[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@##/_/rnying rgyud kha pa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D831}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gu h+ya dz+nyA na ar+tha gar+b+ha kro d+ha badzra ku la tan+t+ra piN+DA r+tha bi d+yA yo ga sid+d+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[1b.2\]]thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po khro bo rdo rje'i rigs kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rnal 'byor grub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[1b.3\]]dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du 
[\[1b.4\]]bzang po rdo rje sa nga he ru ka gsang ba mchog gi bdag po byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang phyug_/mi zad mdzod kyi bkod pa/_che ba'i don la dam pa'i spyod pas bskyod pa de/_rmad du byung 
[\[1b.5\]]ba'i don 'di nyid bshad pa'i gnas gsang ba'i yang gsang ba kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang thig le bdal ba'i klong /_ye 'byam rmad du grags pa'i gzhal yas rgya phyogs 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]su yongs su ma chad pa/_chos nyid kyi nam mkha' las cho 'phrul gyi sprin kun du 'thibs pa byang chub kyi char mngon par 'bab pa/_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba bangs par gyur pa/_ye shes kyi myu gu mngon par bskyed pa/_
[\[2a.2\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa/_rtse mo kun du rgya mnyam pa/_rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par brgyan pa/_mu tig gi lcang lo dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_lda ldis mdzes pa/_nyi ma chen pos gsal btab pa/_zla ba chen pos phra bkod pa/_skar 
[\[2a.3\]]ma dang shin tu skar ma dag gis gzer spras pa/_rdo rje rin po che'i 'od snang bas kun du mdangs phyung ba'i mkha' la/_rlung nag gi phung po rgya yongs su ma chad par mnyam pa/_khrag gi phung po dba' klong du 'khrug pa/_rgya phyogs su yongs su ma 
[\[2a.4\]]chad pa/_ma tang gi gnas dang /_pris ma 'bur 'phang bar chags pa/_rus pa phung po rgya kun du mnyam pa'i gzhi la 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer kun du 'phro ba/_ga bu cung brtsegs pa'i rtsig pa la/_gnam lcags kyi gzer ta le bar 
[\[2a.5\]]btab pa/_rtsibs kun du nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang ma rangs par 'phyo ba/_nya chen po'i ka gdung la nya phran dral drab gtams pa/_zla ba'i ka rten dang /_nyi ma'i ka lo dang /_sbrul chun gyi ka rgyan la sogs pa/_hU~M gi thog dang /_me'i char 
[\[2a.6\]]mngon par 'bab pa/_chos nyid kyi bla res rnam par brgyan pa/_ye shes kyi lda ldis mngon par bres pa/_rdo rje'i rgyan dang 'phan gyis bklubs pa/_sbrul nag gi zar tshags dang /_sprin nag gi grib so lta bus gzhol ba'i bar bar thams cad 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]na rin po che dang /_mu tig dang /_me tog gis mdzes pa/_'khor ba'i maN+Da la yo bkram la bam ril che chung dang /_khog skam stod smad dang /_yan lag ring thung dang /_dbang po'i phreng ba dang /_rdo rjes kun du spras pa/_sgo dgus kun du gsal bar gyur pa'i gnas 
[\[2b.2\]]na rdo rje rgyal tshab ces bya ba'i zhe sdang rdo rje dang /_rdo rje go phur zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal rin chen dang /_rdo rje ging zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags pad+mo dang /_rdo rje karma zhes bya ba'i phrag dog sna tshogs dang /_rdo rje bya rog ces bya ba'i drod kyi rtags 'dzin dang /_rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya 
[\[2b.3\]]ba'i mthun 'jug gi bka' sdod dang /_rdo rje spun thams cad dang /_rdo rje ming thams cad dang /_rdo rje rig 'dzin thams cad dang /_rdo rje lus thams cad dang /_rdo rje rnal 'byor thams cad dang /_rdo rje ngag thams cad dang /_rdo rje las thams cad dang /_rdo rje yid 
[\[2b.4\]]thams cad dang /_rdo rje ma thams cad dang /_rdo rje ging thams cad dang /_rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang /_rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro ba thams cad dang /_rdo rje phra men ma thams cad dang /_rdo rje kun tu 'bar ma thams cad dang /_rdo rje gnod sbyin thams cad dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]rdo rje srin mo thams cad dang /_rdo rje slas dang /_byi mo dang /_bran mo la sogs pa bud med thams cad dang /_rdo rje mngag pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje khro bo thams cad 'du bar gyur pa/_rdo rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_'gying bag gi tshul gyis bsnyengs pa 
[\[2b.6\]]mi mnga' bar rdo rje'i gdan la 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/_cho 'phrul chen po nam mkha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_cho 'phrul chen po rnam grol sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_cho 'phrul chen po rnam grol sgrogs pa 
[\[2b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_cho 'phrul chen po thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_nam mkha'i bu mo dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_nam mkha'i bu mo dga' sdud ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_nam mkha'i bu mo rnam par 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gdung ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_nam mkha'i bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo la sogs te/_shin tu gsang ba chen po'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang dam tshig chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_dam tshig chen 
[\[3a.2\]]po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_dam tshig chen po nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_dam tshig chen po pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_dam tshig chen po bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_dam 
[\[3a.3\]]tshig chen mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_dam tshig chen mo nor bu'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_dam tshig chen mo pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_dam tshig chen mo rgyan 
[\[3a.4\]]gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo la sogs te/_shin tu mi 'da' ba chen po'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang tshad med pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_gsang ba chen po byams pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_gsang ba chen po snying rje'i snying 
[\[3a.5\]]po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_gsang ba chen po dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_gsang ba chen po btang snyoms kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_gsang ba chen po bde ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_gsang 
[\[3a.6\]]ba chen mo 'joms byed dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_gsang ba chen mo dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_gsang ba chen mo khyab pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /_shin tu tshad med 
[\[3a.7\]]pa'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang rol pa chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas yak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas rak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas b+hig sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma yak+Sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma rak+Sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma b+hig sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[3b.2\]]rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu rol pa chen po'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas te sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen po'i 
[\[3b.3\]]sangs rgyas ke sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas pa sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma te sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs 
[\[3b.4\]]byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ke sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma pe shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor dang /_
[\[3b.5\]]gzhan yang 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas trag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas hri sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas ka sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[3b.6\]]'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas bag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma trag sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma tri sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ka sha 
[\[3b.7\]]sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bag sha sho ri ka la sogs te/_shin tu 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang za byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas ru ti he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas rag ti he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas kha hi he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas sa ha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ru ti sho ri ka zhes bya ba 
[\[4a.2\]]dang /_za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma tag ti sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kha hi sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /_za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma sa ha sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rab tu mang zhing bsam gyis mi 
[\[4a.3\]]khyab pa'i he ru ka mtha' yas pa sha stag rnams dang /_gzhan yang gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_gsang ba'i bu mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo rkun mo zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo rmongs mo zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu 
[\[4a.4\]]mo ro langs ma zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo lbos mo zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo gtum mo zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo sme sha can zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba'i bu mo ma tshogs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 
[\[4a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhan yang dga' ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_dga' ba'i bu mo seng gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo bya rgod gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo stag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo wa 
[\[4a.6\]]gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo dur bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_dga' ba'i bu mo mun gdong ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu dga' ba'i bu mo'i 
[\[4a.7\]]'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhan yang shin tu gus pa'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_shin tu gus pa'i bu mo rta gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gus pa'i bu mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gus pa'i bu mo spre'u gdong ma zhes bya ba 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dang /_shin tu gus pa'i bu mo thal byed ma la sogs pa shin tu gus pa'i bu mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang shin tu gsod pa chen po'i sras kyi 'khor la 'di lta ste/_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal stag gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen 
[\[4b.2\]]po dpal g.yag gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal sha ba'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal gzig gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal rta'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod 
[\[4b.3\]]pa chen po dpal spyang ki'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal seng+ge'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal dom gyi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod pa chen po dpal phag gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu 
[\[4b.4\]]gsod pa chen po dpal dred mo'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje gsod ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje dur khrod ces bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje gtun khung zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo 
[\[4b.5\]]rje gtum mo zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje za byed ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje 'dren ma zhes bya ba 
[\[4b.6\]]dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje spor ma zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu gsod ma chen mo'i 'khor rab tu mang po rnams dang /_de dag la sogs te rdul phra rab snyed dang thabs cig go/_/yum rdo rje kun du bzang mo sa nga sho ri kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khril te/_
[\[4b.7\]]mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gsung mnyam pa 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhugs so/_/thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te/_'jug pa'am/_ldog pa'am/_rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[5a.2\]]'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des dbyings kyi ngang la mi g.yo bar brnal bzhin du yum rdo rje kun du bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi glu 'di blangs te rnam par bskul to/_/yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus/_/nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig 
[\[5a.3\]]nye bar gshegs/_/ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong /_/mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs/_/zhes bskul nas/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar par 
[\[5a.4\]]mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste/_dper na nam mkha' dang ba las zla ba dri ma med par shar ba lta bu'o/_/de nas yum sa nga sho ri ka la gzigs te/_'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do/_/dper na nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bkye 
[\[5a.5\]]ba lta bu'o/_/de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las byang chub kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te/_rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /_
[\[5a.6\]]rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang /_dung dang ker kor dang gling bu dang rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi sgeg pa dang steg pa dang /_'khyud pa dang steng ba dang /_sbyor ba dang bstim pa dang mnyes pa dang /_rol pa sna 
[\[5a.7\]]tshogs kyis gsol ba dang myang ba dang /_'cha' ba dang bde ba dang /_spro ba dang /_'jo ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzad do/_/de nas yum kun du bzang mo des spyan zim bag gis rnam par 'dud 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bltas te/_rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun du sa la brdabs nas rol pa chen po'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha/_/longs spyod 
[\[5b.2\]]rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku/_/rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag_/thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des glu des bskul bar thugs su chud nas/_bde ba chen po'i 
[\[5b.3\]]ngang de las cho 'phrul chen por rnam par bzhengs te/_rnam par 'gying ba dang /_rnam par brjid pa dang /_gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /_rnam par bshad pa sna tshogs dang /_zhabs kyi brkyang bskum dang /_sku'i 'gyur bag dang /_smin ris kyi 'bri ku ta bsgyur 
[\[5b.4\]]ba dang /_sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas thams cad dang thams cad la mtshan ma dang /_rnam pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa thams cad la gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun la khyab par mdzad de/_de dag 
[\[5b.5\]]gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje kun du bzang mo de ngo mtshar du gyur te/_yang rnal 'byor pa'i phyag lus kun du sa la brdabs te/_cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku/_/thabs dang 
[\[5b.6\]]shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i/_/'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas/_/bde gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad bzhengs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje rol ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[5b.7\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas yum rdo rje kun du bzang mo dang /_dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa de 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]kho na'i glu 'dis bskul te gsol ba btab bo/_/e ma'o/_/yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las/_/khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing /_/gzi brjid sprin dpung rol pas bsgyings pa'i sku/_/thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i 
[\[6a.2\]]cho 'phrul ston/_/e ma'o/_/yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las/_/snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing /_/yan lag rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa'i gsung /_/seng+ge sgra yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston/_/e ma'o/_/ye shes snying po 
[\[6a.3\]]nyi ma lta bu las/_/ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing /_/thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs/_/rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston/_/mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtshos bcings pa thabs kyis khrol/_/
[\[6a.4\]]ma rig mun pas ldongs pa don gyis phye/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po/_/ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan/_/rnal 'byor theg chen rdo rje kun 'dus rgyud/_/'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher 
[\[6a.5\]]bshad du gsol/_/a la la ho zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te 'dzum pa 
[\[6a.6\]]mdzad do/_/'dzum pa mdzad pas thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa khyab par shar bar mdzad do/_/'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje he ru ka rab tu mang ba'i tshogs bshad 
[\[6a.7\]]par mdzad do/_/de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do/_/de dag las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab pas mun pa'i klong thams cad gsal bar mdzad do/_/rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]dang /_rig pa'i chos kyi char dang /_rig pa'i chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang /_gar sna tshogs dang /_rig pa'i chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste/_'byam klas pa'i nam mkha' la sgra sna tshogs phan tshun dang /_yan man dang /_snrel zhi la sogs pa thams 
[\[6b.2\]]cad du khyab par ling long phyad par byung ngo /_/mchod pa'i char yang mngon par phab/_rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ling long phyad rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o/_/rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang a la la ho zhes sgra 
[\[6b.3\]]sgrogs/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag kyang gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu/_e ma'o rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrogs/_'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar skyed/_rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs don gyi che 
[\[6b.4\]]ba phyung /_ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje 
[\[6b.5\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M rdo rje 'du bar bsdus pa yi/_/dam tshig chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams/_/bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral 'khod de/_/rigs ma yin pa rigs min 'gyur/_/skal ba bzang po'i dam tshig 'di/_/
[\[6b.6\]]skal ba ngan la 'bab mi 'gyur/_/de las 'das na de rlag byed/_/hU~M kro d+ha dz+wa la sa ma ya/_rak+Sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/_yak+Sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/_tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis zhal ljags kyi dbang po 'od me dpung chen po las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba 
[\[6b.7\]]dang /_srin po 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /_gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrug pa dang /_za byed 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba brgyud mar byung bas ru tra can dang /_bdud dang /_srin mo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'jug sred dang /_sred med dang /_dbang 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]phyug dang /_stobs ldan dang /_spre'u dang /_ra dang /_lu 'de dang /_sbrang ma dang /_bya rog dang /_me khyer dang /_'khor ba dang /_chu dang /_sa dang /_nam mkha' dang /_me dang /_sgra dang /_bsam ngan la sogs pa brlag ste/_mi 
[\[7a.2\]]gnas par gyur cing rmad du byung ba nyid du mdzad do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang /_'khor mang po dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa/_e ma'o/_e ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol ba 
[\[7a.3\]]btab pa las/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhal gyi mdangs phyung ste/_'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil ba dang /_mdzes shing bde ba dang ldan pas thams cad rangs par byas pas snod du rung bar rnam par sbyangs nas 'od de 
[\[7a.4\]]dag 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa/_gsang ba'i nges pa/_rgyud kyi 'grel 
[\[7a.5\]]pa/_rtags kyi rol pa/_rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po sgra 'dis bshad do/_/a o oM/_sa ma ya/_a d+hi/_gu h+ya/_pu ti a ho ku la ma tong bying ta pa dra a mo g+ha I shwar sa ma ya na/_gu ti a la la ho zhes cang mi gsung ngo /_/kun du mi 
[\[7a.6\]]gsung /_rab tu mi gsung /_gsungs pa mi 'gog 'gog pa ma yin/_ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so/_/rnam par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la zhal gzigs te/_'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[7a.7\]]dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' des bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs nas/_rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas lce pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas/_lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas nas/_seng+ge'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]lta stangs kyis byas nas ston pa'i zhal du bltas te/_rdo rje rgyal po tshogs bdag dgongs su gsol/_/chos kyi rgyal po mi g.yo rgyal tshul mdzad/_/rgyal mchog rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po'i mthus/_/'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol/_/a la 
[\[7b.2\]]la ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje las kyi bka' ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/badzra karma tsakra satwa 
[\[7b.3\]]ra~M/_zhes gsungs te/_rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo gcig sems dpa' rdo rje'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob par gyur te/_rnam par rol pa chen po shin tu bla bkyal ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/_/byin gyis brlabs nas kun du mi gzo 
[\[7b.4\]]ba rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen por gyur to/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag tu blangs te/_stabs sna tshogs dang /_gar dang /_glu sna tshogs rdo rje tshig tu len cing rdo rje rgya gram las kyi 'khor lo de lan rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas 
[\[7b.5\]]grangs gnyis dang lnga bsgyur bas/_zhing khams mtha' dag rnam par g.yos te/_g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs/_rab tu 
[\[7b.6\]]'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur rab tu 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur/_chem rab tu chem/_kun du rab tu chem par gyur te/_zhing khams thams cad ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sha stag tu gyur/_bcud yul thams cad ni phyag rgya chen por 
[\[7b.7\]]gyur/_rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gdan la 'gying bag gi tshul gyis rnam par gnas so/_/de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]e ma bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar byin rlabs che ba/_'di ltar rgya che ba/_'di ltar mkhas pa/_'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa lags so/_/zhes 
[\[8a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi phyi mo/_/snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[8a.3\]]rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yab/_rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mes chen po/_/mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi ded dpon/_bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po/_/chos thams cad kyi mdzod/_ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur 
[\[8a.4\]]pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa mnyam pa'i dus/_pha mtha' las kyang pha mtha'/_dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa/_'byam klas pa'i dus nas bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/_chos 
[\[8a.5\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing gnas pas na/_rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/_de 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal ba las 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni 
[\[8a.6\]]'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'di ngo mtshar lags so/_/sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la logs su btud de lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas te/_rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang /_tshogs kyi mchod pa sna 
[\[8a.7\]]tshogs byas te/_'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod/_/sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa/_/ci ltar zhing 'dir snang zhig gu/_/rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras/_/ngo mtshar khyod kyis spyod pas na/_/bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]sgrub pa'i lam mchog dam pa dag_/tshig gis mtshon de gsal bar mdzod/_/a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas dam pa rdo rjes rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid bag tu tshig tu mtshon te smras pa/_oM A~MHhU~M/_a la la ho/_rgyal ba'i sras pos 
[\[8b.2\]]cang mi gsung /_/mi gsung bas ni rgya cher bshad/_/bshad du med pa'i chos 'di ni/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de/_/de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang /_/rnam par brjod par mi bzhed de/_/rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o/_/skye ba med pa'i 
[\[8b.3\]]chos rnams ni/_/ma skyes par yang snying por bzhed/_/snying po'i don du gang gyur pa/_/tshig tu smra ba legs ma yin/_/spros pa nyid na gol ba zhes/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bshad/_/de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid/_/bka' ma stsal bar dgongs pa'o/_/
[\[8b.4\]]dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa/_/ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar/_/dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa/_/ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na/_/tshig tu spro bar ma yin na'ang /_/mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa/_/tshig la zhib cing don la rtsing /_/tshig 
[\[8b.5\]]phyir blo 'brang rtsal zhan rnams/_/bkri phyir bsam pa rangs bya ba/_/mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi/_/cho 'phrul tshig gis mtshon pa ni/_/bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs/_/gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don/_/mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po/_/
[\[8b.6\]]gsal bar bkod de nges brjod kyis/_/rgya chen 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon/_/nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste/_/stong par sbas pa'i don 'di la/_/dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis/_/mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye byas/_/
[\[8b.7\]]sbas pa'i don 'byin gsal byed pa/_/sA lu phub khrod snang me bzhin/_/bsal bteg snang rnyed sa ler 'dug_/zab mor spyod pa la mos pas/_/gang zhig don la 'dris pa yi/_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/mthun pa'i dmigs bcu dper 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bzhag ste/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang /_/gzugs brnyan dri za grong khyer dang /_/brag ca chu zla mig yor dang /_/chu bur 'khrul dang mgal mer snang /_/sgrub dang gsang sngags spyod pa dang /_/
[\[9a.2\]]grub pa dang ni gnas dag dang /_/bzlas pa'i sgra dang phyag rgyar rtog_/ting 'dzin lta ba cho 'phrul brtag_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni/_/skyes bu dag gi rtsol ba dang /_/sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las/_/dbang po yid 'phrog cir snang yang /_/de la 'gro 
[\[9a.3\]]'ong ga la yod/_/de ltar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/yig 'bru rdzas kyi sbyor ba las/_/grub par snang yang rang bzhin med/_/ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni/_/zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la/_/drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las/_/byis pa gdungs pa'i 
[\[9a.4\]]rang bzhin gyis/_/chu yi 'du shes ci bskyed kyang /_/tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur/_/gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang /_/rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la/_/mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags/_/de nyid stong pas ming mi dmigs/_/
[\[9a.5\]]dper na rmi lam rang bzhin ni/_/skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na/_/thang cig skad cig yud tsam dang /_/lo la sogs pa de bzhin du/_/bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong /_/sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltar/_/de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa dag_/stong 
[\[9a.6\]]pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la/_/spyod pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang /_/brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral/_/gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/dper na gdong dang me long las/_/brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs byung yang /_/red par gyur pa ga la yod/_/de bzhin 
[\[9a.7\]]sngags kyi dngos grub kyang /_/sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad las/_/brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang /_/gsol thob dmigs pa ga la yod/_/dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' ngos la/_/dri za'i gzugs ni gar byung yang /_/grong 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]khyer de yang de nas byung /_/byung nas de yang mi rtag ltar/_/gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang /_/chos sam yid kyi mkha' ngos la/_/rnal 'byor gsang bdag gar bskyed par/_/de nyid gnas pa'i gzhal med khang /_/byung yang de la gnas mi 'gyur/_/
[\[9b.2\]]brag ca grag pa'i mtshan ma ni/_/dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas/_/ci bzhin sgra ltar brag ca 'byung /_/byung yang sgrar thos dmigs pa med/_/de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i sgra/_/dper na med las yod brtags pa'i/_/mtshan ma la brten stong ba'i 
[\[9b.3\]]sgra/_/brjod pa tsam du bstan par zad/_/ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni/_/sgrib med mkha' las zla shar ba/_/gzugs brnyan dang ba'i chu nang snang /_/snang yang gzung ba'i rtog med pa/_/de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya yang /_/sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal 
[\[9b.4\]]ba/_/phyag rgya rig 'dzin ngo la snang /_/de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral/_/ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du/_/chu las chu bur rnam par 'byung /_/de yang gcig gi rnam pa las/_/mang po'i rnam grangs du ma 'byung /_/sdud cing phyir yang dum bur 'chad/_/de 
[\[9b.5\]]bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi/_/ting 'dzin rnam pa mang por 'dod/_/'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni/_/spros bral dngos po stong pa las/_/srog dang shed can byed pa po/_/sems can pa la sogs par snang /_/mig nad ngo la rdzas ltar snang /_/'khrul pa kho na 
[\[9b.6\]]snang bar zad/_/de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang /_/cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul ba/_/snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/'khrul pa sna tshogs snang bar zad/_/rnal 'byor can gyis de ltar lta/_/ji ltar mgal me'i rang bzhin ni/_/gang dag lag na mgal me 
[\[9b.7\]]thogs/_/bskor na 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang /_/de la 'khor lo'i rang bzhin med/_/de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang /_/mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las/_/ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste/_/cho 'phrul sna tshogs rgyun mi 'chad/_/de phyir mtshan ma'i 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]chos thams cad/_/mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na/_/rtog pa'i bag chags ci 'byung yang /_/chos kun dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir/_/rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun/_/ma byung ma skyes dbyings nyid la/_/g.yos pa med cing 
[\[10a.2\]]cho 'phrul 'byung /_/yon tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i/_/gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang /_/skad cig gcig la de la 'dus/_/de bas yid bzhin rin chen 'di/_/ldog pa med pas dang du blang /_/don 
[\[10a.3\]]dam yang dag gter gyi mchog_/rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste/_/gang rtogs de 'thob gcig pu nyid/_/'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'/_/bdag med gnyis bral bde chen klong /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che/_/ye nas lhun grub 
[\[10a.4\]]'dus ma byas/_/thig le chos nyid ye 'byam pas/_/kun khyab bdal bas snying por 'dus/_/mi dmigs spros bral byang chub sems/_/zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di/_/mkha' la mdud 'drar gting dpag dka'/_/rnal 'byor dmigs ldan 
[\[10a.5\]]blo chung zhing /_/gang zhig rtsal zhan de rtog pa/_/g.yor mo'i tshul du bdag brtag pa/_/brtags kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na nyi ma'i snying po la/_/mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na/_/de brtags don de mi rtogs kyi/_/'od kyi zer gyis 
[\[10a.6\]]mig rdzir 'gyur/_/de 'drar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/zab mo'i don la cir brtags kyang /_/yang dag don de mi mthong gi/_/blo zhan byis pa ga chad brgyal/_/brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni/_/rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te/_/gang zhig 
[\[10a.7\]]de don mi rtogs phyir/_/g.yang sar ltung ba ci cha yod/_/gdod nas ma thos shin tu dge/_/bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag_/mi brtags bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang /_/byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan/_/bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te/_/bstan 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]du med cing go bar dka'/_/tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral/_/'di zhes bstan du ga la yod/_/med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi phyed/_/mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing /_/yid kyi me long gsal byas na/_/nam mkha' dag la rab brtags na/_/snang 
[\[10b.2\]]ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur/_/chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/_/nam mkha' gang ming rjod byed pa/_/brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste/_/dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang /_/nam mkha' de la 'gag 
[\[10b.3\]]mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed pa/_/brjod pa de nyid rnam rtog ste/_/rnam rtog de yi ming brjod kyang /_/mi rtog de la 'gag mi 'gyur/_/de 'drar sems kyang de ltar blta/_/sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste/_/de bzhin chos kyang grub ma yin/_/sems 
[\[10b.4\]]dang chos nyid gnyis med de/_/sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de/_/chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/_/chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pa/_/bla med byang chub chen por bshad/_/sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtogs/_/de bzhin 
[\[10b.5\]]sa gzhi chen po ltar/_/bla med byang chub myu gu skyed/_/me yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas/_/rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed/_/rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na/_/mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel/_/chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na/_/nyon mongs gdung ba kun sim 
[\[10b.6\]]byed/_/sman gyi rang bzhin yin pas na/_/'khor ba'i gcong rnying rnam par 'byin/_/de ltar rtsi yi rang bzhin pas/_/'tsho ba rnams kyi gsos su 'bab/_/de bzhin rno dbal rang bzhin pas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod/_/nyi ma lta bur snang 
[\[10b.7\]]ba yis/_/mun khang snang ston sel bar byed/_/ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/brtan po mi 'gyur g.yo ba med/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/mi g.yo ba la byin brlabs che/_/sems ni 'di ltar cho 'phrul bas/_/de phyir 'khor dang mya ngan 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'das/_/gnyis su snang ba ma yin te/_/sems kyi rang bzhin bzang ngan las/_/gnyis kyi 'du shes phye ste bstan/_/sems las yang dag ye shes 'byung /_/de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal 'byung /_/chos dang sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung /_/dge 
[\[11a.2\]]'dun yang ni de bzhin no/_/'di las pha rol phyin tshogs dang /_/byang chub dang ni pad+mo 'byung /_/'di las rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/dri med rin chen dpa' sbyin 'byung /_/de bzhin rdo rje dpag med dang /_/sna tshogs rgyal ba 'di las 'byung /_/'di las phyag 
[\[11a.3\]]rgya sna tshogs dang /_/rig pa'i snying po thams cad 'byung /_/'di las 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/sdug bsngal nga rgyal phrag dog 'byung /_/gti mug dag kyang de bzhin te/_/'di las khams gsum thams cad dang /_/skyes pa bud med ma ning 'byung /_/'di 
[\[11a.4\]]las 'dod dang 'dod gzir dang /_/nyon mongs gdung 'dod chags pa 'byung /_/ri dang skye bo de bzhin du/_/nam mkha' dang ni rlung dag dang /_/sreg pa'i me ni rab tu 'byung /_/'di las sa dang chu dang ni/_/rdo dang sa bon myu gu 'byung /_/de bzhin glog dang skar ma 
[\[11a.5\]]dang /_/nyi ma zla ba sprin rnams 'byung /_/de bzhin spyod dang mi spyod kun/_/thams cad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/_/sprin dang na bun khug rlangs dang /_/zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dag_/snang yang nam mkha' bzhin du 
[\[11a.6\]]gnas/_/de bzhin sems kyi nam mkha' las/_/mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci byung yang /_/chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin gnas par/_/rnal 'byor can gyis blta bar bya/_/de lta bu yi sems nyid ni/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs rang bzhin la/_/lta ba'i khyad par 
[\[11a.7\]]so sor blta/_/rtog pa can gyi ngo ga la/_/rtog pa 'khrul pa'i ngo bor snang /_/kun du nyer 'jog lam tshor la/_/kun du rdul gyi phung por snang /_/tshogs spyod snying rje nyer 'jog la/_/thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar/_/de nyid mnyam par shes gnas na/_/
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]nam mkha'i rang bzhin mthong bar gnas/_/ye shes rang snang nam mkha' la/_/nam mkha' nyid du snang bar zad/_/brjod bral mthong med dmigs dang bral/_/mthong ba med pa'i don 'di ni/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/_/bde gshegs 
[\[11b.2\]]snying po byang chub la/_/dgongs pa 'di las gang mi mnga'/_/lta ba de dang ldan bzhin du/_/dam tshig nam mkha' lta bu la/_/bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang bral/_/'di'o zhes ni bsrung du med/_/bsrung ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed cig_/dus gsum 
[\[11b.3\]]rgyal bas gsungs mod kyang /_/bsrung ba'i mdo ni gcig tu 'dus/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor bas/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i dam tshig bsrung /_/de yang bsrung du med na bde/_/gzhan pa theg pa chung ba rnams/_/bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bsrungs 
[\[11b.4\]]nas ni/_/skyon yon chos la blang dor byed/_/bsrung dang bral ba'i chos rnams ni/_/bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag_/de bzhin pa yi dam tshig la/_/ji bzhin pa yi blo gzhag ste/_/brjed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyis/_/bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdam/_/
[\[11b.5\]]bsrung med nam mkha'i dam tshig 'di/_/ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la/_/sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang /_/byis pa rnams ni tha tshig sdom/_/bden gnyis rgyu la ston par grags/_/bla med mchog la dam tshig spyod/_/gcig gi don las ma g.yos 
[\[11b.6\]]kyang /_/'dul dbang ngo la so sor grags/_/kho na nyid ldan dam tshig mchog_/de dang gang ldan dam pa ste/_/de las 'das na 'tshig par 'gyur/_/de phyir dam tshig chen po ni/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar dpa' bos bshad/_/rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad la/_/
[\[11b.7\]]dam tshig 'di las yong mi mnga'/_/spyod pa dag gi khyad par yang /_/chos nyid bya btsal kun bral la/_/bsgrub dang sgrub pa'i dmigs pa med/_/'khrul pa gcod pa'i skye bo dag_/dmigs med byang chub bde chen la/_/sdug bsngal rtsol sems 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bcug pas nor/_/bya ba med pa'i chos nyid la/_/nyon mongs bya med spyad pas 'khrul/_/rang byung lhun grub gnas bzhin du/_/byis pa'i spyod pas ci btsal dgos/_/gang zhig 'dod de ci zhig sgrub/_/ci spyad ci bsgrubs ci btsal 
[\[12a.2\]]yang /_/sdug bsngal nyid de byang chub med/_/dmyal ba sangs rgyas chen po la/_/sdug bsngal byang chub lam nyid de/_/nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis dang /_/theg pa'i khyad par ci bstan pa/_/byed rtsol bcas pa thams cad 'khrul/_/bla med byang chub gegs 
[\[12a.3\]]su che/_/gang zhig btsal med bde chen don/_/sems kyi klong 'dis ma mthong na/_/sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang /_/byis pa don med gyi na 'khyam/_/btsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rtsol ba'i spyod pas ci zhig bya/_/'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la/_/tshig 
[\[12a.4\]]'dzin nor ba'i rtsol byar med/_/bgrod du med pa'i chos nyid la/_/bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor ming dang bral/_/bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la/_/rtog sems bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral/_/btsal med pa yi chos nyid la/_/btsal med ye nas lhun gyis 
[\[12a.5\]]grub/_/mtha' dbus med pas bdal ba che/_/phyi nang med pas ye gsal khyab/_/skyon yon med par lhun gyis rdzogs/_/bsgrub du med pas btsal sems bral/_/gzung du med pas dmigs dang bral/_/thams cad mkhyen pas byin brlabs che/_/gdod 
[\[12a.6\]]nas byang chub snying por gnas/_/spyod pa'i khyad par 'di lta bu/_/des na gcig las med bzhin du/_/spyod mthun rtsol ba'i rang bzhin la/_/rnam rtog spyod pa so sor snang /_/'khrul ba thams cad 'khor bar spyod/_/rgyu 'bras mi slu bden don spyod/_/
[\[12a.7\]]mi dmigs pa la nam mkhar spyod/_/de ltar spyod pa kun spyod kyang /_/dam pa'i don de spyod mchog nyid/_/dam par gyur pa thams cad la/_/dam pa'i spyod pa de las med/_/skyes bu mchog gis de skad bshad/_/the tshom med par shes par gyis/_/ma bcos 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]byang chub de bzhin nyid/_/bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la/_/bsgom pa dmigs su med pa ste/_/ting 'dzin zhes ni gdags su med/_/bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin la/_/de bzhin ma bsgoms stor ba med/_/bsgom chos sna tshogs cir snang yang /_/bsgoms 
[\[12b.2\]]nas de yi ngang mi gnas/_/de bas byis pa'i spyod yul yin/_/dper na byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/sa la sogs pa gzugs sna tshogs/_/mdzes par byas nas skad cig mthong /_/mthong ba nyid na ma grub ste/_/skad cig kho nas zhig gyur nas/_/
[\[12b.3\]]sa la sogs pa'i rdul du snang /_/de bzhin rnal 'byor byis pa yis/_/gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs bsgom/_/sems kyi bye brag skad cig la/_/yid kyi rgyu ba sna tshogs 'byung /_/byung ba bzhin du de ma grub/_/sems kyi skad cig dran pa la/_/yid kyi 
[\[12b.4\]]dmigs pa rgyun chad nas/_/byung tshor chad pa'i mtha' spangs te/_/chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur ni/_/brjod med rgyun mi 'chad par dmigs/_/de don phyin ci ma log par/_/brjed med ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mchog_/ci phyir chos kyi dbyings nyid ni/_/nam 
[\[12b.5\]]mkha' lta bur 'dus ma byas/_/bsam du med pas nam mkha' 'dra/_/brjod du med pas gzugs dang bral/_/kun gzhi kun du nam mkha' la/_/yid ni mkha' la nyi shar 'dra/_/rnam shes nyon mongs sprin gyis khebs/_/'du byed rlung gis kun bskyod 
[\[12b.6\]]de/_/gsal dang byung 'jug sangs dang 'gag_/rnam shes mtshan ma'i rtog pa yis/_/kun gzhi nam mkha' mthong mi ster/_/kun gzhi mthong nyid chos sku ste/_/'di don nam mkha' ma brjed pa/_/ting 'dzin chen po rgyun mi 'chad/_/gang zhig 
[\[12b.7\]]'di don yid 'chang ba/_/gzugs kyi dngos po cir snang yang /_/sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das/_/bde chen sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/dgongs pa 'di las yong mi mnga'/_/snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' 'di/_/ting 'dzin chen por gnas bzhin 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]du/_/'di las glags te ci zhig tshol/_/rgyal bas btsal kyang yong mi rnyed/_/'di las gzhan du gang tshol ba/_/btsal ba nyid na tshi chad 'gyur/_/gzhan nam dman pa'i sgo rnams ni/_/ting 'dzin med pa'i chos nyid la/_/'dzin 
[\[13a.2\]]pa'i ting 'dzin bcug pas nor/_/de dag la ni gang spyod rnams/_/then tsher mig ni nam mkha' la/_/phra rab then thag 'dzud pa ltar/_/byis pa las gang byed pa de/_/shed can dag gis byar mi rung /_/shed can spyod pa'i nam mkha' de/_/then tsher nam mkhar 
[\[13a.3\]]shong mi 'gyur/_/de bas gzhan la bstan pa min/_/bstan na byis pa ga chad 'gyur/_/chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos/_/gsal bar 'od stong nyi mas 'grub/_/byin brlabs 'od kyi zer phreng tsam/_/sgyu ma ltar snang mtshan mar thob/_/mi g.yo mtshan 
[\[13a.4\]]med rang bzhin dngos/_/skye med sems kyis ma mthong ba/_/byis pa 'drid pa'i rtsed mor snang /_/dngos grub chen po'i sems nyid de/_/yid bzhin 'byung ba rin po che/_/ji ltar dmigs shing bsgyur bar 'gyur/_/grub pa'i don chen thams cad rdzogs/_/
[\[13a.5\]]sems kyis sems kyi tshul mthong na/_/dngos grub ces de dag las 'ong /_/gang gis stsol te su yis blang /_/stsal dang stsol bar byed mi dmigs/_/dper na chu dang me long dang /_/mkha' dang ral gri shel la sogs/_/gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la/_/
[\[13a.6\]]rnyog med la sogs bltas gsal ba/_/chu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/de la ngo mtshar che mi 'byung /_/sems kyi chu gsal nam mkha' la/_/nyon mongs sprin gyis rnyog med na/_/dngos grub nyi zla skar tshogs bkram/_/sgrib med byin brlabs ngang gis 'char/_/
[\[13a.7\]]kun gzhi nam mkha'i snying po de/_/nyon mongs sprin gyis gting spungs pa/_/shes rab rlung gis ma gtor bar/_/ga zha mkhan gyi spyo 'dri yis/_/sgrib bsal chos nyid gsal 'dod pa/_/ji ltar chus gsher byis pa dag_/nyi ma sprin ldan grib ma yis/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]shin tu bsgribs par gyur pa na/_/sprin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la/_/kha yi dbugs kyis bus byas na/_/sprin bsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'dra/_/de phyir rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/_/sems nyid don la rnam brtags te/_/kun gzhi rtsa ba shes par bya/_/
[\[13b.2\]]sems nyid de la bltas gsal ba/_/rtsa ba dang ni gang ldan pa/_/dus dang tshigs dang lor gyur yang /_/yal ga lo 'dab 'bras bur bskrun/_/rtsa ba'i sa bon med mi 'gyur/_/ci ltar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/nan gyis mtshan pa'i dngos grub dag_/byis 
[\[13b.3\]]pa'i sems kyis blang 'dod na/_/de yang mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur/_/dper na me yi rang bzhin dag_/sa dang nags tshal sreg byed pa/_/rgyu rnams tshogs pa'i bden pa las/_/med las yod pa'i bden par snang /_/de ltar mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor yang /_/mtshan 
[\[13b.4\]]ma'i cho 'phrul thob 'dod pa/_/mtshan ma'i rgyu rnams tshogs pa las/_/mtshan ma rangs pa'i mtshan mar snang /_/shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la/_/byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pa'i/_/dam pa'i don la cher dmigs pas/_/gsang mchog rig pa'i dngos grub 
[\[13b.5\]]myur/_/mtshan mar mi rtog rang bzhin gyis/_/zab mo'i don chen go ba ni/_/nges pa'i don gyis thag gcad de/_/mnyam pa'i don la yid ches bya/_/ji ltar mkha' la tshig tsam du/_/ngang du brjod pas rjod byed kyi/_/brjod pa'i tha snyad dang bral bas/_/ji ltar 
[\[13b.6\]]'khrigs kyi smig rgyu dag_/snang ba nyid na med pa ltar/_/chos so cog gi rang bzhin gsal/_/gsal ba nyid na de mi dmigs/_/thabs chen gting zab shes rab lam/_/spros bral mtshan ma'i 'phrang las 'das/_/gtos ches yangs pas lam gnyis 
[\[13b.7\]]bral/_/dbus mtha' mi dmigs mnyam pa'i lam/_/gcig tu mnyam par chud nas ni/_/yul med tshol ba'i sems bral de/_/blang dor gnyis kyi mtha' spangs nas/_/gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/chos nyid dbyings su ro gcig phyir/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]shes dang shes bya gnyis med de/_/ye nas shes nyid chos shes na/_/chos nyid gzhan nas btsal ci dgos/_/dper na sgyu ma'i bde sdug kyang /_/bsal nas gnyi ga mi dmigs ltar/_/'khor ba 'gyur ba'i bde sdug kyang /_/mnyam par 
[\[14a.2\]]rang bzhin don gyis mnyam/_/ji ltar dus rnams thams cad dag_/mnyam pa nyid du rtogs nas ni/_/sgros tshig rjes su ma 'brangs na/_/mnyam 'gyur dus rnams ga la dmigs/_/mkha' la ngang gis gzugs med phyir/_/dmigs su zin par mi 
[\[14a.3\]]'gyur bzhin/_/sems kyis ma skyes don mi dpogs/_/skyon dang yon tan gnyis 'byed pa/_/rtogs nas gnyis kyi don spangs te/_/rang bzhin mnyam par don bzhag na/_/bsgom zhes ming du brjod par zad/_/gnyis su lta ba ma skyes phyir/_/gnyis kyi 
[\[14a.4\]]'du shes ci byung yang /_/rang byung zhi ba ma bkag chos/_/ye nas ma bcos don gyis gsal/_/ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/_/mi gnas ye shes thugs dang mnyam/_/rig dang ma rig khyad par las/_/'khor 'das rten dang 'brel 
[\[14a.5\]]bar snang /_/rnam rtog med phyir zhi ba med/_/'dzin par ma yin spros bral min/_/drang ba'i don bstan ma gtogs par/_/don la tshig gis brjod du med/_/snang yang med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/shes blo yod pa'i sems mi 'byung /_/mnyam nyid 
[\[14a.6\]]stong pa'i don 'di la/_/don ldan stong pa'i sgro mi 'dogs/_/ma bcos rang bzhin zhi ba yi/_/mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas/_/med do tsam du'ang mi dmigs na/_/byung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur/_/thams cad mi gnas byang chub pas/_/
[\[14a.7\]]btsal nas grub pa ma yin yang /_/sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul bral bzhin/_/spros bral ye shes snying por gnas/_/'khor bar rtogs pa dug yin te/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi shes na/_/dug 'thungs bde ba ga las 'ong /_/sbyar legs dug 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]nyid sman du 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i las rnams de ltar snang /_/'khrul snang dug gzer bzod dka' ltar/_/ma rig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal snang /_/rmi lam sgyu 'phrul mi zad pas/_/shin tu nyam thag gdungs pa'i tshe/_/'chi bdag bdud kyis zin 'dra la/_/
[\[14b.2\]]mgon btsun gzhan gyis mi phan te/_/bdud sel rtsi dang 'dra bar ni/_/yang dag lam mchog rtogs par bya/_/dug nad smyo sangs 'byang ba la/_/skad cig ma la mi bzod cing /_/sman dang sman pa'i rtsol bsgrubs pa/_/sangs nas de dag mi dmigs ltar/_/
[\[14b.3\]]'khor ba mi dmigs 'khrul pa la/_/rmi lam nad sel rtsol sgrub ltar/_/sgrub dang ting 'dzin rtsol byed kyang /_/'khor ba stong rtogs nyid byang chub/_/sgyu ma rgyu 'bras mi slu bzhin/_/blun rmongs ngo la de ltar snang /_/mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal can dag_/'khor ba 
[\[14b.4\]]'khrul pa'i tshig tsam du/_/ma nor lam rig blo la gsal/_/de la rtsol thob rlom sems med/_/sems nyid don dang ma mnyam na/_/tshig gis mnyam pas don mi dpogs/_/'khrul 'khor mnyam las ma g.yos kyang /_/log rtogs sgyu ma'i tshul tsam 
[\[14b.5\]]snang /_/sems nyid ye sangs rgyas rig nas/_/rig pa'i don la brtson sbyor zhing /_/rang 'byung yon tan rtsal sdud pa/_/'khrul par 'brel ba ga la yin/_/byang chub sems ldan bsam rdzogs na/_/ye shes mchog ldan mnyam nyid sku/_/ting 'dzin mchog 
[\[14b.6\]]ldan bla ma'i dbang /_/dge bsags mchog ldan lus spyod pa'i/_/bsod nams mchog ldan gzugs kyi sku/_/rnam smin tshul gyis 'grub mi lta/_/btsal nas thob par mi byed de/_/rgyu yi dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog_/dpyod pa'i sems nyid ting 'dzin ni/_/
[\[14b.7\]]sems can dus na don la spyod/_/lhun grub sa la bgrod mi byed/_/'khor ba'i sa shes bde ldan gnas/_/mi gnas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yang /_/byang chub 'khor ba'i lam dang 'brel/_/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma bkag tshul/_/rang byung rtog bral gcig 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]tu mnyam/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi don btsan par/_/chos nyid la yang chos nyid gsal/_/mnyam pas mnyam zhes tshig brjod kyang /_/mnyam pa'i don dang mthun mi 'gyur/_/byang chub de yang mi dmigs te/_/mi gnas zhes ni gang brjod cing /_/
[\[15a.2\]]gnas dang dmigs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa/_/gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la bya/_/sgyu 'drar byang chub sems med na/_/dngos bral yul med stong pa dag_/mkha' la rang bzhin mi gnas zhes/_/bstan pa de ni yod ma yin/_/bsam gtan lus ni gtsor byed 
[\[15a.3\]]dang /_/gnas de lus kyi phyag rgya kun/_/mtshan mar mngon par zhen las byung /_/mtshan med sems la bya btsal med/_/smig rgyu bzhin du lus red na/_/gnas dang phyag rgyar dmigs pa med/_/byed spyod ched du ston byed cing /_/bya med bya ba'i dmigs 
[\[15a.4\]]pa'ang med/_/de nyid ma skyes gzhi med pas/_/gnas bder lus bcos kha na med/_/zhen par 'chos lam spyod byed pa/_/de nyid gzung 'dzin rnam rtog ste/_/bsam gtan lus dben dben ma yin/_/mkha' la sems dben dben pa'i mchog_/sems nyid 
[\[15a.5\]]dben pa'i gnas yin te/_/'di ni rnal 'byor spyod mchog gnas/_/bla gab ri phug gzhal med min/_/sems nyid dpag yas gzhal med mchog_/'di ni rmad byung nor bu'i gzhal/_/phyi dang nang med kun du nang /_/'du bar 'dus pa tshogs ma yin/_/
[\[15a.6\]]sems la ye shes tshogs 'dus mchog_/chos kun 'dus pas lus pa med/_/dpag med rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs/_/kun rdzob 'byor pa yo byad min/_/sems nyid 'byor pa rdzas dang ldan/_/lhag pa'i rdzas mchog 'di shes na/_/bsgrub 'grub 
[\[15a.7\]]'di la the tshom med/_/sgom par byed pa sgom pa min/_/bsam bya dmigs su med pa ste/_/'di ltar sems kyi gsang sgom pa/_/don la sems sgom ting 'dzin mchog_/bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs/_/stong par sbas pa'i sems nyid de/_/mtshan 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]mar 'das nas tshig shes na/_/bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o/_/tshig tu mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs/_/sems nyid rang dag mnyam pa las/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid lhag par med/_/'di don mnyam shes mnyam pa'i don/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa spyod 
[\[15b.2\]]min te/_/sems la sems gzhol rol spyod pa/_/thabs che yangs pa spyod pa'i mchog_/byang chub don gyi phyi mo ru/_/sems kyi phyi mor ye gnas pas/_/gsol thob mtshan ma'i ming mi dmigs/_/dngos grub chen po rgyun mi 'chad/_/de ltar sems kyis 
[\[15b.3\]]sems mthong na/_/ye shes kyis ni chos nyid mthong /_/dus kun du ni skye 'gag med/_/sngon ma mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur/_/de yang dngos po cang mi mthong /_/thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhig_/blo la 'gyus pa kho nar zad/_/de lta bu yi don mthong na/_/
[\[15b.4\]]mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med/_/sgyu ma tsam du tshul shes nas/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i don snang 'gyur/_/kha cig dag ni de don la/_/mthong ba ci yang med 'gyur na/_/snang ba zhes ni ci phyir gdags/_/med pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur zhes/_/the tshom za 
[\[15b.5\]]'gyur de dag la/_/mthong ba med pa'i don de nyid/_/yid kyi ngo la snang 'gyur na/_/snang zhes de phyir brjod par bya/_/de bas 'khrul pa ma zad par/_/nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de/_/de nyid yid la snang 'gyur yang /_/gzugs la snang bar 'gyur ba min/_/
[\[15b.6\]]sems nyid bden par ma mthong na/_/yid la mtshan med don gsal dang /_/mtshan ma 'khrul par rgyu ba gnyis/_/'dren mar rgyu byed 'bral 'gyur min/_/de nyid bden par mthong 'gyur na/_/de nas de ma thag tu yang /_/yid kyi rgyu ba rgyun chad nas/_/sngar 
[\[15b.7\]]'khrul mtshan ma'i chos bral te/_/des ni bden pa mthong ba yin/_/de bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/_/sems ni yang dag lam nyid de/_/mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin/_/gol med lam zhes 'dren pas bshad/_/de ltar bshad pa'i lam de yang /_/
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]kun gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/tshig tu mtshon te bshad mod kyang /_/dmigs med tshig gi yul bral ba/_/de yi rang bzhin de yin na/_/rang bzhin gzhi las mtshan mar g.yos/_/de la ming med ming btags rgyus/_/yin dang ma 
[\[16a.2\]]yin the tshom skyes/_/de las rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur te/_/de bsal don phyir mtshan ma yi/_/tshig gi tshogs kyi rnam grangs las/_/sgo mo dpag tu med par bshad/_/de yis nges don rjes bcad pa/_/thugs kyi klong nas bton pa yi/_/tshig gi sgron mas 
[\[16a.3\]]don btsal ba/_/lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/_/dran byung rjes su 'brengs na ni/_/'khor ba'i gnas su 'khor bar 'gyur/_/dran 'byung g.yo ba ci bkag pa/_/de dag 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur/_/dran byung med par blun pa ni/_/mu stegs can lam mun par 'gyur/_/
[\[16a.4\]]'di zhes sems su gcig bzung na/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin/_/snga phyi med ces phyang bcad na/_/med de chad pa'i mu can yin/_/gzhi yi don las yud tsam zhig_/cir g.yos skye 'gag byung ba de/_/rnam grangs lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi/_/lam 
[\[16a.5\]]gyi chos nyid ga la 'gyur/_/dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag_/grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol/_/rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/btsal na grib med dag mi rnyed/_/don nyid ye nas gnas bzhin du/_/sems nyid sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis/_/sha thang bar ni 
[\[16a.6\]]don tshol ba/_/don med bdud kyi las yin no/_/don la tshig tu brjod pa ni/_/nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra/_/tshig tu sman dang dpyad bshad kyang /_/nad pa'i tshogs la mi phan no/_/sems nyid don du ma shes na/_/tshig tu don brjod don mi rtogs/_/
[\[16a.7\]]'khor ba spangs nas 'das tshol ba/_/gzugs btang nas ni grib tshol 'dra/_/lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/_/ma rig ye shes tha dad min/_/ma rtogs rtogs pa lam du gcig_/sems 'di sna tshogs par snang bas/_/sna tshogs sems su gcig pa yin/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dper na gser du gcig pa las/_/dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par/_/byis pas so so'i ming du grags/_/grags kyang gser gyi ngo bor gcig_/de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/'khrul dang ma 'khrul khyad par gyis/_/ji ltar bltas dgu 
[\[16b.2\]]der snang yang /_/snang yang sems las gzhan mi dmigs/_/sgron mar 'bar ba'i rin chen ni/_/gal te ngan khung sbas gyur kyang /_/de nyid yon tan rang snang bas/_/'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron/_/
[\[16b.3\]]lus ngag 'khor bar bying gyur kyang /_/rang byung rang zhi rab snang bas/_/shes rab chos nyid mkha' la gsal/_/sems nyid nam mkha' 'drar mtshungs te/_/kun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung /_/byung tshor g.yo 'gog thams cad kyang /_/rang 
[\[16b.4\]]bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi/_/mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin/_/'gyur bas thams cad ngo bor snang /_/ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid la/_/sna tshogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing /_/cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med/_/ci bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin 
[\[16b.5\]]la/_/blo bzhag ma g.yengs kho nar zad/_/de ni skyes mchog don po che/_/de sems dus gsum thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin/_/de lta'i don la ring zhig nas/_/shes shing 'dris par gyur pa na/_/nges don mthong ba'i nyams drod ni/_/
[\[16b.6\]]don dang mjal ba'i rtags chen yang /_/man ngag lung gis brgyad 'char te/_/nges par don gsum myong bar 'gyur/_/de dag thog tu phebs pa yi/_/drod chen rtags su bstan pa yin/_/de yi zhar las byung ba'i drod/_/'khor ba'i chos la snying rje yi/_/byang chub 
[\[16b.7\]]sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la/_/yid mi ches pa'i 'du shes skye/_/chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa las/_/'di ltar 'khrul pa ngo mtshar che/_/ya mtshan dpyod pa'i 'du shes 'byung /_/'di don ma shes 'gro ba rnams/_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]rtsol sgrub dka' ba'i thabs chen gyis/_/yang dag don tshol lam re ring /_/bsags pa'i 'bras bu yod 'gyur yang /_/don de mthong bar yong mi nus/_/de 'dra'i 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar shes pa'i nyams drod ni/_/skal dang 
[\[17a.2\]]ldan pa'i skyes bu gang /_/rgyud 'gros tshig gis ma bkrol bar/_/sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas/_/smra ba'i sgo mor thams cad gsal/_/don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs dag_/tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par nus/_/de ni chos sku mnyam nyid dang /_/
[\[17a.3\]]dbyer med gnyis su med pa yin/_/rten pa'i gsung thugs sku brnyan dang /_/de ni mtshungs pa yod min no/_/zhi lus mthar 'gog skyon gnyis dang /_/de ni mtshungs pa yod ma yin/_/sa la slob pa'i sems dpa' dang /_/de yang mi mtshungs rgyal bas gsungs/_/
[\[17a.4\]]rig 'dzin drang srong don dpyod dang /_/lus 'dra sems ni yong mi mtshungs/_/de phyir rnam dag lam chen ni/_/sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na/_/skal ldan 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/_/lam 'di shes par bya ba las/_/btsal bar bya ba'i rgyu med de/_/
[\[17a.5\]]lam 'di shes pa de nyid kyis/_/dka' ba'i rtsol sgrub ma byas par/_/thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de bas na sems 'di ni lam zhes bya'o/_/'khor ba zhes bya'o/_/sems can zhes bya'o/_/gru zhes bya'o/_/bgrod pa 
[\[17a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/byang chub ces bya'o/_/sems zhes bya'o/_/shes rab ces bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/gnas zhes bya'o/_/rab ces bya'o/_/mchog ces bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/zab pa zhes bya'o/_/gsang ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[17a.7\]]gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/chos zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jug pa'i phyir ni lam mo/_/'khrul pa'i phyir ni 'khor ba'o/_/ma shes pa'i phyir ni sems can no/_/sgrol ba'i 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]phyir ni gru'o/_/bskyod pa'i phyir ni bgrod pa'o/_/bde ba'i phyir ni byang chub bo/_/dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni sems so/_/mkhas pa'i phyir ni shes rab bo/_/gsal ba'i phyir ni ting nge 'dzin to/_/phyin pa'i phyir ni gnas so/_/zla med pa'i phyir ni rab bo/_/ngo 
[\[17b.2\]]mtshar ba'i phyir ni mchog go/_/'phags pa'i phyir ni phul lo/_/dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa'o/_/gting ring ba'i phyir ni zab pa'o/_/gab pa'i phyir ni gsang ba'o/_/phra ba'i phyir ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni chos so/_/sa 
[\[17b.3\]]non pa'i phyir ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/mthar phyin pa'i phyir ni sangs rgyas te/_/sems dpa' chen po de'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya ste/_/lam 'di ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[17b.4\]]chos thams cad 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir na gzhi'o/_/mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di nas gshegs par gyur to/_/da ltar stong pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste/_/de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/de ltar na de'i phyir lam 'di ni de 
[\[17b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o/_/de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang /_sras zhes bya ba dang /_bdag po zhes bya ba dang /_gdung zhes bya ba dang /_srog ces bya ba dang /_nor zhes bya ba dang /_bran zhes bya ba dang /_sku zhes bya ba 
[\[17b.6\]]dang /_gsung zhes bya ba dang /_thugs zhes bya ba dang /_yon tan zhes bya ba dang /_phrin las chen po zhes bya ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thabs chen po dang /_shes rab chen po dang /_byang chub chen po dang /_dbang chen po dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_'da' 
[\[17b.7\]]bar dka' ba dang /_chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_rnam par brjid pa dang /_sna tshogs su ston pa dang /_thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /_cir yang 'byung ba dang /_mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni de ltar yin par shes par bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o/_/'tsho ba chen po zhes bya ba dang /_longs spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang /_yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang /_rgyu zhes bya ba dang /_rkyen zhes bya ba dang /_'bras bu 
[\[18a.2\]]zhes bya ba dang /_spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /_cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang /_phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang /_bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /_nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /_sgrub pa zhes bya ba dang /_sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang /_tshogs chen po zhes bya ba dang /_kun du rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[18a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang /_dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang /_'jol nyog tu spyod pa dang /_dgos pa sgrub pa dang /_'bras bur byed pa dang /_kun du log pa dang /_don grub pa dang /_smin par bsags pa dang /_rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /_bya 
[\[18a.4\]]ba byed pa dang /_sna tshogs su 'byung ba dang /_mtshan mar bstan pa dang /_rnam par 'dud pa dang /_shin tu mdzad pa dang /_'dod pa byed pa dang /_lhag par 'dod pa dang /_kun du 'byor pa dang /_lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[18a.5\]]'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di la ni thams cad yod de/_chos thams cad ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang /_rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang /_'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di 
[\[18a.6\]]las 'byung bar shes par bya ste/_de yang ji ltar zhe na/_rgyu ni 'khrul pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang /_rtog pa gsum dang /_log pa bzhi dang /_nyon mongs pa lnga dang /_phung po lnga dang /_dbang 
[\[18a.7\]]po lnga dang /_rgyu drug dang /_rkyen bcu gnyis dang /_skye ba bcu gnyis dang /_rang bzhin [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_spyod pa bcu gcig dang /_smin pa bzhi dang /_lam lnga dang /_gnas drug dang /_mu gsum shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o/_/
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te/_lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o/_/yul dang gnyis su gyur pa'i phyir na mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/nges pa las log pa'i phyir 
[\[18b.2\]]don las gol ba dang /_mnyam pa las gol ba dang phyogs las gol ba dang gzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang /_sred pas gdungs pa dang /_sdong pos non pa dang /_mi phyed pas 'thas pa 
[\[18b.3\]]dang /_kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/_/kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang /_rkyen du tshor ba dang /_mtshan mar shes pa dang /_thams cad nas byed pa dang /_rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o/_/sgor gsal zhing yul la dbang 
[\[18b.4\]]byed pa'i phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang /_thos par dbang ba dang /_tshor bar dbang ba dang /_myong bar dbang ba dang /_reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o/_/'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang /_mnyen par byed pa dang /_chags par byed pa dang /_
[\[18b.5\]]g.yo bar 'bud pa dang /_skyed par gsal ba dang /_dus su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o/_/rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir sa bon dang /_rtsa ba dang /_myu gu dang /_ldum bu dang /_yal ga dang /_sdong po dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_snying po dang /_
[\[18b.6\]]skams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang /_snang ba dang /_thos pa dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_tshor ba dang /_dri dang /_myang ba dang /_ro dang /_reg pa dang /_shes pa dang /_chos skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma'i chos nyid 
[\[18b.7\]]can gyi phyir/_/mthong ba'i chos nyid dang /_snang ba'i chos dang /_lhang nge ba'i chos dang /_thos pa'i chos dang /_grags pa'i chos dang /_gsal ba'i chos dang /_tshor ba'i chos dang /_dri'i chos dang /_tshim pa'i chos dang /_myang ba'i chos dang /_ro'i chos dang /_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]bro ba'i chos dang /_reg pa'i chos dang /_reg bya'i chos dang /_nges pa'i chos dang /_shes pa'i chos dang /_chos kyi chos dang /_rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o/_/mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sgyur ba'i spyod pa 
[\[19a.2\]]dang /_dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang /_rnam par g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang /_sgros su 'dogs pa'i spyod pa dang /_zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang /_kun du 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang /_bla bkyal 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang /_chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang /_kun du 
[\[19a.3\]]bdud kyi spyod pa dang /_phyin ci log pa'i spyod pa dang /_gnyis la rten par spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang /_rim par smin pa dang /_glo bur du smin pa dang /_bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o/_/bgrod 
[\[19a.4\]]par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang /_'gog pa'i lam dang /_mun pa'i lam dang /_'dam gyi lam dang /_yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o/_/brten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang /_yid ldan gyi gnas dang /_mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang /_'dod 
[\[19a.5\]]ldan gyi gnas dang /_rtsod ldan gyi gnas dang /_dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o/_/bde ba'i mu la bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang /_byed pa dang dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rkyen gyi rnal 'byor 
[\[19a.6\]]ni 'di lta ste/_shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang /_lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du don gnyis dang /_tshul gsum dang /_thabs bzhi dang /_chos lnga dang /_rigs drug dang /_mdzad pa chen po bcu gnyis dang /_cho 'phrul chen po 
[\[19a.7\]]bcu gnyis dang /_ye shes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_sa'i khyad par bcu gcig dang /_sku bzhi dang /_lam lnga dang /_'bras bu chen po drug dang /_byang chub chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang rkyen 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]tsam du spyod cing 'bras bu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_lam de nyid ma nor par shes pa'i phyir de shes pa gcig shes bya'o/_/bden pa gnyis su snang ba'i phyir don gnyis pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan nyid gsum gyis sbyor ba'i phyir kun brtags mthun pa la yod 
[\[19b.2\]]pa'i tshul dang /_gzhan dbang mi mthun pa la med pa'i tshul dang /_rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o/_/mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang /_rkyen la sbyor ba'i thabs dang /_mngon par 'jug pa'i thabs dang /_
[\[19b.3\]]thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o/_/rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos dang /_lam gyi chos dang /_rtogs pa'i chos dang /_'bras bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o/_/phyis 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgyu'i dran pa dang /_'bras bu'i dran 
[\[19b.4\]]pa dang /_sgra'i dran pa dang /_sbyor ba'i dran pa dang /_gnas kyi dran pa dang /_mngon sum pa'i dran pa dang /_rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces bya'o/_/gzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo bo'i tshul dang /_bltams pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[19b.5\]]rol pa'i tshul dang /_mnga' dbang chen po'i tshul dang /_thar par gyur pa'i tshul dang /_dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang /_sangs rgyas pa dang bdud btul ba dang 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bdud btul ba'i tshul dang /_cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang /_mya ngan 
[\[19b.6\]]las 'das pa'i tshul gyi phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/sna tshogs su 'phrul pa'i phyir/_ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang /_snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_bsam 
[\[19b.7\]]gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang /_byin brlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang /_skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang /_stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang /_yon tan gyi cho 'phrul dang /_'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang /_de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gi chos thams cad shes pa dang /_phyi'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_stong pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_don dam pa'i chos nyid shes pa'i ye shes dang /_'dus 
[\[20a.2\]]byas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_blang dor mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[20a.3\]]gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_mtshan mar mi rtog 
[\[20a.4\]]pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /_brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang /_mi nyams par rig pa dang /_mi 
[\[20a.5\]]sgrib par rig pa dang /_rdzogs par rig pa dang /_ma g.yos par rig pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid du rig pa dang /_gnyis su med par rig pa dang /_yongs su dag par rig pa dang /_kun du legs par rig pa dang /_de ma thag par rig pa dang /_rdzogs par chub 
[\[20a.6\]]pa'i rig pa la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o/_/kun du brjod cing ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_rdzogs longs spyod pa dang /_'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o/_/bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir tshogs dang /_sbyor ba dang /_
[\[20a.7\]]mthong ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_mtha' zad du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o/_/rgyu la don yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang /_thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /_yongs su khyab pa dang /_tshogs su 'byung ba dang /_kun du dbang ba dang /_dgos pa tshang 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/_ma nor ba gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du nges pa gnyis 
[\[20b.2\]]dang /_yon tan gsum dang /_dgongs pa bzhi dang /_chen po lnga dang /_tshogs pa drug dang /_'byung tshul bcu gnyis dang /_ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis dang /_ye shes chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnal 'byor chen po bcu gcig dang /_sgrub pa chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[20b.3\]]sbyor ba lnga dang /_dngos grub chen po drug dang /_rdzogs pa chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas ma nor ba zhes bya'o/_/the tshom mi za ba'i phyir thabs 
[\[20b.4\]]kyis nges pa dang /_shes rab kyis nges pas nges pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongs su khyab pa dang /_rlabs su che ba'i yon tan dang /_rtsis las 'das pa'i phyir yon tan zhes bya'o/_/thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[20b.5\]]dgongs pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_bsgyur ba'i phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na dgongs pa zhes bya'o/_/lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mngon pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po 
[\[20b.6\]]dang /_de yin pa dang /_thams cad du che ba dang /_kun du rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o/_/kun nas tshang ba'i phyir/_mnyam pa chen po dang /_'byor pa chen po dang /_'dus pa chen po dang /_rig pa chen po dang /_dbang chen po dang /_'dres pa chen po'i 
[\[20b.7\]]phyir tshogs zhes bya'o/_/gzhan gyi don du 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i tshul dang mthun pa'i phyir gnas su bskyod pa dang /_mnyam par gyur pa dang /_mdzes par gshegs pa dang /_spro bar spyod pa dang /_gsang bar sbyor ba dang /_mtshan ma bcom pa dang /_mdzad pa med 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa dang /_seng+ge'i gsung sgra dang /_nges par rdzogs pa dang /_tshom ngam chen po sprul pa mdzad pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'byung tshul chen po zhes bya'o/_/gsal zhing mi gtong ba'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa ste/_rnam dag dbyings kyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[21a.2\]]dang /_snang gsal yel 'phyo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi zad mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thams cad rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'byung chen sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang sgyur thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtse 
[\[21a.3\]]gcig 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen myu gu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dug 'joms sman gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_rgyu'i ye 
[\[21a.4\]]shes dang /_thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes dang /_yi ge'i ye shes dang /_phyag rgya'i ye shes dang /_sprul pa'i ye shes dang /_cir yang mdzad pa'i ye shes dang /_me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes 
[\[21a.5\]]dang /_rin po che lta bu'i ye shes dang /_nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes dang /_snang stong gsal ba'i ye shes dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /_bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su gsal ba'i phyir ye 
[\[21a.6\]]shes chen po zhes bya'o/_/'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor dang /_rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang /_gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang /_spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang /_mtshan ma rtags 
[\[21a.7\]]kyi rnal 'byor dang /_lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_rtsal chen sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o/_/mnyam 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pa nyid du grub pa dang /_bde ba chen por grub pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par grub pa dang /_thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir grub pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyor ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab tu sbyor ba dang /_dbyings dang ye shes su sbyor ba dang /_
[\[21b.2\]]sems dang chos su sbyor ba dang /_las dang thugs rjer sbyor bas sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o/_/srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings su tshim par grub pa dang /_'khor ba rgya mtsho bdag gir grub par gyur pa dang /_bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub par gyur pa dang /_dmigs pa gang yin 
[\[21b.3\]]pa de bzhin grub par gyur pa dang /_cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang /_don dam bcud kyis rnam shes rgyas par grub pa'i phyir dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o/_/rnam grangs thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir 
[\[21b.4\]]rdzogs pa chen po gcig ces bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sa'i khyad par chen po bcu gcig non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste gang zhe na/_'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang /_brten pa gzhi'i sa dang /_gal chen sbyor ba'i sa 
[\[21b.5\]]dang /_mi ldog gnas pa'i sa dang /_bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang /_cho 'phrul sprul pa'i sa dang /_bsten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang /_dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang /_gnas pas mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang /_bdal ba chos nyid kyis dang /_rdzogs pa 
[\[21b.6\]]spyir chib kyis sa ste/_sa 'di dag non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/_rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcu chib par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/_gang zhe na gzhi dam tshig 'dis 
[\[21b.7\]]bzung bar bslab pa dang /_rgyud thos pas dgrol bar bslab pa dang /_phul du mkhas par dbyung bar bslab pa dang /_sgo kun nas sdud par bslab pa dang /_rim pa dbang gis bgrod par bslab pa dang /_la spyod pas dor bar bslab pa dang /_thag lta 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bas gcad par bslab pa dang /_nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blang bar bslab pa dang /_don man ngag gis bsgrub par bslab pa dang /_mdo gcig tu bsdu bar bslab pa'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_yon tan gyi che ba sbom 
[\[22a.2\]]par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/_gang zhe na/_che ba nyi shu dang /_rol pa nyi shu dang /_cho 'phrul nyi shu dang /_rngom pa nyi shu dang /_brjid pa chen po nyi shu dang /_tog chen po'i nor bu'o/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/_rmad du byung 
[\[22a.3\]]ba'i mthu chen po nyi shu thob par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'jig rten chen po drug 'phang bar 'dod pa dang /_chu'i phung po chen po rngubs te bskam par 'dod pa dang /_rlung gi bskal pa bcing bar 'dod pa dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[22a.4\]]'bum dgye bar 'dod pa dang /_bsreg pa'i bskal pa chen po gsum gzhil bar 'dod pa dang /_nam mkha' thams cad ba spu gcig gis dgang bar 'dod pa dang /_ba spu gcig las sangs rgyas bye ba dgye bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba pa spu gcig gi nang du shong 
[\[22a.5\]]bar 'dod pa dang /_'khor ba thams cad ba spu gcig tu rngub par 'dod pa dang /_ba spu gcig gis 'khor ba thams cad la khyab par 'dod pa dang /_bskal pa'i 'khor lo chen po ring du bsrub par 'dod pa dang /_thung du bsrub par 'dod pa dang /_dus kyi 'khor lo chen 
[\[22a.6\]]po mnyam par bskor bar 'dod pa dang /_'khrug par bskor bar 'dod pa dang /_las kyi 'khor lo chen po rgyun du bskor bar 'dod pa dang /_rgyun gcad par 'dod pa dang /_srid pa'i 'khor lo bzlog par 'dod pa dang /_lugs su bskor bar 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[22a.7\]]gyi 'khor lo chen po rgyun gcad par 'dod pa dang /_dmyal ba'i 'khor lo chen po dong sprugs par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_rnal 'byor rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad cu rtsa gcig gzhil bar 'dod pas 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/_dngos gzhi'i rtog pa dgu dang /_mtshan ma'i rtog pa dgu dang /_rtags kyi rtog pa dgu dang /_rkyen gyi rtog pa dgu dang /_las kyi rtog pa dgu dang /_spyod pa'i rtog pa dgu dang /_bskyod pa'i rtog pa dgu dang /_zhen pa'i rtog pa dgu 
[\[22b.2\]]dang /_mngon par rtog pa dgu'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_ltung ba'i sgo dgu shes pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_bdud chen po'i ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_mu stegs kyi khams su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_srin po'i 
[\[22b.3\]]khams su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_gnod sbyin gyi ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_ru dra chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang /_bgegs chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang /_lha chen po'i ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_shog ma gcan chen gyi ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /_dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i 
[\[22b.4\]]sgo'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_lam 'di shes par 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par bya'o/_/ci lta ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rtag par yang blta'o/_/chad par yang lta'o/_/skye bar snang ngo /_/dmigs par yod do/_/sangs 
[\[22b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos 'di ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'o/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'o/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'o/_/nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o/_/phrag dog dang bcas pa'o/_/mtshams med pa lnga dang bcas pa'o/_/de dang nye ba lnga dang bcas pa'o/_/lci ba bzhi dang bcas pa'o/_
[\[22b.6\]]log pa brgyad dang yang bcas pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang bcas pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang bcas pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang bcas pa'o/_/phra ma dang bcas pa'o/_/
[\[22b.7\]]ngag rtsub mo dang bcas pa'o/_/tshig khyal pa dang bcas pa'o/_/brnab sems dang bcas pa'o/_/gnod sems dang bcas pa'o/_/log par lta ba dang bcas pa'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de bas na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams la spyod par 'dod pas 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]lam 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/shes par bya'o/_/goms par bya'o/_/klong du gyur par gyis shig ces sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//
[\[23a.2\]]de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che'i tshogs kyis rmad byung gi phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas/_sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems dpa' chen po smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la bdag cag shin tu zhu bar spobs na gnang ba'i 
[\[23a.3\]]skabs dbye bar gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_smra ba'i seng+ge des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs ji ltar zhu ba'i don gnang gis kun du spobs pa skyed la zhu ba'i don gsol cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'dus pa chen 
[\[23a.4\]]po'i tshogs kyis a la la ho zhes gsol to/_/smra ba'i seng+ge chen po khyod kyis rgya cher bshad pa'i rnal 'byor rang bzhin chen po'i don gyi rjes su bdag cag 'jug par 'tshal na/_'di la 'jug pa'i sgo du mchis/_thabs ji ltar lags/_lam gang ltar bde/_sems 
[\[23a.5\]]dpa' chen po 'di'i don rgya cher bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag legs so shin tu legs so/_/nges par legs so/_/khyed kyis zhus pa'i don 'di rnams ngo mtshar che ste/_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo 
[\[23a.6\]]gsal zhing rgya che bar byed de/_rna lhogs la gus par nyon cig gsal bar bshad par bya'o/_/de nas 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i gsung sgra yis chos rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa 'di gsal bar bshad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi sgo mo 'di/_/grangs mang bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[23a.7\]]kyang /_/mdo ru bsdus na gsum du gsal/_/rtsol bas 'jug pa'i sgo mo dang /_/grub pa thabs kyi sgo mo dang /_/mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sgo mo'o/_/dang po la yang gsum yod de/_/mtshan nyid thabs kyi sgo mo dang /_/thub pa rigs kyi 'jug sgo dang /_/grub pa lung gi 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gsang sgo'o/_/de dag sgo mo re re la'ang /_/gsum gsum yod par 'dren pas bshad/_/gnyis pa'i sgo la'ang gsum yod de/_/shes rab rtogs pa'i sgo mo dang /_/ting 'dzin goms pa'i sgo mo dang /_/smon lam grub pa'i sgo mor gsal/_/tha ma mthar phyin sgo mo 
[\[23b.2\]]la/_/rnam thar gsum gyi sgo zhes bshad/_/'jug pa'i lam la'ang 'di lta ste/_/dam pa gsum du gsal bar bshad/_/'dren pa chen po'i sde snod dang /_/thub pa chen po'i 'jug sgo dang /_/dam pa chen po'i mdzod gsum mo/_/'jug pa'i thabs kyang 'di lta ste/_/
