[\[23b.3\]]thabs las thabs byung thabs gsum ste/_/don dang yi ge ting 'dzin gyis/_/rjes su gang gis brtag byas na/_/'jug pa'i thabs kyi dam pa'o/_/don gyi rjes su 'jug pa yang /_/don ni chos nyid snying po la/_/rjes su 'jug pa'i sems yin te/_/sems nyid 
[\[23b.4\]]chos la sbyor ba'i skabs/_/rnam pa bcu zhes 'dren pas bshad/_/bcu nyid gang dang gang zhe na/_/'dun pa skye ba'i gnas skabs dang /_/rtsol pa sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang /_/bslab la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang /_/'du shes 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs 
[\[23b.5\]]dang /_/sbyor chen la 'jug gnas skabs dang /_/ro nyid tshor ba'i gnas skabs dang /_/yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang /_/rtog chen nyid la phebs skabs dang /_/de nyid gdeng du gyur pa'i skabs/_/las su rung ba'i skabs dang bcu/_/bcu po de dag 
[\[23b.6\]]re re yi/_/skabs su sems dang chos phrad pas/_/rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung /_/byang chub sems ni gang zhe na/_/'di yi grangs kyang rnam pa bcu/_/g.yo ba byang chub sems nyid dang /_/de bzhin smon pa byang chub sems/_/ldang ba byang chub chen po'i 
[\[23b.7\]]sems/_/de bzhin sbyor ba byang chub sems/_/'jug pa'i sems dang dge ba'i sems/_/mi 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang /_/gnas pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems zhes grags pas na/_/sems bcu dag tu rgyal bas bshad/_/byang chub sems 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]kyi rang bzhin de/_/skabs bcu dag tu sbyor bas na/_/gzugs brnyan chos nyid ngo la snang /_/gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ci ltar snang /_/phra mo tsam gyi skar ma dang /_/de bzhin skar ma tha mal pa/_/skar ma chen po dag dang ni/_/zla ba tshes gcig rnam 
[\[24a.2\]]pa dang /_/gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/_/brgyad dang bcu drug rnam pa yi/_/gzugs brnyan dag tu snang ba ste/_/dngos por snang ba cang ma yin/_/chu zla lta bur gzung du med/_/sems kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang /_/chos nyid gsal ba'i nyi ma gnyis/_/
[\[24a.3\]]yul dang dbang po'i tshul lta bur/_/dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin gsal/_/'di ni rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i lam/_/bgrod par byed pa'i thabs chen yin/_/lam 'di goms par bslab bya na/_/rnal 'byor bslab par bya ba'i mtha'/_/gnas bcu dag kyang 'di lta 
[\[24a.4\]]ste/_/ji ltar sa gzhi gshin pa la/_/brten nas sa bon btab pa las/_/'bras bur smin par gyur pa yis/_/'tsho bar byed pa'i srog 'dzin ltar/_/chos nyid kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i/_/dam tshig 'di la brten nas ni/_/dngos grub lo tog smin pa yis/_/dge 
[\[24a.5\]]ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o/_/bslab pa 'di yi dam tshig ste/_/bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin du/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar cang shes gyi ling ngag_/sdom byed sgrog gis bcings gyur pa/_/bkrol byas bde blag byang 'gyur na/_/ci la 'khogs 
[\[24a.6\]]med 'gro ba ltar/_/sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di/_/mi shes bcings pas bcings gyur pa/_/rnam grol thos pa'i sgo mo yis/_/shes rgyud kun grol thogs med 'gro/_/'di ni mi shes rgyud 'grol ba'i/_/bcing bar bya ba 'gro ba ste/_/rgyud nas dgrol 
[\[24a.7\]]ba'i bslab pa ru/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar ri mthon rtse mo la/_/sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na/_/mtho sar phyin cing rtse non pas/_/yul khams rtogs shing lam la mkhas/_/de bzhin shes rab mthon ri la/_/sgyid mi lug par mnyan 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bsams na/_/kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin/_/mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do/_/don la mkhas par bya ba de/_/phul du dbyung ba'i bslab pa ste/_/shes rab chen po 'di dag la/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/dper na bung ba khung tshol ba/_/kun du 'jug 
[\[24b.2\]]cing byung nas ni/_/rang gi 'dzul khung gang yin par/_/nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol ba/_/spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu/_/lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsdur na/_/ma nor nges pa'i dbu ma la/_/chos nyid don gyi rjes gcad 
[\[24b.3\]]phyir/_/sgo mo kun nas bsdur ba yi/_/bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin te/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba/_/mang po'i dbang por dpon bstabs te/_/'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis/_/kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar/_/de 
[\[24b.4\]]bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba/_/chos kyi dbang por dpon bstabs te/_/phyag rgya la sogs rtags chen gyis/_/rim par kun gyi thog mar 'gro/_/'di ni dbang gi khyab par te/_/sa la rim par 'byung ba yi/_/rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i mtha'/_/goms 
[\[24b.5\]]par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar glang po chur 'jug pa/_/tsham tshom chags thogs yong med par/_/dga' ba'i longs spyod brod tshul gyis/_/mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa'i blo/_/brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa/_/rtsal 
[\[24b.6\]]chen sbyong ba'i brod tshul gyis/_/chags thogs med par dor ba'o/_/bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin no/_/spyod pa'i bslab pa dam pa ni/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding ba/_/gshog pa'i rtsal gyis nam 'phang gcod/_/ngam 
[\[24b.7\]]grog chu klung mtha' yas kyang /_/gshog rlabs 'og tu kun chud ltar/_/rnal 'byor mnyam nyid mkhar lding ba/_/theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang /_/mnyam pa chen po'i don gyis ni/_/lta 'phang rlabs kyis thag gcad pa'o/_/'di ni re dang dogs pa yi/_/the 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]tshom gcod pa'i lta ba ste/_/don la sems kyis blta ba ste/_/bslab pa 'di dag goms pa gces/_/dper na rgya mtshor nor len mi/_/sbrul dang chu srin sbrang ma las/_/sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun/_/dka' ba nyams su blangs nas 
[\[25a.2\]]'grub/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor bde tshol ba/_/rnam rtog bying rmugs phyar g.yeng dgra/_/gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag_/nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed/_/'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi/_/nyams su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste/_/sems kyi goms par bya 
[\[25a.3\]]ba'i las/_/'dris par bya ba rab tu gces/_/ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas/_/sman snang gser du bsgyur bas na/_/'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis/_/dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pas/_/sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi 'grub ste/_/su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i 
[\[25a.4\]]mis/_/tshegs med gyi na'i tshul gyis na/_/bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i don sgrub pa/_/kun gzhi gnas 'gyur man ngag dang /_/gang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni/_/dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub pa min/_/sems kyi gsang 'di 
[\[25a.5\]]sus mthong ba/_/de dag man ngag ldan pa ste/_/'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa/_/de dag tshegs med gyi nas 'grub/_/don rnams sgrub par gang byed pa/_/man ngag can gyis 'grub pa'i phyir/_/don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi/_/bslab pa 
[\[25a.6\]]'di dag rab tu gces/_/dper na kun du rgyu ba'i mi/_/'dod pa'i yul du 'gro byed na/_/yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang /_/bgrod pa'i lam gnas gcig las med/_/de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong chos bstan kyang /_/
[\[25a.7\]]bkri zhing drang ba'i tshig yin te/_/bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o/_/don rnams gcig tu sdud pa yi/_/bslab par bya ba dam pa ste/_/nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir/_/'di dag goms par bya ba yin/_/bslab pa 'di la goms gyur na/_/lobs 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te/_/lobs pas lam la mkhas par 'gyur/_/sngags kyi yon tan chen po yang /_/rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur/_/gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni/_/thams cad thams cad bya'o cog_/byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa'am/_/
[\[25b.2\]]dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste/_/dper na nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'am/_/ji ltar me dpung rgyal po 'dra/_/de yang de yul che chung gi/_/khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin/_/rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis/_/dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la/_/che chung rim 
[\[25b.3\]]pa yod pa yin/_/rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang /_/thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang /_/bab chod thad du 'jug pa ste/_/dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa/_/rab dang glang chen bab mi bab/_/de yang rtsal sgyid drag zhan gyis/_/la la thad du gcod pa la/_/
[\[25b.4\]]la la bsegs su 'gro ba yin/_/la la chung zhig bshad thabs 'gro/_/de ltar rnal 'byor rgyu nyid na/_/'bras bu'i don la bab chod kyang /_/rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/_/ji ltar nus tshad der snang phyir/_/sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang /_/sgrib 
[\[25b.5\]]dang gol sa rtog pa dang /_/spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang /_/dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang /_/lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur rnams/_/thams cad gcig las med na yang /_/grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnams/_/snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni/_/chos 
[\[25b.6\]]rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la/_/kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/_/bye brag lam gyi chos su snang /_/gzhi nyid rgyu yi kun gzhi dang /_/sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi dang /_/snang ba don gyi kun gzhi dang /_/'gyur ba med pa'i kun gzhi dang /_/btsal med 
[\[25b.7\]]gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga/_/skabs lnga dag tu gnas 'gyur bas/_/sa yi khyad par bgrod pa yin/_/de yang gnyis kyi chos 'di dag_/kun kyang yongs kyis rnal 'byor dang /_/'gro don gsum gyis 'gro ba ste/_/dge don dang ni sgrub pa po/_/rig 'dzin zhes 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ni rdzogs pa yin/_/des na rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/dang po las kyi rnal 'byor la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams/_/rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni/_/rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul/_/
[\[26a.2\]]spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa/_/sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang /_/btsal ba'i yul ni chad pa yin/_/nor bu las kyis 'phang dmas pa/_/rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas/_/rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho ba'i/_/longs spyod che la dmigs 
[\[26a.3\]]bcas kyang /_/de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral bzhin/_/skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag_/skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o/_/sna tshogs gter gyi khang pa dag_/rgyal po'i mdzod du gyur pas na/_/spyod sgo 'jug pa thams cad kyang /_/dka' thub phyi nang khyad 
[\[26a.4\]]par gyis/_/rin chen sna dgu'i rim pa dag_/so so'i las thabs mtho dman gyis/_/yul de gcig las med na yang /_/yig tshang sgo dgu so sor spyod/_/rgyal por gyur na de kun la/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag po yin/_/mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dag_/
[\[26a.5\]]blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na/_/rig pa rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/blta yul gcig las med na yang /_/so so 'jug sgo kun nas spyod/_/dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la/_/rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/_/skas kyi gdang bu rtsi ba ltar/_/sa dang theg 
[\[26a.6\]]pa'i khyad par du/_/mtho dman rim par snang ba yin/_/mnyam par gyur pa'i gzhi gcig la/_/mthun dang mi mthun don gyis ni/_/dper na khang pa sgo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]bzhin/_/sa dang theg pa so so'i sgo/_/mi mthun so sor snang ba yin/_/so so'i theg pa'i sgo rnams 
[\[26a.7\]]la/_/'jug pa la sogs ma sbyangs kyang /_/kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcad pas/_/gcig ste tha dad yongs kyis med/_/de ni ri dang lhun po'am/_/kun du rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar/_/mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni/_/don gyis de ltar yod pa yin/_/des 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]na chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba'i sems 'di yin pas na/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te/_/kun gyi rtsa ba shes par bya/_/'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa ste/_/lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas/_/nye lam 
[\[26b.2\]]bde rnyed grub pa'o/_/rnyed pa'i lam nyid gang zhe na/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa yin te/_/sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i phyir/_/sa yi khyad par bshad par bya/_/'di yi gnas 'dzin spyod pa'i sa/_/rnam pa bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs/_/'gyur dbang ma 
[\[26b.3\]]nges sa 'di la/_/bcos ma phra men spyod pa dang /_/tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang /_/dge la 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga/_/'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis/_/kun du 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o/_/'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/gnas shing spyod 
[\[26b.4\]]pa'i sa zhes bya/_/bsten pa gzhi yi sa 'di la/_/dang po las can rnal 'byor dang /_/bslab pa sbyong dang nges pa la/_/dag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o/_/bka' sdod las kyi dang po pa/_/gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad/_/gal chen spyod pa'i sa 
[\[26b.5\]]'di la/_/gnas shing spyod pa'i sa yin te/_/rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kun/_/gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/_/legs nyes stobs chen byed pa'o/_/bslab pa rgyun gyis 'di la/_/g.yo dang thob 
[\[26b.6\]]dang brtan pa'i drod/_/de bzhin rtags chen g.yo ba dang /_/thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi/_/rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po dag_/bslab pa'i gnas bcu mthar 'byin cing /_/ji ltar zla ba yar gsal bzhin/_/bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te/_/don la mi 
[\[26b.7\]]skrag ngo mtshar skye/_/dpyod sems 'jug pa'i shes pa des/_/ngan song mi ldog dgon par 'jug_/bar chad dag kyang de la byung /_/gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang /_/spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang /_/mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor gsum/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad/_/bsod nams gter gyi sa 'di la/_/spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor nyid/_/mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas/_/rtsal can blo yi bsti gnas sa/_/bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir chib pa'o/_/bsten pas khyad 
[\[27a.2\]]par 'gro 'di la/_/dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs che/_/nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyong /_/yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor/_/bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste/_/bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras 'di bcu la/_/goms 
[\[27a.3\]]par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor/_/ngal bso ba la thams cad mthong /_/mi ldog sa la goms byar med/_/'di dag sbyor ba gzhi gcig kyang /_/so so thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/sgrib las zhes rtsi byed cing /_/ye shes re re 'char ba'o/_/des na bslab pa'i mtha' 
[\[27a.4\]]gcig la/_/mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams/_/mnyam pa la bzhag re re la/_/ye shes re re 'char ba ste/_/tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs/_/mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang /_/mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin/_/rmi lam dag dang sgra brnyan dang /_/mngon 
[\[27a.5\]]sum nges pa ci rigs par/_/rnal 'byor rdo rje gral sko ba/_/rdo rje rdo rje che ge mo/_/zhes ni nyid dang sa khams dang /_/zhing khams kun du bsgrags byas nas/_/rnal 'byor lung rab ston pa'o/_/dmigs pa'i 'bras bu skye 'di la/_/grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 
[\[27a.6\]]'byor che/_/nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum/_/rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes shing /_/rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa/_/khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o/_/gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la/_/tshogs chen 
[\[27a.7\]]'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs/_/gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste/_/phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po/_/mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa/_/rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs pa'o/_/bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la/_/rol pa 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang /_/bde ba che dang thig ler rdzogs/_/gsum nyid du ni rdzogs pa la/_/yul don ye shes de sbyar ba/_/shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs/_/sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod la/_/rdzogs pa spyir chib sa 'di ni/_/bcu yi tha ma dang po 
[\[27b.2\]]las/_/mthar rdzogs kun gyi thog yin te/_/klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la/_/sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal/_/cir snang ci yang ma yin pa/_/mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo la/_/ci ltar bltas dgu der snang ba/_/theg mchog spyi rgya'i rlabs kyis bcad/_/de yang lta 
[\[27b.3\]]ba'i khyad par gyis/_/bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang /_/lhun gyis grub dang klong yangs chub/_/gsum rdzogs rang byung bdal ba'o/_/'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bgrod par bya/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/
[\[27b.4\]]don gyi rjes ni tshol 'dod na/_/tshig 'ga' thos pa tsam gyis ni/_/chog pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/khyed kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi/_/yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor/_/spyod pa 'gyur bar byed mod kyi/_/yang dag don du yong ma gyur/_/chags sdang las la 
[\[27b.5\]]zhen mod kyi/_/dam pa'i don la yong ma zhen/_/longs spyod rgya cher byed mod kyi/_/chos nyid don gyi ro ma tshor/_/bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi/_/nyon mongs lnga dang yong ma bral/_/brtul zhugs rtog pa choms mod kyang /_/gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong ma 
[\[27b.6\]]choms/_/de bas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/thos pa tshig gi sgron ma yis/_/yang dag don gyi gser btsal na/_/rtogs 'dod spre'u 'di bzung nas kyang /_/rkun mo byi la btags byas te/_/gse khung skar khung kun dgag cing /_/khang stong phang phung 
[\[27b.7\]]bshig nas ni/_/rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin/_/yang dag don gyi lam tshol na/_/rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya/_/rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang /_/mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang /_/byung tshor skyon lnga bsal bar bya/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rtog pa la yang gnyis yod de/_/rags dang phra bar snang ba yin/_/de bzhin mtshan ma che chung gnyis/_/rgyu ba ring po thung ngu gnyis/_/de bzhin tshor ba gsal mi gsal/_/byung tshor gnyis su snang ba yang /_/myur ba dang ni bul ba'o/_/'di ni 
[\[28a.2\]]don la sgrib pa yi/_/rtog pa chen po'i gegs chen yin/_/ci phyir don de mi mthong phyir/_/mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang /_/kun du 'thibs dang sprin phung dang /_/na bun lta bur bsgribs pa yis/_/yang dag mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur/_/'di yang bye brag 
[\[28a.3\]]gnyis gnyis te/_/mun pa mun nag chen po dang /_/kun nas 'thibs pa lta bu dang /_/kun du 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang /_/'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis/_/sprin chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang /_/na bun gtams dang ban bun gyis/_/gnas ngan gsum dang 
[\[28a.4\]]mi'i gnas dang /_/'dod khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang /_/gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams/_/nyan thos rang rgyal gnas su ltung /_/ltung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon chen ni/_/mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba rnam drug yin/_/rang bzhin yul la g.yeng ba dang /_/
[\[28a.5\]]de bzhin phyi rol g.yeng ba dang /_/nad dang mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba dang /_/yid la byed dang gnas ngan len/_/'di dag rab tu bsal bar bya/_/bsal nas don la mnyam bzhag che/_/mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon/_/rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste/_/byung tshor 
[\[28a.6\]]dbang gis g.yeng ba dang /_/bying rmugs dbang gis 'thibs pa dang /_/'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa dang /_/ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang /_/phyal ba'i dbang gis med pa ste/_/'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yin no/_/skyon chen de dag glan pa'i chos/_/sems 
[\[28a.7\]]kyi lon 'di rgyal bas bshad/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba/_/rnam par mi rtog don tshol na/_/gcig pu dben pa'i sa bzung ste/_/tshad ma gsum dang ldan pa'i blos/_/rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcad pa/_/yod med sngon thog ga las byung /_/brtags 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bas rtog pa ltas las byung /_/rtog pa sgyu mar rab shes na/_/rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur/_/des ni gnas ngan gsum mi ltung /_/rtog pa gang las byung zhe na/_/mtshan ma'i chos las byung ba yin/_/mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na/_/mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi 
[\[28b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/des ni 'dod khams tha mar min/_/mtshan ma gang las byung zhe na/_/dran pa rgyu ba dag las byung /_/dran pa skyon du shes gyur na/_/rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed/_/mthu des 'dod khams gnyis par min/_/rgyu ba gang las byung zhe na/_/tshor 
[\[28b.3\]]ba dag las byung ba yin/_/dag cing skye bar bya ba med/_/tshor ba sgyu mar shes gyur na/_/skyon gyi tshor ba sal bar byed/_/'dod khams gsum par ltung mi 'gyur/_/tshor ba gang las byung zhe na/_/byung tshor phyi nang dag las byung /_/dag cing skye bar bya ba 
[\[28b.4\]]med/_/de nyid skyon du shes 'gyur na/_/de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni/_/'dod khams bzhi par mi ltung ngo /_/byung tshor gang las byung zhe na/_/sems kyi chos las byung ba ste/_/sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na/_/sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[28b.5\]]phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la/_/sems nyid smig rgyu lta bu yin/_/yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol/_/de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod khams lnga par ltung mi 'gyur/_/sems nyid yod pa'i dngos po'am/_/med ces bya bar mi lta bar/_/
[\[28b.6\]]mu stegs can du ltung mi 'gyur/_/bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas/_/'du shes med par ltung mi 'gyur/_/'du shes rjes su ma 'brangs par/_/sems can gnas su de mi 'khor/_/kun gzhi'i don la goms pas ni/_/nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung /_/stong 
[\[28b.7\]]zhing zhi bar mi byed pas/_/rang rgyal lta bar de mi ltung /_/rnam dag stong par mi byed pas/_/byang chub spyod par ltung ma yin/_/mnyam nyid stong pa'i don dag la/_/so so tha dad mi 'byed pas/_/sa yi rim par mi ltung zhing /_/rim gyis sbyang zhing 'phar 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ba med/_/yang dag don gyi rang bzhin ni/_/ci la mi gnas mi len cing /_/ci yang mi mthong thos pa med/_/cir yang mi byed byed dang bral/_/ci yang thos pa rdul tsam med/_/cir yang snang ba med pa de/_/de ni snang ba dam pa yin/_/bsam 
[\[29a.2\]]du med pa'i chos nyid ni/_/bsam du med pas de bzhin gzhag_/rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid la/_/sems kyi gyin da skad cig mas/_/mi g.yo rgyun tu dran par bya/_/de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na/_/rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung /_/drod dang rtags 
[\[29a.3\]]dang cho 'phrul dang /_/mngon shes dang ni ye shes 'byung /_/drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang /_/rtags ni byung dang brtan pa dang /_/cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang /_/rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal/_/des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin/_/dper na mun pa 
[\[29a.4\]]sangs pa dang /_/snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang /_/kun du mthong dang thams cad gsal/_/de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni/_/bag chags mun pa kun bsal te/_/ji ltar rlung gis sprin phyags ltar/_/skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/sgrib pa'i 
[\[29a.5\]]phung po 'phyag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na/_/mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/skad cig ma yi don rig pas/_/sngon nas bsags pa'i mun pa sel/_/de ltar rig pa'i skyes bu ni/_/don la rig pa'i sgo bye zhing /_/chos kyi 
[\[29a.6\]]mig dang de ldan pas/_/mthong thos tshig le'u tshig bzhir bsdebs/_/sa pa yin pas don la spyod/_/chos kyi mig dang ma ldan na/_/mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/don gyi tha snyad ci brjod kyang /_/nor ma nor gyi don mi dpogs/_/tshig phyir blo 'brangs 
[\[29a.7\]]dmu rgod de/_/bslab pa'i sa dang lam pa yin/_/tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang /_/gzhan la ston par ma byed cig_/bstan na rdo rje bka' rkun de/_/dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/_/gang dag tshul 'chos mkhan dag gi/_/don la blo shed ma bye bar/_/
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]tshig dang yi ges khrid nas ni/_/mi shes bzhin du chos bstan na/_/sems can thams cad srog phrogs pas/_/mi shes chos ston de bas lci/_/de bas mnyam pa'i don 'di la/_/bstun te cig car 'jug shes na/_/bsgom pa'i yun ni ring thung dang /_/las 
[\[29b.2\]]'phro yod dang med pa dang /_/nam grub snyam pa'i khar ma lus/_/mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag na/_/de ma thag tu rig pa 'char/_/mnyam pa'i don las ma g.yos na/_/gzugs khams gnas su de mi ltung /_/mnyam pa nyid la ma chags na/_/gzugs med khams 
[\[29b.3\]]su ltung mi 'gyur/_/mnyam nyid mngon du gyur pas na/_/nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung /_/ci yang med pa'i don mthong na/_/sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya/_/des ni ting 'dzin khyad par 'di/_/rnal 'byor can gyis 'dris par bsgom/_/thams cad mi rtog skye med 
[\[29b.4\]]cing /_/rtog pa'i mtha' spangs nam mkha'i dbyings/_/ji bzhin mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid/_/mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das/_/yul med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/_/snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems/_/nyi ma stong gi dkyil 'khor shar/_/mtshan 
[\[29b.5\]]ma'i chos rnams kun la khyab/_/nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las/_/'od zer yig 'bru'i mchog tu gsal/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i yi ge a/_/cir yang 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las/_/sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'byung /_/de yang rtsal gyi khyad par 
[\[29b.6\]]las/_/dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang /_/thos dang mthong ba la sogs te/_/sems kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par/_/rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/_/yan lag yi ge so so yi/_/rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig 
[\[29b.7\]]bcas/_/'phro 'du tshad kyang phyag rgya yi/_/tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no/_/'di ni dang po'i 'jug rims te/_/mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o/_/yi ge'i ye shes las skrun te/_/don byed pa dang phyag rgyar skyed/_/rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]skas/_/rlung bcing ba dang rgyun bzlog dang /_/bsreg pa'i bskal ba gzhil ba dang /_/nyi zla zhon dang 'jig rten 'phang /_/sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs/_/stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang /_/gzhig dang spar ba la sogs te/_/bsam 
[\[30a.2\]]bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/goms pa las su rung ba yi/_/rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad/_/bzlas pa mthar phyin grub pa dang /_/bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/bsam pa las su rung ba dang /_/don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa/_/bya ba yongs su dag pa dang /_/
[\[30a.3\]]don gcig yul la so sor snang /_/des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang /_/dbyings nyid gcig la sgom mod kyi/_/rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te/_/dang po'i sa la gnas pa yi/_/brtsam pa las kyi rnal 'byor ba/_/'dun 
[\[30a.4\]]pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor las/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po/_/shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas/_/ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste/_/don la mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_/rang gi mos pa'i lha sgom na/_/lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/_/kha dog tshon gyis phye 
[\[30a.5\]]nas ni/_/sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te/_/dbugs kyi yul du gyur tshad du/_/zung bsgril phar 'phro gsal ba las/_/'phro 'du'i gnas su bskyed par bya/_/rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i/_/sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/_/gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/_/
[\[30a.6\]]bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor las/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po/_/ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni/_/sa bon rang bzhin yi ge la/_/'od zer 'bar bar bcas pa de/_/dri byung yul ni tshun chad du/_/'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las/_/rang gi 
[\[30a.7\]]chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i/_/sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/_/gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/_/rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsgo las/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum po/_/dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod/_/lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/_/rang 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te/_/'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yis/_/thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du/_/'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las/_/rang gi chag tshad bzhi bsgyur tsam/_/sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin/_/lha yi khyad par 
[\[30b.2\]]gang yin pa/_/yi ge'i rim pa bzhin byas nas/_/'phro 'du'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/_/rim pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang /_/'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/sems kyi lcogs tshad tshun chad du/_/sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas 
[\[30b.3\]]klas par/_/sku yi khyon gyis gang bar bsgom/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/yi ge'i rjes su don dpags na/_/yi ges don rnams ston par 'gyur/_/ci phyir don nyid yi ger snang /_/dbyings las a byung a las ni/_/yi ge'i 
[\[30b.4\]]tshogs byung sna tshogs 'phros/_/a ni rang bzhin yi ge ste/_/rten dang bral bas rgyu rkyen med/_/kun la khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra/_/a ni chos nyid cho 'phrul te/_/chos nyid zab mo'i ngang las ni/_/cho 'phrul yi ge a byung bas/_/as ni chos nyid mtshon 
[\[30b.5\]]par byed/_/a las yig 'bru'i tshogs 'phros te/_/tshig tshogs bstan pa rgya mtshor grags/_/yi ge'i sgra skad kun bzung ste/_/sna tshogs yi ge'i skad du bsgyur/_/yig 'bru yan lag mang po rnams/_/rang bzhin a yi ngang du 'dus/_/thugs kyi klong nas a 
[\[30b.6\]]byung bas/_/a yi 'od zer 'phro 'du las/_/mgur gyi gsang bar shar ba las/_/gsung sgra yi ge lngar 'phros pa/_/a/_ka kha ga g+ha nga /_de nas a yi 'od zer de/_/ljags kyi zla gam pad+mar 'phros/_/ljags kyi mthil du 'khyil ba las/_/'od zer 
[\[30b.7\]]yig 'bru lngar shar ba/_/tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_de nas a yi 'od zer de/_/ljags kyi rtse la 'phros pa las/_/'od zer yig 'bru bcur shar ba/_/Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_de nas a yi 'od zer de/_/zhal gyi sgo nas 'phros pa las/_/cho 'phrul yi ge lngar 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]shar ba/_/ba pa ba b+ha ma/_/de nas a yi 'od zer de/_/phyi rol yul du 'phros pa las/_/cho 'phrul yi ge sna tshogs 'phros/_/ya wa ra la sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/_i I u U e ai o au a~M aH/_a las cho 'phrul 'od 'phros pas/_/yi 
[\[31a.2\]]ge'i phreng ba tshogs byung ste/_/yi ge'i yan lag ye shes la/_/sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon byung /_/dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/sku dang gsung thugs sprul pa'i tshogs/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzes par snang /_/des na yi ge'i rang bzhin ni/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[31a.3\]]sku nyid yin par bshad/_/a ni thugs kyi sa bon te/_/ka la sogs pa dang po lnga/_/mgur gyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin yin/_/gnyis pa tsa la sogs pa lnga/_/zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin/_/gsum pa Ta la sogs pa bcu/_/ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang 
[\[31a.4\]]bzhin yin/_/bzhi ba pa la sogs pa lnga/_/zhal gyi sgros las byung bar bshad/_/lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi/_/bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag_/sku las 'phros par rab tu bshad/_/zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las/_/sgrib pa sreg pa'i yig 'bru ha/_/
[\[31a.5\]]gsang ba'i mkha' yi 'od zer las/_/cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'bru k+Sha/_/sku yi khrun tshad lte ba las/_/'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bru hwa/_/thugs kar 'khyil pa'i dpal be'u las/_/mtshan ma dag pa'i yig 'bru sha/_/phyag gi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las/_/
[\[31a.6\]]cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru shu/_/skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las/_/rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'bru la/_/skyes bu chen po'i sta zur las/_/'dod chags sreg pa'i yi ger/_/skyes bu chen po'i dku skabs las/_/gti mug sel ba'i yi ge wa/_/skyes bu chen 
[\[31a.7\]]po'i byin pa las/_/'khor ba gnon pa'i yig 'bru ya/_/skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las/_/rang bzhin yi ge i gnyis shar/_/skyes bu chen po'i snyan gnyis las/_/rang bzhin yi ge u gnyis shar/_/skyes bu chen po'i shangs gnyis las/_/rang bzhin 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]yi ge e gnyis shar/_/skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las/_/rang bzhin yi ge o gnyis shar/_/skyes bu chen po'i spyi gtsug nas/_/rgyal ba'i sa bon a~M du shar/_/des na yig 'bru'i yan lag kun/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs/_/o~M ni sku 
[\[31b.2\]]yi rang bzhin te/_/AHni thugs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/yi ge'i phreng ba mang po kun/_/gsung brjod gsung gi rang bzhin no/_/AHni chos sku'i rang bzhin te/_/a~M ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams/_/sprul pa 'dren pa'i sku zhes bshad/_/
[\[31b.3\]]a ni chos kyi dbyings yin te/_/oM ni rig pa'i ye shes yin/_/yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams/_/chos dang chos nyid rang bzhin yin/_/a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te/_/o~M ni tshig tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/tshig gi tshogs nyid yi ge yin/_/yi ge ring 
[\[31b.4\]]ba'i tshig gi mdzod/_/yi ge 'od zer 'bar 'phros pas/_/chos dang chos ma yin pa rnams/_/ngag gi dbang po kha phye ste/_/don dang tshig tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/sgra skad kun gyis bsdus pa'i tshogs/_/yig 'bru phreng ba'i ngang du rdzogs/_/tshig dang yig 'bru 
[\[31b.5\]]thams cad kun/_/o~M gyi rang bzhin ngang du rdzogs/_/o~M gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kun/_/a yi rang bzhin dbyings su zhi/_/a ni yig 'bru kun gyi gter/_/a nyid chos kyi dbyings su thim/_/des na rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 
[\[31b.6\]]de/_/'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis/_/cir yang 'gyur zhid cir yang snang /_/sa dang nam mkha' me dang rlung /_/chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/_/'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la/_/sa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i/_/chu dang rlung gi ngo bor 
[\[31b.7\]]snang /_/gang dag sku yis 'dul ba'i tshe/_/sku dang gzugs brnyan ring bsrel dang /_/rten la sogs pa tha dad par/_/'jig rten kun du ston par 'gyur/_/gsung gis 'dul ba'i dus byung na/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu las/_/sogs pa'i 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sgra skad sna tshogs dang /_/yi ge'i gzugs su bstan nas ni/_/'khor ba'i khams su snang bar byed/_/ci'i phyir zhe na yi ge ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te/_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin 
[\[32a.2\]]yin pas na/_/thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs kyis/_/thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o/_/de bzhin yi ge'i tshogs 'di yang /_/yan lag sbyor sdud sna tshogs kyis/_/thams cad tshig tu go bar byed/_/yi ge rang bzhin ye shes ni/_/so so'i don rnams 
[\[32a.3\]]bshad par bya/_/a ni ma skyes ye shes yin/_/rang bzhin thams cad stong bar ston/_/ka ni bya ba'i ye shes te/_/lam gyis thams cad grol bar ston/_/kha ni khyab par byed pa'i sgo/_/mi dmigs thams cad grol bar ston/_/ga ni don du gyur pa'i sgo/_/
[\[32a.4\]]yul med thams cad grol bar ston/_/g+ha ni gnas pa'i sgo yin te/_/gcig tu ma nges grol bar ston/_/nga ni 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo/_/'dzin bral thams cad grol bar ston/_/tsa ni 'gag pa med pa'i sgo/_/cir yang snang bas thams cad grol/_/tsha ni 
[\[32a.5\]]'da' ba med pa'i sgo/_/'bral ba med pas thams cad grol/_/dza ni ma byung ba yi sgo/_/mi gnas pas ni thams cad grol/_/dz+ha ni rnyog ma bral ba'i sgo/_/dri ma dag pas thams cad grol/_/nya ni spyod dang bral ba'i sgo/_/bya ba med pas thams cad grol/_/Ta 
[\[32a.6\]]ni nga rgyal med pa'i sgo/_/ri bo med pas thams cad grol/_/Tha ni sgyu rtsal med pa'i sgo/_/byed pa med pas thams cad grol/_/Da ni 'dres pa med pa'i sgo/_/rtsod pa med pas thams cad grol/_/D+ha ni slu ba med pa'i sgo/_/sgyu ma thams cad grol bar byed/_/
[\[32a.7\]]Na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo/_/'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol/_/ta ni tha snyad med pa'i sgo/_/brjod pa med pas thams cad grol/_/tha ni rten dang bral ba'i sgo/_/gnas pa med pas thams cad grol/_/da ni gtong dang bral ba'i sgo/_/len pa med pas 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]thams cad grol/_/d+ha ni rang bzhin med pa'i sgo/_/mtshan nyid med pas thams cad grol/_/na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo/_/'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol/_/pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i sgo/_/'gag pa med pas thams cad grol/_/pha ni dngos po med 
[\[32b.2\]]pa'i sgo/_/ci yang med pas thams cad grol/_/ba ni brjod pa med pa'i sgo/_/brjod pa med pas thams cad grol/_/b+ha ni rdul dang bral ba'i sgo/_/rtog pa med pas thams cad grol/_/ma ni chags pa med pa'i sgo/_/rtag pa med pas thams cad grol/_/ya ni 
[\[32b.3\]]chags pa med pa'i sgo/_/gos pa med pas thams cad grol/_/wa ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i sgo/_/'bras bu med pas thams cad grol/_/ra ni rkyen dang bral ba'i sgo/_/dor ba med pas thams cad grol/_/la ni blang ba med pa'i sgo/_/yon tan med pas thams cad 
[\[32b.4\]]grol/_/sha ni spros pa med pa'i sgo/_/zhi bas thams cad grol bar byed/_/Sha ni khur dang bral ba'i sgo/_/lci ba med pas thams cad grol/_/sa ni yang dag gsang ba'i sgo/_/nges pas thams cad grol bar byed/_/ha ni rgyu dang bral ba'i sgo/_/rkyen dang bral 
[\[32b.5\]]bas grol bar byed/_/a ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo/_/mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed/_/i ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo/_/gzugs dang bral bas thams cad grol/_/u ni thos pa med pa'i sgo/_/sgra dang bral bas thams cad grol/_/e ni tshor ba med pa'i 
[\[32b.6\]]sgo/_/dri dang bral bas grol bar byed/_/o ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo/_/reg dang bral bas thams cad grol/_/a~M ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo/_/cir yang snang bas thams cad grol/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos/_/yod mthong snang grags chos 
[\[32b.7\]]thams cad/_/yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas/_/yi ger ma gyur gang yang med/_/chos nyid snying po'i nyi ma la/_/'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar/_/chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la/_/yig 'bru sna tshogs phra bkod pa/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer las/_/'od kyi 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'bar/_/yi ge hUM gi 'od 'phros pas/_/rdo rje snying po'i sa bon zhes/_/rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer rin chen las/_/yig 'bru 'od kyi swa 
[\[33a.2\]]'phros pas/_/rin chen snying po'i sa bon zhes/_/rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags/_/nyi ma pad+mo 'bar 'phros pas/_/cho 'phrul yi ge'i a~M du 'bar/_/pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags/_/sna tshogs nyi ma'i 'od 'phros pas/_/cho 'phrul yi ge har gsal bas/_/sna 
[\[33a.3\]]tshogs snying po'i sa bon te/_/las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags/_/dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/thugs ni rdo rje ye shes yin/_/ye shes dam pas sprul pa yi/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/_/rdo rje rigs zhes bya bar bshad/_/yon tan ye shes rin 
[\[33a.4\]]chen yin/_/rin chen de las sprul pa yi/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/_/rin chen rigs zhes bya bar bshad/_/gsung gi ye shes pad+ma ste/_/pad+ma ye shes las sprul pa'i/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/_/pad+mo rigs kyi zhing du grags/_/phrin las bya ba sna 
[\[33a.5\]]tshogs te/_/sna tshogs ye shes sprul pa yi/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la/_/las kyi rigs zhes bya bar bshad/_/sku ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la/_/sprul pa rgyal ba dpag med la/_/de bzhin rigs zhes bya bar bshad/_/de bas rigs 
[\[33a.6\]]kyi gtan tshigs ni/_/ma bcos sku ni de bzhin nyid/_/mi 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs/_/yon tan kun 'byung rin chen rigs/_/chags med gsung gi pad+ma'i rigs/_/bya ba byed pa las kyi rigs/_/sku yi sprul pa thams cad ni/_/de bzhin rigs kyi gdung rgyud 
[\[33a.7\]]'dzin/_/thugs las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/rdo rje rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/_/yon tan yul gyi sangs rgyas rnams/_/rin chen rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/_/gsung las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/pad+ma rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/_/mdzad pa sprul 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/phrin las rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin/_/ci phyir rigs zhes bya zhe na/_/dang po de las byung ba dang /_/bar du de yi bya ba byed/_/tha mar de yi rgyud 'dzin phyir/_/de phyir rigs zhes grags pa yin/_/dper na me dang chu dag dang /_/nam 
[\[33b.2\]]mkha' dang ni sa dag la/_/gnas pa'i sems can mtha' dag kun/_/gnas rgyun nyid kyi ming 'dzin de/_/me la gnas pa'i sems can la/_/me yi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma zhes zer/_/chu la gnas pa'i sems can la/_/chu srin twa ra na zhes zer/_/ci phyir lnga zhes bya 
[\[33b.3\]]zhe na/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang /_/mdzad pa phrin las nyid dang lnga/_/rig pa lnga dang lnga nyid du/_/thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang /_/des na lnga zhes nges par bshad/_/ci phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kun/_/
[\[33b.4\]]lnga po de las ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med/_/sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang /_/mtshan med pa las mtshan btags pa/_/thams cad lnga po nyid las btags/_/mtshan gyi bye brag thams cad kun/_/tha snyad tsam du gdags 
[\[33b.5\]]par zad/_/rigs med pa las rigs smos pa/_/'dul ba'i dbang du lngar snang yang /_/drang ba'i don te dngos gzhi med/_/ci yang med las ci snang ba/_/mkha' la 'ja' tshon byung ba 'dra/_/chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/_/gsang ba mchog gi bdag 
[\[33b.6\]]pos bshad/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa yin/_/sangs rgyas med cing sems can med/_/'khor ba med cing chos nyid med/_/dmigs pa med de mi dmigs med/_/de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin/_/rig dang ma rig tshul gcig ste/_/de ltar shes pa rgyal 
[\[33b.7\]]ba yin/_/sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can te/_/sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin/_/de ltar shes pa rgyal ba'i sras/_/byang chub phyir ni gang ma brnyes/_/ma brnyes gang yang de ma brnyes/_/brnyes pa med pa'i 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]don mthong na/_/de ni brnyes pa'i mchog yin no/_/gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/lam gyi ngo bo tshol 'dod na/_/lam gyi rtags nyid dpes mtshon te/_/lam gyi don la goms par bya/_/mi gnas mig ldan sgron ma yis/_/
[\[34a.2\]]lam gyi rgyu la mkhas par bya/_/bag chags rtogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams/_/sna tshogs dngos por snang mod kyang /_/nam mkha' dag la smig rgyu 'dra/_/de yang gtan tshigs nges pa yi/_/dpe yis mtshon te rtogs bya na/_/mkha' la sprin phung 'ja' tshon dang /_/
[\[34a.3\]]char la sogs pa'i rgyun snang yang /_/nam mkha'i cho 'phrul gcig tu zad/_/rtag tu de ltar snang ba min/_/dper na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang /_/slu zhing 'drid pa cir snang yang /_/sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa snang bar zad/_/rtag tu de ltar snang ba min/_/dper na rdo yi 
[\[34a.4\]]dngos po yang /_/sra zhing mkhregs pa'i dngos po yang /_/btags sam phye mar byas nas kyang /_/rlung gi mthu yis gtor byas na/_/de la rang bzhin ga la yod/_/dper na me yi rang bzhin dag_/tshang tshing sbar sbur kun sreg cing /_/'bar 'phro snang gsal 
[\[34a.5\]]mched byed na/_/chu yi mthu yis rlag 'gyur na/_/de la rang bzhin ga la yod/_/dper na rdzas kyi dngos po yang /_/me yi mthu yis sreg 'gyur na/_/de la rang bzhin ga la yod/_/shes pas zin pa'i sems can rnams/_/gzugs dang dran pa sna tshogs 
[\[34a.6\]]kyi/_/dbang po la sogs mdzes gyur kyang /_/phung po mi rtag shi 'phos na/_/dngos po brtan par mi 'gyur te/_/gzugs rnams so sor zhig nas ni/_/rus pa dag kyang mi snang ste/_/zhig dang rul la sogs pa yis/_/tha mar ci yang mi snang 'gyur/_/ri 
[\[34a.7\]]bo chen po la sogs pa/_/dngos po brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten rnams/_/sreg pa'i bskal pa la sogs pa/_/bskal pa gsum gyis brlag byas na/_/de la rang bzhin ga la yod/_/des na dngos po'i chos rnams kun/_/dngos por brtags pa ma yin 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pas/_/chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes/_/'di ni rnal 'byor lam gyi mchog_/'dus pa'i tshogs rnams goms par gyis/_/zhes sems dpa'i rdo rje smra ba'i seng ges rnal 'byor mchog gi lam gsungs pa'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa 
[\[34b.2\]]kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i byin gyi rlabs las 
[\[34b.3\]]zhing khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/_don yongs su rdzogs pa'i snga ltas byung bar gyur to/_/'khor der 'dus par gyur pa rnams la la ni nyi zla'i steng na gnas shing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la lding bar gyur to/_/la la ni ri rab rgyang mar 'phen/_la la ni stong 
[\[34b.4\]]gsum chen po'i khams 'phen par gyur to/_/la la ni chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong bar gyur to/_/la la ni seng ge'i khri la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis shin 
[\[34b.5\]]tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/_sems dpa'i rdo rje de la rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun dus la brdabs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems dpa' chen po cho 'phrul rgya cher gda' ba 'di don ji lta bu lags/_rtags ci lta bu lags/_bdag cag rnams la rgya cher 
[\[34b.6\]]bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/_/smra ba'i seng ge chen pos bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams 'di dag ni don yongs su rdzogs pa'i ltas chen po yin te/_snga ltas kyi mtshan ma 'di dang sbyar na 'dus pa chen po rnams sa nas sar shin tu 'phar 
[\[34b.7\]]zhing yang dag nges pa'i don mthong ba'i snga ltas yin no zhes gsungs pa las/_/rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis gsol pa/_sems dpa' chen po sa non pa'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags/_/don mthong ba'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags/_bdag cag rnams la bshad 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]du gsol zhes zhus pa las sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs legs so/_/khyod kyis zhus pa'i don rgya cher bshad par bya'o/_/rna ba lhogs la gus par nyon cig_/sgrub pa don gyi rnal 'byor pa/_/
[\[35a.2\]]rnal 'byor don la sbyor ba'i tshe/_/spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis/_/khams dang sa ni gar 'gro ba/_/mdo don tshul lngas lung bstan no/_/nges pa'i snga ltas byung ba yi/_/'bras bu don gyi khyad par yang /_/cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par nus/_/de nas yang 
[\[35a.3\]]dag bden pa 'thob/_/nges pa'i snga ltas rnam pa lnga/_/rgyu yi dus na 'byung ba ni/_/tshig gi brjod pa 'di lta ste/_/blo rtsal las kyi khyad par yang /_/snang ba lus kyi snga ltas dang /_/ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags dang /_/mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas dang /_/'dun 
[\[35a.4\]]pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis/_/'bras bu gang dang gang 'grub pa/_/mtshan ma gsal bar rgyud las 'byung /_/dper na me yi snga ltas ni/_/du ba'i mtshan ma rgyas par 'byung /_/du ba gar byung gnas de na/_/me nyid yod par nges pa yin/_/de bzhin chu yi snga ltas 
[\[35a.5\]]kyang /_/rlangs dang sngabs dang srog chags 'byung /_/de na chu nyid yod par nges/_/rlung gi ltas kyang 'di lta ste/_/sprin rnams rgyug cing dum bur 'chad/_/des na rlung chen 'byung bar nges/_/rtsi mtshal lo ma gang byung ba/_/de na gser khung yod pa ltar/_/snga ltas 
[\[35a.6\]]mtshan ma 'di dag gis/_/'bras bu mtho dman gar 'gyur ba/_/rgyu la mkhas par byas nas ni/_/mtshan ma ci byung de la sbyar/_/bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/srog la bab kyang mi blta bar/_/rnal 'byor yul la 'jug pa dang /_/ting 'dzin rig pa'i 
[\[35a.7\]]rtsal sprugs la/_/gnyen po kun bsten sa sbyangs nas/_/rnal 'byor sa la brtson par bya/_/'dis ni gdon mi za ba dang /_/la la the tshom mi skye zhing /_/ma nges la zhugs the tshom med/_/dper na 'jig rten byis pa dag_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma la skyo ba ltar/_/snga ltas 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]byung ba'i sgra thos na/_/shin tu brod pas mdun bsu ltar/_/ltas chen byung ba'i brod tshul gyis/_/shin tu brtson pas bde thob 'gyur/_/de bas snga ltas mtshan ma rnams/_/shes nas brtson par 'bad pa'i rigs/_/blo rtsal las kyi khyad par gyis/_/ting 
[\[35b.2\]]'dzin drod kyi snga ltas 'byung /_/yang dag bden pa'i don bstan na/_/mi skrag mi dang dga' ba skye/_/yang dag don la nges bltas na/_/'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skye/_/yang dag don la 'dris pa dang /_/rnam grangs chos la dad mi 'gyur/_/yang dag don nyid 
[\[35b.3\]]mthong ba na/_/tshig la dga' ba mi skye zhing /_/don nyid nye bar 'dzin par byed/_/don mthong ba dang ye shes skye/_/ye shes skyes par gyur pa dang /_/dngos por snang ba thams cad kun/_/sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur/_/sgyu ma tsam du shes pa la/_/brten 
[\[35b.4\]]nas chos nyid don bltas na/_/snang ba med pa'i don nyid ni/_/snang ba med par mthong bar 'gyur/_/snang med srid pa mthong ba'i tshe/_/cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung /_/de nyid bden pa'i snga ltas so/_/de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi/_/rdul phran 'dra ba'i mtshan ma 
[\[35b.5\]]'byung /_/de ni g.yo ba'i snga ltas so/_/de nas smig rgyu lta bur 'byung /_/dang po'i drod ces bya bar bshad/_/de nas mtsho yi rlabs ltar 'byung /_/bar gyi drod ces bya bar bshad/_/de nas rlung chen lta bur yang /_/thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tha 
[\[35b.6\]]ma'i drod ces bya bar bshad/_/de nas yig 'bru'i drod spros pas/_/char chen 'bab pa lta bur 'byung /_/de ni thob pa'i drod ces bya/_/de nas mkha' la sprin lding bzhin/_/ting 'dzin rtsal 'phang mtho bar 'gyur/_/de ni shin tu brtan pa'i drod/_/de nas ta 
[\[35b.7\]]la gcig tsam du/_/bdag gi lus ni dbang med par/_/mkha' la 'phar zhing 'phags par rtsol/_/'di ni shin tu gsal ba'i drod/_/de nas sa chen g.yo ba ltar/_/shin tu yam yom mar mer 'byung /_/'di ni dang po'i rtags shes bya/_/de nas 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs na/_/ci ltar dmigs pa der 'grub ste/_/me yi skye mched der bsgoms na/_/me yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/_/chu yi skye mched der bsgoms na/_/chu yi skye mched nyid du 'gyur/_/rlung gi skye mched der bsgoms na/_/rlung 
[\[36a.2\]]gi skye mched nyid du 'gyur/_/yig 'bru'i skye mched der bsgoms na/_/yig 'bru gang ltar gsal bar 'gyur/_/de ltar rdzas kyi skye mched du/_/gang ltar bsgoms pa de ltar 'gyur/_/de ni rtags chen thob pa yin/_/blo yi ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs na/_/ngag gi 
[\[36a.3\]]bden pa'i rtsal 'gyur ste/_/sreg pa'i me chen mthong ba na/_/zhi par gyur cig byas pa yis/_/de nyid du ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/chu klung gnod pa'i rgyun byung na/_/chad par gyur cig brjod pa yis/_/de nyid du ni chad par 'gyur/_/rlung chen gnod pa'i rgyun byung na/_/zhi 
[\[36a.4\]]bar gyur cig brjod pa yis/_/de nyid du ni chad par 'gyur/_/nad pa'i tshogs ni mthong ba na/_/gang na na ba'i dmigs der ni/_/se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang /_/nad rnams zhi bar gyur ces brjod/_/nad kyi tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[36a.5\]]ngag gis brjod byas pa/_/thams cad ma lus grub par 'gyur/_/ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na/_/lus kyi drod la rtsal 'byung ste/_/gnyid kyi rtog pa choms pa dang /_/lus kyi bzod pa thob pa ni/_/'di ni dang po'i drod yin no/_/khams kyi zas dang bral ba 
[\[36a.6\]]dang /_/mdangs dang dbang po gsal 'gyur ba/_/'di ni gnyis pa'i drod ces bya/_/shing bal lta bur yang ba dang /_/khams bde mi bde mi 'byung zhing /_/nad kyi tshogs dang bral 'gyur ba/_/'di ni drod chen bstan pa yin/_/khams kyi zas la ma bsten 
[\[36a.7\]]yang /_/dbang po gzi mdangs shin tu gsal/_/'di ni ting 'dzin ro tshor rtags/_/gzhan yang lus kyi snga ltas ni/_/mnyam pa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/_/khru gang tsam du 'phar ba dang /_/ta la gang tsam bar du 'gro/_/'di yang ltas chen rtags yin 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]no/_/gzhan yang snang ba'i nam mkha' la/_/gom pas bgrod de 'gro ba dang /_/chu la mi 'bying sa la 'dzul/_/me yis mi 'tshig rlung bcing ba/_/'di yang snga ltas chen po yin/_/lus kyi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na/_/mthu yi rtsal yang 'byung ba 
[\[36b.2\]]ste/_/mthu yi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/gal te dgos sam 'dod pa na/_/sa 'am rdo 'am bye ma dag_/gser dang dngul la sogs par sgyur/_/skam sa dag la chu 'byin cing /_/sol ba dag la ljon shing 'byung /_/de la sogs pa'i dgos pa 
[\[36b.3\]]rnams/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 'grub/_/spyod pa'i mthu dang rtsal rdzogs na/_/'byor pa'i yon tan rdzogs 'gyur te/_/yid du 'ong ba'i nor 'byung zhing /_/'dod pa'i bsams pa thams cad 'grub/_/rdzas kyi mchog tu gyur pa yi/_/ngo mtshar can yang 
[\[36b.4\]]rnyed par 'gyur/_/de dag rung ba'i snga ltas so/_/'gro gang 'du ba'i snga ltas kyang /_/kun gyis bkur zhing dga' ba dang /_/kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/thams cad 'dul zhing thams cad la/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/de dag snga ltas 
[\[36b.5\]]chen po yin/_/mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas kyang /_/shin tu rgya cher 'byung ba ste/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/_/bag chags byang ba'i snga ltas kyang /_/rtag par gcer bur 'byung ba dang /_/khrus chen rtag tu byed pa dang /_/dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag 
[\[36b.6\]]pa dang /_/chu bo dag las rgal ba dang /_/mtsho chu dag la rkyal ba dang /_/char gyi rgyun gyis 'khru ba dang /_/gzhan gyis bum pa gang ba'i chus/_/bdag gi lus la ldugs pa dang /_/me dpung chen pos sreg pa dang /_/shin tu mthon po'i rtse dag las/_/rlung gis 
[\[36b.7\]]shin tu g.yeng zhing 'thor/_/'di dag bag chags byang ba'i ltas/_/'jigs dang bral ba'i snga ltas ni/_/g.yul 'gyed pa las slar log dang /_/nad las thar te sos pa dang /_/btson ra dag las thar ba dang /_/gshed ma'i lag nas shor ba dang /_/gcan 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gzan nang nas bros pa dang /_/dug nad dag las sos pa dang /_/bcings pa dag las grol pa dang /_/thag pa bcad par gyur pa rnams/_/mtshan ma bzar po'i snga ltas yin/_/sa rnams thob pa'i snga ltas ni/_/khri rkang dag la 'dzeg pa dang /_/
[\[37a.2\]]phal pa'i skas la 'dzeg pa dang /_/ljon shing dag la 'dzeg pa dang /_/gyen du shin tu 'gro ba dang /_/ri bo'i rtse la 'dzeg pa dang /_/rin chen skas la 'dzeg pa dang /_/mchod rten dag la 'dzeg pa dang /_/nam mkha'i skas la 'dzeg pa rnams/_/'di dag don 
[\[37a.3\]]gyi snga ltas yin/_/sa rnams non pa'i snga ltas kyang /_/khri mthon steng na 'dug pa dang /_/glang po che la zhon pa dang /_/seng ge dag la zhon pa dang /_/khyung chen lding la zhon pa dang /_/mchod rten kha la phyin pa dang /_/ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang /_/nam mkha'i 
[\[37a.4\]]dbyings na 'dug pa dang /_/lus las sprin phung 'byung ba dang /_/zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang /_/nyi ma'i steng na 'dug pa rnams/_/rnal 'byor sa la gnas pa'i rtags/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi snga ltas ni/_/rgyal po'i bka' la btags pa dang /_/bka' yi 
[\[37a.5\]]dbang por bskos pa dang /_/gzhan la dbang sgyur byed pa dang /_/'jig rten skos la 'bebs pa dang /_/gzhan gyi sde pa dbang sdud dang /_/g.yul chen dag las rgyal ba dang /_/bdag nyid rgyal por gyur pa dang /_/mgo la me tog skye ba rnams/_/rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[37a.6\]]su gyur pa'i ltas/_/chos la dbang thob snga ltas ni/_/glegs bam zab mo rnyed pa dang /_/de bzhin 'dri ba mang po dang /_/de dag la ni dpyod pa dang /_/gzhan la 'chad cing ston pa dang /_/don nyid gtan la 'bebs pa dang /_/me long dag la lta ba dang /_/shel 
[\[37a.7\]]gyi bum pa gang ba la/_/lta zhing brtags te 'thung ba dang /_/rin chen nor bu thu ba dang /_/'khor lo lag tu babs pa dang /_/nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang /_/ri rab klad la skor ba rnams/_/chos la dbang thob snga ltas so/_/bden pa mthong ba'i snga ltas kyang /_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]sngon ma mthong gi yul mthong dang /_/stong gsum rgya cher mthong ba dang /_/gling rnams gzhan du phyin pa dang /_/ri rab kha la phyin pa dang /_/nam mkha' rgya cher mthong ba dang /_/rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin pa dang /_/lag na sgron me thogs pa dang /_/nyi ma'i snying 
[\[37b.2\]]por lta ba dang /_/snang srid dpyod pa byed pa rnams/_/chos la dbang thob ltas chen yin/_/lung bstan thob pa'i snga ltas ni/_/rol mo'i sgra rnams thos pa dang /_/'brug gi sgra ni grag pa dang /_/seng ge'i nga ro grag pa dang /_/chos kyi sgra yi gtam thos dang /_/
[\[37b.3\]]gzugs brnyan zhal ni 'dzum pa dang /_/sangs rgyas gsung thos sku mi mthong /_/lha mo glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang /_/gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang /_/grogs po grogs po zhes brjod cing /_/chos kyi bgro ba byed pa rnams/_/lung bstan 'byung ba'i snga ltas 
[\[37b.4\]]so/_/de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams/_/ltas chen kun du snang ba dang /_/gang zag las kyi dang po rnams/_/rig 'dzin so so'i sa pa ni/_/'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin/_/rnal 'byor las kyi dang po la/_/ltas chen 'di dag gang byung yang /_/'khor ba'i 
[\[37b.5\]]'du 'dzi kun bsal nas/_/don la rtogs shing sa rnams sbyong /_/des ni don la reg par 'gyur/_/don la rig pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/rig 'dzin rdo rjer lhun gyis grub/_/rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang /_/sa la rtsal chen sbyong ba'i tshe/_/rtsal gyi cho 
[\[37b.6\]]'phrul sna tshogs 'byung /_/nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang /_/ri rab rked nas gsor ba dang /_/'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_/sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la/_/sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kun/_/khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus/_/de la 
[\[37b.7\]]sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni cho 'phrul yin/_/rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni/_/'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la/_/so so'i skad dang chos mthun par/_/'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su/_/so so'i skad du ston par nus/_/de dag rjes su 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bstan pa yin/_/chos kyi sgo rnams snang ba yi/_/nges pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/'jig rten khams rnams g.yos nas kyang /_/thams cad ngo mtshar skye 'gyur te/_/sems kyi bsam pa rangs byas nas/_/
[\[38a.2\]]so so dga' ba'i ro myang 'gyur/_/chos rnams snang ba'i cho 'phrul yin/_/kun nas kun du brjod pa ni/_/gsang ba'i yi ge'i phreng ba las/_/rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra sgrogs pas/_/mthong yod snang grags chos rnams kun/_/kun kyang sngags kyi sgrar grag pas/_/
[\[38a.3\]]sngags su ma gyur gang yang med/_/des na rtsal gyi khyad par las/_/sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung /_/zhes smra ba'i seng ge chen po sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las cho 'phrul 
[\[38a.4\]]bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /_'dus pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[38a.5\]]chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid ni dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo /_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_/sems dpa' chen po des bka' stsal pa/_/'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams 
[\[38a.6\]]chos thams cad kyi srog ni dam tshig yin par shes par gyis shig_/de nas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems dpa' chen po dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba rnams bdag cag rnams thos par 'tshal/_/
[\[38a.7\]]thos nas kyang rtogs par 'tshal/_/rtogs nas kyang de la gnas par 'tshal na/_sems dpa' chen po rgya cher bshad du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_/sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dam tshig rnams 'di lta ste/_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]shin tu gsang ba'i dam tshig ni/_/snod ma yin par gyur pa las/_/phyi nang gsang ba gsum dag tu/_/sba ba'i thabs su spyad nas kyang /_/gsang ba'i chos rnams gsang bar bya/_/bstan pa'i gnas min snod ngan dag_/rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams/_/ma 'ongs 
[\[38b.2\]]rnal 'byor bcud can gyis/_/shes nas spang bar bya phyir bshad/_/'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang /_/mu stegs log lta'i lta la dga'/_/dad med blo zhan g.yeng rmugs shing /_/bslab nyan mi brtson byol song mtshungs/_/dad log dam nyams don las 
[\[38b.3\]]gol/_/byang chub thag pa gting nas chad/_/sems kyi myu gu'i rtsa tshig pa/_/ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha sbub yin/_/snod med kha sbub de dag la/_/gsang ba'i smra bar bya ba min/_/smras na de nyid kha sbub 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i tshig rnams khar smra yang /_/gab pa gsang 
[\[38b.4\]]ba'i don mi shes/_/skyon can spa los sgrogs rnams la/_/gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra/_/bsnyen sgrub gsang ba'i tshig rnams la/_/sgra la nyan kyang don mi gnyer/_/snying po'i don gsang mi thub pa/_/bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin/_/gsang don 
[\[38b.5\]]mi thub snod ngan la/_/gsang ba smra bar gang byed pa/_/de dang snod med snod ngan gnyis/_/'khor ba'i khams su zag par mnyam/_/lta dang dam tshig sgrub pa yi/_/dam pa'i mdzod gsum smra shes kyang /_/goms pa'i mthu med gnas ma gyur/_/ngan sgyu phrag dog 
[\[38b.6\]]ser snas gdungs/_/bya med chos la blo gtod cing /_/spyod rtsing dam ral rdeng med par/_/rnal 'byor spyod la lta dman zhes/_/zer ba pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho/_/snod ngan 'khor bar 'pho ba la/_/gsang ba'i don rnams smra byed pa/_/gsang ba nyams pa'i dbang 
[\[38b.7\]]gis na/_/nyams pa de dang de 'drar 'gyur/_/zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren/_/kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing /_/sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te/_/rku dang sgyu spyod [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]la dga'/_/tshe gcig grags pa ched phyir du/_/gang zag phyir 'breng tshig 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]'ga' la/_/mnyan te brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa/_/log smra dug can thar ma ltung /_/dug can ltung ba'i snod de la/_/gsang ba'i dmigs rnams smra ba ni/_/rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste/_/'khor ba'i tha mar de ltung 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[39a.2\]]ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la/_/gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i/_/don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/bstan kyang pham ltung gegs su 'gyur/_/de bas bstan par bya ba min/_/gal te bstan par gyur na ni/_/ston smra nyan byed de dag rnams/_/mthong 
[\[39a.3\]]yun phung byed gnyis skrag 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la/_/rnal 'byor mi shes gang dag gis/_/dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gi/_/sems kyi rnam grangs ci skyed pa/_/de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par/_/'bras bu mi bzad 
[\[39a.4\]]myong bar 'gyur/_/gal te las kyi 'phro len na/_/de snyed bskal par gzod 'jug dgos/_/mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni/_/gong ma bzhin du ngan bsams na/_/de yang gnas ngan len pa ste/_/mkhas pa de la skyo mi nus/_/rnal 'byor don ldan tshul 
[\[39a.5\]]mthun la/_/ngan pa'i tshig gis sems dkrugs shing /_/sgro skur rku dang brlang btab na/_/dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/_/zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang /_/ji ltar rgyu mthun de 'drar 'gyur/_/skal ba dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rtsa nyams skyon can rang bzhin 
[\[39a.6\]]ni/_/ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa dang /_/mi zad phra men las spyod byed/_/gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can/_/byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas/_/shin tu dman pa'i lta sems kyis/_/tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed/_/gang dag dam tshig yon tan ldan/_/byams 
[\[39a.7\]]la gnas shing rtag tu bzod/_/tshul shis don gyi gzhung rnams srong /_/de dag la ni 'dun pa med/_/dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du/_/byang chub snying po thob pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong /_/rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]gyur rnal 'byor pa/_/lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la/_/kha cig dregs dang phrag dog gis/_/khro spong thabs kyis smod par byed/_/de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste/_/nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung /_/mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor pa/_/yang dag don dang ldan pa'i 
[\[39b.2\]]mi/_/rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing /_/longs spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i/_/rjes su 'gro zhing de la 'dud/_/de ni log pa'i lam pa yin/_/rnal 'byor ltang dang byang chub khe/_/'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung /_/zang zing nor dang g.yo sprul khe/_/chung yang cis 
[\[39b.3\]]'grub srog dang sdo/_/rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can/_/bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar/_/shes rab mdzod kyi gter ldan yang /_/srog chags rkun mo'i sder mo ltar/_/khong nas gab sbas don ston la/_/blun po rnams kyis cir mi mthong /_/dper na 
[\[39b.4\]]'di 'drar tshul gcig ste/_/lus la gter 'chang mi dang ni/_/blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnas/_/'grogs kyang gnyis mtshungs khyad med 'dra/_/ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med/_/yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/
[\[39b.5\]]yang dag don du gnyer ba med/_/dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/dam tshig don du gnyer ba med/_/ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag_/nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste/_/'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes/_/rin chen dag gi yon tan brjod/_/de la 'gro gang gzhan 
[\[39b.6\]]dag gis/_/de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na/_/de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes/_/dris kyang med pas slar smras pa/_/gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi/_/yon tan cung zad smos par zad/_/de nyid bdag la med ces smra/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas/_/bslab par bya 
[\[39b.7\]]ba'i chos bral la/_/chos nyid bsngags pa rjod byed kyang /_/de dag la ni chos nyid med/_/de las spyod pa'i log spyod rnams/_/dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya/_/rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis/_/rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can/_/gsang ba 'jig 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]pa'i dgrar mthong nas/_/de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar/_/skrod cing chad pas gcod byed pa/_/skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/dper na blon po gang dag gis/_/nyes byas khrims dang 'gal 'gyur na/_/'gal bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor/_/
[\[40a.2\]]bka' yi yo srong blon po de/_/rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes/_/kun du rgya cher grags par 'gyur/_/ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na/_/bdag pos dug tu shes ma thag_/rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed/_/ci phyir ldum zas de dag las/_/dug 'phel gyur na 
[\[40a.3\]]'chi phyir ro/_/de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de/_/brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor des/_/gnas sam lo yis spyugs te spang /_/gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa/_/de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin/_/don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/_/tha tshig zab mor 
[\[40a.4\]]bcas rnams las/_/bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la/_/gal te ma tshor zhig gyur kyang /_/rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams/_/ji ltar glang po e ne ya/_/shi nas ro ru gyur mod kyang /_/gi wang rtsis ni don byed ltar/_/rnal 
[\[40a.5\]]'byor nyams de ror gyur yang /_/gzhan gyis bkur pa'i gnas yin zhing /_/de yi don byed nus pa yin/_/de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams/_/rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/_/ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig_/rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin/_/rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig 
[\[40a.6\]]gis ni/_/rnal 'byor can kun ma rung 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi/_/log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun/_/don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya/_/gal te ma spangs log spyad na/_/'khor ba'i g.yul ni 
[\[40a.7\]]rgyal 'gyur te/_/bden pa'i byin brlabs mthu chung 'gyur/_/kun kyang dge spyad don chung zhes/_/yang dag don las yid byung zhing /_/log pa'i chos la spro bar byed/_/kun kyang log pa'i las spyad pas/_/yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung /_/des ni sgro skur gnyis 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]su 'gyur/_/bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa/_/ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis/_/nams kyang gnod pa yong mi mdzad/_/de yi 'khor na gnas pa yi/_/gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams/_/rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi/_/skyon mthong tsam na chad 
[\[40b.2\]]pas gcod/_/thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung /_/sgrub pa'i snod mchog gcig yod de/_/'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i/_/rgyud mnyan don ldan ngang tshul bzang /_/ci la chags med gtong ldan sems/_/shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis/_/
[\[40b.3\]]gti mug tha ram blo phye nas/_/chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan pas/_/rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul/_/ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas/_/sdong po sdong chen rab dul ba'o/_/tha tshig lung las byung ba bzhin/_/gzhung srong thub par byed pa de/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[40b.4\]]sras po yin pas na/_/de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya/_/ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar/_/de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung /_/rigs 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo/_/de bzhin dam tshig thub pa ltar/_/gnas par byed pa'i rten 
[\[40b.5\]]yang yin/_/dam tshig kun gyi srog yin te/_/dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog go/_/dam tshig 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs/_/dam tshig bgrod pa lam gyi mchog_/dam tshig chu bo sgrol ba'i gru/_/dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin/_/dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin 
[\[40b.6\]]te/_/dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin/_/ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar/_/gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yin/_/'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed/_/des na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung /_/mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po/_/dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung 
[\[40b.7\]]nas/_/lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang /_/bdag nyid dag pa ma khrel ba'i/_/tshul gsum mi gnod dam bcas gsum/_/yongs su mnyams mdo bzhi po/_/mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas/_/mdo don dran pa la bgrang bsngo/_/brtul zhugs spyod 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pa'i dam tshig ni/_/da ma tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro/_/wa dang cang shes gyi ling dang /_/blang dor ming bral khro chen bdag_/shin tu glang chen myos 'dra'i sems/_/dpa' rtul stag mchog rngam zhing gtum/_/mkha' lding khyung chen lhag mi lta/_/
[\[41a.2\]]gtum thung dom chen sdong gcig pa/_/yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser/_/gti mug lkugs pa'i blo tshol ldan/_/ri po mi 'gyur brtan pa che/_/mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral/_/gnam lcags lce yi drag shul can/_/phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 
[\[41a.3\]]bdag_/zon bag khu 'phrig kha rog sems/_/nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan/_/zla bral seng ge [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal/_/re 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo/_/g.yo ldan lcag chen sgyu ma'i rgya/_/gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing /_/thogs med gsod spyod ce 
[\[41a.4\]]spyang khwa/_/che ba'i nga rgyal stag mchog blo/_/kum 'dzem blo ldan nam mkha' lding /_/sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyong /_/rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni/_/bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan/_/goms nas nyams su len byed pa/_/rnal 'byor gsang 
[\[41a.5\]]ba'i bka' ba yin/_/dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/bsrung dang brjod dang gsang ba dang /_/yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang /_/yid 'ong dang du blang ba dang /_/brtul zhugs zab mor spyad pa dang /_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 
[\[41a.6\]]thams cad kyi/_/mi 'dor mi spong sbyar pa yi/_/rigs ldan shes par bya ba dang /_/thob cing grub par bya ba yin/_/re re la yang lnga lnga ste/_/rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las/_/bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa/_/spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[41a.7\]]byang chub sems rgyud la/_/nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu/_/zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi/_/blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan/_/'di ni sngar 'gro tha tshig ste/_/zab mo sgrub pa'i sngon logs su/_/rdo rje tha tshig drag po'o/_/gcan 'phrang lam rnams 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]bsrung ba'i phyir/_/spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams/_/nges pa'i don gyis bsrung byas na/_/de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin/_/de ltar spyi yi sdom pa la/_/gnas nas dus kyi skabs 'di ru/_/bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni/_/mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste/_/gcan 
[\[41b.2\]]gzan rgyal po yin pas so/_/za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter/_/dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs/_/rig chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag_/de ni breg pa'i rigs ma yin/_/gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag_/mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min/_/pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru kha ma 
[\[41b.3\]]bye/_/zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye/_/ma brtags bug rdol can gyi snod/_/kha mi dbye zhing bcud mi blugs/_/don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i rtags/_/bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min/_/shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag_/'dam rdzab khung du bsrub mi bya/_/seng ge 
[\[41b.4\]]dkar mo'i 'o ma dag_/dug can snod du blugs pa min/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/bsreg par bya ba yod ma yin/_/khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba/_/de dag gcag par bya ba min/_/gnam lcags me yi ngur mo dag_/brdab par bya ba ma yin no/_/
[\[41b.5\]]stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i/_/las kyi lhag ma bsdu mi bya/_/rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi/_/de dag gzhig par bya ba min/_/rdo rje ra ba'i go tshags ni/_/bsngam bya bral bar bya ba min/_/bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag_/g.yeng ba'i rlung gis 
[\[41b.6\]]bskyod mi bya/_/rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag_/'ol kar gcad par bya ba min/_/rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag_/nam zhar dbyi bar mi bya'o/_/rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar/_/rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o/_/gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba dag_/rgyal 
[\[41b.7\]]mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya/_/rnal 'byor las kyi khyad par can/_/skal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste/_/skal bar ldan pa'i nor mchog yin/_/rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni/_/rdo rje las kyi thun tshags dag_/rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis/_/srog la bar 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]chad byed pa'i dgra/_/nyon mongs 'thibs pa de gzhom bya/_/snyom las le lo'i dpung bskyed pa/_/thug thu bar chod nga rgyal gzhi/_/dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud/_/dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya/_/rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs 
[\[42a.2\]]pa/_/'dres pa gang zag byis pa'i tshig_/zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing /_/thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o/_/ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag_/gshed ma'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe/_/thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bzhin/_/le lo'i dgra bcom brtson 
[\[42a.3\]]par 'bad/_/rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gegs bsal ba/_/dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can/_/'dod dang longs spyod mi mthun dang /_/spyi mthun nang du mi gcig pa/_/phyi nang can dang gnod byed dang /_/'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dang /_/dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar 
[\[42a.4\]]g.yeng can/_/mkhas pas bsgrims te spang bar bya'o/_/de ni rnal 'byor gegs yin te/_/dngos grub chu bo gcod par byed/_/rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa la/_/bar du gcod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung /_/rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud nyid dang /_/de bzhin btang snyoms 
[\[42a.5\]]le lo'i bdud/_/longs spyod 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba'i bdud/_/tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po'i bdud/_/khro gtum ngang thung 'khrug pa'i bdud/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bdud lnga po/_/yang dag don la sgrib pa ste/_/gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis/_/zhi ba chen po'i 
[\[42a.6\]]dang du bzlog_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po/_/thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya/_/rdo rje brnag pa gsang 'phel bas/_/ngag gi dbang po nyams 'gyur te/_/kha na ma thos phog par 'gyur/_/de dag bcas kar 'gyur ba'i dgra/_/lta dman 
[\[42a.7\]]spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis/_/bka' yi gzhung bor log par spyad/_/nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i dgra/_/dam gtsor spyod pa'i las rnams yin/_/'da' dka' rdo rje mchog gsum po/_/btang snyoms phyal bar shor ba ni/_/rtsa ba rul pa'i ljon shing 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bzhin/_/bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas/_/brtsam pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe/_/'bad pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis/_/don rnams grub pa ma yin te/_/'bras bur mi 'gyur 'phrog pa'i dgra/_/rnal 'byor chen por spyod pa la/_/'dod pa'i nor mchog 'phrog 
[\[42b.2\]]pa'i dgra/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis/_/skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya/_/srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag_/sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni/_/sa rnams cig car sbyangs pa ste/_/zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin no/_/khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di 
[\[42b.3\]]dag_/yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te/_/rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i rgyu/_/rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o/_/'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag_/bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te/_/ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings/_/btsal med lhun gyis grub pa la/_/dug lnga 
[\[42b.4\]]rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag_/ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba ste/_/kun shes kun rig gsal ba'o/_/rang rig ye shes rang las byung /_/rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis/_/nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o/_/'di ni rgyun gyi dam tshig ste/_/brjod du med pa bsrung ba'o/_/bsrung 
[\[42b.5\]]ba thub par bya ba la/_/dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni/_/gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi/_/blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan/_/'dod pas chags dang 'joms pa dang /_/gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rnams/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/_/don dang ldan pa'i skyes bus 
[\[42b.6\]]spyad/_/sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang /_/ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed/_/rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog_/spyad par bya ba'i las yin no/_/rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang /_/dngos por brtags pa thams cad kyang /_/don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste/_/de nyid 
[\[42b.7\]]sku gsung thugs kyi bdag_/mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad ni/_/mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal/_/theg pa 'og ma'i khyad par rnams/_/kun kyang rang rig blo la gsal/_/yon tan ci 'byung mi brjod cing /_/'og ma rnams la mi smod cing /_/thams cad 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]mnyam pa'i dam tshig ste/_/'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs/_/gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad/_/tshig rnams brjod pa snang mtha' yas/_/rnam rtog kun du sems rdo rje/_/rig dang tshor ba rin chen 'byung /_/yid g.yo byed 
[\[43a.2\]]pa don kun rdzogs/_/stan 'gan rang bzhin spyod pa'i gnas/_/zhing bcu dag dang ldan pa na/_/bde ba chen po'i longs spyod de/_/thogs med phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs/_/phyi yi yul dang nang gi sems/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas/_/de la sgrib dang mi 
[\[43a.3\]]sgrib ces/_/mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs/_/thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas/_/phung po lnga don ye shes lnga/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni/_/phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin/_/yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las/_/gzhan gyi rang 
[\[43a.4\]]bzhin med pas na/_/mtshan ma'i rnam pa cir snang yang /_/de la chad pa'i gnas med do/_/dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/_/rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste/_/rtog par byed pa gang yin pa/_/de ni dam tshig chen po'o/_/thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas/_/
[\[43a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las/_/dngos su spyod pa thams cad bya/_/de ni dam tshig chen po yin/_/snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings/_/bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'/_/'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod de/_/'di ni rdo rje tha tshig yin/_/srid pa'i 
[\[43a.6\]]sems can thams cad dang /_/thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun/_/so sor thams cad snang ba ste/_/kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal/_/spyod pa'i las dang rtogs pa dang /_/mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad kyang /_/sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de/_/
[\[43a.7\]]brtags na longs spyod tshogs su 'gyur/_/ma skyes stong pa sku yi rgya/_/rang bzhin smon med gsung gi don/_/mtshan med yid las 'das pa thugs/_/rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgyas so/_/mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang sgyur na/_/'khor ba thams 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]cad dbyings la snang /_/las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te/_/gzhan du phrin las lus pa med/_/sdug bsngal byang chub chen po ste/_/'khor ba ye nas mya ngan 'das/_/sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/_/nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don/_/snang ba 
[\[43b.2\]]med pa'i don mthong dang /_/sa dang sa yi rim par ni/_/'di dang 'di zhes gzung du med/_/'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas/_/sku dang gsung thugs mi g.yo ba'i/_/ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang la gnas/_/ji ltar bsgyur yang chos nyid pas/_/chad pa'i 
[\[43b.3\]]gnas zhes brjod dang bral/_/med dang phyal ba gcig po dang /_/lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che/_/'di zhes ris su chad med pa/_/'di ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/_/spyad dang spyod par bya med pas/_/srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i/_/spyod par 
[\[43b.4\]]snang ba thams cad kun/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod do/_/ma spangs lhun grub dbyer med pas/_/dbyings las gzhan na lta yul med/_/'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go/_/sa chu me rlung snod bcud bcas/_/kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid do/_/chos nyid don 
[\[43b.5\]]la gzhan med pa/_/rang 'byung ye shes gsal ba'o/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/ma btsal rang la yod pa yin/_/'dod pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod de/_/bde chen longs spyod tshogs yin no/_/ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang /_/'phags lam 
[\[43b.6\]]'khor ba'i chos rnams kun/_/rang bzhin so sor mi dmigs te/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin yin/_/spyod dang gzugs rigs thams cad kun/_/phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin te/_/sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston/_/don rig thugs kyi rang bzhin 
[\[43b.7\]]no/_/ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba/_/mi gnas pa la chags pa med/_/don gyi khyad par rtogs chud na/_/kun du bzang po mchog gi sa'o/_/mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs te/_/thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don/_/bdag nyid chen por thams cad rdzogs/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]lhun rdzogs bde ba chen po yi/_/khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas/_/sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs/_/rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral/_/lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin/_/zhes smra ba'i seng ge chen pos gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi 
[\[44a.2\]]rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 
[\[44a.3\]]'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang /_'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/_sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad ni bdag cag rnams kyis brda rig pa tsam gyi ngo bor mthong ngo /_/de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i 
[\[44a.4\]]tshogs chos thams cad ni brda dang /_tha snyad dang /_btags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig_/btags pa'i chos thams cad ni phyi nang gang na yang mi gnas te/_chos thams cad la ming gi gzhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yin no/_/brda zhes bya 
[\[44a.5\]]ba ni sbas pa btags pa'i tha snyad yin no/_/sbas pa'i chos rnams gsang ba'i phyir/_/thams cad sba zhing brgyud par bya/_/'di ltar brda yi sbyor ba la/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/_/de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsol pa/_sems 
[\[44a.6\]]dpa' chen pos brda yi chos rnams rgya cher bshad du gsol/_/bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad/_/brda yi don gyis brgyud par bgyi/_/brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu/_/sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang gang /_/mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags/_/de skad ces 
[\[44a.7\]]gsol pa dang /_smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/_/brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig_/sbas te gsang ba'i chos rnams ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin/_/mi bstan gzhan la gsang ba ni/_/mu stegs la sogs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]sde ba rnams/_/rnal 'byor spyod la 'phya ba las/_/shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir/_/sbas pa'i brda yis bstan par bya/_/brda yi yon tan chen po ni/_/grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab na/_/mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi yod de/_/gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin 
[\[44b.2\]]dang /_/rnal 'byor rig pa'i spyod yul dang /_/sbas pas grub thag nye ba dang /_/gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams shing /_/brda la dga' ba'i ma sring rnams/_/nye zhing gdung ba'i thabs su 'gyur/_/de bas sbas pa'i brda rnams ni/_/tshig gis mtshon te brjod par 
[\[44b.3\]]bya/_/a la la hoH/_a ti pu hoH/_pra ti bu hoH/_ma hA go ru saM kra ma/_gu ya de bI sa ma ya/_ma hA tsan+d+ra/_ma hA pur+sha/_gu ya/_b+ha ga_/ma hA badzra/_sa ma ya hoH/_sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_ra ho ya haM/_ra ga yA mi/_sa ma ya dzaH/_lhan/_o~M A~MHhU~M/_sa ma ya/_sa ma 
[\[44b.4\]]ya/_e h+ye hi/_e h+ye hi/_ha he ha/_ha he ha/_ma ta~M kha/_ma ta~M kha/_ka ruk+Sha/_ka ruk+Sha/_k+Sha~M ba ri/_k+Sha~M ba ri/_ra ho ha~M ra ho ha~M/_sa ma ya hi/_a la stoM/_a la stoM/_kha kha le kha le/_sha da pa/_sha da pa/_kha raM khA hi/_kha raM kha hi/_kha le b+h+yo/_kha le ha 
[\[44b.5\]]b+h+yo/_kha ka kha kha ka kha/_kha h+yi ha he/_rak+Sha khA hi rak+Sha khA hi/_ha ha he ra~M/_gu h+ya/_gu h+ya/_sa ma/_sa ma/_ma le mu le/_ta le du le/_ma tsa me tsa/_gu h+ya sit+ti/_pa ra ma/_pa ra ma/_shi ri hoH/_shi ri ho/_ma ma kha ka tra~M/_e e e e/_hriM hriM/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_
[\[44b.6\]]kha kha le le/_karma ma ti b+h+yo/_rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/_rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/_karma ma le/_karma ma le/_k+Shu ti sha ne/_k+Shu ti sha ne/_rak+Sha karma/_rak+Sha karma/_kro d+ha k+Sha~M/_khA hi b+h+yo kha hi b+h+yo/_tsa le ya~M/_tsa le ya~M/_pra tsa le/_pra tsa le/_gu rA ya~M/_gu rA ya~M/_bi gur+t+ti/_bi 
[\[44b.7\]]gur+t+ti/_ma mo\u0f85 ha~M/_ma mo\u0f85 ha~M/_ngag brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/_/byA g+h+ri tsarma/_byA g+h+ri tsarma/_ba ya~M k+Sha~M ga ri/_ba ya~M k+Sha~M ga ri/_ba byA dz+nyo ba ba ti/_ba byA dz+nyo ba ba ti/_na ra ha sa/_na ra ha sa/_ban+d+ha ka pA la/_ban+d+ha ka pA la/_tsarma na ga tru~M/_tsarma na ga tru~M/_rA 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]ga rak+ta tsa ra ga rak+ta tsa/_ru d+hi rA ma ta/_ru d+hi ra ma ta/_ka ru ga tsa/_ka ru ga tsa/_ba bya ba ti/_ba bya ba ti/_gaM gro Na/_gaM gro Na/_thar+pa ta/_thar+pa ta/_dpa' byed kha/_dpa' byed kha/_zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang /_zla ba dkar dang zla phrom mchog_/tshe 'dzin 
[\[45a.2\]]kun gyi gtso mo dang /_/'jam po thar pa chen po dang /_/gal zhes bya ba'i ro mchog dang /_/gzi brjid chen po'i dri zhim dang /_/bran mo dang ni g.yog 'chang ma/_/'jam dpal rnon po'i ka tar dang /_/mA tha ya mA tha ya/_par+pa ti par+pa ti/_rwa tha ma rwa tha ma/_
[\[45a.3\]]kha taM nya kha taM nya/_rwa ti hU~M rwa ti hU~M/_shi nyaM tha/_shi nyaM tha/_ka raM tha/_ka raM tha/_shak+ti kha shak+ti kha/_yo gtsa rbAn yo ga tsarbAn/_sgra brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/gar thabs g.yas g.yon bskor nas kyang /_/se gol brdabs 
[\[45a.4\]]pa 'dren pa'i brda/_/bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i brda/_/shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol/_/'di ni mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda/_/bskor nas snying gar bcangs pa ni/_/ting 'dzin rdo rje brtan pa'i brda/_/gar bskor shin tu gnyis bstabs pa/_/mchod pa 
[\[45a.5\]]stobs par byed pa'i brda/_/gar bskor dbang mo'i spyi bor bzhag_/sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda/_/thabs kyis spyi bor bzhag pa dang /_/shes rab dbang mo'i snying gar ro/_/thabs kyis gsang ba g.yas bcug na/_/shes rab thos byed gsang ba yin/_/
[\[45a.6\]]thabs kyis nas g.yas bteg na/_/shes rab nas g.yon bteg pa'o/_/thabs kyis rdo rje phyag rgya bstan/_/shes rab pad+mo'i phyag rgya bstan/_/thabs kyis smin ma g.yas bskyod na/_/shes rab smin ma g.yon bteg bya/_/thabs kyis phyag g.yon brkyang ba 
[\[45a.7\]]dang /_/shes rab g.yas kyis 'khyud tshul bstan/_/phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs shing /_/dbang mo lce la reg pa ni/_/tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brda/_/lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thor/_/de nas dbang mo lce la reg_/'dza' gad 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]'drim pa'i brda thabs so/_/ma hA ging chen karma dang /_/rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin las/_/sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams/_/rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub/_/lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o/_/zhes smra ba'i seng ges gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
