[\[67b.3\]]sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan/_/rngam pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par brgyan/_/za byed rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs/_/'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad/_/'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun/_/dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid 
[\[67b.4\]]ring rol/_/'gran gyi zla med che btsan gcig pu nyid/_/gsang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de skad ces bstod pas chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs shing sangs ma rgyas pa med par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang 
[\[67b.5\]]ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to/_/spro ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chos nyid rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[67b.6\]]so/_/chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so/_/nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la/_/skar tshogs rig pa'i yig bris te/_/'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas/_/gsang sngags chos kyi rgyun mi 'chad/_/chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya 
[\[67b.7\]]ba yongs su rdzogs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/stong gsum b+han d+ha'i bzang khong du/_/srid gsum sems can dug chen las/_/
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas/_/bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'di skad ces gsungs 
[\[68a.2\]]so/_/'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams/_/mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te/_/srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun/_/kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas 
[\[68a.3\]]brjod rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las/_/sems can sangs rgyas snying po shar/_/sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig_/ces gsungs so/_/de 
[\[68a.4\]]nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la/_/snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/'du 'bral med par sbyar bas ni/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su 
[\[68a.5\]]bskyed/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'khor ba bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag_/ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis/_/rang bzhin med 
[\[68a.6\]]par bsgral nas ni/_/mnyam nyid chos sku chen por bton/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sku gdung rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/_'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la/_/gzugs 
[\[68a.7\]]khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan/_/gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas/_/gdung chen chos skur rgyun du gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/nam mkha' me chu sa rlung rnams/_/rmang gzhi ri rab 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]rten du snang /_/bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams/_/de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan/_/ri bo bum rten bum par bcas/_/'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dzugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmang rten/_/'khor 
[\[68b.2\]]lo tshogs chen khri 'phang brtan/_/yan lag dang po bum rten bcas/_/lcang lo cod pan phreng bas bklubs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shi ba yongs su slong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ro yi sgrub 
[\[68b.3\]]lugs chen po ni/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams su/_/ro yi rdzas rnams btsal nas kyang /_/'dod pa bsgyur ba'i sngags kyis gdab/_/ro yi steng du gnas nas ni/_/ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams nas/_/ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/_/rol 
[\[68b.4\]]bkrag dang mdangs byung na/_/grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te/_/rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya/_/ro ni 'gul bar gyur pa dang /_/gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya/_/ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas/_/sngags ni dag par bzlas par bya/_/ro nyid 
[\[68b.5\]]langs par gyur pa dang /_/ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed/_/brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis/_/de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas/_/ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur/_/de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi/_/rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur/_/lce bcad ral gri 
[\[68b.6\]]mtshon cha des/_/ro yi b+han d+ha bcad pa dang /_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste/_/b+han d+ha go ru bzung nas ni/_/lce yi ral gri thogs nas ni/_/lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur/_/ro langs grub pa'i rkang mgyogs ni/_/dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa 
[\[68b.7\]]ste/_/skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas nas/_/dus gcig mda' yi rgyang 'phangs nas/_/mda' ni sa la ma 'babs par/_/bzhi ka bar snang las blangs nas/_/skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten skor/_/skyes bu lag tshod ma 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]yal bar/_/de ma thag tu gnas su slebs/_/ro la 'dod pa kun 'byung zhes/_/dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/ro langs bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rdo rje nam 
[\[69a.2\]]mkha'i them skas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/nam mkha' rdo rjer bsgoms nas kyang /_/ting 'dzin red par gyur pa na/_/phan tshun gya gyu'i thabs tshul du/_/rdo rje skas la bgrod nas ni/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[69a.3\]]dbyings su song nas kyang /_/snang srid 'jig rten khams la blta/_/des ni sems yul yangs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rgya mtsho chen po gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad 
[\[69a.4\]]ces gsungs so/_/rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams par ni/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/rgya mtsho chen por bgrod nas ni/_/rgya mtshor gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/ting 'dzin rdo rjes bsgral bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems 
[\[69a.5\]]dpa'i rdo rje snying po de thogs med rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/nam mkha' dag gi ling+ga la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/bsgom te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang /_/zhing khams kun du bgrod par bya/_/
[\[69a.6\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/nam mkha' dag gi ling+ga la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/bsgoms te 
[\[69a.7\]]ting 'dzin rtas pa dang /_/mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad bsal/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rnal 'byor sdigs mdzub rtse mo 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar/_/bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang /_/chu rgyun babs te gzhil bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des stong gi 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[69b.2\]]zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor las kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/_/shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa dang /_/ting 'dzin rtsal can rab sbyang phyir/_/nam mkha'i khams su 'phangs nas ni/_/sa nas sa ru spar 
[\[69b.3\]]bar bya/_/de skad ces gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 
[\[69b.4\]]ba las/_/'od zer 'bar ba 'bum 'phros pas/_/'od zer de dag re re las/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'phros pas/_/des ni mun pa thams cad sel/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de 'byung ba chen po bskal pa'i chu rgyun zhes 
[\[69b.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor lag pa'i 'khor lo las/_/chu zla'i snying po rab shar te/_/bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun bab pas/_/sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me chen gsod/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems 
[\[69b.6\]]dpa'i rdo rje de sku'i phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i ling+ga la/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dpal gyi sku/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i ngos brgyad la/_/rig pa'i ma mo dpal 'bar ba/_/brgyad 
[\[69b.7\]]du gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/ye shes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsung gi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/pad+ma 'bar ba'i 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ling+ga la/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad/_/shin tu 'bar zhing 'phro 'du ba/_/gsung gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de thugs kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[70a.2\]]zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i ling+ga la/_/yi ge hU~M gi 'bru yis bskor/_/mtha' ma rin chen yig 'bru brgyad/_/kha dog mthing gas bskor ba ni/_/thugs kyi gsang ba'i ye shes yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo 
[\[70a.3\]]rje des ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo 'di gsungs so/_/sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/_/ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang /_/mdo bzhin snang bar ma gyur kyang /_/sems nyid brtags pa de ltar 'gyur/_/gdos bcas dmigs bus mi mthong yang /_/mngon shes yid 
[\[70a.4\]]gzugs can gyis mthong /_/gang ltar brtags par yun brtags na/_/rtog pa rtas pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/mngon sum gsal bar red par 'gyur/_/dge dang mi dge'i bag chags dang /_/yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin rnams/_/bag chags rtas pa kho nar 
[\[70a.5\]]zad/_/de bas ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsang sbyor chen po sgrub pa 
[\[70a.6\]]'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gshegs shul te/_/'jig rten gang zag lam yang yin/_/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/_/phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma 
[\[70a.7\]]rtogs/_/log pa'i lam bzhin mtha' bsal nas/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug_/des na sgrub pa'i lam mchog 'di/_/'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya/_/shin tu gus pas mnyan par gyis/_/de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]gsang ba sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po bdag cag rnams la gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/_bka' gsang ba chen po ye shes rmad du byung ba/_sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i shul 
[\[70b.2\]]yang dag pa'i don bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol/_/zhes gsol ba btab pa las sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de/_btsun mo'i tshogs la dgyes par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/
[\[70b.3\]]b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+ma ni/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba'i pho brang ste/_/sngon 'das rgyal ba brnal ba'i dbyings/_/da ltar bzhugs pa gnas pa'i rten/_/slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul/_/rgyal ba rnams la de ltar snang /_/de ltar ma shes 'khor ba'i 
[\[70b.4\]]lam/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/_/yul gyi mchog ni 'dir gzung ba/_/mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum/_/smin dkyus ring la lag sor phra/_/tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad/_/kha nas ut+pal dang ldan zhing /_/yid 'ong 
[\[70b.5\]]mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed/_/skra 'jam mthon mthing lcang lor 'khril/_/so dkar tshags dam smin dkyus ring /_/zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan/_/dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug_/sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs/_/lus drang 
[\[70b.6\]]ske ring sems ma'i tshul/_/nu ma'i dkyil 'khor zla rgyas 'dra/_/sha dkar tshags dam 'khril bag can/_/khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jam/_/skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrogs/_/ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan/_/skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung /_/gzungs 
[\[70b.7\]]su byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_/de yi gzugs kyi phung po la/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga/_/'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa de/_/rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/_/bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal/_/rdo rje thabs la'ang de bzhin 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]te/_/de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom/_/gsang ba dbus kyi zla gam la/_/byang chub sems kyi spro bsdu bya/_/gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin/_/chags pa'i mkha' la de bzhin no/_/ma skyes 
[\[71a.2\]]pa dang ma 'gags pa/_/rig pa rang snang mnyam pa'o/_/mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde chen klong /_/mi gnas bde ba chen po'i lung /_/rig pa thabs kyi rang bzhin las/_/byin brlabs rang dbang ngang gis gsal/_/bzhin mdog dmar po sog ka la/_/dpral 
[\[71a.3\]]ba'i dbyes che smin dkyus ring /_/mig gi mdangs gsal dkyus su ring /_/dung chen thags dam shel mdog chags/_/bzhin gyi gzangs ring kos ko phra/_/lus la zhim pa'i dri ldang zhing /_/kha nas ga pur ngad ldang ba/_/nu ma'i dkyil mtho nu mar 'khyil/_/
[\[71a.4\]]pad+ma can zhes bya bar grags/_/dung can ma zhes bstan pa ni/_/dkar mo zla ba'i mdangs su gsal/_/bzhin lus dung ltar g.yas su g.yo/_/gtsug phud mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil/_/skad che gdangs snyan tshig tu gsal/_/bong chung lus ni mdzes 
[\[71a.5\]]par snang /_/bu mo mig ring zhes bya ba/_/shes rab gsal zhing 'dod pa che/_/gtso bo nges pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/zla gsang dkar dmar rlung kar lci/_/rnam par brdig cing 'khyil pas ni/_/kun gyis drod ni yong mi lon/_/gsang ba sbas pa'i 
[\[71a.6\]]thabs la mkhas/_/phyi nang rlung kar gser ltar lci/_/rtog pa med cing don la gzhol/_/bzhin ni gru bzhi'i dbyibs ldan la/_/mig ring phra bshad 'khyil bag chags/_/dkar dmar mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_/ljon pa dag gi rigs smos pa/_/sdong 
[\[71a.7\]]po yal ga mang po'i dkyil/_/shin tu 'dab rgyas yal gar legs/_/mthon mthing skra yi rang bzhin ni/_/byang chub sems 'drar lcang lor bshad/_/stod smad kun du phra la legs/_/srid du ring zhing ldem bag can/_/lcug phran zhes bya'i mtshan ma 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]ni/_/bcu gnyis nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/_/rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog cing /_/mu la rak+tar ldan pa la/_/phra zhing bshad la gzangs su ring /_/ban glang ser mo gru bzhi la/_/kham la mig 'bur smin tshogs che/_/skra kham ma la so che zhing /_/sna ring 'gram slang 
[\[71b.2\]]ring ba yin/_/ri mo can gyi bud med ni/_/nag mo grwa gsum rtsid mgo ma/_/khro gnyer can la gel bag chags/_/sdong gcig yan lag gtan med pa'o/_/skye ba'i rgyu med bkra mi shis/_/mi reg yal ga mes tshig yin/_/spyir ni de ltar bstan med 
[\[71b.3\]]kyang /_/gang dag dad ldan brtul zhugs can/_/yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams/_/dad pa chags shing lus 'bul na/_/thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya/_/rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa/_/de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas/_/rmad du gsang ba'i mchod 
[\[71b.4\]]pa la/_/gsang ba'i phyag tshang gang byed pa/_/las kyi sgrib pa kun bsal te/_/man ngag gsang ba'i dmigs bu 'thob/_/de ltar brtags pa'i yum de la/_/dri spos tsan+dan la sogs pas/_/a ga ru dang sbyar ba'i chu/_/khrus kyi cho gas dag par 
[\[71b.5\]]bya/_/dri zhim la sogs sna tshogs kyis/_/lus la byug pa sna tshogs bya/_/de nas nang gi khrus chen yang /_/shin tu dag par bya ba ni/_/rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas/_/nang gi rdzas rnams dag par bya/_/bur shing snying po la sogs pa/_/ro yi mchog 
[\[71b.6\]]tu gyur pa kun/_/rtsi 'am bcud dang sbyar nas kyang /_/nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya/_/rdzas kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang /_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/_/mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs phyir/_/rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don/_/rgya cher shin tu 
[\[71b.7\]]bshad par bya/_/phung po sgyu mar snang bas na/_/sems la rang bzhin med par nges/_/snang srid nam mkhar gcig pas na/_/'khor ba sgyu ma yin par nges/_/kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas/_/sangs rgyas gzhan na med par nges/_/byams la dang 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ma chags pas na/_/sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges/_/gnas la nges pa med pas na/_/sa rnams bgrod pa med par nges/_/sems la skye shi med pas na/_/'pho 'gyur dag la nyam ming /_/des na thams cad sgyu mar snang /_/sgyu ma rang 
[\[72a.2\]]bzhin med shes pas/_/thams cad chos nyid snying po yin/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag_/chos nyid chu po des bkrus na/_/'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par 'gyur/_/de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni/_/rdzas kyi yo byad yin pas na/_/rlob cing 'phur ba'i chas gos dang /_/rin 
[\[72a.3\]]chen phrog dang rna char bcas/_/'jol sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa/_/dpung rgyan do shal se mo do/_/nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan/_/rkang gdub lag gdub la sogs pa/_/gser dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan/_/rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 
[\[72a.4\]]pa'i/_/mchod rdzas sna tshogs thogs par bya/_/de nas 'dren pa'i cho ga ni/_/gsang ba'i tshig gis bsre ba na/_/rdo rje lce yi dam tshig gis/_/tshig gi brdas ni mtshon par bya/_/sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes kyang bsre/_/ra ga ya mi zhes 
[\[72a.5\]]brjod na/_/ra ho ha~M zhes brjod par bya/_/ti pa su ki zhes brjod na/_/gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon/_/a ti pu ho zhes brjod na/_/pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon/_/g.yas kyi smin ma bskyod byas na/_/g.yon gyi smin mas mtshon par bya/_/nA sa g.yas kyis mtshon 
[\[72a.6\]]byas na/_/de bzhin nA sa g.yon gyis mtshon/_/gtsug tor gtsug tu mtshon byas na/_/de bzhin dpal be'u'i ling+gar mtshon/_/rdo rje ling+ga 'od 'phro na/_/pad+ma ze 'bru 'bar 'phro 'khyil/_/zhes pa'i tshig gi don rnams bsre/_/bskul ba'i cho ga khyad par 
[\[72a.7\]]yang /_/don gyis 'di ltar bskul bar rigs/_/shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/_/thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul/_/bskul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang /_/mchod pa'i yo byad dbul bar bya/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]ngang du gsal bar gyur to/_/shes rab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas nyi ma'i zer gyis 'di skad ces bskul to/_/mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol/_/rnam par mi rtog shin tu dri med sku/_/'od zer mdangs ldan zla ba rgyas 
[\[72b.2\]]'dra'i zhal/_/dgyes pa rol pa'i don la bzhengs su gsol/_/de skad ces bskul ba dang /_zla ba'i 'od zer las 'di skad ces bskul to/_/yid 'ong 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings/_/shes rab zab mo rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs/_/sgyu 'phrul rabs la mkhas 
[\[72b.3\]]pa'i spyod mchog ma/_/yid 'ong 'byor ldan cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin tu 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste/_nyi ma'i 'od zer las sgra byung ba/_pad+ma'i ze 'bru 'bar ba 'di/_/'dzum pa'i 
[\[72b.4\]]mdangs kyis 'bul lags na/_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul las/_/byang chub char sprin dbab tu gsol/_/zla ba'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba/_e ma yid kyi dga' sde mo/_/gdung ba'i snying phreng shes rab gzungs/_/pad+ma'i ga'u 'khyil pa la/_/bde 
[\[72b.5\]]ba'i rdo rje byang chub 'bar/_/zhes sgra byung bas/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur to/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'khor ba thams cad thugs rjes yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thabs mchog 
[\[72b.6\]]zla ba rdo rje zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo /_/'dod pa'i dbang po thams cad ni/_/chags pa'i 'gying ba'i gtso mo yin/_/chags pa rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/_/'dod pa gnas su drang bar bya/_/zhes byung bas/_'khor ba thams cad thugs rje chen 
[\[72b.7\]]po'i lhung bzed kyis bzung ngo /_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de sgrib pa sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i ling+ga la/_/a yi ye shes 'od 'phros pas/_/chags pa'i sgrib pa'i bud shing rnams/_/
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]me yi ye shes kyis sbyangs so/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des/_b+ha ga byin gyis rlob pa la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa/_'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/b+ha ga'i snying por rab gsal ba/_/yum gyi lus kyi yan lag rnams/_/
[\[73a.2\]]yum lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/chos nyid nam mkhar rtogs gyur na/_/sbyor sgrol mang 
[\[73a.3\]]po ci byas kyang /_/chags sdang drang ba'i thabs yin te/_/rdul cha tsam yang snang ba med/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad la dgyes pa'i rol pa la zhugs par gyur te/_mi dmigs pa'i bde ba la ci yang mi 
[\[73a.4\]]g.yo bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po pad+ma'i snying po rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par gyur to/_/'khor ba thams cad ni rgyal ba'i sras por bskyed/_/rgyal ba 'gog pa ni byang chub sems kyis brlan par mdzad cing srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyed/_/
[\[73a.5\]]rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ling long phyad par byung ngo /_/rig 'dzin gyi sems dpa' thams cad ni/_shes bya'i sgrib ba sbyangs nas chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad la 
[\[73a.6\]]dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/'khor ba'i sems can rgyu las byung /_/'khor ba'i sems can rgyun chad na/_/sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur/_/'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin 
[\[73a.7\]]du/_/shes nas smra bar gang byed pa/_/rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang de/_/chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas 'jug par mkhyen nas smon gnas chen 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]po'i lam 'di gsungs so/_/'gro drug rgyal ba'i sras po 'di/_/ma rtogs log par 'khyams pa rnams/_/rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed nas ni/_/'khor ba'i rgyun rnams gcad par bya/_/nyi zla'i nang du bzhag nas ni/_/bcu drug sa la rdzogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[73b.2\]]des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la/_/don dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa yis/_/sbyor ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs nas/_/yum gyi mkha' dbyings zla gam la/_/grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du bskyed/_/rtsibs brgyad zla gam dgur gsal la/_/byang chub 
[\[73b.3\]]sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs/_/lha dgu gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed/_/des ni thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las gsang sbyor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de 
[\[73b.4\]]nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rnal 'byor rig 'dzin gang zhig rnams/_/mi 'pho bar ni gnas 'dod pa/_/lo gcig gam ni zla gcig gam/_/
[\[73b.5\]]de bzhin zhag gi rnam grangs kyang /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am yang na bdun bar du/_/tho rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe/_/rig 'dzin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/_/shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te/_/shar phyogs nam mkhas bsdus pa yi/_/lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten 
[\[73b.6\]]bcas/_/thams cad khong du bsdus nas kyang /_/dbugs de slar la mi dbyung bar/_/rang gi khong du bstim par bya/_/tha mar sna yi nang du bsre/_/de ltar mang por bsgrubs pa dang /_/dpal che gzi brjid thams cad 'thob/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas yang 
[\[73b.7\]]sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/gang zhig rten la gnas 'dod pa/_/mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas mchog tu/_/thams cad 'byor bar byas nas ni/_/sa las byas pa'i 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]stegs bu bshams/_/dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/_/zla gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan/_/mtha' ma rdo rje ra bas bskor/_/dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod/_/rin chen lugs kyi bum pa la/_/tshe rdzas rgyas par byas nas ni/_/mtshan ldan 
[\[74a.2\]]snod kyis kha dgab bya/_/rdo rje gzungs kyis btags nas ni/_/tshe tshad med par mnga' gsol la/_/dbus su de bzhin gzhag par bya/_/rin chen bum pa bzhi rnams la/_/gsang ba'i bu mo bzhi bkod gzhag_/ya mtshan byung ba'i bum pa la/_/rigs bzhi 
[\[74a.3\]]sangs rgyas yab yum dang /_/so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams/_/thabs dang shes rab sdebs nas ni/_/phyogs phyogs gnas su tshom bur bri/_/sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi rnams gzhag_/sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas/_/nyi zla ga 'ur a yu ni/_/'khyil 
[\[74a.4\]]'bar 'tsher zhing gsal bar bya/_/a yu byang chub sems su zhu/_/rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen gter/_/dbang bskur dpal ldan mdzod ldan ma/_/gsang ba'i bu mo tshe gter 'dzin/_/a yu yum bzhi'i thugs kar 'phros/_/de bzhin tshom bu rim 
[\[74a.5\]]par brgyud/_/rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas/_/dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstim/_/de nas rdo rje tshe phreng bzlas/_/nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchog gi/_/pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams su/_/byams ldan ye shes tshe dpag med/_/thugs kyi dpal be'u 
[\[74a.6\]]chen po ni/_/gnyis gsal 'od kyi ga'u na/_/byang chub sems kyi a yu 'bar/_/dmar gsal 'bar ba'i tshe mchog de/_/rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la 'phro/_/'phros pa dgu lung dam pa yis/_/tsit+ta'i dbugs la bkrag tu bslan/_/tshe nyams rgyu drug 
[\[74a.7\]]kun spangs nas/_/gzi byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom/_/byang chub sems kyi a yu de/_/skye med dbyings su sbas nas kyang /_/phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis bshad/_/dang po sku gsung thugs kyi rgya/_/gnyis pa gnon pa'i rgya gram 'bar/_/gsum pa rta mchog dpal 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gyi rgya/_/bzhi pa rin chen dpal be'u ste/_/lnga pa gser gyi gu h+ya'o/_/drug pa zla gam dmar po la/_/bdun pa nyi zla ga 'ur 'bar/_/tshe yi ngo bo rgyud gsum po/_/srog gi ngo bor gzhal yas khang /_/le brgan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/a yu dmar 
[\[74b.2\]]po 'od 'phro ba/_/'chi ba med pa'i srog btsugs te/_/'gyur ba med pa'i g.yung drung yin/_/chos nyid dbyings su tshe sbas pas/_/dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar langs kyang /_/de la gzung zhing bstan du med/_/de nas ci bde spyad par bya/_/rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[74b.3\]]de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de rdo rje khro bo tshe kun du 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/gnas 'gyur maN+Dal 'bar byas la/_/ye shes khro bo 'bar ba yi/_/thugs kyi dpal be'u'i 'od zer las/_/
[\[74b.4\]]dbang gi lha mo mang po 'phros/_/za ma tog dang bcas pa yi/_/lcags kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs/_/de yis 'gro drug thams cad kyi/_/tshe dang gzi byin thams cad 'phrogs/_/za ma tog tu bsdus nas kyang /_/tshe yi rig 'dzin rnams la bstim/_/ji ltar 
[\[74b.5\]]'dod pa gong ltar sbyar/_/rdo rje gzi mdangs 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de tshogs thams 
[\[74b.6\]]cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'di rgya cher bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 
[\[74b.7\]]'di/_/'khor ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor can la bshad par bya/_/nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/_/sgrub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa dag_/skyon yon gnyis kyi bye brag las/_/nges par brtags te shes pa las/_/blang dor 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]gnyis su sbyar bar bya/_/ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtse/_/gangs dkar shel gyi 'dab chen ni/_/seng phrug 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/_/thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gnas/_/rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i dkyil/_/dgon pa chen po'i phug chen 
[\[75a.2\]]ni/_/gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/_/mngon spyod chen po bsgrub pa'i gnas/_/dur khrod ngam grog bshung ba'i gnas/_/sum mdo grog gle rtsub pa'i ri/_/dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/_/chags pa bsgrub pa'i gnas yin no/_/nags tshal dra bas 
[\[75a.3\]]btibs pa'i nang /_/shin tu btsan zhing 'jigs pa'i ngogs/_/stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas yin te/_/'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas su shis/_/chu mdo chu 'jigs rgya mtsho'i gling /_/chu yi ra bas kun bskor ba/_/chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin pas/_/bya ba 
[\[75a.4\]]med pa'i las la bya'o/_/der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs/_/ci 'dod bltas te ma thogs par/_/kha na ma tho bcas dang bral/_/'phyor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa/_/khams las gyur pa'i nad chen rnams/_/bcud kyi mchog gis bzlog bya'i phyir/_/rtsi 'am 
[\[75a.5\]]bcu dam thar pa rnams/_/nyer rdzogs su ni gzhag par bya/_/'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad/_/dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams kyi/_/rkyen gyis bar chad 'byung srid phyir/_/sman dang mkhas pas bcas te sbyar/_/ka pA la dang lcang lor bcas/_/ga'u 
[\[75a.6\]]chung la sogs pa'i rdzas/_/phyag rgya che dang ldan byas la/_/dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten du bya/_/sgrub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa/_/skyo ba'i yid rnams bsang phyir dang /_/gti mug mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir/_/dung dang 'khar rnga rdza rnga dang /_/cang te'u 
[\[75a.7\]]pi bang ko ki la/_/snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun/_/sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste/_/nyer rdzogs su ni 'byor par bya/_/shin tu gtams pas tshogs chen ni/_/bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal/_/gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du/_/sgrub chen sgrub pa'i rnal 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'byor rnams/_/snying rje byams dang dga' snyoms dang /_/gdung ba'i byang chub sems bskyed do/_/de yang shes dang shes bya yis/_/rtsal chen kun du rdzogs pa ni/_/rdo rje snying po 'bru mchog dag_/shin tu gtams pas tshogs pa ni/_/bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo 
[\[75b.2\]]rgyal/_/yon tan mchog gi gter gyur cing /_/srid pas zhus kyang zad mi shes/_/rkyen thub dbang lung rdzogs pas gzung /_/rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa/_/kun sdud kun 'byung 'khrug med cing /_/nam mkha'i khyon ltar kun la khyab/_/ma ltar byams pa'i 
[\[75b.3\]]yum mchog gzung /_/rgyud sbyangs brtul zhugs mchog 'chang zhing /_/thogs med the tshom som nyi bral/_/'dzin chags med cing blang dor med/_/brtan ldan gzungs thub rdo rje ging /_/rdo rje drod kyi dus 'dzin cing /_/tshig gi 'phen sdud skabs su sbyor/_/yon 
[\[75b.4\]]tan rlabs kyis 'phang bcad de/_/legs nyes dmigs su gal 'dzugs so/_/rdo rje tshig gi gdangs skad can/_/rdo rje mthong ba rnam par dag_/ngag gi dbang phyug tshig la mkhas/_/las kyi phreng ba rdzogs byed pa'o/_/'di ltar sbyar ba'i dus chen yang /_/nges par 
[\[75b.5\]]brtags te mdo gzung ba/_/rig byed dag gi yan lag las/_/shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba/_/bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang /_/'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po rnams/_/'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste/_/brtags na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung /_/dus cha 
[\[75b.6\]]bzhi yi dang po ni/_/mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin/_/dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste/_/zhi dang rgyas pa de bzhin sbyar/_/dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te/_/bam chen gsang ba'i dus su bshad/_/nor 'dod rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang /_/cha bzhir khyab 
[\[75b.7\]]par sbyar ba'o/_/bsgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog dag_/gal te dus la bab gyur na/_/dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te/_/dus 'di mkhas pas yong mi bcag_/rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams/_/ci ste 'dod pa'i mtshan ma dag_/yid 'ong 'byung zhing rtags 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rnyed pa/_/dam tshig gzungs 'du dus chen yin/_/sbyangs pas rtsal gyi mthar phyin cing /_/shes blo'i yon tan tshogs rgyas pa/_/'di dag tshad la bab pa ste/_/dus kyi mchog 'di nye bar brtag_/'di ltar rgyu bzhi 'byor pa las/_/'bras bu'i dngos 
[\[76a.2\]]por grub pa ste/_/gru dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la/_/bsten pas rin chen lon pa 'dra/_/ji srid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams/_/rang bzhin med par kun gcig pa'i/_/bdag med phyogs bral lhun gyis grub/_/gcig las rnam grangs ngang gis med/_/tha snyad dag par 
[\[76a.3\]]yongs chud na/_/nges pa'i don chen de nyid de/_/thams cad dag par 'gyur ba'o/_/bdag dang gzhan du mi gnyis pas/_/bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin te/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med/_/bdag nyid lhun grub dbang phyug che/_/gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag_/
[\[76a.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin grub 'gyur te/_/rdza mkhan 'phang lo srub pa ltar/_/gang ltar dmigs pa de ltar 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i khams su gzi che zhing /_/'byung chen lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/ngo mtshar rtsal gyi khyad par dag_/gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin/_/de ltar 
[\[76a.5\]]brtson pa'i bsgrub pa dag_/rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te/_/shes dang yon tan phun sum tshogs/_/gzhan du reg las med pa ni/_/thams cad tshang bar rdzogs pas na/_/phun sum tshogs zhes de la bya/_/gsang chen bsgrub pa'i las 'di dag_/'khor ba'i 
[\[76a.6\]]las dang mthun spyad cing /_/nyon mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang /_/'od kyis mun pa snang 'gyur ltar/_/skyon ni yon tan chen po la/_/g.yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur/_/de ltar 'khor ba'i rka bzlog pas/_/mi gnas ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil/_/
[\[76a.7\]]gnas rab brtag pa'i gal chen yang /_/nam mkha' 'khor lo rdo rje dang /_/rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma'i dbyings/_/rgya gram la sogs 'dra bar brtag_/sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te/_/ri bo brtsegs dang bzur ba dang /_/de bzhin bsgreng dang gtams pa'i 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]tshul/_/'dra bar mkhas pas brtag par bya/_/de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni/_/lnga la sogs pa so so yi/_/gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni/_/nor bu rin chen de bsgrub bya/_/skyon gyi gnas dag spang ba ni/_/gshin rje gdug pa'i gdung rtse dang /_/ma mo rngam 
[\[76b.2\]]pa'i spar shad dang /_/srin mo ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang /_/gnod sbyin khro bo'i rbab shul dang /_/'byung po rkun po 'jol la sogs/_/gnas kyi skyon rnams dgra dang rkun/_/mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya/_/kha na ma thor bcas pa dang /_/nyams pa las byung 
[\[76b.3\]]nyen dang bral/_/ma dag pa yi yo byad rnams/_/gdug can pang du 'ongs pa ltar/_/wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi/_/bskal pas bshugs te spang bar bya/_/dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam/_/bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung ba dag_/dga' ba skye bar 'gyur 
[\[76b.4\]]ba yi/_/yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni/_/rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir/_/snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bsgrub pa brnag pa mthar dbyung phyir/_/rgyal po rten dang 'khor bcas la/_/bden pas bsgo ba'am yang bslang ba/_/dgongs shig thugs rje 
[\[76b.5\]]rgyal ba'i lha/_/lha klu gnod sbyin sde dpung bcas/_/gangs ri rtse dang rin chen ri/_/kun dga' ldum ra skyed mos tshal/_/mtsho rdzing lu ma 'bab chu'i gnas/_/'jig rten 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/gang dag bdag por gyur pa rnams/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[76b.6\]]dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis/_/sa 'di lhun gyis grub bya'i phyir/_/'dzam gling grub pa'i sa slong na/_/'khor dang bcas pa 'dir 'khod la/_/rin chen gter gyi sa gzhi bslang /_/zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis/_/sa la gnas pas de mgu bya/_/
[\[76b.7\]]des ni bdag gir de 'gyur zhing /_/nyes pa de dang bral ba yin/_/byang chub spyod pa g.yo ba dang /_/bsod nams dga' ba skyed pa la/_/shes ldan rdzu 'phrul can gyi bu/_/ma skrag phrag dog yong ma skye/_/rnal 'byor mchog gi sgrub pa po/_/bdud 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]'dul phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i tshe/_/ru dra tshogs kyi rgol ba la/_/skyes bu las kyi don bgrangs te/_/don gyi dbang po'i phyir sbran pa/_/rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis/_/don mchog yang dag mdzad pa'i tshe/_/skyes bu rtsal gyi khyad 
[\[77a.2\]]par las/_/'di tshe dpang mkhyen dmigs 'byed ma/_/sngon tshe dpal chen gar dbang gis/_/ru dra sde bzhi bsgral nas ni/_/gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyas mdzad nas/_/'gro drug thugs rjes bsgral ba ltar/_/rnal 'byor sa la sbyor tshe 'dir/_/lha mos 
[\[77a.3\]]mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang /_/bde chen sa la bgrod pa'i tshe/_/ru dra'i rgol ba 'byung ba 'am/_/spyan ldan khyod kyis dbang mdzod cig_/sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par gyis/_/brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun/_/mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom 
[\[77a.4\]]ba'i phyir/_/ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya/_/dge bar gyur na der gnas bya/_/gal te shis par ma gyur na/_/skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis/_/gnan nam spo ba'i las kyis sbyar/_/der ni bsod nams gter ldan phyir/_/rin chen lnga la sogs 
[\[77a.5\]]pa'i rdzas/_/sa gzhi gter chen rgyas par bya/_/bkra shis mchog tu bsngags pa yin/_/sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga'i khu/_/bsres pas kun du gru bzhi ni/_/maN+Dal rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dra la/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas/_/mtshan ma'i dngos po 
[\[77a.6\]]kun sbyangs te/_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i rten du bya/_/rdo rje byin brlabs 'byung gnas dang /_/gnas rnams shin tu brtan bya'i phyir/_/mchog gi sbyor ba dag pa yis/_/sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs/_/de dang der ni sa sbyangs te/_/thig gis yul 
[\[77a.7\]]bcad skabs dag tu/_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der/_/rdo rje drag po'i ging chen gyis/_/lce pog nag po'i dud pas bdug_/rgyun mi 'chad du byas nas ni/_/khro bo drag po'i sngags zlos shing /_/rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis bskor/_/shes rab yum gyi 'jo 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]tshul gyi/_/rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'de gu dag_/srin bal ye'u sbyar ba yis/_/kun du zla ba'i thig le bya/_/rdo rje rgyal po 'phags rnams kyis/_/so so'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i rgya/_/so so'i stang stabs sbyar nas kyang /_/de dag gnas su byin gyis rlob/_/gsang 
[\[77b.2\]]ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir/_/gsang ba'i las kyi sngon logs su/_/bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la/_/sbyin mchod bsrung ba'i las chen bcol/_/gzhal yas gnas kyi phyi rol du/_/mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag_/rin chen 'bras sam 'byung khungs 
[\[77b.3\]]sam/_/shing ngam ba so de dag las/_/lugs sam phyag rgya'i gzugs byas te/_/mgon po bzhi ru mnga' gsol te/_/gnas kyi sgo srung so par bya/_/ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas/_/rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus/_/'jig rten skyong ba'i tha 
[\[77b.4\]]tshig can/_/mthu chen mgon po sde bzhi rnams/_/so so'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas/_/chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas/_/rigs bzhi kha dog so sor gsal/_/rang rtags lha yi mtshan ma thogs/_/phyi 
[\[77b.5\]]'khor skyong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can/_/bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis/_/rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod/_/bsgrub pa'i rtsal 'di mthar dbyung zhing /_/rkyen gyi bar chad bsal ba dang /_/gsang ba'i man ngag spyad pa'i phyir/_/'jug srid dam sri 
[\[77b.6\]]gnon par bya/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu/_/rnal 'byor gsang ba'i gnas dag tu/_/dngos grub chu la rdul 'jug cing /_/khro bo hU~M chen kun 'dus nas/_/gsad cing gnon pa'i las bya ste/_/ri rab chen po'i rmang du gtang /_/ya ma ra dza'i 
[\[77b.7\]]zas su sbyin/_/chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzang /_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gnon/_/bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag gyur nas/_/nams kyang ldang bar mi nus te/_/byang chub sems ni skyes na btang /_/badzra muSh+Ti ba~M/_/ma ma ba sha~M ku ru nan/_/su~M b+ha ni su~M b+hA 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]nA~M/_/de ltar drag po'i sbyor ba yis/_/sgo nas phyi rol bar khang du/_/mkha' 'dra'i khung bu byas nas ni/_/dug dang rtsub pa'i phye ma dang /_/khrag sna tshogs dang mi ro yis/_/shin tu bsub cing gnon par bya/_/de nas rdo rje nang dag tu/_/seng 
[\[78a.2\]]ge'i lta bas bltas nas ni/_/rdo rje gom pas phyogs nas ni/_/khro mig 'bar bas phyir bltas te/_/'gying bag tshul du brjid pa yis/_/'bar ba'i rdo rje spar nas ni/_/phyi nang rdul chen bsal bar bya/_/hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/skye 'gro rtsi shing 
[\[78a.3\]]nags tshal dang /_/yod mthong snang grags ji snyed pa/_/kun kyang 'bar ba khrag 'thung ste/_/rngam chen gtum thung she dag 'bar/_/dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/_/rak+Sha yak+Sha he ru ka_/rak+ta kro d+hi dz+wa la kha/_/ha la ha la tiSh+Tha phaT/_zhes pas khro bo rol 
[\[78a.4\]]pa yi/_/stabs dang ma mo'i rngam tshul dang /_/phra men lhags pa'i rngam stabs kyis/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje dkrigs pa'i phreng ba dang /_/tho ba lcags kyu 'bar ba dang /_/'khor lo ral gri la sogs rdzas/_/kun gyi phyag rgya mtshan 
[\[78a.5\]]mas bskor/_/de las 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang /_/mig las 'bar ba'i me mched pas/_/me 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dis/_/dmigs sam dngos su sbyar nas kyang /_/'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las/_/sreg pa'i dpal chen gur du gtams/_/hU~M ra~M rdo rje me yi 
[\[78a.6\]]ri/_/lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad la/_/'bar ba'i lha brgyad bsgyel nas kyang /_/dbang chen rdo rje bka' sdod gnas/_/shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba yis/_/gtum chen ha la rngam pa'i gzugs/_/lha chen khyab 'jug lpags bshus nas/_/zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i 
[\[78a.7\]]na bza' bsnams/_/gshin rje ma traM 'bar ba yi/_/ro dbyug chen po phyag na 'phyar/_/phra men dgu khri mang po dag_/'bar ba'i tshogs ni gtibs thag bcad/_/gang la cis 'dul der ston pa/_/tsit+ta 'bar ba'i me phreng gis/_/do shal mgur chu phreng bas 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]sbrengs/_/bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong /_/srid pa'i rtse mor 'khyil cing 'phro/_/nam mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtibs/_/rdo rje 'khor lo me lce 'phro/_/dur khrod dgon pa'i sa phyogs dag_/me yi ri bo 'bar ba la/_/me yi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma dag las/_/
[\[78b.2\]]gang yang gnas par mi phod pa/_/steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni/_/'og gi phyogs su 'phro zhing 'khrug_/'og gi me lce 'bar ba yang /_/gyel du 'khyil zhing steng du thal/_/me lce dgu phreng 'bar ba dag_/'ur chem 'chad pas 'thab cing 'khrug_/dur khrod me ni smug cing 
[\[78b.3\]]'bar/_/zhe sdang 'joms pas mthing nag 'tshub/_/nga rgyal sreg pas ser nag 'phro/_/'dod chags mnyam pas dmar nag 'phro/_/phrag dog sreg pas ljang nag 'khyil/_/gti mug sel bas smug nag 'khyil/_/'bar chen klong gi 'khor los gtams/_/
[\[78b.4\]]dz+wa la maN+Da la ha la ha la ra~M/_/me'i ri lag chu'i phyag rgya yis/_/gnas sam dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/_/chos nyid bdal ba'i nam mkha' la/_/ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtsegs/_/kun gzhi bdal ba'i nam mkha' la/_/bskyed ma'i 'byung chen rnam lnga 
[\[78b.5\]]brtsegs/_/bru~M las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal/_/mtha' dang dbus med kun du khyab/_/ta la'i bskyed cing gser cong dril/_/zla gam dmar po dbang gi rgya/_/bru~M kha~M tra~M kha la ti bru~M/_/zhes pas rnam lnga'i byug pa yis/_/gtor zhing kun du byug par bya'o/_/
[\[78b.6\]]sgrub mchog skyong ba'i rnal 'byor rnams/_/rdo rje tshig gis btab nas ni/_/rgyal sras rig 'dzin bka' 'khor lo/_/'bras bur red phyir byin gyis rlob/_/rdo rje rgyal dbang chen po des/_/sgrib pa sreg pa'i yi ge ni/_/phreng bar byas te gnas su 'phro/_/nyi ma'i 
[\[78b.7\]]dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste/_/rig 'dzin pho mo'i mtshan mas gdab/_/rnam lnga'i byug pas kun la gtor/_/rtags kyi phyag rgya lag tu sbyin/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs su spyad/_/'jig rten skyong tshul thams cad ni/_/sgyu ma yin phyir shin tu yang /_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod tshul dag_/ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar spyad/_/e ma dur khrod gsang ba yi/_/rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dir/_/skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras/_/'dus pas tshogs pa'i rig 'dzin rnams/_/e ma'o 
[\[79a.2\]]dga' mchog bde chen grogs/_/dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/_/sprul pa'i gshog sprugs grwa rgyas pas/_/tshogs gnyis rtsal gyis brlabs spar nas/_/chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs/_/a ya~M dza la~M 
[\[79a.3\]]kha~M lhan/_/de ring phan cad rgyal ba'i sras/_/dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod/_/rnal 'byor longs spyod bskyed pa dang /_/dug rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi/_/mA~M las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis/_/zangs kyi dngos po 'ju 'dul bya/_/dam rdzas yo byad 
[\[79a.4\]]longs spyod rnams/_/gong nas cha gsum so so nas/_/shan ma 'dres par sta gon bya/_/phyi yi cha la 'jug pa yi/_/mchod sbyin spel ba'i yo byad bya/_/de gnyis gnyis pa'i cha dag las/_/mjug gi rgyal chos longs spyod bya/_/rmad 'byung nang gi cha dag 
[\[79a.5\]]ni/_/thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni/_/ras sam shing khyon dag tu ni/_/bsdus te bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgab/_/byug pa chen pos de la gtor/_/lce pog nag po'i dud pas bdug_/rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang /_/'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya/_/
[\[79a.6\]]tsham ngam chen po'i stabs kyis bskor/_/sna tshogs bsur gyi dri chen gdon/_/de nas rgyal po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/yo byad de dag bdud rtsi lnga/_/dam rdzas ngo bor bsdus nas ni/_/de la 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las/_/zhu nas phyag mtshan rnam lngar 
[\[79a.7\]]'bar/_/dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por zhu/_/shes rab lha mo rig 'dzin ma/_/bzhi 'am yang na rnam pa brgyad/_/rdzas sam yo byad rang bzhin pas/_/zas mchog gar gyis spyir blangs te/_/longs spyod spel ba'i dbyangs 'dis bstan/_/bdag cag rig 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]'dzin shes rab ma/_/rgyal sras lha yi dngos grub 'dzin/_/dgyes pas tshim pa'i longs spyod dag_/ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu 'am/_/dpag bsam shing ljon 'dod 'jo'i ba/_/ma rmos lo tog rgyas pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor longs spyod chen po dag_/nam mkha'i 
[\[79b.2\]]khams su gtibs nas kyang /_/rdo rje dgyes tshogs kun 'dus nas/_/skal ldan rnams kyis rab sprul cig_/rdo rje gar gyi dbang sgyur nas/_/sgeg pas lha mo 'jo tshul dag_/'dud cing sdod pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba skyed/_/oM 
[\[79b.3\]]shrI badzra lA s+yai hU~M hU~M/_badzra mA lai trA~M trAM/_badzra gI ti hrIHhrIH_badzra nr-i t+ya aHaH/_rdo rje karma'i thabs mchog gis/_/rdo rje glu 'dis gzi byin bskyed/_/rdo rje bdud rtsi longs spyod 'di/_/rtsi mchog bcud kyi snying po ste/_/gzi mdangs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog_/
[\[79b.4\]]bkrag 'dzin gzugs mchog dran pa'i dpal/_/rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis/_/skal pa can gyi zas su bya/_/skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur/_/dper na sbrul la 'o ma bzhin/_/sa ma ya dzaH_ku su tsa ma ma/_/smug zil lha mo mnyen gsal ma/_/rlan 
[\[79b.5\]]rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/_/bdud rtsi chu rgyun dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs/_/shing lo 'dab las bdud rtsir sgyur/_/'bru thog sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal 'bras bur skyed/_/lha mo sra brtan dbang sgyur 
[\[79b.6\]]ma/_/khu ba bcud las bdud rtsir 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi zhun chen dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed/_/rdo rje lha mo shel mdog ma/_/nyi zer bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/_/gsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal gzi byin 
[\[79b.7\]]skyed/_/lha mo khro gnyer sngo bsangs ma/_/dur khrod rdzas las bdud rtsir sgyur/_/sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal byin 'bebs ma/_/rtsi yi lha mo blo gros ma/_/rtsi thog bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/_/rtsi mchog kun gyi dngos grub 'dzin/_/
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]rang gnyer las skal tshim byed ma/_/sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun/_/dug rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma/_/bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin/_/rang gnyer las skal 'di kun yang /_/rdo rje glu yi brten nas ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i yo byad du/_/rol 
[\[80a.2\]]mos dga' ston longs spyod bya/_/de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir/_/phyi nang mthun 'jug bka' sdod pa'i/_/gshin rje chos kyi phyag rgya yis/_/bran gyi bya bar dbang bsdus nas/_/phyi mtshams bsrung bar dbang bskur te/_/'bur ram lugs sam ri mo'am/_/ci 
[\[80a.3\]]'dra bar ni byas nas kyang /_/phyi khyams sgo yi phyi rol du/_/ma he khri la bzhag nas ni/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mgu byas la/_/de tshe 'di yis bskor bar bya/_/gsang chen lhun grub pho brang nas/_/las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang nas/_/bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal 
[\[80a.4\]]pa/_/de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos/_/bka' gsang gzhung chen 'di sgrub cing /_/yang dag don la nges 'jug na/_/'di dag nor bu rin chen te/_/'di la rtod cing bar gcod pa/_/lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun/_/khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin gyis/_/
[\[80a.5\]]rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la/_/gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pas/_/bla med 'bras bur ma gyur tsher/_/sa 'di yan chad ma gtang bar/_/dpal chen mi pham bka' ma 'da'/_/bdag cag ye nas gnyis med de/_/de tsam don gyi dbyings su gcig_/
[\[80a.6\]]phyi rol skyong ba'i mu ran la/_/rdo rje yal dam thub par mdzod/_/badzra ya ma rA dza sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_/zhes pas gshin rje mnas bsgags te/_/gal te 'das na kho bdag 'tshig_/brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po/_/dngos grub 'byung bar byed pa'i rten/_/phyag rgya che 
[\[80a.7\]]dang gzugs mchog gi/_/stegs bu legs par sbyangs na 'grub/_/mtshon pas khrid par byed pa yi/_/rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams la/_/brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad bgyi ba/_/so sor brtags te bshad bgyi ba/_/brtan zhing ngos 'jam khang bu 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]la/_/'bur khung khod snyoms 'phang mtho ba'i/_/kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas/_/des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ster/_/shing shun ras sam dur khrod kyi/_/zhing chen ras la kha dog lngas/_/phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs bris na/_/de yang mtshan ma 
[\[80b.2\]]'byung ba'i rten/_/rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa/_/dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni/_/mkhas pas 'bur du btod byas nas/_/mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur/_/gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa/_/zangs lcags khar ba'i rgyu dag las/_/mkhan gyis 
[\[80b.3\]]blugs te ma nyams na/_/de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/_/bla k+Sha byang chub shing la sogs/_/rgyud shing yal ga mnyen pa las/_/phyag rgya'i gzugs de legs sbyar na/_/de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad/_/mnyen cing sbyin pa'i mchog rnams la/_/
[\[80b.4\]]bzhin dang 'dril khugs legs sbyar te/_/phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na/_/de yang rten pa'i 'os su 'gyur/_/de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la/_/yi ge'am yang na mtshan rtags sam/_/ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri/_/bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rten 
[\[80b.5\]]du 'gyur/_/de las re zhig 'dir bshad pa/_/stegs bu la brten mtshan ma dag_/bsgrub pa'i don du brtag gzung ba/_/brtsam pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste/_/gong du smos pa'i rgyu rnams la/_/stegs bu mdzes shing mnyam byas te/_/kun du gru bzhi cha 
[\[80b.6\]]mnyam la/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/me long lta bur snying por bya/_/snang byung yang dag byin brlabs can/_/ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas/_/bka' gsang rmad byung pho brang du/_/dur khrod rdzas lngas skyang nul bya/_/rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa/_/
[\[80b.7\]]cho ga rnam par bshad bgyi ba/_/gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa/_/ring thung maN+Dal 'khor khyud la/_/'jur mdud can du ma gyur pa'i/_/sum sgril snyoms pa'i tshad ldan la/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/_/rgyu 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]de byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/_/yi ge gnyis kyi 'phro 'du las/_/dkar dmar 'od kyi gser phreng 'phro/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs kyis da/_/byang chub sems 'dren 'khal ba'i yum/_/nges par 
[\[81a.2\]]brtags te 'dir bzung ba/_/mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum/_/smin dkyugs ring la lag sor phra/_/tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad/_/kha nas ut+pal ngad ldang zhing /_/lus la ga pur tsan+dan dri/_/yid 'ong mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed/_/skra 'jam 
[\[81a.3\]]mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil/_/so dkar tshags dam dkar dmar phyed/_/mig gi dkyus ring smin dkyugs legs/_/zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan/_/dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug_/sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs/_/lus drang ske ring 
[\[81a.4\]]sems ma'i tshul/_/nu ma'i dkyil mtho zla rgyas 'dra/_/sha dkar tshags dam 'khril bag chags/_/khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jam/_/skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrogs/_/cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan/_/skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung /_/gzungs mar 
[\[81a.5\]]byin gyis brlab pa ni/_/yum gyi phung po gnas lngar ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga/_/'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/sangs rgyas byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/_/bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal/_/rdo rje yab la'ang de bzhin te/_/de 
[\[81a.6\]]ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/yum gyi mkha' la me ri sgom/_/gsang ba dbugs kyi zla gam la/_/byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du bya/_/gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin/_/yum gyi mkha' la de bzhin no/_/de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis/_/lus kyi yum la 
[\[81a.7\]]nges par bsgo/_/shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum/_/'dod dgur sgyur ba'i 'phrul mo che/_/chags pa'i tshul gyis thabs la 'dud/_/g.yon du 'khril cing g.yas su 'khyud/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zla gam sbyor/_/gsang ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'dren pa/_/khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras/_/rang bzhin chos kyi mtshan ldan ma/_/rdo rje las kyi yum yin gyis/_/gsang ba'i las rnams kun byos shig_/lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/_/nyi zla 'bar ba'i tshogs bkod de/_/gsang ba'i byang chub 
[\[81b.2\]]dkar dmar 'di/_/thig le yi ge'i ngo bor gdab/_/las kyi rdo rje 'bar ba yi/_/rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis/_/byang chub sems kyi thig 'di drongs/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di drongs/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di gyis/_/o~M tsan+d+ra d+ha ra hrI zhes pa'i/_/gsang 
[\[81b.3\]]ba'i thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdzas mchog 'bar ba'i thig le yis/_/gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yas su/_/gsang ba thabs kyi thig le bya/_/srad bu'i sbyor ba de rdzogs nas/_/gol sgrib rtag chad skyon bral ba'i/_/che chung ya yo med pa yi/_/rdo rje dbu ma'i 
[\[81b.4\]]thig 'di dgye/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas su/_/mi dmigs bdal ba'i maN+Dal la/_/ye shes lnga yi thig 'phros pas/_/bde chen rnam thar phyag rgya'i tshogs/_/kun gzhi nam mkha'i gzhal yas su/_/nyon mongs rtog pa'i maN+Dal la/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[81b.5\]]'od zer thig 'phros pas/_/phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs/_/mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal yas su/_/zla gam pad+ma'i maN+Dal las/_/byang chub sems kyi thig 'phros pas/_/ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs/_/bkra shis dben pa'i gzhal 
[\[81b.6\]]yas su/_/mtshan ma rten gyi maN+Dal la/_/rdo rje srad bu'i thig 'phros pas/_/cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan phyag rgya 'bar/_/stong gsum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rmad byung rdo rje'i thig 'gyed na/_/gsang ba'i dam la gnas pa yi/_/'byung po skye bo gdol pa 
[\[81b.7\]]can/_/rdo rje rtsal gyi hU~M ring las/_/rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu yug 'tshub/_/phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro bos gtams/_/'bar ba gsang ba'i mtshams bzung ste/_/phyi rol sde pa'i 'drul rnams gcad/_/rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs/_/sreg dang 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'joms pa'i drag shul can/_/rdo rje lce yis 'dir brdeg bya/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i gzhal yas su/_/rdo rje dpal be'u 'od kyi thig_/me long ye shes rang bzhin can/_/rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya/_/de bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal/_/
[\[82a.2\]]pad+ma zla ba 'khor lo yi/_/dpag med nam mkha'i gzhal yas su/_/rigs kyi dpal be'u 'od kyi thig_/ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin can/_/rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya/_/rdo rje mkha' la 'khor lo bskor/_/thabs dang shes rab zung ya bzhis/_/
[\[82a.3\]]so so'i phyag tu gnas nas ni/_/nam mkha' dbus kyi snying po la/_/srad bu bzhi yi rgya gram bre/_/de nas rdo rje brtan pa'i sa/_/dbus kyi pho brang dgu pa ni/_/rdo rje srad bu'i thig chen gyis/_/phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams kun/_/che chung med par snyoms par 
[\[82a.4\]]bya/_/'dir ni rdo rje mu khyud bdun/_/'byung ba'i rim pa drug bar du/_/'khor lo drug brtsegs snying por 'bar/_/gru chad rtsibs mchan me ri 'phro/_/mu khyud tshar gsum 'bar ba'i phreng /_/bar khyams bzhis mdzes phyi khyams dang /_/ldar gsal sgo 
[\[82a.5\]]dgu shar du brtsegs/_/pho brang de yi gnas gnas su/_/phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni/_/mu khyud mtha' zad yan chad du/_/yab yum drug cu rtsa zhi yi/_/cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa/_/rol ba 'jigs byed 'jigs byed che/_/ka tsa li la sogs 
[\[82a.6\]]par bri/_/de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi/_/las kyi lha ste he ru ka/_/'khor lo tha ma'i rtsibs la dgod/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dag_/gru chad phyi dang nang la dgram/_/hU~M chen bcu yi yab yum dag_/shin tu mdzes par dang po la'o/_/de nyid la ni ma brgyad 
[\[82a.7\]]dang /_/ging chen [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rgyas par dgod/_/gnyis pa'i khyams la mkha' 'gro brgyad/_/shugs 'gro brgyad kyang de bzhin no/_/gsum pa'i khyams la phra men brgyad/_/de bzhin 'bar ma brgyad rnams bris/_/bzhi pa'i khyams la phor thogs brgyad/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]de bzhin srin mo gzhong thogs brgyad/_/kun du mdzes par bri bar bya/_/lnga pa'i khyams ni tha ma la/_/rdo rje slas dang bran mo dang /_/pho nya la sogs rgyas par dgram/_/de yang tshul du dgod pa ni/_/gong ma dag ni rgyu rnams las/_/ka tsa li la sogs pa dang /_/ji ltar 'byor 
[\[82b.2\]]pa de ltar bri/_/mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang /_/rmad du byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang /_/rdo rje gsang ba'i rim gyis bkod/_/rdo rje gsang sgo phye nas ni/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs nas/_/rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni/_/bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor der rdzogs 
[\[82b.3\]]bya/_/'dir yang don gyi khyad par gyis/_/rig 'dzin che ba'i sa spar pa/_/shar gyi gdan gyi khyad par la/_/rdo rje seng ges bteg 'khor lo/_/zla ba nyi ma g.yas g.yon gyi/_/zhabs rten tshul gyi maN+Dal ni/_/rdo rje rgyal po yab yum bzhugs/_/lho yi gdan 
[\[82b.4\]]gyi khyad par la/_/glang chen rdo rjes btegs 'khor lo/_/pad+ma g.yas g.yon zhabs brten tshul/_/rdo rje rgyal ba yab yum bzhugs/_/byang gi gdan gyi khyad par la/_/pad+ma rdo rje bteg rgya gram/_/rdo rje karma yab yum bzhugs/_/nub bam phyogs sam 
[\[82b.5\]]mtshams gzhan du/_/gzhi rnams gcig tu gyur pa la/_/maN+Dal rgyun ma chad pa la/_/rdo rjes gtams shing sbrel byas nas/_/pad+ma phyogs gcig cher 'bar ba/_/kha dog 'bar ba'i 'od kyis dkrigs/_/rtsal 'phang che chung khyad par gyis/_/skal dang ldan 
[\[82b.6\]]nam mi ldan pa'i/_/la la dag la zla ba ni/_/rangs pa'i gdan gyi mtshan ma la/_/de yang rtsal 'phang che chung la/_/la la rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan/_/la la rdo rje phyed mas mtshan/_/la la ma rangs zla gam kha/_/nang du bstan pas mtshan par bya'o/_/la la rtses 
[\[82b.7\]]'bigs rnam par mtshan/_/la la pad+ma brtsegs pas mtshan/_/la la dag la mtshan ma med/_/la las gdan de mi non te/_/nar ma gang zag mi yi rdzas/_/so so'i bde ba'i thabs su sbyar/_/kun du bde bar sbyar ba'i phyir/_/pi par stan zhes grags pa ste/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]kun du khyab par lus bder sbyar/_/rmad byung sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang /_/dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya/_/'dod par bya ba bsgrub pa dang /_/gtor ma la sogs rdzas kyi rnams/_/cha gsum dag la bgos nas 
[\[83a.2\]]kyang /_/gcag ni sbyin sreg las mchog bya/_/gcig la rnal 'byor longs spyod gter/_/gcig ni mkha' 'gro'i 'khor tshogs bskyang /_/gnas su bkra shis la sogs kyis/_/sgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung ngo /_/dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la/_/
[\[83a.3\]]dkyil 'khor dgu brtsegs dpal gyi rgya/_/ye shes dgu yi khong gseng gsal/_/me ri 'od kyi thig thag gcad/_/'khor lo tshogs chen bsgrub pa'i sa/_/rnal 'byor rtsal mchog can gyi gnas/_/sgrub pa rtsa yi dkyil 'khor de/_/dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi mdo/_/
[\[83a.4\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las tshogs chen 'dus pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rig 'dzin thams cad nges 
[\[83a.5\]]par 'grub par 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin thams cad kun rdzogs nas/_/rigs kyi khyad par 'di dag dbye/_/so so'i rigs su bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje can la dpal be'u ni/_/dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba'o/_/de bzhin rin chen rin chen te/_/pad+ma dmar 
[\[83a.6\]]po 'od kyi dkyil/_/las ni kun du rgya gram 'bar/_/de bzhin rin chen 'khor lor 'bar/_/so so'i rigs rnams gtsor gzhag ste/_/'khor ni de bzhin mi 'gyur bar/_/rnam par bkod de legs sbyar nas/_/bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa/_/bsgrub dang sgrub chen 
[\[83a.7\]]rdzogs par bsgrub/_/ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni/_/so so'i rigs ni gang yin pa/_/ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la/_/yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar bya/_/des ni rig [(]'jin [,]'dzin [)]gang 'dod pa/_/gsol bar nges par 'grub pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni blang dor med par rig par 
[\[83b.2\]]bya'o/_/chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la/_/bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral/_/bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med de/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang gnyis su med/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin mi'i thod pa can mang po dag rnam 
[\[83b.3\]]par bkod pa rnal 'byor gyi gral nas langs te/_/a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na/_bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83b.4\]]kyis ma gsungs so zhes gsol pa las/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi'i thod pa can rnams rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la phul cig ces gsungs pa las/_/'dod chags kyi rig 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can 
[\[83b.5\]]rdo rje thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/_/ma dang sring mo bu mo dang /_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gyi/_/bud med thams cad thams cad la/_/'dod pa'i chags pa ci spyad kyang /_/
[\[83b.6\]]yang dag rig na mi gos so/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas rig 'dzin rak+Sha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste/_/bdag ni gsod la dga' ba ste/_/sems can thams cad bsad nas kyang /_/
[\[83b.7\]]zag pa mi gtsang snyigs ma dang /_/mi sha la sogs thams cad kun/_/zos na dam tshig mchog lags te/_/mthu dang gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yak+Sha mi'i thod pa 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste/_mi yi bdag po thams cad la/_/'dod pa thams cad 'phrog pa dang /_/gser la sogs pa brkus spyad kyang /_/yang dag rig na mi gos te/_/'dod pa grub pa'i 
[\[84a.2\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_/bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od srung ral pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/_mi yi mgo bo bcad nas kyang /_/bzang dang ngan ni 
[\[84a.3\]]bye brag rnams/_/rig pas brtags te shes byas nas/_/bzang ba'i rtags can bsten bya ste/_/dkar po ra ri lcang lo can/_/'di dag rtag tu sus 'chang ba/_/'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa ste/_/rgol ba thams cad 'joms par nus/_/yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra bar/_/
[\[84a.4\]]de yi yon tan 'di las 'byung /_/bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas yang bram ze sha la dga' ba dang /_/sha za mo'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/_/ba glang 
[\[84a.5\]]khyi sha rta sha dang /_/mi sha glang chen sha la sogs/_/sha rnams 'dra bar gtsang sme med/_/zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'grub/_/bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas yang srin mo'i rig 'dzin khrag 'phrog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 
[\[84a.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/_srog chags sems can thams cad kyi/_/bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag_/'thungs na gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi dam tshig de lags so/_/zhes gsol to/_/lha 
[\[84a.7\]]mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig 'di lta ste/_bro gar glu tshig chen po ni/_/thams cad bsten pa'i mchog lags te/_/bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang /_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]glu yi snyan dang gas don bsgrags nas/_/yid kyi dbang po thams cad 'phrog_/bsten pa'i thabs kyis 'khrig spyod pa/_/'di ni dga' ba'i dam tshig ste/_/bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas rig 'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[84b.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi spyi'i dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/_dkar nag las ni ci spyad kyang /_/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_/rab 'bring tha dad bye brag med/_/de bzhin 'di la bde sdug gam/_/dge dang mi dge'i rtsod pa med/_/rnon 
[\[84b.3\]]po'i mtshon gyis gcad du med/_/ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas/_/thogs pa med pa'i don phyir ro/_/srog kyang bcad cing gsad du med/_/ci phyir rdzas 'di 'jigs pas so/_/sdig pa chen po'i las rnams kun/_/bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug_/
[\[84b.4\]]gal te gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/sems can de la sbyin byin dang /_/de bzhin gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/sems can thams cad gsad pa gnyis/_/yang dag rig la tha dad med/_/nam mkha' dag la rdul dang chus/_/ji ltar mi chags pa bzhin no/_/gang zhig khrel 
[\[84b.5\]]dang 'dzem ldan na/_/dogs pa'i rtog pa de bzung bas/_/dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur/_/chags pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis/_/lus rnams gdung bar byed pa yi/_/sems can de ni 'du shes chung /_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84b.6\]]sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/e ma'o thod pa can gyi tshogs/_/khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams/_/mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te/_/khur dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag yang dag ces smra ba/_/yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa ste/_/
[\[84b.7\]]mdud pa'i bkrol ba ma byas na/_/tha ram phyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag_/chags pa'i dbang gis der sbyor na/_/de dag de yi grong khyer du/_/gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin/_/'du shes sgyur ba'i las chen dag_/sdang ba'i 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dbang gis sems shor na/_/shan pa gsod pa'i rig 'dzin du/_/ltung 'gyur sdig pa'i ri bo yin/_/rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang bas na/_/gang tshe bde gshegs rgyal ba'i zhal/_/mi gtsang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/yongs su bstabs par gyur 
[\[85a.2\]]na ko/_/de tshe las kyi rnam smin gyis/_/thar med nad kyis bzung nas ni/_/'dam du bying bar mi 'gyur ram/_/sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas/_/dku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste/_/gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la/_/'byung po dri za kun 'dus nas/_/dri mnam 
[\[85a.3\]]ro dang bcud rnams 'byin/_/des ni gzi mdangs yal 'gyur na/_/ci phyir ci ste de rnams bza'/_/sems nyid rin chen yod bzhin du/_/gzhan gyi rin chen spyod byed pa/_/log pas log pa len pa'i chos/_/'di dag mdud pa dam po yin/_/dkar gnag las la 
[\[85a.4\]]khyad med ces/_/thams cad khra bos spyod pa ni/_/rigs med rigs chad log pa'i las/_/'bras bu log pa'i khams su 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la/_/yan lag tshig tu ma dag na/_/nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni/_/gang gi dus rnams 
[\[85a.5\]]thams cad du/_/dbang po yan lag ma tshang zhing /_/dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/bder gshegs rgyal ba sgom zlos pa/_/cho 'phrul khro tshul bstan pa ltar/_/mtshan ma nyid du der go na/_/las kyi srin po'i rig 'dzin 
[\[85a.6\]]yin/_/rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun/_/mtshan ma nyid du brtags gyur na/_/ci la'ang rtog cing chags pa yi/_/'dzin pa'i phur pa chen por 'gyur/_/a dang hU~M la sogs pa yi/_/rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun/_/mtshan ma nyid du der brtags na/_/tsan+dan 
[\[85a.7\]]sbrul gdug la sogs par/_/ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gegs chen yin/_/khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas chen lnga/_/de nyid dngos por de brtags na/_/'byung po khrag gi dri mnam pa'i/_/lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yi/_/ma bdun rngam pa'i cha lugs su/_/gang 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]zhig rtog par der go na/_/srin mo mi sdug sha za mo/_/lang+ka'i yul du de dag 'khor/_/mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can/_/der btsan der bzung dmigs pas ni/_/sho gam gnas kyi gcan chen rigs/_/'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur/_/las 
[\[85b.2\]]kyi dbang btsan bran mo'i tshogs/_/de 'dra nyid du de brtags na/_/gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshogs su 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi tshe la 'tshe ba yin/_/des na mdud pa chen po 'di/_/khur du bshal ba'i gdos yin te/_/'chal pas lta ba'i mig long ste/_/sems kyi nor 
[\[85b.3\]]bu rin chen de/_/rtag chad khams su stor bar 'gyur/_/de lta'i skyon chen spang bar gyis/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa las thod pa can gyi tshogs rnams rtogs pa'i 'du shes kyis zin cing rang rang gi spyod pa la skyo ba skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85b.4\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni log pa'i dka' thub tu 'gyur ba lags na/_'di dag yang dag pa'i dka' thub tu gnas par 'tshal na/_chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_cir yang 'gyur ba lags 
[\[85b.5\]]so/_/gsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni bskal pa me dpung lta bu ste/_bdag cag rnams kyi rtog pa so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa chen po'i bzhad pa mdzad nas/_rigs kyi bu rnams ni de ltar zhu ba 
[\[85b.6\]]legs kyis shin tu nyon cig_/khyed rnams kyi spyod pa mi dgag par ji ltar dga' ba'i bsam pa so sor rangs par bya ste/_'jig rten mtshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang sngags kyi dka' thub chen por bya'o/_/rang rang gi spyod pa ma bkag par 
[\[85b.7\]]sgo gsum lhug par spyod cig_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye ma'o thod pa can gyi tshogs/_/bud med bud med thams cad kun/_/skyed par byed pa'i rten yin te/_/'bras bu smin pa'i zhing yang yin/_/bsgral zhing gdon 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa'i gnas yin te/_/shes rab dga' ba'i yul yin no/_/'di la sems gsum gnas pa ste/_/ye nas dag pa chos nyid sems/_/mkha' dang sbyor ba byang chub sems/_/snying rjes sgrol ba gsum sbyar te/_/chos nyid gsang ba nyi shar 
[\[86a.2\]]khyab/_/snying rjes sgrol ba gsum gyis sbyar/_/ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis/_/chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la bsgral/_/bsgral ba'i rgyu mchog man chad nas/_/shel chen tsa ra la sogs pa/_/de la rgyu drug sa bon gdab/_/rang bzhin ye nas de 
[\[86a.3\]]gzhom bya/_/khyad par 'das pa'i yi ge lnga/_/gnas bkod 'phros pas mtha' yas bkang /_/thams cad stongs shing zad byas nas/_/'dus pa'i yi ge lnga ru gsal/_/de las phyag mtshan ye shes lnga/_/mi gnas ye shes ngang du thim/_/sgrib pa'i phung por smin 
[\[86a.4\]]pa de/_/rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis/_/'jo tshul stabs kyis sbyar bar bya/_/kha T+wAM la sogs sngags bcas pas/_/bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya/_/rnam shes dbugs kyi sgrom drangs la/_/rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sgrom du/_/bsdus te rdo rje dbugs can la/_/hU~M byas 
[\[86a.5\]]sgril ma de la bslan/_/gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/mtshon gang 'od du bstim par bya/_/yu ti a ha~M gis sbar te/_/gsal na de dang mnyam du gsal/_/rdo rje tshe la bslan par bya/_/rdo rje rlung gis dbugs sbar te/_/thugs las rlung sgrom lam du sbar/_/
[\[86a.6\]]nam mkha' chos kyi gzhal yas su/_/nyi ma'i steng na hU~M du gsal/_/ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba/_/nyi zla ga'u'i bar na gsal/_/a yang phaT kyis bskyod 'phangs pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar 'phros/_/ye shes sems dpar gsal ba la/_/
[\[86a.7\]]dngos por snang ba 'dzin dang bral/_/g.yo 'gul 'phar 'phrig ma chad par/_/rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te/_/rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin/_/rdo rje gdung ba'i glu blangs te/_/man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab/_/bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni/_/sman gyis btab ste phung por 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]btsal/_/'khor ba'i phung po de bsdus la/_/rdo rje stabs dang glu yis sbyang /_/gnas gnas dag tu bsngo bar bya/_/phung po mchod pa'i rdzas su bstim/_/rdo rje bra yi las rnams gdab/_/des ni mnyes dang skongs pa dang /_/rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin/_/rnal 'byor las 
[\[86b.2\]]kyi dbang phyug che/_/mtho gtsang shes rab gangs rum nas/_/rig pa'i sder mo sbar shad can/_/nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'joms/_/rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas seng phrug rnams/_/rdo rje rtsal chen 'di sbyangs pas/_/rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs pa'i rten/_/dngos grub 'byung 
[\[86b.3\]]ba'i rin po che/_/mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po/_/byin brlabs phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dis/_/rgyal ba'i dngos grub man chad nas/_/mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang /_/dregs pa ma rungs sde pa rnams/_/thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na/_/'byung po 
[\[86b.4\]]gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/'khor ba'i skam gling chen po la/_/ris drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/_/rgyud drug 'das pa'i rnam shes srog_/dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pas na/_/rtag chad mthar shi'i ro gling nas/_/gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas/_/
[\[86b.5\]]bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis/_/rtag chad mtha' las ro blangs shing /_/byang chub sems su gsal ba'i phyir/_/ro yi rdzas rnams btsal bar bya/_/khro tshogs rngam par bdag byas te/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig nang nas/_/mthing nag hU~M gi seng chen ni/_/'khor 
[\[86b.6\]]ba'i ro gling khams su spro/_/bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun/_/ye shes rol ba'i zhing du blta/_/khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis/_/tsham ngam chen po'i rngam tshul gyis/_/dpa' bo rdo rje'i 'dzur 'gros sbyar/_/thabs chen [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad stabs kyis sbyar/_'jo 
[\[86b.7\]]tshul thabs kyi 'gro stabs kyis/_/'dzem tshul lta zhing rnam par rtsen/_/sgra skad sgyur zhing he hes sgrogs/_/'thab cing rtsod pas rnam par rngam/_/'bri tshugs lta zhing 'drog tshul spyod/_/g.yas su lta zhing g.yon du 'gyur/_/yid ma ches te phyir yang blta/_/
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]sdang mig logs kyi khyab par blta/_/rdo rje 'gros su rgyug cing 'gro/_/ha ha ru lu'i rngam sgra sgrogs/_/so so'i brda skad 'byin byed cing /_/rtod pa'i tshul gyis mchong zhing rgyug_/yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas/_/'dod 'byung rin chen phung po 
[\[87a.2\]]de/_/'khor ba'i rnam smin dpyis phyung nas/_/rnam gsum dug chen gtan sprugs nas/_/thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long kha/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis/_/dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang /_/rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma nor bar/_/shel phur gnyis kyis 
[\[87a.3\]]gsang gnas bzung /_/nges par gshin pa'i gzhi ma la/_/cung zhig brtod de nye 'khor bsgyur/_/bzhin phyogs gang ltas legs nyes brtag_/phyi yi bzang ngan de nyid ni/_/nang du nges par gsal ba yin/_/nyes pa'i mtshan byung mkhas pas mnan/_/gal 
[\[87a.4\]]te dri bas gleng slong na/_/de yi the tshom gsal ba dag_/dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis/_/mtshan mar rtog pa 'di dag rnams/_/'jigs byed bka' la btags pa yi/_/'dod chags bdag po nga la gsol/_/ji skad smras pa de bshad kyis/_/mtshan 
[\[87a.5\]]ma'i rdzas rnams rtogs par gyis/_/'jig rten mgon khyod bdag la gson/_/bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi/_/snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis/_/nyes dang legs pa 'di las byung /_/skyon gyi mtshan ma bdun pa ste/_/kha sbub pa dang gdan las 
[\[87a.6\]]bskyod/_/rgyud mi 'phel dang mtshams su gas/_/bar chad 'byung dang bgegs ldang ba/_/mtshan ma ngan pa 'byung ba'o/_/'di dag mkhas pas yong mi 'chang /_/legs pa'i rgyu ni bcu gcig ste/_/gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang /_/rig 'dzin lam 'gro 
[\[87a.7\]]nam mkhar 'phur/_/khams gsum dbang bsdu rdo rje spyan/_/pha rol g.yul zlog zil gyis gnon/_/mthu dang byin brlabs tshe 'phel dang /_/mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang /_/slob ma chu yi rgyud 'phel ba/_/dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang /_/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]phyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang /_/dngos grub rnam gsum thob pa ste/_/smon lam bzhin du 'grub pa'o/_/de yang bye brag 'di lta ste/_/phyed du 'gyur na thob thang yin/_/sum cha tsam la btang snyoms so/_/de yang so so'i mtshan rtags su/_/brtag cing ming du 
[\[87b.2\]]brjod bya ba/_/dkar po spros med chos kyi sku/_/lcang lo kun rdzogs longs spyod ldan/_/ma 'ongs sprul pa mdzad pa'i rgyun/_/'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i/_/rnal 'byor sa la 'gro ba'i rigs/_/bder gshegs dus gsum 'byung ba'i rtags/_/rin chen 
[\[87b.3\]]gter gyi ga'u 'di/_/thabs kyi rgyal po dpal gyi dkor/_/pho brang rtags ldan snod bcud rdzogs/_/'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'dod zho'i ba/_/rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i mchog_/ngo mtshar thog thog rkan sgra can/_/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang sgra dag_/rig 
[\[87b.4\]]'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrogs/_/nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi/_/rmad byung bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas/_/su zhig dngos grub gang 'dod pa/_/the tshom med par dus 'dir long /_/gang dag bka' ltar mi byed cing /_/su zhig dam la mi gnas pa/_/nga yi gzugs 
[\[87b.5\]]mthong tsam gyis 'tshig_/sgra thos tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur/_/zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni/_/rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las sgrogs/_/'di dag don dang ldan par spyod/_/'di ltar grags pa nges don ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba/_/thams cad 
[\[87b.6\]]dpal ldan lcang lo can/_/la la bkra shis mtshan ldan te/_/de bzhin paM tsa ku la yin/_/la la dpyad kyi na sha yin/_/de bzhin mi 'gyur sra mkhregs yin/_/ma hA ke sa dpal dang ldan/_/ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni bya/_/A yuHpha la tshe yi mchog_/la la 
[\[87b.7\]]me le de byi brtan/_/la la de bzhin kha swa kha/_/kha hu pa yi dpal dang ldan/_/bkra shis don 'byung de lta'o/_/bder gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin/_/gtsug phud dge gtsug dpal dang ldan/_/dz+nyA na mur+t+ti de bzhin no/_/la la dz+nyA na ku N+Dali/_/de 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bzhin khro po kuN+Da li/_/e ka dza Ti mtshan ldan pa/_/a bi mu ka rdzogs pa'o/_/'dod pa brtan ldan bde ba skye/_/gnyis med don ldan thob pa'o/_/pu tra mang 'phel lcug phran rgyas/_/rdo rje bse phor mtshan rdzogs nas/_/shel phor gsang 
[\[88a.2\]]ba'i don 'byung ba/_/sku gsung lhun grub ka pA la/_/thams cad re ba yid bzhin skor/_/de bzhin yon tan rdzogs kun rdzogs/_/bkra shis mtshan ni kun ldan pa/_/de bzhin mi 'gyur g.yung drung brtan/_/mi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o/_/cho 'phrul 
[\[88a.3\]]rtags 'byin dam pa 'byung /_/srid pa yongs sgrol las kyi mchog_/khams gsum dbang sdud khyad par ldan/_/drug gsum gtan sprugs las mchog can/_/mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don/_/rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug dang /_/yon tan 
[\[88a.4\]]skyon rnams sbyar bar bya/_/mang dang nyung ba'i gsang ba ni/_/bcas dkar 'phel dang mgo mi 'byung /_/rjes 'dra la sogs skyon rnams spang /_/dug gsum stongs mdzad rgyal ba'i bka'/_/sku gsum smin pa'i g.yung drung rtags/_/sba thabs gsang ba'i 
[\[88a.5\]]man ngag 'di/_/skal ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyi ste/_/skal med kun gyi rtog pa'i bdud/_/ming tsam 'dzin la ga la brten/_/mkhas pas brtag cing bzang po brten/_/dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus chen yang /_/gcig dang gsum ni rab tu bshad/_/de 
[\[88a.6\]]bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags/_/dgu ni dngos grub tha ma ste/_/bcu gcig phan chad yal bar bshad/_/de bas rnal 'byor rtsal can gyis/_/nges par brtson te brtag par rigs/_/'dod chags bdag pos de skad bshad/_/mtshan ma yin phyir der nges 
[\[88a.7\]]pa/_/mtshan ma can dang mthun bya'i phyir/_/thabs kyis de dang mthun spyod la/_/yang dag don la kha lo sgyur/_/de dag rnam par sbyang ba dang /_/'gro drug shin tu g.yeng ba can/_/yid rnams drangs te brten byas nas/_/thabs kyi don la sbyar ba'i tshig_/rgyu 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]drug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/_/glu bro gar gyi rol pa yis/_/srid gsum zil gnon dbang sdud pa/_/'jig rten mthun 'jug spyad par bya/_/dper na 'jig rten khams dag na/_/'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul byed pa/_/de dga'i las la de zhugs te/_/de dang bsam 
[\[88b.2\]]pa mthun sbyad pas/_/de dang 'dris nas de dga' byas/_/de nas de yi drod lon nas/_/de yi 'du shes sgyur ba'i tshig_/de snga bdag gi grogs khyod kyi/_/las la zhugs pa shin tu nor/_/'dir nyes las kyi bsags pa bgrang /_/nyes kyang bdag gis khyod dgar 
[\[88b.3\]]byas/_/da ni bdag dga'i las 'di la/_/grogs khyod shin tu 'jug dgos so/_/byas pas de yi snga sems de/_/zin pas gcig gi phyi sems kyang /_/'dzin cing de dga'i las la 'jug_/spyod pa'i las kyang 'di lta ste/_/rgyu drug 'dus pa'i phung po la/_/
[\[88b.4\]]ngan song gnas 'joms rdo rje'i rtags/_/ye shes thabs kyis snyan pa'i glu/_/rmad 'byung gsang chen sgrogs pa'i tshig_/nyon mongs lnga yi sa gzhi la/_/yi ge ye shes lnga gsal bas/_/'bar ba khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin/_/khyu mchog lnga yi stabs 
[\[88b.5\]]kyis rol/_/seng ge nga ro rngam pa'i glu/_/rdo rje don rab sgrogs pa'i tshig_/rmad byung rol pa'i don byung ba/_/e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan che/_/dgyes pas rol ba'i byin brlabs las/_/rgyud drug rtsad gcod ngo mtshar che/_/mnyam pa chen po'i nam mkha' las/_/
[\[88b.6\]]ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas/_/'khor ba khrag gi rgya mtsho skams/_/sdug bsngal dbyings su zad mdzad do/_/mi gnas klong nas cho 'phrul ba/_/gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor 'bar/_/khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas/_/srid gsum khrag mtsho 
[\[88b.7\]]rngo nas skams/_/dpa' bo tsham ngam gyad kyi stabs/_/srin po ma traM khros pa'i glu/_/theg chen rmad byung gsang ba'i tshig_/chags pa'i rtod phur gting nas phyung /_/mkha' bzhi dbyings kyi bde klong nas/_/tshom bu 'bum gyi cho 'phrul 'phros/_/dgyes mchog 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rol pa'i phrin las las/_/la la shes rab thabs la rol/_/la la thugs rje las la rol/_/la la gdul bya'i yul la rol/_/la la ye shes dbyings la rol/_/thabs kyi rgyal po rtogs pa'i dbang /_/che ba lung gi khyad par las/_/rgyal ba 
[\[89a.2\]]kun dang mnyam par sbyor/_/rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i stabs/_/chags med mkha' la gsal ba'i tshig_/dug gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i glu/_/'jig rten rim gyis sbyang ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten khams su rol pa byung /_/'jig rten drug gi snying la rol/_/bdag po 
[\[89a.3\]]gtso bo zil mnan nas/_/'khor ni snyan pa'i tshig gis bsten/_/'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyud bcad nas/_/rnam thar nam mkha'i ngang du bslan/_/gar mchog glog ltar 'gyu ba yin/_/rmad byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/yi ge 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul 'phros/_/
[\[89a.4\]]'phro 'du skar ltar 'khrug pa las/_/khams gsum bud shing thal bar rlags/_/rdo rje bu yug skar mda'i stabs/_/rdo rje 'brug chen ldir ba'i glu/_/don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig_/gdug pa'i dbung rnams rnam par 'joms/_/rdo rje sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[89a.5\]]bas/_/thabs kyi byang chub sems sprin spros/_/dbang sdud chags pa'i khyad par las/_/'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol/_/seng ge rnam par rol pa'i stabs/_/rdo rje khyud skad 'gyur ba'i glu/_/chags pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshig_/rdo rje rol pa'i don chen po/_/'khor 
[\[89a.6\]]lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/mtshon cha 'bar ba'i yig 'bru 'phros/_/rgyu drug ngo bo rtsad nas gcod/_/dug lnga'i phung po rnam par spros/_/ye shes rno dbal mtshon chen po/_/chos nyid bdal ba'i klong nas 'phro/_/thabs mchog dbyig gi rtsal shugs 
[\[89a.7\]]las/_/'bar ba'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab/_/yi ge ye shes mtshon cha'i char/_/rdo rje lce yi shugs kyis dbab/_/rin chen gter gyi longs spyod rnams/_/rtog pa'i ri bo gzhom pa dang /_/dug gsum phung po gzhig pa'i phyir/_/'khor lo lcags kyu 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]la sogs pa/_/rten dang gsang chen til mchog dang /_/dngas ma la sogs sgo kun rnams/_/so so'i cha ru phye nas ni/_/thugs rjes nyon mongs sbyong ba yi/_/so so gnyer gyi rang skal du/_/phyag rgya so so'i skabs su gdang /_/de ltar rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_/maN+Dal 
[\[89b.2\]]kun gyi tshad 'dra la/_/dbus su thig bzhi le tshe dgu/_/mtha' skor 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad bya/_/de la sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas/_/mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri bri/_/dbus su dkar dmar kha sprod bri/_/phyogs mtshams brgyad du kha~M brgyad bri/_/'khor lo'i 
[\[89b.3\]]bar mtshams mu khyud la/_/nang du bltas pa'i kha~M brgyad gsal/_/rtsi bsal nang du lta ba brgyad/_/mu khyud brgyad la phyir lta brgyad/_/gru chad bzhi la nang du lta/_/thig le rnam bzhi bri bar bya/_/phyi rim bar khyams de dag la/_/thig le nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/_/phyi ru
