[\[89b.4\]]lta ba bri par bya/_/bskal ba chen po'i me khyams la/_/thig le phyir lta bcu gsal bri/_/de la phyag rgya rim par dgod/_/maN+Dal sgo ru bam chen gcig_/glu bro gar gyis rnam sbyangs te/_/dbus su bzhag ste shar du bstan/_/de yi phung po gzhal yas khang /_/b+hu~M 
[\[89b.5\]]las bskyed de gsal bar bya/_/de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs chen bsgom/_/rdzas kyi gnas rnams so so la/_/rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod/_/de nas rdo rje bsnyen pa bya/_/byin phebs rtags lung mgu pa na/_/bam de byang shar mtshams su bsgral/_/rdzas rnams 
[\[89b.6\]]so sor bsngos nas kyang /_/phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/_/ma nor bar yang dgod de sbyar/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la/_/rmad du byung ba dgu bkod de/_/'bar ba chen po'i gnas gnas su/_/brjid pa'i tshul du gsal bar bsgom/_/phyag rgya 
[\[89b.7\]]gzhan yang rdzogs par dgod/_/ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/dbang chen zla gam skar tshogs bkram/_/rdo rje mi phyed dgur 'bar ba/_/che ba dgu yi khyad par las/_/dpal chen dgu ni sku la rdzogs/_/yum chen dgu ni dbyings la rol/_/dpal 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]be'u dgu ni thugs la 'bar/_/'byung chen dgu ni klong du 'khyil/_/khu byug dgu ni rang skad rdzogs/_/b+han d+ha dgu ni dpal dang ldan/_/zla gam dgu ni yum gyi dbyings/_/thig le dgu ni byang chub sems/_/nyi zla dgu ni 'od 'phro 'bar/_/de ltar dgu 
[\[90a.2\]]dgur gsal ba yi/_/dgu klong b+ha ga gcig gi dang /_/dgu bkag gcig phye thig le'i don/_/thams cad 'byor pa rgyas byas la/_/bam dgu phan cad sman du sbyar/_/rdzas kyi dngos grub blangs te spyad/_/ces bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs 
[\[90a.3\]]so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rmad byung rdzas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni mngon sum du shes shing 
[\[90a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/mngon sum gang zhe na/_dran pa mngon du bzhag pas yul la mi gnas pa'i chos thams cad dang /_phyis 'byung ba'i chos thams cad dang /_/sngon du byung ba'i chos thams cad mngon sum mar rig pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mngon sum mar shes 
[\[90a.5\]]pa ni ye shes chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du dran pa mngon du bzhag na mngon du gyur pa'i chos nyid phyin ci ma log par shes pa yin no/_/chos nyid phyin ci ma log par mngon du gyur na mi gnas pa'i ye 
[\[90a.6\]]shes chen po nyid de yin no/_/de bas na mngon par shes pa rnams dran pa mngon sum mar yid la byos shig de skad ces gsungs pa dang /_mngon shes rig pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa ni 
[\[90a.7\]]bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rig 'dzin chen po rnams ye shes chen po'i rgyu mngon par shes pa ni rnam pa 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]lngar rig par bya'o/_/mig gi dbang po thams cad las/_/zhib tu btags pa'i phye mar bya/_/bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas nas/_/mthong ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/_/thams cad ma lus mthong bar 'gyur/_/'di ni mig gi mngon shes so/_/rdo rje lce yis 
[\[90b.2\]]brjod pa'i tshig_/dus sam rgyun du brjod par bya'o/_/badzra tsak+Shu gar+b+ha bid+yA hU~M/_/rna ba'i dbang po thams cad kyang /_/btags sam phye mar byas nas ni/_/bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te/_/thos pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/_/sgra yi bye brag thams cad thos/_/'di ni 
[\[90b.3\]]rna ba'i mngon shes so/_/rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni/_/badzra gar+b+ha stam si ho/_/sna yi dbang po thams cad kun/_/bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni/_/bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te/_/dri sna tshogs dang bsres pa las/_/tshor ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/_/sna yi 
[\[90b.4\]]mngon shes thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje tshig tu gzung ba ni/_/badzra na ma si ta~M hU~M/_/lce yi dbang po thams cad kun/_/bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni/_/bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te/_/ro yi mchog la sogs pa las/_/ro yi snying po 'bum bzlas te/_/smra byed 
[\[90b.5\]]lce yi dkyil 'khor ni/_/stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi la/_/dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje bri/_/mtha' ma lce yi pad+mas bskor/_/lce la tshig gi 'od zer 'phro/_/smra ba'i bsgrub pas 'di rdzogs na/_/smra ba'i dbang po kha dbye zhing /_/ro rnams thams cad shes par 'gyur/_/
[\[90b.6\]]'di ni lce yi mngon shes yin/_/rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni/_/badzra pA sha sit+yA hU~M/_/snying gi dbang po thams cad kun/_/bskams sam phye mar byas nas kyang /_/snying po mchog dang sbyar byas zhing /_/dran pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas shing /_/dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 
[\[90b.7\]]'khor nas/_/dran pa'i rten gyis yongs bskor te/_/snying gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang /_/dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang /_/thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa'i mchog_/badzra tsit+ta si d+yA hU~M/_/lus kyi dbang po 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]thams cad kun/_/btags sam phye mar byas nas ni/_/sra mkhregs bcu dang sbyar byas te/_/reg bya'i snying po 'bum bzlas na/_/lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur/_/mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na/_/mi gnas ye shes chen po'i rgyu/_/pra mo'ang 
[\[91a.2\]]nan tan mchog tu bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mngon shes rig pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u zhes bya ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus 
[\[91a.3\]]pa chen po'i tshogs mchog chen po'i bsgrub lugs ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/las kyi stegs bu chag phyed pa/_/me ris bskor te 'bar bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor de yi maN+Dal ni/_/sum brtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam/_/
[\[91a.4\]]brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o/_/phyi mtha' thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/_/de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas bskor/_/de yi phyi mtha' dmar chen rgyas/_/zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar/_/zla gam brgyad la gnas bdag brgyad/_/mthing nag ya tha me rir 
[\[91a.5\]]'bar/_/de 'og thod pa tshar gsum dang /_/sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor/_/sgo brtsegs sgo khyud tha ma bran/_/thams cad gang yin de ltar sbyar/_/phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na/_/rnam bzhi las kyi maN+Dal brtsam/_/'jigs byed bskal 
[\[91a.6\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/za byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/thar pa tsa ra bsgral ba'i phyir/_/drod ldan man ngag 'chang ba des/_/mchog gi byin brlabs gzhag par bya/_/dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrang nas/_/gnas mchog dben pa'i ri bo rtse/_/rna 
[\[91a.7\]]nyan phra gsag can dang bral/_/'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad pa dag_/gsang chen spyod pa'i gnas su shis/_/rnam bzhi las kyi rtags nyung na'ang /_/gcig gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad/_/bsgrub pa'i rgyal po gdeng ldan pa/_/shin tu brjid cing sran tshugs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa/_/khu 'phrig rtog bral brtul zhugs can/_/las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med/_/dri zhim dag pa'i sman dag gis/_/phyi bkru shi ne da hu las/_/nang yang dag pa chen por bya/_/tshad mar sbyar ba'i bka' dang ni/_/ldan nas dus btab shin tu brtsam/_/de yang 
[\[91b.2\]]brtag pa'i gal chen ni/_/bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur ba/_/bong tshod lo ni dar la bab/_/rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan pa la/_/bsgral ba'i rdzas su rung ba dag_/yid 'ong 'byor ldan btsal nas ni/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas su bya ba de/_/de 'dra'i mtshan rtags yod pa 
[\[91b.3\]]ni/_/sa sbyangs sa la slebs pa'o/_/bsgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni/_/'da' hu man 'das dbang po bsgyur/_/rdo rje pra mkhan phab nas ni/_/snang srid thams cad dri ba'am/_/legs nyes thams cad dri bar bya/_/dbang po sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/_/bdud rtsi rnam 
[\[91b.4\]]lnga'i thig le gdab/_/rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo lnga ru/_/so so 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams gdab/_/so so rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/_/phyag rgya bkod de nyon mongs bsgral/_/bsgral sbyar thams cad sbyangs nas ni/_/mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang /_/dngos 
[\[91b.5\]]grub rnam gsum gang thob blang /_/thob nas thams cad ci bder spyad/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs bar du gcod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i bsgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar rig par 
[\[91b.6\]]bya'o/_/gong ma bzhin du las brtsams nas/_/thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni/_/rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub/_/rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/_/bsregs dang lce pog nag por sbyar/_/khyab 'jug ga'u kha sbyar du/_/bcug ste 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/
[\[91b.7\]]drag po sngags kyis bsgrub byas nas/_/grub na rnal 'byor don ldan gyi/_/bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje thal chen gyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs bra thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/maN+Dal gru bzhi pa gcig la/_/zla gam sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor/_/mtha' khyud sgo bzhi ldan par bri/_/rgyu mchog dbang po phyed 
[\[92a.2\]]ldan shis/_/phyi yi khrus rnams byas nas ni/_/shar du kha bstan dbus su gzhag_/lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyis bskor bar bya/_/phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram/_/de yi khong du gzhal yas bskyed/_/rim par brtsegs 
[\[92a.3\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/'bar ba'i 'byung chen 'bar ba lnga/_/don gyi lha mo lnga ru gsal/_/kun gzhi kun du bzang mor gsal/_/de yi thugs kyi khong thag tu/_/thig le zla ba nya rgyas la/_/ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba/_/thugs kar nor bu rin chen 
[\[92a.4\]]'bar/_/dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la/_/dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i bum pa la/_/hU~M dmar til 'brur gnas pa ni/_/bde chen byang chub sems zhes bya/_/rdo rje gsang thag rgyun mi gcad/_/rdo rje kha pra gdab par bya/_/de nas mtshan ma byung gyur na/_/dngos grub blangs 
[\[92a.5\]]te de bsgral la/_/bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchog phran thabs kyis bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad 
[\[92a.6\]]ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/sgyu ma ni dngos por snang yang rang bzhin med pa yin te/_rang bzhin med pa'i don ni chos nyid rdo rje yin no/_/de bas na sgyu ma'i chos thams 
[\[92a.7\]]cad khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs bdag sgyu ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul la gnas shing sgyu ma ched du bgyid lags 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don ched du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba las/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshogs bdag chen po sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/chos rnams thams cad sgyu mar snang /_/sgyu 
[\[92b.2\]]ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste/_/stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa/_/mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don/_/stong pa nyid la sgyu ma yi/_/cho 'phrul bye ba mang po 'byung /_/de bzhin sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yang /_/gyin da tsam gyi rgyu rkyen las/_/cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha dad 
[\[92b.3\]]snang /_/snang yang dngos por ma grub ste/_/'gyur 'jigs med pas rdo rje'i don/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/rde'u dang shing bu'i rgyu dag las/_/sman dang sngags kyis rkyen sbyar nas/_/'bras bu sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung /_/sgyu ma'i gsang tshig sbyor 
[\[92b.4\]]ba ni/_/sgyu ma'i bdag pos 'di skad bshad/_/rgyu la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la/_/she'u re'u sman gyis btab nas ni/_/gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba bya/_/she'u re'u i na ya/_/a mo kha a gus+sa gus/_/chag shing dag gis brdabs byas na/_/ji ltar 
[\[92b.5\]]'dod pa sna tshogs bya/_/bsdu bar 'dod na slar bzlog bya/_/des na sgyu ma'i g.yeng ba can/_/drang ba'i thabs kyis bkri bar bya/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sgyu ma rdo rje'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[92b.6\]]de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas/_/stegs bu kun du gru bzhi la/_/mu khyud gcig tu bskor 
[\[92b.7\]]nas ni/_/zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs su su sbyar/_/sgo bzhi gru chad bzhir ldan bya/_/dbyibs kyis thig le zlum po la/_/rdo rje dang ni nyi mas bskor/_/dbus su b+han d+ha dpal ldan la/_/dpal chen yab yum sbyar la gzhag_/tshal bu brgyad la gnas brgyad 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]sbyar/_/lte ba bskor te rim par gzhag_/thig le shar gyi sgo gang du/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor gsang ming dang /_/dngos grub gsol bya bris la gzhag_/mchod pa'i khyams su gyur pa la/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa rnams/_/rim pa bzhin du 
[\[93a.2\]]mdzes par dgram/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor de dag rnams/_/rdo rje lhags pa'i rtags kyis mtshan/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas/_/spyan drangs mchod pa kun bsogs te/_/'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang /_/dbang bskur las rnams kun 
[\[93a.3\]]rdzogs nas/_/rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dag_/cha gsum dang po sbyin sreg bya/_/bar ma mi zad gter du sba/_/byang chub sems kyi chu bo dang /_/chos nyid nam mkha'i dbyings chen dang /_/b+ha ga yum gyi sa gzhi la/_/shin tu sba ba'i tshul du sbyar/_/cha gcig gzhal 
[\[93a.4\]]yas shar sgo nas/_/bcu gsum bcal bar stegs bu bya/_/der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams kyang /_/de bzhin bcu gsum lan re la/_/gnas kyi mgron ni ma sring rnams/_/bdun cu bar du kun rdzogs bya/_/tha mar maN+Dal zla gam la/_/nus na mkha' 'gro nam 
[\[93a.5\]]mkha'i hom/_/rdzogs bya ma lus de mgu bya/_/lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs bya/_/snyigs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang /_/sba 'am bsreg gam chu klung 'dor/_/rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te/_/gnas ni sba phyir su dag gsang /_/mi rigs phyir na mtshan ma dag_/rang 
[\[93a.6\]]rang gnas su slebs par bya/_/gang dag 'du tshe'ang de bzhin no/_/'di ni thig le gcig pa yi/_/bsgrub lugs yin par rgyal bas bshad/_/'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes bu ni/_/zla ba'i 'khor lo la gnas nas/_/nyi ma'i 'khor lo thogs nas ni/_/yang dag chos 
[\[93a.7\]]kyi dbyings nyid la/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'di yang rim gyis gong ma ltar/_/thams cad tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas/_/phyir kun 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]du gru bzhi la/_/thig le zla ba gcig tu bya/_/de la srad bu bzhi bsnol bas/_/le'u tshe dgu ru gyur par bya/_/phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor/_/gru bzhi gru chad rab mdzes brgyan/_/de yi mtha' zad khyams gcig la/_/sgo gdong sgrub pa po la lta/_/dbus 
[\[93b.2\]]su thig le dkar dmar la/_/kha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes 'brel/_/der ni dpal chen yab yum bzhugs/_/phyi mtshams le'u tshe de brgyad la/_/zla gam brkyang ba brgyad byas te/_/ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad dgod/_/phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la/_/bsgrub pa'i 
[\[93b.3\]]rdzas kyis mdzes par dgram/_/bsam bya bsgrub pa la sogs kun/_/thams cad de bzhin 'dir sbyar bya/_/'di ltar grub pa'i skyes bu gang /_/chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/_/thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[93b.4\]]de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des cho 'phrul thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'di yang thams cad de 'drar sbyar/_/kun du gru bzhir ldan 'gyur ba/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya/_/gru chad 
[\[93b.5\]]bzhi yi phyi rol du/_/sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya/_/phyi khyams dmar nag me ri klong /_/shin tu brjid cing 'jigs par bri/_/thig le dbus kyi snying po la/_/zla gam 'bar bas mtshan par bya/_/rtsibs mchog brgyad la zla gam ni/_/nang du lta ba de brgyad 
[\[93b.6\]]bri/_/rtsibs mchan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te/_/rdo rje sgo mo bzhi rnams te/_/phyag rgya rim par bkram byas nas/_/bsgrub pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o/_/de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las/_/'das pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[93b.7\]]thams cad la/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las thig le sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/'di ni byas la sogs pa'i las/_/'di ltar 'byor dang phun sum tshogs/_/thabs la mkhas dang 
[\[94a.2\]]yo byad dang /_/ji ltar rig par 'dir bsdu bya/_/de nas maN+Dal 'dra cig la/_/dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya/_/zur bzhi maN+Dal bzhi byas la/_/bzhi las de bzhis chag res bstod/_/de nyid ma tang gzugs su bya/_/snying ga man chad dbus su bsnol/_/dkyil 
[\[94a.3\]]'khor chen po'i 'og tu gzhug_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i thig btab ste/_/dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya bya/_/khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod/_/sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi/_/yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas/_/
[\[94a.4\]]phyi khyams rdo rje me rir bya/_/de yi phyi rol phreng chen gtams/_/skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor/_/de yi phyi rol me bur 'tshub/_/bskal pa'i bu yug bri bar bya/_/rdo rje sgo khyud sgo khang du/_/gu gu thul dang za ra tshags/_/zhing dang sbrul gyi chun po bri/_/de nas 
[\[94a.5\]]ban+da dpal ldan la/_/rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag_/bris la kha sbyar sbub ste gzhag_/ga'u chung la ral pa can/_/brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag_/las byed brgyad dam bcu gnyis la/_/las byed bcu gnyis bris la 'god/_/thar pa gnas kyi 
[\[94a.6\]]dkyil 'khor du/_/gdol pa 'byung po nga rgyal can/_/chags sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu/_/de yi dug gsum bshig pa'i phyir/_/don gyi bsgrub pa chen po bshad/_/ru dra lnga yi tshogs chen te/_/ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom nas/_/rdo rje drod kyis 
[\[94a.7\]]rnam par sbyar/_/mdo yi sa la stabs gcig tu'o/_/bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po/_/dug lnga rtog pa nyid las skyes/_/phyed dang gsum gyi dur khrod na/_/gzhi rtsa ngag dang lus sems so/_/brjid ldan dpal chen dur khrod bdag_/bdag 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]rtog rtog 'joms ting 'dzin gyis/_/srid gsum ru dra dur khrod du/_/tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya/_/ma rig mun khang sgo phyed nas/_/glang chen smyon pa de bzung nas/_/gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag bcad/_/dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur 
[\[94b.2\]]dbyung /_/ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni/_/nyon mongs dpung rgod de btul nas/_/ye shes thabs kyis rnam sbyangs te/_/nam mkha'i klong du dmigs med par/_/bde chen mchod pa'i tshogs chen dag_/ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas/_/chos kyi 
[\[94b.3\]]longs spyod rgyas par sbyar/_/mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje yis/_/dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang /_/'khor ba'i dra ba gcad pa'i phyir/_/khro tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas/_/gtum thung rngam pa mgyogs pa'i tshogs/_/phyag brnyan char chen phab nas 
[\[94b.4\]]ni/_/'khor ba'i tha ba spangs nas ni/_/bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste/_/byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lo tog bskyed/_/dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni/_/mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting /_/rkang pa byang shar mtshams su 
[\[94b.5\]]bting /_/nga ni dur khrod dbang phyug che/_/sangs rgyas sku ste ye shes yin/_/thugs rje rnon po'i dmag tshogs la/_/ye shes rnon po'i mtshon cha yis/_/log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad do/_/gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi/_/dbyibs 'dra'i thab ni brtsigs 
[\[94b.6\]]nas kyang /_/snying gar 'khor lo'i thab tu bya/_/rigs kyi yam shing lnga brtsigs te/_/hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen brtsigs/_/thabs chen lnga yi hom khung du/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yam shing la/_/ye shes chen po'i me klong du/_/nyon mongs lnga 
[\[94b.7\]]yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs/_/bya bar sbyor ba mtha' dag kun/_/ji ltar 'byor cing 'tsham par 'os/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dregs pa can gnon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i don ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/'di yang de 'drar kun sbyar nas/_/
[\[95a.2\]]'khor khang can gyi gzhal yas su/_/khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la/_/bzhi ni 'khor khang khyams de dag_/phyogs bzhi dag tu brtsam par bya/_/dri zhim tsan+dan 'de gu btang /_/dri spos tshom bu rin chen phrog_/sbyin mchod rgyas par de bsham bya/_/lha yi 
[\[95a.3\]]dge bsnyen rnam pa bzhi/_/phyogs mtshams bsrung ba'i las rnams bsgo/_/khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mtshams su/_/chag phyed pa yi stegs bu bcu/_/bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bris la/_/sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi/_/mthun pa'i gzugs bcu 
[\[95a.4\]]dbang bskur te/_/khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams gcad/_/de nas ma traM gnon par bya/_/dregs pa ru dra sdig can 'di/_/nams kyang bsgral ba'i zhing yin te/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_ma hA shrI he ru ka ma traM ru dra ha ha phra be sha phaT/_kha T+wAM phyag rgyas bsgyel nas ni/_/
[\[95a.5\]]ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas/_/rnam shes a ru byin brlabs te/_/gsang chen thugs kyi klong du bstim/_/sbubs ni gzhal yas 'bar bar bya/_/stegs bu ma traM gzugs 'dra la/_/'gyel thabs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya/_/kha dog sngo skya gan rkyal 
[\[95a.6\]]thabs/_/che chung tshad med gnas kyis sbyar/_/de yi snying gar bang rim gsum/_/dang por dmar po gru bzhi brtsigs/_/gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya/_/gsum pa smug nag zla gam bya/_/yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug_/gsang sgo gnyis te 
[\[95a.7\]]brgyad dag la/_/stegs bu chag phyed gru bzhi brgyad/_/de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du/_/zla gam gsal ba'i maN+Dal bya/_/de dag me klong 'bar bar bskor/_/ya thog zla gam steng dag tu/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs/_/mthing nag gru 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gsum me dpung bri/_/gru bzhi'i dmar po bang rim la/_/rigs bzhi lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag_/yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon brgyad/_/dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad/_/bri bya yang na mtshan ma gzhag_/tshigs chen brgyad la yul bdag 
[\[95b.2\]]brgyad/_/ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o/_/sgo bzhir gsang ba sgom ra gzhag_/mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam la/_/bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhag_/ming ngam mtshan ma rten te gzhag_/de yi kha la thab tu brtsigs/_/pad+ma dpal be'u dbyings 'dra thab/_/mkhas 
[\[95b.3\]]pas yam shing brtsam par bya/_/bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun/_/gong du sbyor ba de ltar sbyor/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[95b.4\]]de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des dug gsum thugs su dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/dug gsum dbang du bsgyur ba yang /_/'di ltar khong du chud par bya/_/dug gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/sku gsum nyid 
[\[95b.5\]]kyi ngo bo ste/_/gzhan nas btsal ba ci yang med/_/de ltar shes par 'gyur ba dang /_/kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur/_/thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la/_/stegs bu 'dom gang pa zhig la/_/phyir dmar po rgyas par bya/_/de nas mthing nag gru gsum 
[\[95b.6\]]brtsigs/_/de nas dmar nag zla gam bya/_/zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar/_/dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'/_/bang rim bar la dur khrod 'bar/_/tha mar dmar po gru bzhi la/_/sgo bzhi sgo srung bcas par bya/_/de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor/_/khro bcu 
[\[95b.7\]]'bar ba'i rtags rnams dgod/_/bsgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur rnams/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyin par bya/_/des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin/_/dug gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]mdo las dug gsum dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen 
[\[96a.2\]]po'i tshogs chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te/_/chags pa khrag gi rgya mtsho yin/_/las kyis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/_/chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying /_/chags las rnam 
[\[96a.3\]]grol 'gog pa ste/_/chags pa de nyid khrag ces bya/_/khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/_/bud med khrag gi rgya mtsho rnams/_/'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho bsgyur/_/de ltar shes par gyur pa dang /_/kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar sbyar/_/las kyi brtsams pa phun sum 
[\[96a.4\]]tshogs/_/rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang /_/maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/'khor lo bzhi yi thig tu gdab/_/mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi/_/de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya/_/kun gyi phyi rim lag chu hwa'i/_/me ri 'bar bas gtib thag gcad/_/dbus 
[\[96a.5\]]su shar lta zla gam bri/_/b+han d+ha dpal ldan yab yum dgod/_/'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan/_/bar khyams gnyis la gnas yul rnams/_/zla gam thig ler ldan par bya/_/sgo khyams sgo bzhi zla gam bcas/_/phyi khyams lag chu hwa yi me/_/me yi khro bo 
[\[96a.6\]]thig ler bcas/_/dur khrod rgyan gyis kun brgyan bya/_/ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos bsgrub dad/_/'jug pa dbang bskur dngos grub rnams/_/gnas bsrung la sogs rdzogs par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig 
[\[96a.7\]]pa'i mdo las 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni 'tsho ba chos nyid kyi rtsi yin/_/ma rtogs na ni 'chi ba 'khor ba'i dug yin/_/de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/de ltar shes nas kun rdzob tu 'di ltar bsgrub 
[\[96b.2\]]par bya'o/_/ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas/_/ma traM khog pa'i snying ga ru/_/'dom gang tshad dang mthun pa la/_/rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i 'khor lor gdab/_/me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yi/_/mtha' ma sgo khyud 'bar bar bya/_/
[\[96b.3\]]dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bya/_/der ni phyag rgya 'bar ba dgod/_/lang ka bsgral ba'i gnas mchog 'dir/_/ral pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te/_/rak+Sha 'joms pa'i mthu chen kun/_/srid pa gsum ril 'dir sgrol ba'o/_/dus bzhi mchod pa'i dam rdzas kyis/_/de 
[\[96b.4\]]dag ji ltar rigs par mchod/_/dus bzhi bcud smin snying po yis/_/dngos grub chen po'i rdzas su bya/_/phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams/_/rmad du byung ba'i ral pa can/_/'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur mdzad/_/'byung ba lnga yi cho 'phrul sgrub/_/dbyar chu 
[\[96b.5\]]ston me dgun sa ste/_/dpyid rlung nam mkha' gsang bar sbyar/_/cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas/_/de dag ral pa can du bsgrub/_/ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga gsal bas/_/'byung lnga las byung sha rigs lnga/_/khyi sha ba lang rta sha dang /_/bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sna tshogs ni/_/rdzu 
[\[96b.6\]]'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rdzas/_/sgrub pa'i rdzas chen 'byung chen lnga/_/'jig rten kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang /_/ting 'dzin bsgom dang bsgrub pa dang /_/thams cad gong dang mthun sbyar nas/_/'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams/_/
[\[96b.7\]]ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po ni/_/gong 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas/_/maN+Da la tshad dang mthun pa la/_/pad+ma dmar po 'od kyi mkha'/_/phyi rim zla gam dmar po bzhi/_/rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes par bskor/_/me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/_/zla gam mtha' zad bri bar bya/_/rin chen ge 
[\[97a.2\]]sar phreng bas ni/_/pad+ma'i lce la bskor bar bya/_/sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar bas bya/_/phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na/_/dbus su gser phor sul med la/_/dung chen 'khor ba can gyis sbyar/_/shar du shel phor sul 'greng la/_/rin chen mdzod spu gsal bas 
[\[97a.3\]]sbyar/_/lho ru rin chen sul mang la/_/rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar/_/nub tu rgya phor zla gam la/_/bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur gnyis sbyar/_/byang du bse phor rgya gram la/_/gtsug tor rin chen 'bur bzhi rgyas/_/rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyar/_/
[\[97a.4\]]sgo lnga'i gtso bo rigs su sbyar/_/dbus nas shar lho nub byang du/_/ka ko la dang du ru ska/_/dza ti pha la kha dri zhim/_/lce bog dkar zhes rim par sbyar/_/de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhin/_/a ru ra dang ga pur dang /_/gur gum pad+ma li ga dur/_/de na rA sa yA na 
[\[97a.5\]]rnams/_/thams cad rigs dang kha dog dang /_/las dang mthun par sbyar bar bya/_/sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i snod nang du/_/yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya/_/dbus dang pad+ma lce la dgod/_/gnas yul la sogs mdzes par 
[\[97a.6\]]gzhag_/dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis rdzas/_/'byor ba'i yo byad thams cad bshams/_/de nas byin phab dngos grub gsol/_/thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya/_/dam pa de nyid gsang chen gyi/_/rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis/_/thams cad sbyang 
[\[97a.7\]]ba'i mchog tu bya/_/de nas khrol bu sbyang ba na/_/bsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye ba dang /_/khrus bya ba dang bshags pa deng /_/yon tan brjod dang byin dbab bya/_/de nas skad cig thang cig gam/_/zhag gcig dag gis sbyar bar bya/_/rtags dag byung na der 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'byongs pa'o/_/phye ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni/_/snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas/_/bsdus te btags pa'i cho ga yang /_/yum gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btags/_/rig 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing drang /_/so so las kyi sngags brjod cing /_/gtan gtun thabs 
[\[97b.2\]]dang shes rab ste/_/sman nyid byang chub sems su sbyar/_/rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blang /_/kun du bzang mo'i gzhal yas su/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las/_/'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar/_/ye shes lnga ru gsal ba las/_/'bras bu sku gsum thugs su 
[\[97b.3\]]rdzogs/_/'chi med bdud rtsis gcong rnying sbyang /_/mtshan ma brtag phyir bcal nas ni/_/rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs/_/kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis dkri/_/rdo rje dbang gi rgya yis gdab/_/rdo rje sngags kyi gzungs kyis gdags/_/dpal chen sku lngar 
[\[97b.4\]]mnga' gsol te/_/ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya/_/maN+Dal dag tu dgod par bya/_/kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab/_/rtsi dang sman gyi bdag po dang /_/rtags ldan rig 'dzin phra mo dag_/rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten/_/bsgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams 
[\[97b.5\]]pas dgang /_/bkra shis gos kyis rgyas par bklubs/_/gzungs thag gnyer can rigs su dbul/_/ting 'dzin me yis rnam par sbyang /_/rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang /_/smyur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/_/bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas ni/_/dpal ldan pad+ma ldan 
[\[97b.6\]]pa ru/_/thams cad bdud rtsir sa ma ya/_/mkha' klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs/_/rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/gzhan nas bsgrub ba ci yang med/_/'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang /_/tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[97b.7\]]bdud rtsi phye ma'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/thams cad de 'drar sbyar nas kyang /_/maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/_/phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]sman sbyang btags btsags bcal nas kyang /_/sbrang chang 'o mas gong bur bya/_/bse phor mtshan ldan nang du gzhag_/legs par kha sbyar ras kyis dkri/_/gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas/_/dngos grub mchog rnams bdag gis bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[98a.2\]]ri lu'i cho ga rnam par bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/skyo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste/_/thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/_/mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang /_/phye ma chu tshags nang nas dbyung /_/phye ma'i mchog 
[\[98a.3\]]tu gyur pa dang /_/phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni/_/bse phor kha sbyar nang du blugs/_/rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/_/bzlas brjod 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad/_/sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram chang /_/rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa/_/bcud kyi khu ba thams cad sbyar/_/rin 
[\[98a.4\]]chen ga'u mtshan ldan du/_/blugs te kha sbyar rgyas btab nas/_/'phro 'du bzlas brjod gong ma bzhin/_/byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang /_/dngos grub chen po blang bar bya/_/phye ma'i bsgrub rdzas de dag ni/_/cha lnga dag tu bgos nas kyang /_/rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams 
[\[98a.5\]]las/_/ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang /_/sbyar chang cha lngar bgos pa las/_/rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las/_/sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya/_/zla ba gcig tu zos pas ni/_/ba spu rangs shing gnyer ma rangs/_/zla ba gnyis su zos byas na/_/gzi mdangs thams 
[\[98a.6\]]cad 'bar bar 'gyur/_/zla ba gsum gyi phan yon gyis/_/nad kyi bskal pa dag las thar/_/zla bzhi phan chad gang zag gis/_/zas dang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na/_/gzhan gyi nad rnams 'joms par nus/_/drug dang bdun dang brgyad rnams la/_/bdud rtsi bcud 
[\[98a.7\]]kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/dgu dang bcu la zag pa zad/_/bcu gcig rig 'dzin nam mkhar 'phur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi skyo ma'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zas/_/lde gu'i cho ga chen po ni/_/'di ltar khong du chud par bya/_/sbrang rtsi bu ram rgun 'brum rnams/_/lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang /_/kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba/_/lo yi 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel/_/sman 
[\[98b.2\]]gyi rgyal po ram nye bas/_/rgyun du gsos pa'i 'o ma de/_/rig 'dzin zas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi rgyal mo ram nye ba/_/phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang /_/lo yi 'tsho ba'i sbyar byas te/_/sus mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/bsgrub rdzas de dag bkram 
[\[98b.3\]]nas kyang /_/bdud rtsi bsgrub pa de bzhin bya/_/dus bab pa yi tshod rnams la/_/bsgrub rdzas de dag thams cad kyang /_/ba yi 'o mas lde gur bya/_/cha res bskyed cing bza' bar bya/_/zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro/_/
[\[98b.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi lde gu'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/'di yang gong ma ltar byas te/_/de dang mi mthun bsgrub rdzas rnams/_/bdud rtsir 
[\[98b.5\]]'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun/_/thams cad thams cad bsdu bar bya/_/til chen la sogs zhun gyi mchog_/thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas/_/gnas kyang gong ma bzhin btsal te/_/bdud rtsi bkram nas bsgrub par bya/_/'phro 'du bzlas brjod 
[\[98b.6\]]rgyun mi gcad/_/grub pa'i rdzas su gyur pa dang /_/sman rnams phye mar btag par bya/_/de dag phye mar gyur pa dang /_/zhun chen dag dang sbyar bar bya/_/sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang /_/dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya/_/gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang /_/lo 
[\[98b.7\]]yis bshugs te 'phrad mi bya/_/'tsho ba bdud rtsi zhun gyis sbyar/_/bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags chen ni/_/ba spu langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar/_/kham gyi zas bral bde bar 'tsho/_/shes rab gsal zhing thogs pa med/_/zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]zhes gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi zhun chen gyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o/_/de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na/_/thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/_/
[\[99a.2\]]maN+Dal thig la lnga pa la/_/bkra shis dpal ldan lnga bzhag nas/_/gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/_/rlon par bkod nas yi ges sbyang /_/ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me sbar bas/_/dang po ro 'byung skams pa dang /_/de nas btag btsag gong ma bzhin/_/sbyar 
[\[99a.3\]]nas rigs kyi bsnyen pas sbyang /_/des ni mtshan ma byung ba dang /_/de bzhin gong ltar ci bder spyad/_/ces gsungs so/_/bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/_bdud rtsi 
[\[99a.4\]]sman gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des/_sgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad do/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni dbyings su shes par 
[\[99a.5\]]bya ste/_'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni dbyings su 'dus la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni ye shes su 'dus so/_/de gnyis su med pa ni chos nyid byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig_/de bas na chos thams cad 
[\[99a.6\]]ni thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te gnyis su med do/_/de ltar na kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste gnyis su med pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun/_/thams cad rang gi sems la 
[\[99a.7\]]rdzogs/_/kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa/_/lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad/_/des na chos 'di thams cad kyang /_/rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste/_/'di dag bsgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i rdul bsal nas/_/bsgrub pa'i rgyal 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]po yab yum gnyis/_/don la mkhas par byas nas ni/_/so so'i thugs la thig le dag_/zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya/_/de yi rdzas mchog chen po yang /_/thabs kyi ga pur chen po dang /_/shes rab gsang ba'i tsan+dan gnyis/_/dkar dmar zla gam 
[\[99b.2\]]chen por bya/_/yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la/_/thig le kha ni mar lta ba'o/_/yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la/_/thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o/_/yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni/_/dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri/_/dbus su oM gsal nang du hU~M/_/yum gyi thig 
[\[99b.3\]]le'i dbus su ni/_/pad+ma dbus su zla ba bri/_/dbus su a gsal nang du hU~M/_/de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na/_/kun du bzang po yab yum du/_/gnyis su med par bsgyur bar bya/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/rang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis/_/gsang 
[\[99b.4\]]ba gnyis kyi mchod pa bya/_/rang las byung ba'i dngos grub dag_/rang nyid sa ni bstim par bya/_/'di ltar sgrub pa gtsor byed na/_/bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang /_/bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams/_/lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang /_/bsnyen sgrub yan 
[\[99b.5\]]lag rnam bzhi las/_/bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni/_/gang zag mi yi zas la brten/_/de yang lo yi skad cig gam/_/gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar/_/lo yi skad cig bar du ni/_/bdud rtsi yo byad rnams la brten/_/de nas lo yi skad cig ni/_/gcig 
[\[99b.6\]]gam gnyis kyi bar dag tu/_/rang las byung ba'i rdzas rnam lngas/_/'phags pa mchod cing rang gis bza'/_/des ni drod la gnas par 'gyur/_/drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni/_/lo yi skad cig thang cig gis/_/ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas/_/kham gyi zas dang 
[\[99b.7\]]bral bar 'gyur/_/drod chen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni/_/rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni/_/rin chen phung po 'dod pa na/_/sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub/_/chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na/_/brtsams pas mi 'bying thogs med 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'gro/_/me yi phung po 'jil 'dod na/_/sdigs pa'i mdzub mo phyar nas kyang /_/bden pa'i bsgo ba byas pas 'grub/_/de la sogs pa thams cad nus/_/rtags thob phan chad sangs rgyas yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa 
[\[100a.2\]]bshad pa'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las bka' gsang 'khor lo'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de rdo rje me klong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[100a.3\]]so/_/de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas 'khor rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa/_/e ma'o sems dpa' che ba che/_/ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che/_/cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che/_/thabs mchog khyod 
[\[100a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kun me klong bzhin du snang /_/me nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong /_/'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pas ni/_/mun bsal dngos po thams cad bsregs/_/bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags/_/
[\[100a.5\]]thugs rje chen po a la la/_/don grub chen po a la la/_/sgeg pa chen po a la la/_/'jigs byed chen po a la la/_/dgyes pa chen po a la la/_/dregs pa chen po a la la/_/dpa' bo khyod kyi byin brlabs kyis/_/bdag cag rnams la bshad 
[\[100a.6\]]pa shod/_/me yi rang bzhin chen po dag_/bdag cag rnams la bshad par gsol/_/zhes gsol ba btab pa las/_/sems dpa'i rdo rjes dgyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag_/bshad kyis 
[\[100a.7\]]khyed rnams gus par nyon/_/rdo rje me yi las mchog 'dis/_/rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas/_/rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsreg skongs/_/don grub las kyi mchog tu bshad/_/skye med rnam dag hom khung du/_/chos can skye ba'i yam shing la/_/spros med byang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]chub ye shes mes/_/mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/_/rnam dag b+ha ga'i hom khung du/_/chags pa'i yam shing spungs pa la/_/bde chen byang chub me sbar te/_/'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/_/dpal chen zhal gyi hom khung du/_/nyon mongs lnga yi 
[\[100b.2\]]yam shing la/_/ye shes lnga yi me sbar te/_/gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs thim/_/snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du/_/'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi me sbar te/_/snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/_/las bzhi so so'i 
[\[100b.3\]]khyad par gyis/_/phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas/_/ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar/_/shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar/_/mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar/_/zlum po pad+ma le'u tse zhi/_/'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas/_/zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang /_/
[\[100b.4\]]gru gsum b+ha ga kha mngon sbyor/_/sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes/_/las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas/_/ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan/_/bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar/_/dag pa'i mtha' 'dzin nyes mchog 'dzin/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro 
[\[100b.5\]]gar/_/mchod pa gsang ba dus tshigs sbyor/_/rdo rje lam gyi smon lam sbyar/_/gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas/_/bshar gdab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang /_/rgyas dang dbang bshar rgyud bshar bas/_/lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/de bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya/_/
[\[100b.6\]]rigs kyi lha rgyud lnga rnams ni/_/so so'i rigs su bshar btab ste/_/klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du/_/dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/_/sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os/_/bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin te/_/skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad/_/
[\[100b.7\]]'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang ste/_/chos can rkyen dang 'byung nas dang /_/rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni/_/skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin/_/'di ni skye ba'i chos can te/_/rang byung sreg rdzas rang zhir thim/_/nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas dag_/ye shes lnga yi klong du 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dbul/_/lung bo lnga yi dam rdzas rnams/_/thabs mchog yab lnga'i sku la bstim/_/'byung lngas bsdus pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams/_/shes rab yum lnga'i klong du bstabs/_/rnam shes brgyad kyi bsreg rdzas rnams/_/ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad do/_/
[\[101a.2\]]yul gyi g.yeng ba rnam pa brgyad/_/dmigs med dbyings kyi bye brag brgyad/_/skye bzhi las kyi bsreg rdzas rnams/_/rnam thar sgo bzhi'i klong du thim/_/thabs mchog la sogs rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/so so'i yon tan thams cad dag_/rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang /_/de 
[\[101a.3\]]dag mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam/_/mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /_/sgrib byang ma byang don chen rnams/_/grub dang ma grub don rnams ni/_/me la mkhas pas brtag par bya/_/me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis/_/'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnam drug_/de dag yongs 
[\[101a.4\]]su shes par bya/_/gal te mtshan ma mi sdug na/_/bkra mi shis pa'i rtags yin pas/_/bsreg sbyang chen po rgyas par bya/_/de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byung na/_/me la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams/_/rnam gsum gang ltar grub pa blang /_/ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyangs nas/_/ro 
[\[101a.5\]]la sngags kyis btab nas kyang /_/shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/_/ro la byug cing bkru bar bya/_/bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis/_/ras la byugs pas ro dkris te/_/ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas/_/phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab 
[\[101a.6\]]par bya/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni/_/gzhung yin pa yi phyag rgya rnams/_/du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa yi/_/sdong bu'i grangs kyang de ltar bya/_/sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi/_/ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag_/ras chen dag la bris te gdags/_/ro yi sbyor ba 
[\[101a.7\]]rdzogs pa dang /_/ro yi phyi shun thams cad la/_/'khor ba'i bag chags kun bkod de/_/ras sam shing shun shog shog la/_/'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod/_/nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas/_/skye ba'i lam la rgyud drug rnams/_/ming ngam 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]gzugs su byas nas ni/_/gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya/_/khams dang skye mched phung po lnga/_/gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams/_/brda yi tshul du bris nas ni/_/ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya/_/de nas ro yi phung po de/_/rten nam glegs sam stegs bu yi/_/
[\[101b.2\]]steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya/_/thab kyi cho ga brtsam pa ni/_/maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la/_/dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa'i/_/phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag_/thig gis yul gcad so sor bya/_/de yi steng du shing brtsigs pa/_/dbyibs 
[\[101b.3\]]ni gru bzhi gtams pa la/_/zur bzhi ka ba bzhis brtan bya/_/sum brtsegs yang thog bar khang bcas/_/mtha' ma shing gis brdzang bar bya/_/bar khang dag gi glegs ma la/_/ro yi bzhin phyogs shar du bstan/_/ro yi steng gi khang pa la/_/ras sam shog 
[\[101b.4\]]shog la bris pa'i/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/_/ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la/_/thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas/_/phyogs bzhi bla ma bzhi la dbul/_/shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang /_/shing gi phyi mtha' stegs bu la/_/phyag 
[\[101b.5\]]rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod/_/stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_/rdo rje las kyi skos gdab pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la/_/'khor ba bsreg pa'i mnga' gsol te/_/ting 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas/_/me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/_/rdo rje las kyi karma la/_/
[\[101b.6\]]las rnams rdzogs pa'i mnga' gsol te/_/las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya/_/rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig_/ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas/_/las kyi bsags pa bgrang zhing bshags/_/rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis/_/bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng /_/rdo rje 
[\[101b.7\]]bro gar glu tshig gis/_/skabs kyi glu gar mchod pa dag_/rol mos drangs te dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni/_/skabs dang las kyi mjug tu gdab/_/rdo rje las kyi ltang 'dzin pas/_/rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste/_/dkar byang bla ma'i phyag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]tu dbul/_/ro yi las ngan ltang 'dzin pas/_/grangs med grangs su bzung nas ni/_/mtshan ma nag po'i byang bu dag_/ye shes me yi klong du bsreg_/me yis sbyor ba'i cho ga bya/_/me yi lha ni gang yin pa/_/me yi sangs rgyas snang mtha' yas/_/me yi lha mo gos 
[\[102a.2\]]dkar ma/_/rgyal ba kun gyi 'od mchog ste/_/'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing /_/thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin/_/srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches/_/'khor ba'i sreg pa'i phrin las la/_/thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'/_/me yi cho ga thams cad ni/_/yum chen 
[\[102a.3\]]dkar mo nyid la bsgo/_/de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas/_/ro yi sgrib pa byang ma byang /_/me yi dngos grub thob mi thob/_/me las mkhas pas gong bzhin brtag_/mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na/_/bsreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya/_/gal te mgu na dngos grub thob/_/ro yi thal ba chen po la/_/btags 
[\[102a.4\]]nas thal ba'i bdud rtsir bsgrub/_/des ni bsod nams chen po ni/_/dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje me'i cho ga bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa 
[\[102a.5\]]des dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so/_/sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka badzra tsaN+Da/_sarba duSh+TAM sa~M shrI haM ru kAM ta ka ha na ba tsa hU~M hU~M/_sa sa sa sa sa ma ya sa nu ne/_sa no rba ra/_badzra gar+b+ha/_rat+na gar+b+ha/_pad+ma gar+b+ha/_karma gar+b+ha/_mai tri gar+b+ha/_
[\[102a.6\]]kA ru Na gar+b+ha/_lo ka gar+b+ha/_bi du ma gar+b+ha/_yak+Sha/_rA k+Sha sa/_bi shwa/_te shwa/_ke shwa/_ba shwa/_bi shwa/_tra k+sh+wa/_hri shwa/_ka shwa/_pak+sha/_ru ti/_rak+ti/_khA hi/_sa ha/_sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/_sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/_sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/_sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/_rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/_rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/_
[\[102a.7\]]rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/_rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/_thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/_thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/_thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/_ga ga ga ga ga ga ga/_ga ga ga ga ga ga ga/_ga ga ga ga ga ga ga/_ga ga ga ga ga ga ga/_ta ta ta 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/_ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/_ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/_ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/_ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/_shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/_shrI shrI shrI shrI 
[\[102b.2\]]shrI shrI shrI/_shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/_shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/_he he he he he he he/_he he he he he he he/_he he he he he he he/_he he he he he he he/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/_ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/_ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/_ka ka ka ka ka ka ka/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_
[\[102b.3\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/_shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/_shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/_shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/_ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/_kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/_kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/_kha 
[\[102b.4\]]kha kha kha kha kha kha/_kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/_mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/_mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/_mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/_mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/_ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_gau rI/_tsau rI/_bra mo hA/_be tA lI/_g+ha sma rI/_puk+ka sI/_sma shA nI/_tsaN+Da lI/_ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/_sid+ha/_byA g+h+r-i/_
[\[102b.5\]]sriM ga la/_shwa na/_kr-iD+ha/_kAng+ka/_kha ga_/U lu/_mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/_kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/_he he he he he he he he/_ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra/_phaT phaT phaT phaT/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_Ar+ya te tsa te da dzaH/_pA sha~M hU~M/_lo ka ba~M/_b+hasmi ya ti hoH/_ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_dzra 
[\[102b.6\]]dzra dzra dzra dzra/_kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/_d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_maN maN maN maN maN/_Da Da Da Da Da/_la la la la la/_e gar+b+ha/_ya~M karma/_ra rak+ta/_ba~M snig+b+ha/_ra~M dz+wa la/_ke~M ru d+hiH/_b+h+rU~M dz+nyA na/_pa~M bad+d+ha/_ha ka pA la/_dz+nyA na par ra~M/_bud+d+ha kA ya/_ma hA wa ka/_badzra 
[\[102b.7\]]tsit+ta/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_e h+ye hi/_ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo dzaHdzaH_badzra sa ma ya mu dra hU~M AH_badzra shrI he ru ka/_tiSh+Tha sa ma ya lhan/_ma hA shrI he ru ka ha ha ha ma/_sa ma ya hoHphaT/_badzra Ar li phaT/_a ti pu hoH/_pra ti pu hoH/_i d+ha~M puSh+pa d+hu pa/_ba li/_ti dza hoH/_kha ra~M kha hi/_ma ha rak+ta/_ru d+hi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]snig+d+ha/_pany+tsa a mr-i ta/_tsit+ta/_bA su ta/_go ro tsa na/_DA ki nA/_yo gi ni/_ma hA tsit+ta/_kha ra~M khA hi/_kha kha le/_sha ta pa khA hi/_a la la ho/_sa ma ya hoH_i da na de nA ra kA na/_u tsi ra sa ma ya phaT/_badzra sa ma ya a be sha AHAH/_zhes gsungs pas las kyi 'bar 
[\[103a.2\]]ba'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje gsang sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u 'di rgya cher gsungs so/_/
[\[103a.3\]]rnal 'byor mchog gi lag gnyis la/_/nyi zla 'bar ba'i ling+gar ni/_/a dang pad+ma gnyis gsal te/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyar/_/mnyam pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa la/_/me yi steng du a nyid gzhag_/bya ba thams cad bral ba'i rgya/_/a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams/_/
[\[103a.4\]]'phro 'du bya zhing kun du bsgyur/_/g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yon du 'khyud/_/'di ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgya/_/a dang ma yi 'bru rnams bcu/_/so sor bcangs te myu gur bya/_/shin tu bstod de kun du bsgyur/_/'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgyu/_/ma yis sbyin pa gtong tshul la/_/a 
[\[103a.5\]]yis thams cad skyob byed pa/_/'di ni tshad med chen po'o/_/kun la snyoms pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/ma nyid khrag 'phrog pa yi snod/_/a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyar/_/'di ni thams cad rol pa yi/_/'jigs tshul ston pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/a dang ma gnyis gting sbyar te/_/so phreng mche 
[\[103a.6\]]ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/shin tu kha glal ba yi tshul/_/'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgya/_/ma yis bzung ste 'then nas ni/_/a yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa/_/'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/_/ma dang a yis mgo mjug nas/_/bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni/_/kha 
[\[103a.7\]]yis 'drang cing 'then byed pa/_/za byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/_/a dang ma yi shes rab las/_/g.yas g.yon tshul gyis bsgyur byas te/_/so so ji ltar yin thabs sbyar/_/gnas dang yul gyi gtan tshigs su/_/bsgyur ba gar gyi phyag rgyar bshad/_/dba' bo gdan 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]la bzhengs nas ni/_/phyogs mtshams kun du bltas byas nas/_/shin tu 'gying zhing brjid par byed/_/a dang ma yi 'bru rnams ni/_/so sor brdabs nas dkur brten bya/_/'gying ba'i tshul gyis spyad byas nas/_/stag gi stabs kyis kun du bskor/_/de nas rmun bya stabs kyis 
[\[103b.2\]]ni/_/gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya/_/de bzhin rus sbal gzig dang stag_/spyang ki seng ge dom stabs dang /_/phag chen dred kyi stabs kyis ni/_/thams cad thams cad bskor bar bya/_/de bzhin 'dab chags thams cad kyis/_/'jo tshul stabs rnams rdzogs byas nas/_/
[\[103b.3\]]dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/hU~M 
[\[103b.4\]]'byung ba chen po nam mkha' ni/_/'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod/_/nam mkha' las ni 'dod pa 'byung /_/'dod pa'i mchod pa 'byung gyur cig_/zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog_/maM sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas/_/me tog la sogs tsan+dan phreng /_/sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur 
[\[103b.5\]]cig_/mi mo rnams kyi reg bya mchog_/'khril 'khyud sgyur ba'i gzungs chen ma/_/dbang po sbyor ba'i dgyes mchod de/_/bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig_/rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchog 'di/_/mchod sprin kun du rgyas gyur cig_/dug gsum brtsigs pa'i ri bo 'di/_/sku 
[\[103b.6\]]gsung thugs kyi klong du bstabs/_/dug lnga rol pa'i tshogs mchog 'di/_/ye shes lnga yi nang du thim/_/gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di/_/dbyings dang ye shes klong du thim/_/'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'di/_/chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim/_/phung po tshogs kyi yan 
[\[103b.7\]]lag 'di/_/rnam grol phung po lnga ru thim/_/'byung chen rgyu yi mtshan ma 'di/_/mkha' klong 'bar ba lnga ru thim/_/rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol/_/bla med stan 'gan mchod pa 'di/_/sngon chad rgyal bas bgrod pa'i lam/_/dug gsum gting 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]nas gsod pa'i thabs/_/sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du bzhes/_/'chi med bdud rtsi g.yung drung chu/_/ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed/_/dug gi phung po 'joms byed pa/_/rtsi mchog sman gyi mchod par bzhes/_/zhes mchod pa'i tshogs rnams ling long phyad par byung 
[\[104a.2\]]bas rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs longs spyod des mnyes par gyur to/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje glu'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/'dir ni rdo rje rnal 
[\[104a.3\]]'byor rnams/_/bsnyen par snang ba'i dbang thob nas/_/bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad spro/_/yi ge glu yi rgyan yin te/_/glu yi yi ge bcu drug las/_/yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas/_/glu yi bye brag bsam mi khyab/_/dang por glu yi don byung ba/_/oM gyis glu rnams rab tu 
[\[104a.4\]]'dren/_/o~M yang a yi cho 'phrul te/_/a ni chos kyi yi ge yin/_/a las o~M byung rgyal ba'i thugs/_/rgyal ba chos kyi dbyings las byung /_/a las aM byung gsung gi mchog_/gsung las glu yi yan lag 'byung /_/dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cur grags/_/glu yi yon tan 
[\[104a.5\]]bsam mi khyab/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba glu yis grub/_/rig 'dzin rdo rje glu yis 'dren/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug glu yis 'grub/_/bstan pa rgya mtsho glu yis spel/_/srid pa'i bu mo glu yis bsten/_/bdud dang srin po glu yis 'dul/_/dngos grub rgya mtsho glu yis 'bebs/_/chos nyid 
[\[104a.6\]]dbyings kyi klong dkyil nas/_/dpal be'u nyi ma dgu shar bas/_/rnam thar sgo bzhi rab gsal yang /_/ma rig mun gnag 'thibs pa yis/_/bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo bye/_/'khor ba'i mun gnag klong rum na/_/byang chub sems kyi zla shar bas/_/mun bsal rnam thar 
[\[104a.7\]]sgo bzhir snang /_/rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams/_/dpal chen thugs nas 'od shar bas/_/bag chags sprin mthong bye ba ru/_/rnal 'byor thugs kar zer bab pas/_/mun bsal rig pa'i sgo phye ste/_/rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya/_/rig pa thugs kyi dkyil 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'khor nas/_/ru lu'i 'od zer sgo phye bas/_/spros pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung /_/srid pa gsum gyi bye brag byed/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems/_/nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgrol/_/dug gsum rtsa ba rtsad nas gcod/_/bdud dang srin po gdug pa 'dul/_/
[\[104b.2\]]byin brlabs dngos grub char ltar 'bebs/_/ji ltar dbang po'i sgo phye nas/_/'dzum mdangs gsal bar 'byung ba ltar/_/dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo phye bas/_/ru lu'i 'od zer yig 'bru shar/_/mthing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang /_/smug nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru rnams/_/
[\[104b.3\]]yi ge rigs kyi phreng par drang /_/rgyangs kyis bskul dang dkar gyis dbab/_/bsten kos nye bar gyur pa la/_/'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya/_/'bir kwas gnyis su med pa la/_/'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba drang /_/de nyid la ni glu drug ste/_/sha ta pa dang gar ta ba/_/cang 
[\[104b.4\]]ka de'u dang bang ka de'u/_/breng nge ba dang dung nge ba/_/glu yi yan lag sum brgyas ni/_/rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/glu yi rgyal po 'di drug gis/_/don drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/sha ta pa yi glu blangs pas/_/gdug byed thams cad spa yang kong /_/
[\[104b.5\]]gar ta pa yi glu blangs pas/_/gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog_/cang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod/_/bang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas/_/drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur/_/breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas/_/sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[104b.6\]]thams cad 'gyed/_/dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas/_/srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud/_/yi ge 'bru dgu'i rang bzhin la/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs/_/de bzhin 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/_/khyams dang sgo khyud gsal ba'o/_/srid pa mthong yod 
[\[104b.7\]]snang grags kyang /_/thams cad sngags kyi tshig tu rdzogs/_/yi ge rgyal ba kun dang 'brel/_/'khor lo'i sa la nye ba'o/_/yi ges dmigs pa thams cad 'grub/_/chags med lhun grub don po che/_/rnam bzhi las kyi khyad par yang /_/bya ba 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]med par don du 'gyur/_/yi ge gsang ba'i 'phro 'du yis/_/rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad mnyes/_/de kun yi ges rnam sprul yang /_/rang bzhin dngos med chos kyi dbyings/_/yig 'bru 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul las/_/dam pa'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs 'byung /_/
[\[105a.2\]]de bzhin sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg_/gti mug mun sel ye shes 'bar/_/rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'bebs/_/bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs/_/tsit+ta dpal be'u zur brgyad 'bar/_/rin chen yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal/_/dpal chen rin chen 'bar 
[\[105a.3\]]ba'i thugs/_/dpal be'u smug po zur brgyad las/_/gser gyi nyi ma dgu shar ba/_/'od zer ru lu yig 'bru brgyad/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i rlung sgrom du/_/shin tu 'bar 'phro 'khrug byas te/_/spros pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/_/na sa g.yas su drang bar bya/_/go 
[\[105a.4\]]ro tsa na'i gzhal yas su/_/sen zlum tsam gyi rgya khyon la/_/gser gyi nyi ma ga'u dgu/_/shar ba'i dkyil na yig 'bru dgu/_/gsal bas 'od kyi gzhal yas khang /_/dngos po'i bag chags kun bsregs te/_/sems ni gser chu zhun ma bzhin/_/ltem la 
[\[105a.5\]]'tsher zhing 'od 'bar ba/_/rtsal las gyur pa'i zla dkyil 'khor/_/nyi ma'i steng na dpal be'u 'bar/_/de la ru lu 'phro zhing 'du/_/dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/yig 'bru 'bar ba'i ga'ur gsal/_/pad+ma 'bar ba'i ga'u 'di/_/yi ge phreng ba 'khyil 
[\[105a.6\]]ba'i gnas/_/dper na me tog 'bar ba las/_/bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te/_/rtsi yi bur bu sog pa ltar/_/dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/rin chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar/_/ru lu'i yig 'bru bcud kyis rgyas/_/rnal 'byor sems las byas pa 
[\[105a.7\]]yi/_/bcud 'byin bung ba mang po 'phro/_/phar lding yi ge'i bcud phyung nas/_/tshur lding sems kyi ga'ur bstim/_/dang po shel gyi kha dog la/_/shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher 'bar ba/_/gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi/_/thig le dkyil gyi dpal be'u la/_/'bru bkod gsal 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]bar gyur pa dang /_/shel gyi bung ba mang po dag_/khyung chen lding ba'i bong tshod tsam/_/phar lding bcud phyung tshur gsibs pas/_/yig 'bru ye shes me 'bar bas/_/bag chags bud shing phung po bsregs/_/phar spros thugs rjes sa la bskul/_/ji ltar nyi zer tsha tsha 
[\[105b.2\]]ltar/_/rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig 'bar/_/bar du byi ru'i kha dog la/_/gong ma bzhin du bkod gsal la/_/byi ru bung ba mang po dang /_/gong ma bzhin du 'phur lding bas/_/bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro/_/ji ltar me mgal 'khor tshul du/_/dpal be'u smug 
[\[105b.3\]]po'i klong du bstim/_/kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni/_/bkod pa'i gong ma thams cad kun/_/mthing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni/_/khyung chen gzan la 'jums tshod tsam/_/hUM sgra 'byin cing phan tshun lding /_/ru lu bcud 'byin dngos grub rlob/_/dran pa'i dkyil nas dza phyung ste/_/
[\[105b.4\]]lcags kyu 'bar ba ga'ur bcas/_/dpal be'u'i dkyil na spungs pa yis/_/ru lu rin chen phung po dag_/bsdus shing drangs te gnas su bstim/_/'bab pa'i shugs sam byin brlabs ni/_/mtsho la ser chen 'dril ltar ro/_/'di ltar yi ger sbyar ba'i tshe/_/
[\[105b.5\]]rnal 'byor nyag gcig ma yin gyi/_/lha mchog dbyings na bzhugs pa yang /_/chos nyid dang du mi dmigs kyang /_/rnal 'byor mchog gi bskul ba'i tshe/_/thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas/_/srog rtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar/_/mgur chu yan lag 
[\[105b.6\]]'gul 'gul ltar/_/rdo rje yi ger 'bru 'bar ltar/_/gug skyed klad kor tsheg par phyin/_/ra ri khal khol sgrib med pa/_/ye shes don la mkhyen rig rgyas/_/de lta mod kyang 'dul dbang gis/_/rgyal ba skul ba'i sa la gzhes/_/rnal 'byor gso ba'i 
[\[105b.7\]]cho ga byed/_/lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/_/bzlas brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang /_/sbyor bas don la nye bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na/_/byin brlabs phebs sam nye ba yi/_/rtags sam drod dam mtshan ma ni/_/rnal 'byor nyid dang bsgrub rdzas 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]dang /_/yod mthong sgra thos kun la 'byung /_/lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang /_/sems kyi rtags su gsal ba dang /_/dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung /_/shing bal lta bur yang ba dang /_/mi bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin/_/reg la 
[\[106a.2\]]ting 'dzin gsal ba dag_/rmi lam du yang myos par 'gyur/_/dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye/_/gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing /_/ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid do/_/'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob ste/_/dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o/_/rdzas ni 'bar 
[\[106a.3\]]dang 'phar ba dang /_/dri dang 'od 'byung ro mchog skye/_/mi zad mang du 'phel ba dang /_/mngar 'jam dang zhing ro mchog rnyed/_/lto la mi gnod mgrin la min/_/zos na bzhin 'gyur lus rtas 'gyur/_/sil snyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs/_/dri zhim 'byung 
[\[106a.4\]]ba de lta'o/_/rdo rje pra rnams bzang ba na/_/rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste/_/smyur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/_/bed dang ga'u'i phyag rgya dang /_/rdo rje bum pa'i 'phro 'du yis/_/dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab/_/yab yum sbyor ba'i lhag sems dag_/
[\[106a.5\]]ma phebs pa yi bar du dag_/shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis/_/ha sta me long b+han d+ha dang /_/zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang /_/kha dog lnga yi dar g.yab kyis/_/g.yab cing rig 'dzin mang po 'bod/_/rol mo cha byad mang po dag_/rdo rje gar dang snyan pa'i 
[\[106a.6\]]glu/_/srid pa'i ma mo kun rten cing /_/byin brlabs chen po dbab par bya/_/phebs ma dag tu dngos grub bstim/_/'di ni rdo rje glu 'khor lo/_/ye shes rgyan gyi las yin no/_/zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje 
[\[106a.7\]]bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje glu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'khor dam pa 'dir/_/gang dag 'jug par byed pa yi/_/rnal 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun/_/snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas/_/byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed de/_/tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya/_/e ma bde mchog dga' tshal 'dir/_/
[\[106b.2\]]bdag cag kun du 'jug par 'tshal/_/dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas/_/gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi/_/de skad gsol te zhus pa dang /_/gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis/_/rgyud sbyang rgyud drug las sgo gcad/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 
[\[106b.3\]]rnal 'byor kun/_/dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te/_/phyag rgya dbang dang bcas pa yi/_/'khor ba'i rgyud rnams sbyang bar bya/_/'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru/_/rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang /_/hU~M lnga dag gis gnan par bya/_/bcug pa de 
[\[106b.4\]]yi spyi bor ni/_/ba yi ye shes la bskrun pa/_/pad+ma kha bzhi lte ba la/_/mi dang lha yi sa bon dgod/_/shar lho nub dang byang dag tu/_/lha min dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab/_/hU~M gi lam sgo gcad par bya/_/lag gnyis mthe'u 
[\[106b.5\]]chung mthe bos mnan/_/sor mo gsum sbyar dpral par bsnol/_/lha dang lha min gnas dag tu/_/mi gtong bzlog pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam/_/mi yi khams nas bzlog pa'i rgya/_/khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgreng nas/_/
[\[106b.6\]]g.yon gyi steng du mnan pa 'di/_/byol song gnas nas bzlog pa'i rgya/_/thal mo mnyam sbyar gung rtse sprad/_/gung mo rgyab tu srin lag bsnol/_/mgul nas mdzub mos 'khyud pa ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]khams las bzlog pa'i rgya/_/g.yon thog g.yas kyi 
[\[106b.7\]]rgyab sbyar te/_/srin lag gung mdzub gcig nas gcig_/'khyud pa dmyal ba'i sgo gcod rgya/_/lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni/_/ngag gi rdo rje rgya brjod pa/_/kye ma ru dra kro d+ha kyi hU~M/_/hri sa ma pa tsa hU~M/_/hris pa dza hU~M/_/'di ltar gsal 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]bar gyur ba dang /_/sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gi lha/_/'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mdzad pa/_/rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams mgon khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[107a.2\]]de skad gsol ba btab pa dang /_/rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la/_/'jug pa de yi spyi bos gtugs/_/sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje gsung mchog gsum las byung /_/srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa/_/dbang bskur gnang ba 
[\[107a.3\]]chen po sbyin/_/a ti ho sta hr-i da kha~M/_/de nas snod du gyur pa dang /_/gsang ba'i mig ni dbye bar bya/_/me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin/_/de nas dam tshig chen po bsgrags/_/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/dam tshig 'di las gang 'das pa/_/rgyal 
[\[107a.4\]]ba thams cad bslus pa yin/_/khrag 'thung kha 'bar ma yi tshogs/_/khros nas snying khrag thogs pas 'thung /_/badzra sa ma ya i da na the na ra kan/_/ba ra hr-i da ya na ma ba sti nA na/_/sa ma ya rak+Sha sid+d+hi bad+yi badzra a mr-i to da ka~M/_/rdo rje tha tshig chu blud 
[\[107a.5\]]nas/_/rdo rje gal chen mna' dor ro/_/rdo rje dam tshig sdom pa rnams/_/thams cad thams cad dbog par bya/_/slob pa'i gnyer yang dbog par bya/_/kye rig 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed/_/rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i sras kyis yin/_/gzhan 
[\[107a.6\]]yang gsang ba ma smra shig_/gal te smras na dmyal bar 'tshig_/khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo/_/rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'dzin/_/gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyis/_/zhing khams kun du bde bar spyod/_/des ni sangs rgyas zhing du 
[\[107a.7\]]skye/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba/_/srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas/_/bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni/_/gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin/_/phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang /_/bsgrub pa'i 
[\[107b.2\]]dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang /_/bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang /_/rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de la dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te/_/o~M hU~M sa hrIHha/_/kun gyis 'da' bar dka' ba yi/_/tshig btsan 
[\[107b.3\]]yul la dbang sgyur ba/_/rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang /_/sku lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing /_/rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni/_/sbyor ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te/_/dam tshig 
[\[107b.4\]]phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur/_/shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog ni/_/don dang ldan par gyur pa yi/_/mtha' gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i/_/gzungs ma'i rgyal mo chen mo yin/_/gnyis med yongs su rdzogs pa na/_/thams cad 
[\[107b.5\]]bde ba chen po'i ngang /_/byang chub sems dang don du 'brel/_/shes rab chen po rdzogs pa'i dbang /_/bkra shis chen po bum pa ni/_/bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yi/_/dbang chen 
[\[107b.6\]]de la sbyin par bya/_/gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni/_/yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yi/_/bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang mchog kyang /_/gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya/_/don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi/_/'dod dgur re skong rin po 
[\[107b.7\]]che/_/rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis/_/rgyal po mchog tu dbang bskur ro/_/rin chen pad+ma seng ge'i khri/_/bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog de/_/khyad par chen por gyur pa'i dbang /_/khri chen dag la gzhag par bya/_/cod pan 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]me tog phreng la sogs/_/dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan gyis bklubs/_/dbu rgyan do shal se mo do/_/dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams/_/dbang thob rgyal pos de la sbyin/_/dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i 
[\[108a.2\]]rgyal po de/_/dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po'o zhes par ni/_/kun gyis sgra chen bod cing bsgrags pa bya/_/gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig_/rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni/_/'jig 
[\[108a.3\]]rten kun la kha lo sgyur ba yi/_/dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya/_/phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad/_/bla med mchog gi rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas/_/gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhug par bya/_/shin tu 
[\[108a.4\]]gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur nas/_/gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu/_/gnang chen po yi rtags su byin gyis brlabs/_/gsang ba'i don la nyan cing slob pa'i dbang /_/dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[108a.5\]]chu 'dis rna ba'i gsang sgo dbye/_/sarba ta thA ga ta sta ma ti ho/_/glegs bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams/_/rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin par bya/_/des ni 'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na/_/las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 
[\[108a.6\]]sgrub pa'i rtags/_/rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas/_/bu mchog de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya/_/gzhan gyi re 'dod skong ba'i bu mchog de/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhin/_/rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyud du byung bas 
[\[108a.7\]]na/_/tan+t+ra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin/_/des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun skyong nus phyir/_/bstan pa sgrogs pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir/_/rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di/_/theg chen dgu yi rtags dang chas te 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sbyin/_/de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na/_/sa rnams non pa'i rtags mchog gdan khri'i dbang /_/lha chen la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas/_/khyu mchog seng ge ma he gzig dang stag_/gtum pa'i dom gyis spar te sbyin par 
[\[108b.2\]]bya/_/rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun/_/skye la dbang sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs/_/pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzin pa dang /_/bdag gzhan don sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/_/dgos 'dod yid bzhin skong ba'i 
[\[108b.3\]]rin po che/_/rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya/_/de ni rgyal ba'i mchog sras yin pas na/_/phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/_/ras sam 'bur ram lugs su blugs pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor 
[\[108b.4\]]gzhag_/ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas/_/ye shes lnga yi rtags mchog phyag rgya yis/_/gnas lngar gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin/_/oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~Mm hA A dar+sha dz+nya na badzra swa 
[\[108b.5\]]b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA kr-i t+yA nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin 
[\[108b.6\]]pas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di/_/rdo rje can la sbyin par bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_
[\[108b.7\]]oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de/_/don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir/_/bdud 'dul bkra shis rdzas mchog rnams/_/rtags 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]kyis brgyan te sbyin par bya/_/don rnams grub pa'i bu mchog de/_/rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na/_/zhing khams kun du grags pa yi/_/rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin/_/nang du 'jug pa'i dbang thob nas/_/de dag kun la spyod sgrub 
[\[109a.2\]]pa'i/_/dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya/_/skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la/_/sems kyis dbang bskur thob pa yi/_/shes rab chen po rig pa'i dbang /_/sems lon don gyi gtan tshigs sbyin/_/bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing /_/btsal 
[\[109a.3\]]med gnas pa'i byang chub sems/_/snying rje chen po bde mchog gis/_/khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sbyin/_/srid gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun/_/thams cad rdzogs par nus pa yi/_/rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni/_/thong gshol 
[\[109a.4\]]'bar ba sbyin par byed/_/dug gsum gting nas sprugs pa yi/_/rtags chen ga'u rnam pa gsum/_/dmar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang /_/dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin/_/srid gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi/_/dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i phyir/_/ka 
[\[109a.5\]]tar la sogs mtshon cha rnams/_/dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/_/'khor ba'i chos la cir spyad kyang /_/skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i/_/rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/rnam dag rdzas kyi pad+ma sbyin/_/las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi/_/dbang 
[\[109a.6\]]mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni/_/sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dag_/dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/_/yum dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi/_/chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags/_/sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chun po 'di/_/dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/_/gsang 
[\[109a.7\]]ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma/_/dri med rnam dag lta mo zhig_/mtshan ldan shin tu brgyan byas la/_/dbang thob de la sbyin par bya/_/dbang thob rgyal po chen po de/_/kun gyi bdag po yin pas na/_/rol mo dri dang zhal zas dang /_/'dod yon lnga la sogs 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]pa dang /_/nye ba'i longs spyod rgyan rnams kun/_/thams cad thams cad sbyin par bya/_/sgrub pa'i rgyal po de la ni/_/sgrub pa'i las la dbang thob phyir/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/_/rgyal ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang /_/rdo rje tshe dang sman la sogs/_/
[\[109b.2\]]sgrub pa ma lus sgrubs shig ces/_/bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i phyir/_/rig 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang /_/rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya/_/bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog 
[\[109b.3\]]dang /_/gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas na/_/gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/_/dga' ba byang chub sems chen po/_/kun du tshim par byed pa yi/_/dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang chub sems/_/dbang thob de yi lce la gzhag_/btsal med byang 
[\[109b.4\]]chub sems chen po/_/shes rab chen po'i rtsal gyis ni/_/chos sku sgyu mar dbang sgyur nas/_/rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas/_/rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang /_/kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang /_/chos la sems kyi dbang thob na/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[109b.5\]]rig 'dzin thams cad dang /_/srid gsum dbang can thams cad kun/_/de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur/_/dbang gi tshad ni 'di lta ste/_/dad ldan sri zhur ldan pa la/_/gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang chen bskur/_/rnam bzhi las kyi don tshang 
[\[109b.6\]]na/_/las rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo/_/lta ba'i dmigs bus chos mthong na/_/rgyal theb 'chad pa'i dbang thob bo/_/rkyen thub tshad ma gsum ldan na/_/bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dbang /_/dam pa mdzod gsum thams cad la/_/phyogs 
[\[109b.7\]]med par ni 'chad shes nas/_/rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang 'thob bo/_/dad med blo zhan rdzob pa che/_/tshul 'chos mkhan la ras gcod byed/_/de ni dbang gis 'tshig par bshad/_/gsang med brjed ngas dbang mi 'chags/_/dad med g.yel rmugs 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dbang mi 'gos/_/snod med bcud bral kun stongs pa/_/des ni dbang thob ma yin no/_/snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang thob na/_/dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyu zhes bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa 
[\[110a.2\]]kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang /_sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams 
[\[110a.3\]]cad kyi me long yin par rig nas/_'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas/_bstod pa shin tu dga' ba chen po'i glu 'di gsungs so/_/e ma hoH/_nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi mtha' las 'das/_/dpag med 
[\[110a.4\]]byams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal/_/don dam gsang sbas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khyil/_/rdo rje che mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bdag_/'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khrag la rol/_/thugs kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i mtha' la rje/_/yul med ma skyes mtshan 
[\[110a.5\]]ma'i g.yul las rgyal/_/bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal/_/byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char/_/dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol/_/rtog 'joms ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro/_/dam pa'i 
[\[110a.6\]]don gsungs gnyis med ston pa'i sku/_/smra ba'i seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen gter ldan 'dod dgur kun skong zhing /_/lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod/_/brda can yang dag len pa'i me long gsal/_/rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal po'i rgyud/_/
[\[110a.7\]]chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag 'dud/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las ngo mtshar bstod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]{D832}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI guh+ya gar+b+ha ta twa bi ni sh+tsa ya/_bod skad du/_dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang 
[\[110b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/_ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang 
[\[110b.3\]]bzhin te/_'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/_yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir 
[\[110b.4\]]gyur pa/_lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/_rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil ba/_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes 
[\[110b.5\]]rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/_spags pa/_tshad dpag tu med pa/_ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_shar bu'i rgyan dang /_gzugs sna tshogs dang /_sgra sna tshogs 
[\[110b.6\]]dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_ro sna tshogs dang /_reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par bklubs pa/_rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[110b.7\]]kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/_phyi dang nang med pa/_kun du yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang /_stobs glang po che'i khri dang /_rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang /_dbang rma bya'i khri dang /_thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'od 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna 
[\[111a.2\]]tshogs par kun du snang ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/_ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/_sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum
