[\[132b.1\]{D833}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra satwa mA yA dza la gu h+ya sarba A dar+sha nA ma tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_/o~M rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/hU~M mi bskyod pa la phyag 
[\[132b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/a~M snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag_/kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas/_/dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas/_/rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas/_/
[\[132b.3\]]spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung /_/rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste/_/cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud/_/dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba/_/'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang /_/dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang /_/sku gsung 
[\[132b.4\]]thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud/_/ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags/_/sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de/_/dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan/_/lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid/_/gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad/_/gsang ba zhes ni ji lta 
[\[132b.5\]]bu/_/snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir/_/de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod/_/nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir/_/mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs/_/mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o/_/thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi/_/ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir/_/gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu/_/
[\[132b.6\]]dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu/_/mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod/_/rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir/_/snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir/_/don yod grub pa ji lta bu/_/spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang /_/gos dkar mo dang mA ma kI/_/
[\[132b.7\]]sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir/_/sa yi snying po ci yi phyir/_/nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang /_/phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod/_/sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci/_/byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang dang /_/'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir/_/dus bzhi bdug spos me tog 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dang /_/mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod/_/rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang /_/rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ci/_/lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod/_/yid dang chos bzang gnyis ci phyir/_/gtso bos bdag la nges par 
[\[133a.2\]]gsungs/_/gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las/_/ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor/_/dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod/_/grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las/_/ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar/_/bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu/_/skyes bu 
[\[133a.3\]]chen pos bshad du gsol/_/'di ni gleng gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur/_/gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing /_/thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/sems lnga 
[\[133a.4\]]ye shes lnga yi rim/_/gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol/_/'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing /_/phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje/_/gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs/_/blta bya gang 
[\[133a.5\]]la ci yi phyir/_/gang gis rtogs pas ji ltar 'gyur/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci/_/rtogs pa'i sgo ni du ru gsungs/_/gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci/_/'di ni lta ba'i dri ba'o/_/thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir/_/thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir/_/shes rab 
[\[133a.6\]]tshogs dang thugs rje dang /_/rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang /_/'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci/_/gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad/_/de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur/_/gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i/_/spyad pa'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs/_/'di ni spyod 
[\[133a.7\]]pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o/_/thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi/_/rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi/_/dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir/_/de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang /_/'dul thabs gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang /_/lhag pa 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]ting 'dzin zhes bya ba/_/gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang /_/phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu/_/gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod cing /_/gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang /_/phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[133b.2\]]lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te/_/gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu/_/gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing /_/don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems/_/phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig_/gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas/_/ji ltar 
[\[133b.3\]]spyad pas ci zhig 'grub/_/'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci/_/gnas skabs gang dang 'brel par 'gyur/_/yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel/_/dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag_/gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po/_/gang dang nges pa ma rnyed par/_/kun gyi 
[\[133b.4\]]spyod par ma gyur pa/_/legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che/_/'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o/_/gang gis gang la gang dag tu/_/ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs/_/bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi/_/gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel/_/skyon 
[\[133b.5\]]dang yon tan ji lta bu/_/'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol/_/'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du/_/las kyi rim pa ji lta bu/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/_/bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/_/'di 
[\[133b.6\]]ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o/_/gang la gang gis brten pa yi/_/dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir/_/rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan/_/gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya/_/yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs/_/'di dag lam dang bsnyen bsgrub dang /_/gang zag gang 
[\[133b.7\]]don ji ltar 'brel/_/bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon ci/_/phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar gsungs/_/lta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang /_/shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu/_/grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig_/rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsol/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]mchog dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i/_/bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/_/gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub/_/dgug dang bcing dang gso dang bsad/_/dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci/_/gter dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang /_/rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar sgrub/_/
[\[134a.2\]]rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol/_/'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o/_/phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig_/gang gis gang du brtsam par bya/_/thab dang rdzas dang phur bu ci/_/ting 'dzin 'dug stangs hom khung ci/_/gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig_/khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad/_/
[\[134a.3\]]'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur/_/gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog gtso/_/the tshom legs par chod par mdzod/_/'di ni phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o/_/rmad 'byung skyes bu gang zhig gis/_/dang po lam tshul ji lta bu/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir/_/stong pa'i rnal 
[\[134a.4\]]'byor snying rje che/_/phyag rgya cig dang spros bcas ci/_/rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci/_/mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs/_/phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i/_/'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ci ltar/_/gang 
[\[134a.5\]]dag rtog pa'i rgyal po ste/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla na med/_/kun lam 'bras bu thugs chud pa/_/cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud/_/skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i/_/gsang ba gsang chen mdo sde dang /_/'dul ba chos kyi phung po dag_/nam mkhar mtha' thug bshad pa kun/_/
[\[134a.6\]]gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas/_/ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i lam/_/ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di/_/theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang /_/rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral/_/ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba/_/skyes bu mchog gi spyod yul bas/_/rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang 
[\[134a.7\]]zag la/_/gsang phyir gsang ba'i thabs dag gis/_/dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa'i/_/rten dang brten par bcas pa'i chos/_/ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i/_/thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang /_/rkyen stobs nus pa so sor 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]snang /_/khyad par rim par gang gnas pa/_/rang bzhin gdul bya bde gshegs dang /_/'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang /_/ma bcos ngang la tha dad med/_/rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i/_/bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun/_/de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir/_/
[\[134b.2\]]rgyal mchog bde chen yongs gang bas/_/dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan cing /_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i/_/gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog 
[\[134b.3\]]pa'i rgyal po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang /_/skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing /_/dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing /_/rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na/_/thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing /_/kun kyang de dang mthun pa ste/_/'dzum 
[\[134b.4\]]zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing /_/dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa/_/dpag med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang /_/gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud/_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i 
[\[134b.5\]]mchog_/nyon cig da ni sems dpa' bshad/_/chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i/_/rang rig byang chub sems nyid de/_/tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/_/
[\[134b.6\]]thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad/_/rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don/_/nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don/_/sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do/_/tha dad min las tha dad pa'i/_/ngo bo 
[\[134b.7\]]thabs dang bdag nyid dang /_/byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni/_/drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin/_/ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid/_/sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs/_/dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de/_/las dang ye shes spyi nyid dang /_/rdzogs pas rdzogs 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]phyir lung nyid de/_/bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni/_/thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas/_/gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang /_/so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud/_/'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston/_/don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas/_/lung gi spyi zhes 
[\[135a.2\]]bshad pa yin/_/gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba/_/sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de/_/rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang /_/thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid/_/gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do/_/ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang /_/dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang /_/
[\[135a.3\]]rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'i khyad par/_/de dang de yi dbang gis na/_/ro myang bral phyir gsang bar bshad/_/rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi/_/chos rnams thig le chen po'i don/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/_/ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa/_/ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang /_/
[\[135a.4\]]bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams/_/'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang /_/rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/byang chub sems nyid bde ba che/_/rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de/_/rgyal ba'i byin 
[\[135a.5\]]brlabs rab snang ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams/_/'di las ston pas snying po ste/_/snying po dang ni 'od bzhin no/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas/_/snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems/_/mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad 
[\[135a.6\]]pa/_/dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig_/bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs/_/'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do/_/gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par/_/log par 
[\[135a.7\]]brtags pa'i snang ba rnams/_/mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar/_/ro gcig thabs kyi de kho na/_/de phyir de kho na zhes brjod/_/dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i/_/tha dad don min don gcig min/_/de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni/_/gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang /_/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan/_/gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa/_/'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa/_/ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa/_/nges pa'i theg pa bla na med/_/rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las/_/bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi/_/sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[135b.2\]]'phrul/_/rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o/_/rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las/_/rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul/_/de nyid byang chub sems nyid de/_/mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas/_/de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud/_/nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar/_/rgyud chen 
[\[135b.3\]]sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi/_/lam gnyis 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/bde chen thig le mngon snang ba/_/'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du brjod/_/rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yi/_/dngos dbang thabs 
[\[135b.4\]]kyis 'brel pa yis/_/rim pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas/_/khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin/_/thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems/_/chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid/_/zab mo bstan pa spyi yi lung /_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/_/
[\[135b.5\]]bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas/_/shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan/_/dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang /_/cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis/_/dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di/_/ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang /_/mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa 
[\[135b.6\]]ste/_/rdo rje theg pa bde ba che/_/rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang /_/phyin ci log dang mi mos dang /_/dbang dang dam tshig med pa la/_/gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs/_/thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis/_/snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la/_/gsang ba'i snying po 
[\[135b.7\]]bstan gyur na/_/bdag dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing /_/sreg dang sgrib par yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]gnas/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]don/_/thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la/_/phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang /_/dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi/_/rdo rje pad+ma 'brel pa yis/_/byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/nyon mongs lta dang shes bya 
[\[136a.2\]]rnams/_/skad cig yud la bsal byas te/_/thun mong khyad par gsang ba yi/_/lam gnyis nges par ston pas na/_/ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba/_/'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang /_/mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro/_/
[\[136a.3\]]thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis/_/kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid/_/gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi/_/'og min gnas mchog chen po der/_/yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/_/skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir/_/sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[136a.4\]]gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa/_/'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa/_/'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i/_/yon tan khyad par spags pa na/_/gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la/_/bcu gsum sa yi 
[\[136a.5\]]dbang phyug ldan/_/rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang /_/til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs/_/chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i/_/rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni/_/rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir/_/'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/_/rgyal ba 
[\[136a.6\]]kun gyi bsten pa'i gnas/_/de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi/_/yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i/_/bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs/_/de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/rgyal ba sngags dang byin brlabs kyis/_/der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas/_/thun mong thun mong ma 
[\[136a.7\]]yin pa'i/_/bsod nams ye shes khyad par can/_/bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i/_/rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni/_/gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi/_/'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na/_/rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku/_/gcig dang du ma rnams spangs pa/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te/_/gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir/_/sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la/_/skad cig gcig gis spang bar mdzad/_/chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa/_/dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum/_/khyab dang spags dang tshad med dang /_/ye shes bzhi phyir 
[\[136b.2\]]'khor lo bstan/_/chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir/_/mu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor/_/sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang /_/thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir/_/yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan/_/rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas/_/phyogs bcur 'gro 
[\[136b.3\]]'ong mi gnas pa'i/_/tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir/_/gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan/_/gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir/_/ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de/_/'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/sna tshogs dngos dang dngos 
[\[136b.4\]]med pa'i/_/chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te/_/bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/_/phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med/_/thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras/_/ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid/_/gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas/_/glo 'bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes/_/
[\[136b.5\]]thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun/_/stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug_/de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar/_/thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis/_/'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas/_/rta 
[\[136b.6\]]babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan/_/zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas/_/'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te/_/bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas/_/'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/_/ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang /_/che ba'i 
[\[136b.7\]]yon tan lhun rdzogs pas/_/nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/_/las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che/_/smon lam dbang gis de dag tu/_/thos pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas/_/de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang /_/ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus/_/dus kyi 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]mtha' la mngon rtogs pas/_/thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan/_/de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis/_/bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa/_/'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag_/lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad/_/dus gsum rgyal bas byin 
[\[137a.2\]]brlabs phyir/_/'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas/_/'dul ba'i 'khor la bstan par mdzad/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/_/sku gsum sku gsung thugs nges pa'i/_/de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis/_/gshegs shing 
[\[137a.3\]]gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i/_/thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang /_/pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa/_/zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan/_/gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas/_/las dang 
[\[137a.4\]]spyod pa dka' thub dang /_/srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas/_/de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/_/ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba/_/mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis/_/rnam par snang phyir snang mdzad mchog_/rgya ba kun gyi 
[\[137a.5\]]yon tan ni/_/tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste/_/yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas/_/rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin/_/dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo/_/dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis/_/don rtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo/_/mtha' yas snang phyir 
[\[137a.6\]]mtha' yas mchog_/dpag med thugs rje mdzad pa yi/_/'gro 'ong med pa'i thugs rje yis/_/'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas/_/don grub ces ni rnam par bstan/_/rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang /_/tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing /_/de las thabs des mngon byas 
[\[137a.7\]]pas/_/der dbang sgyur te nyid snang ba/_/rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin/_/steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i/_/sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim/_/gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i/_/bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang /_/'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang /_/rnam shes zag 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]med bde ba'i ros/_/dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad/_/gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris/_/phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog_/dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang /_/sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyid cing /_/spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum/_/
[\[137b.2\]]thams cad de las skyed pa lnga/_/tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang /_/dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin/_/sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod/_/nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba/_/steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa/_/yul dang shes pa dbyer med cing /_/thugs rje shes rab 'brel ba 
[\[137b.3\]]yis/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog_/zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis/_/skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir/_/mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/_/nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/
[\[137b.4\]]las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang /_/shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa/_/rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na/_/gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin/_/gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang /_/ye shes thugs rje bar med chus/_/gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas/_/chu ni mA ma kI ru 
[\[137b.5\]]bshad/_/gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang /_/ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis/_/bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su/_/sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad/_/snying po rang 'byung ye shes nyid/_/kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 
[\[137b.6\]]la/_/sa yi snying por brjod pa yin/_/rang 'byung snying po byang chub sems/_/nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med/_/mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa/_/de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid/_/gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas/_/'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar/_/skyo ba med par 
[\[137b.7\]]gzigs pas na/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i gtso/_/rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis/_/mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag_/'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste/_/thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyi/_/gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bzhi/_/thun mong yul dang khyad 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]par ni/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las/_/mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/_/lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba/_/byang chub sems dang bde ba dang /_/thabs kyi bde bas rab sgeg pas/_/lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad/_/grol dang 
[\[138a.2\]]ma grol 'khor ba yi/_/phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun/_/brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas/_/bar chad med pas phreng ba ma/_/tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa/_/dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid/_/dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas/_/de nyid rdo rje gI ti ma/_/ro yis khyab 
[\[138a.3\]]cing gar sgyur ltar/_/bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar/_/khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang /_/mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma/_/rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang /_/yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar/_/lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no/_/ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la/_/
[\[138a.4\]]rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis/_/yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni/_/'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o/_/rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis/_/las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim/_/sel ba 'di ni sgrib sel lo/_/thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na/_/gang 
[\[138a.5\]]phyir spong len mi gnas pas/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/dbye ba med pas kun du bzang /_/bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun/_/zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis/_/lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na/_/zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku/_/dbang po yi ge thig ler 
[\[138a.6\]]bcas/_/gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/_/mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin/_/dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de/_/de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang /_/spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni/_/dri dang bde bas ngag tshim zhing /_/yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri/_/phyi nang khyab 
[\[138a.7\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/me tog thig ler bder bkod pas/_/rdo rje me tog bla na med/_/phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i/_/mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang /_/ye shes snang ba bla na med/_/rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma/_/phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma lus la/_/rang 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis/_/thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/_/khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma/_/de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis/_/'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa/_/byang chub snying por tshar bcad pas/_/rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod/_/gzung 'dzin bral 
[\[138b.2\]]ba'i ye shes ni/_/gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa'i gnyen po ste/_/rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na/_/ya mAn+ta kr-i ta gshin rje gshed/_/gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/_/thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las/_/'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na/_/rta mgrin 
[\[138b.3\]]rgyal por de bshad do/_/'khor ba'i bdud kyi dug lnga la/_/ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas/_/gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba/_/sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil par bshad/_/gang du lus dang bcas pa yi/_/dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg_/rang rgyud bcad pa'i 
[\[138b.4\]]ye shes nyid/_/sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/_/rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang /_/gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang /_/thig le rig par bcas pa nyid/_/gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang /_/gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang /_/de las 'da' bar dka' ba dang /_/
[\[138b.5\]]bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma/_/gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang /_/gnyis su med pas bde chen po/_/rang lus snang srid brtan g.yo la/_/rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar/_/de dag ma lus dran byed pa/_/rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med/_/kun gzhi 
[\[138b.6\]]rdo rje mi phyed pa/_/kun du bzang por de bshad do/_/ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos/_/ma lus zag med khyab pa'i dbyings/_/rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa/_/kun du bzang mor de bshad do/_/mi shigs thig le bde chen po/_/ye shes lnga ldan dngas ma'i bcud/_/
[\[138b.7\]]rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa/_/ston pa rig pa'i gsung can nyid/_/d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas/_/'od bzhi e sogs tshul du ni/_/lus sbas pa yi tshul dag gis/_/lus can kun la khyab par gnas/_/rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid/_/rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ste/_/bar ma ar+tha byang chub sems/_/nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong /_/ma na ma ta dran rtog yid/_/rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams/_/ye shes nam mkha'i gsal 'dod pa/_/dran rtog rig pa 'khor du gnas/_/zag med rnam shes bsam mi 
[\[139a.2\]]khyab/_/ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su/_/bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par/_/bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad/_/bde ba chen po ma skyes pa/_/nam mkha' lta bur mi phyed pa/_/nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku/_/dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas/_/'di zhes 
[\[139a.3\]]nye bar bstan pa ni/_/e sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te/_/phyi nang bar khyams gdong bar bcas/_/gsang ba'i 'og min rgyan rdzogs pa'o/_/thig le ba~M dbyibs spros pa med/_/brjod med bstan pa bsrung mdzad cing /_/byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa/_/'khor 
[\[139a.4\]]la snang bar mdzad pa'o/_/ma ni ma nu ma ta ste/_/sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos/_/las can rnam shes de dag gis/_/gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod/_/chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/_/thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos/_/mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i don/_/
[\[139a.5\]]byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus/_/bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe/_/bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod/_/shes pa rten dang brten par bcas/_/thabs kyi rim pa la brten 
[\[139a.6\]]nas/_/rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni/_/rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal/_/gang dang gang la gang du ni/_/gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa/_/brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas/_/gleng gzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/
[\[139a.7\]]dbyer med ye shes gcig gi ngang /_/rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las/_/sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul/_/de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang /_/lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/_/lha min ston pa phrag dog rje/_/mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste/_/byol song sgra yis 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'dul mdzad pa/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drag pos gdung ba sel/_/dmyal ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal/_/gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar/_/la la lha las 'pho ba dang /_/la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang /_/dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas/_/'khor lo bskor 
[\[139b.2\]]te mya ngan 'das/_/gnas la nges pa yod min te/_/dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song dang /_/mi dang lha dang lha min te/_/so so'i gnas te gang yin pa/_/'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa'i gnas/_/lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang /_/lha min [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro dang /_/dmyal ba so 
[\[139b.3\]]so'i 'gro ris dag_/rang rang mos dang las dbang gis/_/'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod/_/rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe/_/rang rang brda skad tha dad pas/_/rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa/_/rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i dus/_/bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs 
[\[139b.4\]]te/_/rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir/_/tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na/_/theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang /_/theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul/_/gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/_/dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa/_/'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang /_/sku dang 
[\[139b.5\]]gsung thugs las dag gis/_/'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de tshe 'gro ba so so yang /_/rang gi gzhi rtsa don rig nas/_/rim pa lnga 'am thabs gcig gis/_/rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas/_/rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i 
[\[139b.6\]]lus/_/sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis/_/de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa/_/blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus/_/rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/_/lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang /_/sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni/_/phyi dang nang dang 
[\[139b.7\]]sbas pa ste/_/rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa/_/thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/_/bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bar 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'dus pa ste/_/de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun/_/rtog pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i/_/rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[140a.2\]]sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gang zag thabs ni thun mong du/_/blo yi yul du gang gyur pa/_/de ni thun mong yul nyid de/_/gang zag thabs dang ston pa 
[\[140a.3\]]nyid/_/de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing /_/thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa/_/de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don/_/rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar mdzad/_/phung po khams dang skye mched nyid/_/rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang /_/sems ma nyid du lhun 
[\[140a.4\]]gyis grub/_/gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg_/ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste/_/rtags sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir/_/yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad/_/yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid/_/chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid/_/thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad/_/
[\[140a.5\]]de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi/_/phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul/_/dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi/_/mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de/_/de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas/_/lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel ba las/_/byang chub sems lnga rnam par 'phrul/_/dngos po 
[\[140a.6\]]snang grags chos thams cad/_/skye ba med dang 'gag med dang /_/gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang /_/'gro 'ong med pa nyid du snang /_/bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang /_/gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas/_/rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang /_/shin tu gab sbas 
[\[140a.7\]]gsang ba'i don/_/de nyid legs par bshad pa'i tshe/_/ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la/_/ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de bor snang /_/de nyid bde gshegs snying po ste/_/dngos med dngos po'i snying po can/_/'gro ba rnams ni 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]smin bya'i phyir/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las/_/sprul pa rnams ni rnam par 'phrul/_/sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyis/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang /_/ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig_/yab 
[\[140b.2\]]dang yum dang gnyis med dang /_/gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba/_/brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te/_/bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur/_/'phen pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis/_/thabs des yum la gang bskul bas/_/gnyis med 'brel pa'i chags pa'i 'od/_/sa 
[\[140b.3\]]ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs/_/bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing /_/nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas/_/bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro/_/skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang /_/'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur/_/gang gis gang la gang bslang bas/_/
[\[140b.4\]]gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las/_/ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas/_/snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas/_/nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang snang /_/nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin/_/gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la/_/chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul/_/
[\[140b.5\]]shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang /_/sha da pa yi glu gar dang /_/sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis/_/phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis/_/dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de/_/
[\[140b.6\]]dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang /_/zlog dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis/_/bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'i/_/kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste/_/thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang /_/shes rab 
[\[140b.7\]]gsang ba'i thig le dang /_/gnyis med bde ba las byung ba/_/sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing /_/sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba/_/bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/_/sku gsung thugs 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dang ye shes lngas/_/thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yis/_/'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o/_/snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas/_/g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin/_/skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang /_/
[\[141a.2\]]skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/_/'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis/_/gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas/_/gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan/_/rten dang 
[\[141a.3\]]brten can las byung ba'i/_/rang 'byung bde chen mi rtog pa/_/lus med lus la gnas pa yi/_/khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul/_/gang phyir zag med bde ba yi/_/ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can/_/rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang /_/byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni/_/phyi 
[\[141a.4\]]nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs/_/ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung /_/rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag_/rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang /_/'phen dang sdud pa rlung gis te/_/dngas mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug_/steng dang 'og las byung ba yi/_/bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag_/
[\[141a.5\]]dngas snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid/_/rkyen gyis nus pa phrad pa ltar/_/rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang /_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang /_/rlung ni phyi nang dngas snyigs dang /_/lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung /_/
[\[141a.6\]]gang phyir med dang nus pa med/_/stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis/_/rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing /_/dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur/_/gang phyir thun mong thun mong min/_/sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa/_/rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du/_/gzungs ma 
[\[141a.7\]]rigs la rten bcas pa'i/_/sems lnga yun ring thung bcas pas/_/bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te/_/dngos po ma yin dngos med min/_/bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min/_/rang 'byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid/_/rdo rje brtan po rang snang 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ba/_/ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad 
[\[141b.2\]]kun/_/gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i/_/mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/_/sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las/_/sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul/_/gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i/_/rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin nyid/_/
[\[141b.3\]]dngos med dngos po yul 'das la/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba/_/gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid/_/e ma'o gnyis med bde chen las/_/sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang /_/rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang /_/bde sdug dbang po bye 
[\[141b.4\]]brag dag_/rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul/_/sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' tshon ltar/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas/_/las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba/_/rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis/_/dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i/_/rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong /_/rang bzhin 
[\[141b.5\]]gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings/_/lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i/_/ma mthong log zhen rtas pa yis/_/'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang /_/'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi/_/zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang /_/ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang /_/mngon 
[\[141b.6\]]shes ye shes dpag med pa'i/_/sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang /_/yon tan phrin las rang snang ba/_/bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don/_/sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar/_/ma bsags lhun gyis grub pa'i sku/_/sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i/_/kun la 
[\[141b.7\]]yid bzhin mthun par snang /_/kun kyang rang 'byung byang chub sems/_/bden pa dbyer med don du snang /_/gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar/_/gang la de ltar snang ba las/_/yang dag gcig tu gzung du med/_/ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid/_/rnam par dag 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]pa'i snying po ste/_/'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das/_/rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen/_/sgro dang skur pa kun bral ba'i/_/thams cad rang snang snying po las/_/sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul/_/dngos dang dngos po med min zhing /_/gang la de nyid 
[\[142a.2\]]yul 'das pa/_/nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa/_/phyogs ris mtha' dbus rgya dpag med/_/gang gis gang la khyab pa ltar/_/mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud/_/zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid/_/lus can kun gyi dbang po dang /_/dngas mar 'brel 
[\[142a.3\]]bar gang snang yang /_/mthong pa log pa'i stobs kyis sgyur/_/bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin/_/ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i/_/thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun/_/longs spyod thabs su bcas pa nyid/_/'gro ba kun la khyab par gnas/_/gang yang 
[\[142a.4\]]thabs dang shes rab kyi/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid/_/rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems/_/bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid/_/'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi/_/rgyal ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang /_/ma lus kun gyis rtogs bya ba/_/phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas/_/
[\[142a.5\]]gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid/_/ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste/_/gcig dang du ma las 'das pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar/_/ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang /_/rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po yi/_/mthong tshul dag 
[\[142a.6\]]dang ma dag gis/_/rang bzhin yul du ma gyur pas/_/phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i/_/dbang dang man ngag 'brel ba yis/_/de nyid mthong rtogs don phyir bshad/_/gang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid/_/yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can/_/dad dang brtson 'grus 
[\[142a.7\]]brtul zhugs can/_/shes rab khyad par gang ldan la/_/dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang /_/rgyu rkyen 'brel pa'i nus pa yi/_/bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa/_/thabs kyis phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]grub ste/_/phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa/_/thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid/_/thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas/_/mun pa'i tshogs su gyur pa yin/_/mun snang dug dang gser 'gyur rtsi/_/thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar/_/gang de'i lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/_/
[\[142b.2\]]de ma thag tu de bzhin 'gyur/_/dbyer med nam mkha'i rang bzhin du/_/kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs/_/ma lus tha dad med pa ltar/_/thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur/_/tha mal pa dang log pa dang /_/dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang /_/phyi nang can dang tha dad 
[\[142b.3\]]can/_/gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid/_/mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa/_/ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang /_/dbang po la sogs log pa yis/_/de nyid gnod pa'i stobs su 'gyur/_/gang la gang gis zin pa'i nad/_/thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis/_/de ltar 
[\[142b.4\]]brtson pa'i khyad par gyis/_/de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag_/gang phyir de nyid nges pa la/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis/_/tha dad chos su gang snang ba/_/dngos la de ltar gnas pa min/_/rdo rje skye med shes rab ste/_/me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang /_/gnyis med 'brel 
[\[142b.5\]]pa'i mnyam pa nyid/_/ma lus dbyer med dam par bshad/_/de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba/_/gang la gang gi don med pas/_/lta dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag_/'di nyid don gnyer gzhan med pa'o/_/gang gis de dag de don du/_/tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis/_/
[\[142b.6\]]gang bstan de yi byin brlabs kyis/_/bdag gzhan phan par gang 'dod pa'o/_/gang las gyur pa de zhig pas/_/lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas/_/phyin cad phan gnod chos med pas/_/dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos so/_/gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag_/mnyes 
[\[142b.7\]]dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir/_/las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis/_/grol zhing thar bar 'dod par snang /_/bden bzhi bcu drug tha dad lam/_/khams gsum mthong bsgom spong tshul gyis/_/rang don zag pa kun bral nas/_/rang don thar pa mya ngan 'das/_/rkyen rtogs 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bag chags sad pa yis/_/'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags nas/_/ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad/_/yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa/_/tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i sems/_/bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]khyad par cir bltas pa/_/gsal la mi rtog snying 
[\[143a.2\]]po nyid/_/bdag gzhan nus pa'i stobs su snang /_/chos rnams sgyu ma mig yor dang /_/brag ca chu zla 'dra ba yi/_/de nyid mtha' dbus bral ba ni/_/bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul/_/rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de/_/dngos po sgyu ma las grol nas/_/dag pa'i rten 
[\[143a.3\]]'brel la brten nas/_/ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar/_/gang phyir las dang bya ba dang /_/khrus dang gtsang sbra la brten nas/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis/_/sgo gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa/_/de dag las mthun khyad par nyid/_/de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs 
[\[143a.4\]]nas/_/las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas/_/rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas/_/ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas nas/_/sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis/_/cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sgyur te/_/goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o/_/thabs dang grol ba'i khyad 
[\[143a.5\]]par gyis/_/dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang /_/snang srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi/_/spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas/_/ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/_/snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de/_/
[\[143a.6\]]rang bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi/_/sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas/_/ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa/_/gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos/_/ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur/_/ma lus 
[\[143a.7\]]gcig dang tha bral ba'i/_/ji ltar mthun pa'i snying po la/_/so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas/_/bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang /_/rdzogs pa nam mkha'i ye shes dang /_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru/_/snang ba rkyen gyis sgyur ba ltar/_/ma lus de yi ngo bor 'gyur/_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis/_/rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang /_/nus pa'i rim pa cir snang yang /_/nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las/_/nyi zla gza' skar sprin khu rlangs/_/rang 'byung rang dngas 'gyur med ltar/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/dngos 
[\[143b.2\]]dbang don las ma g.yos pas/_/de dag de ltar nyid snang bas/_/de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su 'du/_/de nas gtan tshigs bshad par bya/_/ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la/_/byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas/_/kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos pas/_/so so thun mong 
[\[143b.3\]]gtan tshigs dang /_/thun mong ma yin la sogs pa/_/rgya mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar/_/ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin/_/thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa/_/log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang /_/dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir/_/thun mong gtan tshigs brjod 
[\[143b.4\]]pa yin/_/gang phyir gtan tshigs thams cad kyis/_/rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid/_/ma lus gcig dang tha dad min/_/gang gi mtha' las yongs grol te/_/dbus su gzung med gtan la phebs/_/gcig dang du ma bral ba'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste/_/thabs 
[\[143b.5\]]de gdod nas dag pa gsum/_/ma lus rang snang rtogs pa nyid/_/mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid do/_/rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/_/byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa/_/ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shar te/_/de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo /_/ma skyes ngang las gang snang 
[\[143b.6\]]ba/_/chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na/_/de dang der gcig dbyer med pas/_/dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de/_/gzhi rtsa ma bcos skad cig ma/_/de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba/_/rtogs pas spyi dang rang 
[\[143b.7\]]mtshan shes/_/snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang /_/mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis/_/dngos po snang grags chos rnams kun/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid du gnas/_/ma lus snying po thig le dang /_/lnga bdag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rgyu/_/sa ya bcu 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gsum rtsa yan lag_/ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol/_/dang po gnas dang gnyis pa gnyis/_/gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa/_/nyams su myong byed gtan tshigs so/_/thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang /_/de yi byin brlabs 'dres pa yis/_/bde 
[\[144a.2\]]ba chen po mngon du snang /_/chu las chu bo tha dad de/_/rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang /_/lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar/_/thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin/_/dngas ma lnga las gang byung ba/_/ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le/_/khams lnga'i ro dang bcud snang ba/_/ye 
[\[144a.3\]]shes chen por gtogs pa yin/_/gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog grangs/_/gnas pa gang yin de snod de/_/so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las/_/byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang /_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i/_/bden bzhi dbyer med dngas ma nyid/_/ma 
[\[144a.4\]]lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang /_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/thig le gcig dang du ma nyid/_/bral ba'i ye shes chen po nyid/_/gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o/_/bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu/_/rlung dang gdams ngag rkyen ldan pas/_/'bras bu lhan 
[\[144a.5\]]cig skyes par snang /_/rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro/_/rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas/_/thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa yis/_/ma lus lhan skyes mngon sum gsal/_/bde dang stong nyid mi phyed pa/_/rang rig 
[\[144a.6\]]bde chen ma skyes gzugs/_/ma lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar/_/dbyer med tshul dang rang snang ba'o/_/bde bas bskyed pa'i rtog pa lnga/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid/_/ma lus ye shes chen po nyid/_/ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pa'o/_/dbang po snod bcud bcas 
[\[144a.7\]]pa yis/_/yab yum 'brel par bcas pa'i bcud/_/sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba/_/mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/_/phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i/_/gtan tshigs mtha' yas bshad pa ste/_/rdo rje me long 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bshad pa'i rgyud/_/gang gis rtogs pa de nyid ni/_/ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs/_/yon tan phrin las rang snang ba/_/zag med rang 'byung ngang las 'char/_/chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa/_/ma bcos ji bzhin ngang 
[\[144b.2\]]bzhag las/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung /_/gang dag gang la gang brten pas/_/lhun gyis grub pas 'bras bu nyid/_/ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid/_/dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par/_/lhun grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul 
[\[144b.3\]]dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa/_/'di dag bshad par bya ba ste/_/rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur pas/_/
[\[144b.4\]]spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin/_/e ma'o rang rig snying po las/_/bde sdug gnas dang longs spyod dang /_/tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa/_/la lar mngon par chags pa ste/_/la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod/_/la lar ri bos non pa nyid/_/la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid/_/
[\[144b.5\]]la lar phrag dog snang ba yin/_/la lar ser sna 'thab rtsod de/_/la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang /_/rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed/_/chos dbyings mtha' yas mu med pa'i/_/nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par/_/spyod pa'i khyad par 
[\[144b.6\]]de nyid do/_/rang 'byung thabs kyi spyod pa nyid/_/ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar/_/rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir/_/sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab/_/thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/_/ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang /_/ma rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir/_/
[\[144b.7\]]bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/_/thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag_/byang chub lam du bde bar bshad/_/thabs dang mi ldan skye bo yis/_/thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis/_/mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa/_/mi dang lha las thar ba med/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]dper na dug dang ldan pa la/_/thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin du/_/rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du/_/bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun/_/rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las/_/brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis/_/mi mthun bde sdug sna tshogs myong /_/
[\[145a.2\]]ma bcos dbyings las g.yos pa med/_/gang dag thun mong ngo dag las/_/las dang bya ba sgo nas ni/_/spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir/_/'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs/_/rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa yis/_/chu dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang /_/spong len bya ba sna 
[\[145a.3\]]tshogs las/_/spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med/_/gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang /_/sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis/_/thun mong yul du ma gyur pa/_/thun mong ma yin thabs spyod de/_/la lar thun mong nyid du ste/_/thar pa dang ni ma thar pa/_/kun du rgyu dang mu stegs 
[\[145a.4\]]dang /_/bud med dang ni ma rabs dang /_/rgyal po dpa' bo dka' thub can/_/byis pa la sogs tha dad de/_/la lar dgod dang drag po dang /_/gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang /_/la lar de bzhin chags chen po/_/g.yo sgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston/_/zhi dang rku dang 
[\[145a.5\]]phrag dog spyod/_/'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang /_/glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang /_/de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang /_/ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe/_/zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang /_/ngo mtshar cho 'phrul du ma dag_/gang dang gang gis mdzad pa 
[\[145a.6\]]dag/_/skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/_/mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston/_/zhi la tshangs dang khro la khro/_/thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol/_/gdung dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba/_/rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i/_/sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston/_/byin 
[\[145a.7\]]gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang /_/brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang /_/tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang /_/shin tu rgyal dang phrag dog dang /_/'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan/_/rtsub dang drag dang sbom phra dang /_/ring thung rol mo lha klu dang /_/mi dang mi min 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]'byung po'i sgra/_/khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang /_/chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i/_/sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa/_/dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni/_/gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang /_/la lar byams dang sdang ba dang /_/g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs 
[\[145b.2\]]dang ri/_/sdud dang mi sdud yal ba dang /_/grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang /_/ma rig ye shes la sogs pa/_/thugs kyi rol pa mtha' yas pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang /_/mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid/_/lung dang rigs pa man ngag gi/_/tshad ma dag 
[\[145b.3\]]gis gang bcal ba/_/shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur/_/de nas chos rnams ma lus pa/_/bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang /_/mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid/_/dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis/_/dus gsum rgya mtsho gting 
[\[145b.4\]]lta bur/_/mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas/_/sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis/_/dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste/_/de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te/_/stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad/_/de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems nyid phyir/_/gang 
[\[145b.5\]]snang rang rgyud dngos med de/_/sgyu ma mig yor brag ca dang /_/smig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa/_/gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs/_/mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya/_/gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang /_/ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas/_/kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag_/
[\[145b.6\]]dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya/_/rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang /_/khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i/_/snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad/_/de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid/_/rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis/_/cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir/_/rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba/_/nyi 
[\[145b.7\]]zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar/_/sa bon gang las thabs cho gas/_/'phro 'du zhu nas mngon gyur pa/_/rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang /_/de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis/_/brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te/_/mdun dang gzhan du skabs dag sbyor/_/gcig dang 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]nges med rim pa dang /_/'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur/_/gang gis gang de ma brten par/_/'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de/_/skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis/_/gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur/_/tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang /_/lam gyi 
[\[146a.2\]]'brel par bya ba dang /_/dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas/_/rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya/_/de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la/_/bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i/_/sgo gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas/_/thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la/_/sgo gsum mnyam 
[\[146a.3\]]bzhag rjes thob med/_/gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir/_/phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya/_/de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang /_/bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar/_/gang de rim par bstan 'phel phyir/_/yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom/_/lhag pa bcu gcig 
[\[146a.4\]]dgur ldan pa'i/_/gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis/_/'khor lo'i rtsa ba lha dag kyang /_/yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom/_/de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag_/yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom/_/'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/_/mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug 
[\[146a.5\]]pa 'dul/_/lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang /_/rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis/_/dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i/_/rim par spros shing bsgom par bya/_/grangs dang grangs med tshul dag gis/_/dpag tshad rgyang grags mkha' dbyings su/_/zhi dang khro 
[\[146a.6\]]la sogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom/_/dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar/_/rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan nas/_/sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yi/_/tshom bu rim par bsgom par bya/_/dgon pa'i rim pa'am nags tshal dang /_/chu 'gram 
[\[146a.7\]]ri rtse dur khrod dang /_/skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste/_/dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i/_/brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa yis/_/shis dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su/_/gzhal yas rim brtsegs mdzes ldan pa/_/rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la/_/ting 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'dzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs/_/mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis spyad/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis/_/mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya/_/yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par/_/cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin brtsam/_/bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas/_/bar 
[\[146b.2\]]chad med par bsgrub par bya/_/gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par/_/sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtan na/_/yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal bas/_/rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de/_/phyin cad 'jigs bral khyung bzhin no/_/de bas 'brel pa'i spyod ldan na/_/dbang sgyur zag med 
[\[146b.3\]]sa thob ste/_/brgya dang stong sogs 'jig bral zhing /_/gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du/_/'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang /_/'jigs pa med cing mi ldog sa/_/dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/gzhan don spyod pa'i khyad par dag_/'dul ba'i dbang 
[\[146b.4\]]ni sna tshogs kyis/_/rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro/_/'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/shes rab phyi yi spyod pa ste/_/cho ga rgyas par bstan pa yin/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi/_/spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag_/de nas rim pa 'di dag 
[\[146b.5\]]bshad/_/lus can 'gro ba thams cad la/_/tsakra bzhi dang sku gsung thugs/_/spor dang 'bar ma 'khyil pa dang /_/'brel dang ma 'brel khug pa dang /_/'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang /_/de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul ba'i rtsa/_/gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas/_/rtsa zhes de la 
[\[146b.6\]]mngon bshad de/_/de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang /_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/_/bde ba chen po skyed par byed/_/gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las/_/spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor 'byung /_/sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis/_/thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa/_/dngas 
[\[146b.7\]]snyigs rlung dang 'brel ba yis/_/gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis/_/zag dang zag med bde ba skyed/_/lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid/_/dngas ma thur gyi rlung dang 'grogs/_/gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can/_/des kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can/_/'khrul zhing 'khor bas 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]'khor lo ste/_/gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten/_/rdzogs dang ma rdzogs gang mi gsal/_/sgra sbyor dag dang ma dag gyur/_/bde dang snyan dang mi snyan dang /_/bya dang dri za bung ba dang /_/chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs byed/_/mdog dmar lus khyab klu la sogs/_/u 
[\[147a.2\]]tha'i rlung dang 'grogs te gnas/_/d+harma tsakra srog gi rten/_/ma lus gzhi rtsa kun gyi srog_/rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan/_/dngas ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso/_/phyi rim rin chen sul mang 'dra/_/mi shigs thig le bde chen po/_/rin chen phung po za ma tog_/sna tshogs ye shes lnga yi 
[\[147a.3\]]bdag_/thung ngu a yi rang bzhin can/_/srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas/_/phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad de/_/chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang /_/rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad/_/thun mong phyi yi rim pa yin/_/'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste/_/zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa/_/chos 
[\[147a.4\]]nyid rim pa gsum du gnas/_/rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin te/_/de las bye brag dpag med pa'o/_/gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba'i rlung /_/gnas pa srog dang ye shes te/_/rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod/_/phyi nang can dang gyen thur can/_/de re'ang dngas snyigs khyad par gyis/_/
[\[147a.5\]]rim pa brgyad du mngon snang yin/_/gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis/_/chags sdang dran rtog kun gyi gzhi/_/gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin/_/rgyu zhing 'pho ba rlung gis te/_/bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed pa/_/myong zhing skyed par byed pa yin/_/'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis/_/srog 
[\[147a.6\]]dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas/_/gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag_/gnas pa srog gi rlung can no/_/gang du 'khrul pa 'dzed pa ni/_/ma lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi/_/gyen thur 'dzeg cing 'gengs 'byung ba'i/_/sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po can/_/phyi 
[\[147a.7\]]rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil/_/dbus nas 'khyil pa thig le'i rtsa/_/'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs/_/gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir/_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid/_/de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa/_/gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro/_/'od kyis 'bar 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ba'i sa bon can/_/rtse mo'i 'og mas reg pa'i khams/_/gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa/_/skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar/_/'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste/_/gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas/_/de 'og g.yo ba rlung gi rten/_/'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las can nyid/_/
[\[147b.2\]]de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas/_/lus kyi dngas snyigs 'dis 'byed pa/_/bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa/_/'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te/_/lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa/_/rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad/_/rgyu ba rlung ni thig ler rten/_/'gyed cing 
[\[147b.3\]]'dud pa g.yas g.yon te/_/bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong /_/rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni/_/sgra sbyor 'khor lo ngag gi gnad/_/de nas dngas ma'i thig le la/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas/_/rig pa'i rtsa la bcud 'dus pas/_/thogs med 
[\[147b.4\]]gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung /_/phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la/_/bde ba chen po'i bcud 'dus pas/_/bde chen nyams nyid skye bar 'gyur/_/chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba/_/dngas ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas/_/ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi/_/zag med ye 
[\[147b.5\]]shes bde ba che/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni rgya che ba/_/thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur/_/'di nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs las/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/spyod pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thabs kyi khyad par phyag rgya lnga/_/bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar 
[\[147b.6\]]ba me/_/thig le chu dang 'dzin pas/_/bde chen nam mkha'i phyag rgyar gsal/_/bde bas bde ba'i don mthong bas/_/rtsa dang thig le rlung dag dang /_/bde ba rang rig ma skyes pa/_/de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa/_/rang rgyud bral bas zag pa med/_/rang rgyud med pa'i bde 
[\[147b.7\]]ba nyid/_/dngas ma'i thig les kun khyab pas/_/phyi nang dbang por bcas pa yis/_/bde ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'char/_/ma lus bde ba chen po nyid/_/de la de yis rgyas btab pas/_/bde ba mi rtog lhan cig skyes/_/phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas/_/gang du 'khor 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]lo rtsa bcud ldan/_/sa bon yi ge bde ba dang /_/khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing /_/stong dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres/_/rtag tu dran par gnas pa nyid/_/re re'ang de ltar gnas pa'i phyir/_/'khor lo rtsa bcud thig ler bcas/_/lha dang ye shes sku gsung 
[\[148a.2\]]thugs/_/rang lus snang ba snod bcud kun/_/spros bcas phyag rgya'i grangs su gsal/_/bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir/_/dngas snyigs dbyer med thig le'i don/_/so so'i kha dog dbyibs tshul dang /_/sbas pa'i sku gsung thugs dag la/_/dbyer med gsal ba'i rig pa yis/_/
[\[148a.3\]]ma lus bde chen mngon du gsal/_/de nas bde ba chen po nyid/_/gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsgyur nas/_/ma lus bde ba'i rig pa 'char/_/gtsang dang 'dzem pa bral gyur nas/_/bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga/_/thig le bcud dang dngas mar bcas/_/thig le chen por 'dres pas 
[\[148a.4\]]na/_/mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas/_/rang rig bde ba chen po nyid/_/thog ma tha ma med par gnas/_/thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas/_/zag med dang ma'i snying por thim/_/mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med/_/dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/_/
[\[148a.5\]]'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag_/thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i/_/bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las/_/ma lus thams cad gsal bar snang /_/gang du thabs dang bral ba yi/_/gnas dang bde sdug btang snyoms dang /_/longs spyod tshe dang kha dog dang /_/bdag dang bdag 
[\[148a.6\]]gir zhen bcas pa'i/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/_/reg dang dran pa sna tshogs kyis/_/zhen dang 'ching ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/rang bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam/_/thog ma med nas lus gnas pa'i/_/bde chen nam mkha'i snying 
[\[148a.7\]]po nyid/_/lus gnyis rtsa bcud ma lus pa/_/thabs dang shes rab sku gsung thugs/_/srin bu 'khyugs pa'i yi ge ltar/_/dbang po gnyis dang 'brel te gnas/_/thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis/_/rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang /_/dmangs rigs tshos ma gar mkhan 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ma/_/rdol ma nyo tshong ma nyid dang /_/ma dang sgyug mo sring mo dang /_/mthar sgeg lus 'tshong ma la sogs/_/dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bcud ldan rab yin te/_/nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad/_/rtsa lnga tha ma'i 
[\[148b.2\]]tshad yin te/_/gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs/_/las dang bya ba ma lus pa/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu brtsam/_/gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi la/_/'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad pas/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/_/lhan cig skyes pa gsum gcig 
[\[148b.3\]]las/_/nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba/_/ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur/_/gnas bzhi rtsa bcud thig le le las/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas/_/dngas snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung nas/_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dag_/
[\[148b.4\]]bdag po gdung can sbyar ba yi/_/'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang /_/bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med myong /_/dang po 'jig pa la sogs nas/_/rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par/_/lam lnga sems lnga mthar phyin pas/_/stobs kyi khyad par gsal bar 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes 
[\[148b.5\]]rab gnyis med pa'i/_/'og min nam mkha'i shar sgo nas/_/nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la/_/dus tshod gza' yis gang bzung ba/_/nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid/_/'phen pa rlung gi sbyor bas 'byung /_/rnal 'byor rig par snang ba yi/_/khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na/_/
[\[148b.6\]]bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la/_/bcud kyi khyad par gang gnas pa/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi/_/shel dang byu ru'i bung bsdus nas/_/rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas/_/bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis grub/_/'khyud pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i/_/
[\[148b.7\]]bde ba chen po mi rtog pa/_/skad cig cha las byung ba yi/_/zag med ye shes snying po ste/_/ma lus dngas ma'i blo snang ba/_/zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa/_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste/_/ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin/_/'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te/_/
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]skye dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid/_/bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid/_/sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i ngang /_/de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa/_/phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid/_/thig le rdul bral zhen pa med/_/sgyu ma gzugs brnyan brag ca sogs/_/
[\[149a.2\]]ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du/_/thun mong dran rtog rang 'gags nas/_/bde chen sgyu ma mngon sum snang /_/bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs/_/bcud lnga zhu ba'i ye shes ro/_/thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid/_/dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste/_/dran pa gcig 
[\[149a.3\]]tu myong ba nyid/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis/_/sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i/_/thig le bde ba nyid snang ba/_/rang rang ma 'dres thig le la/_/sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang /_/ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab ste/_/ma lus thig le'i tshogs su snang /_/rang 'byung 
[\[149a.4\]]bde chen rig pa'i lha/_/gcig dang grangs las 'das pa yang /_/nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs/_/khyab pa thig le'i gur nang nas/_/bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can/_/rtsa bcud 'brel ba'i rgyan dang bcas/_/ka ba gsum dang pho brang bzhi/_/lde mig 
[\[149a.5\]]gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi/_/sgo bzhi phye bas gzhal yas khang /_/lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur/_/dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi/_/gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid/_/rim pa phyi nang bar ldan par/_/nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs nas/_/dus gsum thig ler ro gcig 
[\[149a.6\]]pa'o/_/bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/tshom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te/_/thun mong dam tshig ting 'dzin dang /_/byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga/_/gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang /_/spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas/_/
[\[149a.7\]]ma spangs rol bar longs spyod pas/_/ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba/_/rlung sems ye shes bcas pa nyid/_/rgyu ba med pas zag pa bral/_/nam mkha'i mthar thug bar nyid du/_/zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te/_/bde chen mngon du gang 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bar snang /_/de dag lam la zhugs pa yi/_/phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i/_/spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun/_/'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa/_/skabs la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gang yang rung 
[\[149b.2\]]bas spyod par bya/_/dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la/_/spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de/_/thams cad blang dor med par spyod/_/thabs kyi lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/_/pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam/_/mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin 
[\[149b.3\]]du/_/thabs la mkhas pas spyad par bya/_/skyes mchod thabs dang ldan pa yis/_/zhing dang spyod yul dag pa la/_/chags bral bde bar gang spyad pas/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi longs spyod la/_/bde ba chen por longs spyod cing /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[149b.4\]]dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing /_/don med lam la ma 'brel bar/_/sgra dang tshig la brten pa yis/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa/_/gang bsgrubs snang bar mi 'gyur gyi/_/nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar/_/bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa dang /_/mthong ba'i 
[\[149b.5\]]chos la sdug bsngal zhing /_/ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan 
[\[149b.6\]]dang /_/lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang /_/byang chub sems dang tshogs nyid kyi/_/dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya/_/gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun/_/gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i/_/ma lus rang rig byang chub sems/_/ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal 
[\[149b.7\]]ba/_/ma lus kun gyi snying po ste/_/phyogs bcu 'das dang ma byon pa'i/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med pa/_/de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin/_/de nyid 'jig rten 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]brtan g.yo ste/_/ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun/_/nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis/_/rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad/_/de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te/_/kun du sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/yon tan phrin las bsam yas 
[\[150a.2\]]mchog_/rang bzhin sprul sku bsam mi khyab/_/ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi/_/lus can snying la gang gnas pa'i/_/rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs/_/mi shigs thig le bde chen po/_/nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa/_/mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin/_/
[\[150a.3\]]de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las/_/ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can/_/rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor te/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/de nyid thig le phra rags par/_/snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab/_/de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu/_/sprul pa 
[\[150a.4\]]rang bzhin zhes bshad do/_/gang 'dir phung po 'byung ba dang /_/rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang /_/nyon mongs rtag chad yid chos bcas/_/gang la mngon par mi snang yang /_/rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te/_/kun la khyab par snang ba yin/_/rang snying dngas 
[\[150a.5\]]ma lngar ldan pa/_/dngas ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang /_/dbang po'i yul du bcas pa yi/_/rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/_/sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba/_/ma lus kun la rgyas btab po/_/bcud 'dus thig le chen po nyid/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[150a.6\]]nyid/_/bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis/_/thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang /_/gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro/_/'gro ba kun la rang bzhin snang /_/de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs/_/rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/_/
[\[150a.7\]]'du 'bral med par ye gnas pa'i/_/gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/zag med ye shes rang snang ba/_/dpag med yon tan rgya mtsho nyid/_/ye shes 'og min pho brang ste/_/zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus/_/mi 'jigs 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]phung po'i gdan stengs na/_/bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor/_/bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas/_/gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/_/rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i/_/rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag_/so so'i bzhugs 
[\[150b.2\]]tshul ldan pa yis/_/mdun rgyab phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid/_/yab yum 'brel pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/rang 'byung ma bsgribs ye shes phyir/_/zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i/_/nam mkha'i khams dang rgya mnyam pa'i/_/'jig rten grangs med rdul dang bcas/_/
[\[150b.3\]]bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas/_/gang de zag med ye shes kyi/_/phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas/_/zhal mthong rigs la dbang sgyur bas/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur/_/rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i/_/gsung mchog brjod du med pa nyid/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[150b.4\]]kyi mthar thug pa/_/brda dang don dang byin brlabs dang /_/gsang ba la sogs ci rigs par/_/dam pa'i chos sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs/_/zag med ye shes rgya mtsho yi/_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul mngon shar ba/_/a A/_i I/_u U/_e ai/_o au/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_a~M aH/_
[\[150b.5\]]ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_ta tha da d+ha na/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa ha/_k+Sha/_'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis/_/phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho dang /_/kho ra yug dang lhun po dang /_/'bab chu 
[\[150b.6\]]lteng ka mtshe'u bcas/_/de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/rang rang longs spyod bde sdug bcas/_/phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams/_/ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par byed/_/sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/_/de dag sbyangs nas mi gnas par/_/gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs 
[\[150b.7\]]te/_/de dag stong nyid la thim pas/_/ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur/_/a ni stong dang mi stong gi/_/dbu ma dmigs su'ang yod ma yin/_/ji snyed snang grags chos rnams kun/_/yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas/_/gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang /_/rang bzhin cho 'phrul 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ting 'dzin dang /_/gsang ba bris par gang snang ba/_/rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin/_/rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang /_/lha yi yi ge mngon snang bas/_/rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de/_/khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma lus snang /_/gang du thugs rje byin 
[\[151a.2\]]brlabs dang /_/ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te/_/rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin/_/'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa/_/gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun/_/yi ger ma gyur med par gnas/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs/_/
[\[151a.3\]]mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin/_/zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can/_/shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/_/gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis/_/ye shes ma bsgribs gsal ba yis/_/nam mkha' dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa/_/dus gsum chos dang 
[\[151a.4\]]'gro ba dang /_/zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang /_/ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa/_/snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid/_/me long lta bur mngon du snang /_/dpal ldan nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/_/ye shes lnga yis kun khyad can/_/kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug 
[\[151a.5\]]med/_/nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po/_/mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon/_/shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/_/sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can/_/thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag_/bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid/_/rang 'byung thugs las gzhan pa min/_/'di ni 
[\[151a.6\]]rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/_/gdul bya gang gi ngo dag tu/_/sna tshogs mngon par 'phrul pa yin/_/gang du khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i/_/srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag_/thugs rje khros pas gdul ba'i phyir/_/khro bo'i de bzhin 
[\[151a.7\]]gshegs par mdzad/_/sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid/_/zhabs dang phyag ni rdul snyed de/_/gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis/_/zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang /_/dbu dgu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag la sogs/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la sogs/_/de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des/_/ji snyed phyogs bcu 'jig rten du/_/cho 'phrul bzhi la sogs pa yi/_/mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis/_/dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang /_/dri 
[\[151b.2\]]za gshin rje gnod sbyin bcas/_/gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can/_/rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir/_/ma lus ba dag ma btang bar/_/nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis/_/ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma skams par/_/thugs rje zhe la mnan 
[\[151b.3\]]tshul gyis/_/de dag mngon du btul bar mdzad/_/la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung ste/_/la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid/_/la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste/_/la lar pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/_/la lar sna tshogs las su bcas/_/rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khril/_/
[\[151b.4\]]rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/_/mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te/_/de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang /_/pho nya yang sprul la sogs pa/_/rdo rje ba spu bu ga nas/_/pho nya bye ba drug cu dag_/phyogs bcu kun du rgyas bkye ste/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa 
[\[151b.5\]]yi/_/gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun/_/ma lus dus gcig btul nas ni/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod/_/de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te/_/sprul pa 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu/_/khams gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Dal 
[\[151b.6\]]phaT phaT phaT/_ha la ha la ha la hU~M phaT/_phaT phaT phaT/_trata tra ta tra ta/_kro Ta kro Ta kro Ta/_ha la ha la ha la/_hu lu hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_da ha da ha da ha/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_gardza gardza gardza/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_
[\[151b.7\]]phraT dz+wa la ra~M/_zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang /_/ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' thug par/_/ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/'khor yug stong gsum 'jig rten bcas/_/ma lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste/_/gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa/_/gang gi 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dbang du ma btang bar/_/gdug pa dus gcig btul bar mdzad/_/de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang /_/zhum pas smras shing gsol btab nas/_/rang snying phul nas dam mnos te/_/dmod btsugs rang gi lam la bzhag_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[152a.2\]]de dag kyang /_/la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad/_/la lar chags la chags chen po/_/la lar g.yem la g.yem par ston/_/sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste/_/nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon/_/zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid/_/gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang /_/chags 
[\[152a.3\]]khro dang ni sdang khra dang /_/rmongs khro gnon khro la sogs pas/_/bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/_/rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/_/gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad/_/gang phyir spros med goms pa 
[\[152a.4\]]nyid/_/de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun/_/rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid/_/'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang /_/mtshan med la sogs gang yang min/_/dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i/_/de bzhin 
[\[152a.5\]]nyid dbyings ye shes te/_/rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang /_/'di nyid gsal bar bsgom par bya/_/o~M d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i/_/tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing /_/blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas/_/'di ni de bzhin nyid ces 
[\[152a.6\]]bshad/_/'di la rim pa med pa ste/_/skyes bu mchog gi yul du gsungs/_/ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid/_/khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste/_/rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid/_/gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas/_/phyi nang 
[\[152a.7\]]chos rnams thams cad kun/_/goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid/_/de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid/_/mi shigs thig le dngas ma'i bdag_/bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med/_/rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid/_/thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]'dzin gyis/_/ye shes lnga yi ro dang bcas/_/bde chen skye ba med pa'i don/_/zag med khyab pa mngon du smin/_/ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid/_/phyi nang med pa'i rang 'byung ste/_/gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can/_/thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas/_/lus 
[\[152b.2\]]can kun la gsal bar skye/_/gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas ma nyid/_/rten can brten par bcas pa nyid/_/rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid/_/phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas/_/bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur/_/rang 'byung snying po dngas ma'i lus/_/'byung ba zag med snying 
[\[152b.3\]]por thim/_/thig le spros pa med pa ste/_/thams cad ma lus khyab par snang /_/rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun/_/snyigs ma dngas mar smin byas te/_/dngas ma ye shes snying por gsal/_/de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi/_/rang 'byung thig le spros pa med/_/dngas ma zag med stobs 
[\[152b.4\]]las snang /_/gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang /_/brtags pa'i gzungs ma las byung ba/_/dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las/_/skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal/_/sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po 
[\[152b.5\]]nyid/_/brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid/_/ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa/_/'khyud pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa yis/_/gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa/_/rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang /_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/byang chub sems kyi thig le ste/_/
[\[152b.6\]]rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid/_/rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas/_/ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal/_/ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs/_/dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur/_/'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 
[\[152b.7\]]'khor nyid du bshad/_/gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor pas/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i/_/rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid/_/ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba/_/de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom/_/de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar/_/gsal la stong pa'i rnal 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'byor bsgom/_/yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang /_/chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid/_/gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yis/_/ma dag pa ni sbyang byas te/_/dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya/_/e ya~M ba~M su la~M/_sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dag_/
[\[153a.2\]]rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom/_/de dbus rin chen khang pa dag_/mdzes pa'i tshul dang ldan pa ste/_/rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas/_/mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med/_/gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams dang /_/sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang /_/lnga brtsegs pha gu dra phyed dang /_/
[\[153a.3\]]'dod yon ka ba za ra tshags/_/mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan/_/mi 'jigs la sogs lnga dbus gdan/_/nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa/_/lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go/_/rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stengs su/_/sa bon cho ga las byung ba/_/gtso gzungs mthing ga rdo rje 
[\[153a.4\]]'dzin/_/'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin brlabs te/_/dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan pas/_/sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod/_/chos dbyings dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin/_/mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho/_/sor rtog pad+ma dmar po nub/_/bya grub ral gri ljang gu byang /_/
[\[153a.5\]]btsun mo rigs mthun dril 'dzin 'khril/_/'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan shar lho nas/_/sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin/_/sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril/_/nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin/_/phreng 'dzin mA le nam mkha' mdog_/spyan ras le brgan pad+ma dkar/_/gI ti pi wang
