[\[153a.6\]]dmar mo mdog_/rdor 'dzin ljang gu las kyi rigs/_/phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ljang /_/gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin/_/byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin/_/sgrib sel dmar ser glegs bam bsnams/_/kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen snye/_/'jam dpal dkar ljang 
[\[153a.7\]]ut+pal bsnams/_/btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste/_/spos dang mar me me tog dri/_/'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs/_/sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du/_/stobs chen gshin rje gshed po dang /_/rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi/_/lcags kyu zhags pa lcags 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]sgrog dril/_/mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang /_/ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyug dang /_/thod sbrul rdo rje rgya gram dang /_/yum yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas/_/sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs/_/khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni/_/kun bzang yab yum nam mkha'i mdog_/
[\[153b.2\]]phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te/_/mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro ba'i steng /_/rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan pa'o/_/thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang /_/dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste/_/phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul/_/pi wang go cha gseg par sgrom/_/po ti me chur shes par bya/_/mi 
[\[153b.3\]]bskyod byed po la sogs pa/_/rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan/_/gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te/_/ya mAn+ta kr-ita rtag pa'o/_/thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid/_/sku gsung thugs 'bar byin brlabs ldan/_/rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan/_/cho ga'i rim pa shes par 
[\[153b.4\]]bya/_/dngas ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid yin te/_/ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel/_/kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis/_/khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid/_/tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas/_/bde ba chen por byin gyis rlob/_/'byung lnga 
[\[153b.5\]]dngas ma'i snying po nyid/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te/_/d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings/_/mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas/_/nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi/_/thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang /_/'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid/_/ye shes lnga yi rang 
[\[153b.6\]]bzhin nyid/_/rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin/_/'byung lnga dngas mar bcas pa ni/_/dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste/_/mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang /_/de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni/_/gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas/_/nang gi sems dpa' yab 
[\[153b.7\]]yum nyid/_/so so'i rtsa bcud gnas pa'i rten/_/dbang po dus bzhi re bcas pa nyid/_/phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni/_/gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro/_/gang de dngas mas bskyed pa yis/_/lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas/_/sgo bzhi yab yum shes 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]par bya/_/bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid/_/kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid/_/nyon mongs drug gi yul rnams su/_/sprul ba'i thig ler rang shar ba'o/_/'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa/_/sprul ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab/_/kun kyang dngas ma'i rang bzhin 
[\[154a.2\]]las/_/ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa/_/gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa/_/ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o/_/sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung /_/bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan/_/'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas/_/ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas/_/yan lag nyid 
[\[154a.3\]]du 'di shes bya/_/stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa/_/sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi/_/rigs brtags gzungs ma blang bar bya/_/rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas la/_/lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya/_/rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid/_/phrad pa sa dang gsher ba chu/_/drod med bskyod pa rlung nyid 
[\[154a.4\]]de/_/bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha' nyid/_/b+h+ru~M dbyibs b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas/_/sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang /_/nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan/_/che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par ldan/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro/_/lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi/_/rang bzhin 
[\[154a.5\]]de dang mnyam sbyar bas/_/ye shes phra rags gnyis su med/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/_/dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas/_/rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing /_/rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang 
[\[154a.6\]]thob nas/_/thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis/_/brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog_/dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la/_/bzlog bya ngas kyang mi dmigs so/_/bde ba'i thig le sa bon la/_/thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis/_/dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas/_/
[\[154a.7\]]dngos 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan/_/bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir/_/ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas/_/bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni/_/yon tan kun gyi ngo bo bas/_/che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas/_/de nas rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis/_/ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir/_/gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad/_/b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he/_hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/_oM dzri na dzika/_swA~M rat+na d+h+r-ika/_A~MH_A ro lig/_hA~M 
[\[154b.2\]]pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/_mu~M d+hA twI shwa rI/_lA~M dwe Sha ra ti mA~M mo ha ra ti/_byA~M rA ga ra ti/_tA~M badzra ra ti/_k+ShIM ha rA dza ya/_trA~M A gar+b+ha ya/_hrI ha hU~M pad+ma ba da ya/_dzIM ku ru pa NI hrIH/_hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_trA~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH/_hrI gI tI rA go\u0f85ha~M/_a nr-i t+ye rA ga yA /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/_th+k+hi~M nis+sa ra~M b+ha 
[\[154b.3\]]ya swA hA/_hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/_mu~M shrI a ra~M gA ya swA hU~M/_dzaHng+hU pa pra be sha/_hU~M puSh+pa a be sha/_pa~M dI ba su khi ni/_ho gan+d+he tsit+ta/_hU~M ya mAt+na kr-ita dzaHphaT/_hU~M big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/_hU~M pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ba~M phaT/_hU~M pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hoHphaT/_o~M ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/_o~M 
[\[154b.4\]]ma hA rat+na d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_o~M ma hA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_o~M ma hA karma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/_a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta o~M/_o~M mu ne kri~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne hU~M dru~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne sru~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne pra~M swA hA/_
[\[154b.5\]]o~M mu ne sha~M swA hA/_o~M mu na ye swA hA/_o~M e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/_ma hA ka ru NI ka tr-i sh+ya ho/_sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_sa sa sa sa sa/_ma ma ma ma ma/_ya ya ya ya ya/_o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_o~M sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i/_/
[\[154b.6\]]gsang ba zab mo sku gsungs thugs/_/gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i/_/da lta nyid du dbyer med shog_/o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_o~M badzra sa ma ya hoH_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_zhes brjod pas/_sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag_/gnyis med ro gcig 
[\[154b.7\]]'dres nas kyang /_/stong gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/_/o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_mu~M mA~M lA~M pA~M tA~M/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_trA~M trA~M trA~M trA~M/_d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri/_AHAHAHAH/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrab ldan pas/_/gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]lnga/_/'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang /_/sgo bzhi rab 'byam la sogs pa/_/dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad/_/'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas/_/khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim/_/rang rang phyag mtshan 
[\[155a.2\]]gdan dang bcas/_/bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o/_/de nas rgyal ba de dag gis/_/dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir/_/gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad/_/o~M ma hA shU n+yatA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_
[\[155a.3\]]o~M ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA pra t+yA bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ShA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba 
[\[155a.4\]]ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs/_/
[\[155a.5\]]rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur/_/tsit+ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas/_/rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod/_/mi shigs thig le za ma tog_/rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/tsit+ta'i khams lnga'i snying po la/_/bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid/_/
[\[155a.6\]]ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du/_/gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod/_/gang de dngas ma ye shes lnga/_/gang du mi phyed rdo rjer gsal/_/dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang /_/btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod/_/khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid/_/rang 'byung 
[\[155a.7\]]ye shes bde ba'i thugs/_/rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid/_/thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du bshad/_/de yis gang la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud/_/sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'chang ba/_/yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]dbang sgyur gnyis med gang yin pas/_/yab yum 'brel ba'i ngo bor bshad/_/rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten/_/so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid/_/gang la de dbang de yi phyir/_/'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad/_/gang de khams lnga'i bde ba yis/_/mnyes dang thig le 
[\[155b.2\]]bkod pa dang /_/nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang /_/de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te/_/zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad/_/dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal/_/thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs/_/gang 
[\[155b.3\]]de thabs chen gsal byas pas/_/lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs/_/bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba/_/ma lus 'joms las khro bo'o/_/bcud las 'das pa'i hU~M gsum nyid/_/byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings/_/ma lus rnam dag 
[\[155b.4\]]kun du bzang /_/dngas snyigs snying por 'brel ba yis/_/nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas/_/thig les btul nas bstan pa 'chad/_/sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin/_/kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro/_/khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing /_/snang srid bde chen sku gsung 
[\[155b.5\]]thugs/_/dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus/_/phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can/_/ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste/_/yon tan byin brlabs kun gyi gnas/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rang bzhin du/_/
[\[155b.6\]]rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta/_/nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid/_/phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye/_/gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol/_/snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas/_/dngas ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal/_/rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal/_/gsang 
[\[155b.7\]]ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa/_/dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes/_/rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga/_/snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta/_/thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams/_/rang rang thig le bde bar gsal/_/ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams/_/bde ba chen 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]po gsal bar shes/_/dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis sgegs/_/sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags/_/gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te/_/bskyod cing 'pho ba'i gar gyis mnyes/_/thugs gang thig le brten pa'i gnas/_/gang yul bde bar dbang byed 
[\[156a.2\]]pa'i/_/rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis/_/rang rang thig le skyed par byed/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid/_/dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang /_/thig le rlung dang stod smad bsdams/_/bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs 
[\[156a.3\]]yin te/_/tshim dang thig le dor ba dang /_/ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas/_/rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags/_/gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang /_/rnam shes gang yin ta krita de/_/bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas/_/rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa/_/
[\[156a.4\]]sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags/_/shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags/_/shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa/_/rang rig byed pa yid ces bya/_/rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid/_/rtogs bya kun du bzang mor bshad/_/'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs 
[\[156a.5\]]bcas/_/zil ba'i thig sngon lam bzhin du/_/thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis/_/gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston/_/sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs/_/bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan/_/'dod pa'i yan lag sum brgya dang /_/drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas/_/
[\[156a.6\]]tha mal zhen pa rang grol nas/_/rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas/_/rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags/_/yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung /_/nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od/_/rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis/_/'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas/_/ma lus lhan cig skyes 
[\[156a.7\]]par gsal/_/de nyid gsang bar shes par bya/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/_/bzhi bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi/_/thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid/_/rang rang mtshon pa'i rtags yin te/_/rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du/_/rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]'bar/_/dril bu pad+ma rin po che/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o/_/gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes/_/dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o/_/rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/_/pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che/_/ut+pal klu shing po ti snye/_/gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng 
[\[156b.2\]]ba dang /_/pi wang gar sgyur pog me dang /_/byug pa so sor rim shes bya/_/nr-i mgo rdo rje thod rgya gram/_/lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH/_/'od 'phro mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal/_/ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril/_/thugs la brtan pa nyid du gsungs/_/thub chen 
[\[156b.3\]]nges par phyag gnyis shes/_/gseg par go mtshon pi wang brdab/_/sgrom stob bo ti chos 'chad tshul/_/me dpung bum par shes par bya/_/gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag_/mi mthun khyad par rgyas par bstan/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/rgya gram dril 
[\[156b.4\]]bu brgyad shes bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol/_/rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so/_/pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce/_/rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche/_/gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa ste/_/rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i/_/thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya/_/dngas ma'i 
[\[156b.5\]]ye shes lnga 'bar bas/_/gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang /_/ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid/_/rnam par mi rtog rim par shes/_/yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod/_/de bzhin ma gos ye shes nyid/_/so so yon tan cha las byung /_/rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs/_/
[\[156b.6\]]so so nyid ltar rang gnas te/_/bde ba'i thig le nyid du shes/_/rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid/_/'brel pa'i tshul gyis kun snang ba/_/khu ba rtsa yi dbyibs gzugs nyid/_/rang rang las dang rtog pa dang /_/snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas/_/bde chen thugs 
[\[156b.7\]]su gsal brtan pa/_/thugs kyi dus su shes par bya/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las/_/thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid/_/dpag tu med par rang snang ba/_/bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od/_/ma lus de der snang ba 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]nyid/_/ma lus gnyis med thig le yi/_/bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga/_/de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo/_/thugs kyi rang rtags bsam mi khyab/_/bde ba'i thugs las gzhan ma yin/_/gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang /_/thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa 
[\[157a.2\]]dang /_/mi shigs thig le'i snying po la/_/sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya/_/don dam thig le pad rtse la/_/rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya/_/de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad/_/cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis/_/rang snying 
[\[157a.3\]]rgyu yi sa bon hU~M/_/dag pas rim pas gsal ba la/_/rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga/_/rang 'byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir/_/'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya/_/e ya~M ra~M su~M ke~M ra~M/_so so las rnams byas nas ni/_/nam mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung /_/khrag gi dba' klong 
[\[157a.4\]]'khrug pa dang /_/gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri/_/zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya/_/mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste/_/las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag_/b+h+ru~M las dur khrod gzhal yas khang /_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang /_/bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas/_/
[\[157a.5\]]thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags/_/zhing gi gdung dang ka ba ste/_/sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas/_/khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang /_/thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can/_/nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la/_/dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas/_/de bzhin gsal 
[\[157a.6\]]bar bsgom par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/_/cho ga las byung rim pa yis/_/gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya/_/sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis/_/gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni/_/rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas/_/hU~M 
[\[157a.7\]]gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs/_/ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba/_/dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs/_/rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma/_/sbos mo dang ni gtum mo dang /_/sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i/_/so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas/_/sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing /_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrogs/_/'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya/_/he brgyad sa bon las byung ba/_/stag dang seng ge wa dang khyi/_/bya rgod kang ka 'ug pa dang /_/pho rog la sogs phra men rnams/_/'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan/_/rim pa ji bzhin de 
[\[157b.2\]]bzhin bsam/_/phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang /_/sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin/_/las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang /_/rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin/_/de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga/_/yab yum phyag rgya 'brel bar gnas/_/rtsibs mchan gru chad bzhi 
[\[157b.3\]]dag la/_/gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya/_/bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad/_/phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya/_/sgo bzhir sgo ba rngam tshul gnas/_/bar khyams tha ma dag la ni/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid/_/
[\[157b.4\]]rim pa bzhin du bkod par bya/_/rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag_/gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te/_/yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/_/gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid/_/spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod/_/bde 
[\[157b.5\]]ba'i thig les kun khyab la/_/chos nyid snying rje kun du snang /_/thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu/_/zag pa med pa'i snying po yin/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can/_/thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel/_/gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis/_/ma lus kun la khyab pa yin/_/dz+ha~M sgo 
[\[157b.6\]]g.yo ba'i sa sgo can/_/bskyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa/_/lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni/_/khyad par so sor snang ba yin/_/de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin/_/'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid/_/zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa/_/drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin/_/
[\[157b.7\]]thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud/_/gsher dang 'dzag pa'i ba~M snying can/_/sdang dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can/_/lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya/_/gang la gang rten de yi brten/_/thig le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten/_/de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa/_/brten 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/'khor lo gzhal yas rang bzhin te/_/rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can/_/lus la gnas pas dur khrod de/_/kha dog rtsa dang bcud bsdus pa'i/_/rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa nyid/_/gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid/_/gnyis 
[\[158a.2\]]med bde ba chen po'i lha/_/sa bon yi ge bde ba yis/_/sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid/_/gcig kyang khyams lnga'i bde ba'i ros/_/ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/lus la thig le chen po gnas/_/gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid/_/thabs chen thabs las 
[\[158a.3\]]byung ba yi/_/nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med/_/'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad/_/thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags/_/nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de/_/dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid/_/yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[158a.4\]]gsal bar snang /_/gnas kyi thig le bde ba can/_/dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste/_/gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad/_/thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid/_/dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel/_/snying po thig le nyid du sbyor/_/gang dang lhan cig skyes pa 
[\[158a.5\]]las/_/bde ba chen po skye ba med/_/ma lus bde ba chen po nyid/_/khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro/_/sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'/_/rang 'byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs/_/kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal/_/rnam thar 
[\[158a.6\]]gsum ldan e yi gzugs/_/bde ba bskyod dang thig le bskul/_/'phro dang sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung /_/rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa/_/rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa/_/shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba/_/gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin/_/de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar 
[\[158a.7\]]bas/_/bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye/_/b+h+ru~M las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog_/sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te/_/yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can/_/dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]dang ldan/_/'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan/_/bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs/_/thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro/_/nyi zla 'brel ba'i bde ba'i lha/_/'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis/_/'khor ba'i sa bon zad byed pas/_/za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o/_/dpag med 
[\[158b.2\]]thig le'i rang bzhin gang /_/sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na/_/bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs/_/sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs/_/'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te/_/gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas/_/dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab po/_/gsang ba thig le chen po 
[\[158b.3\]]ni/_/rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid/_/rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas/_/'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/_/gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/_/gnyis med 
[\[158b.4\]]bcud du gyur pa na/_/de yi bde ba chen po nyid/_/khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs/_/ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes/_/gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i tshul gyis snang /_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad/_/de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun/_/
[\[158b.5\]]gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par/_/rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te/_/bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi/_/drag po lha yi sngags dag dang /_/de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad/_/b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he/_dz+nyA na ka pa la rat+na pany+tsa hU~M/_
[\[158b.6\]]ma hA de pa s+thi ra baM/_sUr+ya tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hU~M/_de steng so so'i sku nyid dag_/gsal pa'i rim pa dgod par bya/_/o~M bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M rat+na ma hA shrI 
[\[158b.7\]]he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA badzra 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]d+ha ra kro d+hI shwa ri dza la nI hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bi da ma hU~M phaT/_o~M shrI sha ta sa man+ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra gau rI ha/_badzra tsau rI ha/_badzra pra mo hA ha/_badzra bait+ta lI ha/_
[\[159a.2\]]badzra buk+ka sI ha/_badzra g+ha sma rI ha/_badzra sma shA nI ha/_badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/_badzra siM ha mu khI he/_badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/_badzra sr-ing+gA la mu khI he/_badzra shwa na mu khI he/_badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/_badzra kAng+ka mu khI he/_badzra kA ka mu khI he/_badzra ul+lU kA mu khI he/_badzra Ar+ya te dza teng dza/_
[\[159a.3\]]badzra a mu khA hU~M/_badzra lo kA ba~M/_badzra b+ha smi sa ma ya ba to hoH/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_badzra ma nu rAk+Sha si/_badzra brah+ma NI/_badzra rau tri/_badzra baiSh+Na be/_badzra kau mA rI/_badzra in+d+ra ye/_badzra sUr+ya ye/_badzra bing+ga le/_
[\[159a.4\]]badzra sau me/_badzra a mr-i tA/_badzra daN+Da nI/_badzra rAk+Sha si/_badzra b+hak+Sha si/_badzra ra ti haM/_badzra ru d+hi ro ma t+ya~M/_badzra e ka tsa raM/_badzra ma no ha raM/_badzra sid+d+hi kaM/_badzra bA ya be/_badzra ma hA mA ra Ni/_badzra ag+na ye/_badzra bA rA hI/_badzra tsa muN+DI/_badzra pU ta nA/_badzra 
[\[159a.5\]]bA ru Ni/_badzra ma hA kA lA/_badzra tsa ka lA/_badzra kum+b+ha kar+NA/_badzra lam+bo d+ha rA/_ru lu ru lu hU~M/_e h+ye hi A na ya/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHra~M/_oM badzra kro d+ha ya ma ya hU~M/_oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/_/thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/_/'bar ba'i byin brlabs 
[\[159a.6\]]rmad po che/_/de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/_/oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/_oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/_a li u li tA li ta pa li/_rda~MSh+Ta gau na ra tri/_kha ra~M yo gi ni kha hi hoH/_hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo ra~M/_gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni/_/
[\[159a.7\]]phyogs bcu tshig cing rab tu tshig_/kun du rab tu tshig par 'gyur/_/'bar dang rab 'byam kun du 'bar/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis/_/gang zhig rab gang kun du gang /_/'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun du 'khrugs/_/'thor zhing 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]rab 'thor kun du 'thor/_/'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba yi/_/sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/_/phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa/_/thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te/_/de dag bde bas bslang byas te/_/bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i 
[\[159b.2\]]gar/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed/_/rdo rje gsang ba rang bzhin las/_/thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur/_/gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid/_/ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid/_/ma lus thig ler 
[\[159b.3\]]rgyas btab pa/_/nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid/_/ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid/_/khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te/_/mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che/_/snying rje chen por brjod pa yin/_/kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste/_/ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid/_/mi shigs snying ga'i 
[\[159b.4\]]pho brang nyid/_/ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang /_/nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so/_/nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid/_/gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan/_/phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa/_/rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te/_/
[\[159b.5\]]rang snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid/_/dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid/_/rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid/_/rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/_/bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid/_/phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid/_/dgug dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams/_/thig le'i rang 
[\[159b.6\]]bzhin gnyis su med/_/dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam/_/dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs/_/dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas/_/thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis/_/phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg_/dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs/_/bde 
[\[159b.7\]]ba chen po'i don la 'jug_/gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar/_/sku gsung thugs su kun gsal bas/_/gnyis med thim pas mnyes par mdzad/_/rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun/_/rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim/_/dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]mongs kun/_/tshig pa gsum du shes par bya/_/ye shes bde ba chen po nyid/_/'bar ba gsum du shes par bya/_/byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis/_/ma lus gang zhing khyab par gyur/_/thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid/_/thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu/_/'og ma nyid ni 
[\[160a.2\]]steng du 'bar/_/gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor/_/lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang /_/ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang /_/bde bas dbang sgyur tshim pa'i sgra/_/ma lus khyab par sgrogs par byed/_/sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid/_/bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings/_/
[\[160a.3\]]'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid/_/reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid/_/re dogs rgyu ba chad pa nyid/_/de bzhin nyid du blta bar bya/_/thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis/_/sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid/_/ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i/_/rang 'byung phyogs med kun du snang /_/thabs 
[\[160a.4\]]dang shes rab bde ba yis/_/'byung ba'i rim pa'i dngas ma ste/_/sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags/_/b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/_/bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten/_/sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod/_/phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga/_/
[\[160a.5\]]ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan/_/nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni/_/bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid/_/thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na/_/ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan/_/gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga/_/'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan/_/myong 
[\[160a.6\]]dang yul bcas rnam shes yul/_/phra men nyid du shes par bya/_/phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi/_/sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya/_/sgal tshigs 'dzug pa'i thig le nyid/_/dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya/_/gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/_/bde ba chen po 
[\[160a.7\]]spyan drangs pas/_/rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug_/rim pa gnyis med brda mjal mchog_/sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid/_/gnyis su med par thim par mdzad/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun/_/bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur/_/sangs rgyas gab 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]tse snying po la/_/ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan/_/thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro/_/ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med/_/phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las/_/lhan cig skyes pa gsal 
[\[160b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i/_/thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid/_/gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste/_/rang rig bde ba chen por thim/_/sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig_/kha sbyor snying po za ma tog_/sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las/_/ma lus 
[\[160b.3\]]thig le gnas par mdzad/_/sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni/_/bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de/_/rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel/_/gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas/_/gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud nyid de/_/gsang ba yon tan 
[\[160b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i mdzod/_/snying po'i lam la gnas par bya/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i snying po la/_/rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/gnyis med thig les gang ba yi/_/bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char/_/brten las byung ba'i rten can nyid/_/gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas/_/
[\[160b.5\]]thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/_/bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid/_/rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad/_/rdo rje rdo rje dril bu dang /_/'jig rten 
[\[160b.6\]]'khor yug bcas pa 'degs/_/de bzhin khor yug bcas pa 'degs/_/de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang /_/kha T+wA~M rab tu 'khrol ba'o/_/nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang /_/rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdebs/_/chags mchog pad+ma chen po dang /_/dril bu rnga yi sgra 
[\[160b.7\]]sgrogs pa'o/_/las ni ral gri gshol chen dang /_/'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste/_/bar ma rdo rje dung dmar 'khrug_/sti ra chen por brdebs pa'o/_/btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang /_/'khril bas pad+ma rak+ta stobs/_/gnas dang yul gyi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]phyag rgya ni/_/byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang /_/byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul/_/byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang /_/mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas/_/steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang /_/byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lta/_/rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu gri 
[\[161a.2\]]dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/_/lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/_/rang gi stan dang lag cha dang /_/ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/_/kun kyang mdzes 
[\[161a.3\]]pa'i rgyan dang bcas/_/zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can/_/dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings/_/sha da pa yi glu len cing /_/dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul/_/snam zhing che la rked pa phra/_/nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing 'gying /_/dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can/_/
[\[161a.4\]]gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang /_/so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni/_/srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang /_/tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams/_/lha chen dkar ljang ti shU la/_/gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang /_/gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen/_/brgya byin 
[\[161a.5\]]dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs/_/rdo rje ser mo tsan+dan 'thung /_/bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams/_/zla ba dkar mo buN+Da rI/_/be con ljang gnag dbyug to 'phyar/_/srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung /_/za ba ljang nag ba su 'dren/_/dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang /_/stobs 
[\[161a.6\]]chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma/_/rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod/_/'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs/_/nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin/_/rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar/_/gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so/_/me mo dmar mo gsal shing 'chang /_/phag mo nag mo mche 
[\[161a.7\]]zhags can/_/rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za/_/sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung /_/chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin/_/rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin/_/rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags/_/rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/_/rdo rje ljang gnag dril 'khrol 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'gying /_/so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang /_/yon tan phrin las khro bo'i phyir/_/lnga bcu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang /_/sku 
[\[161b.2\]]mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag_/rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba brtag_/de ltar bsams dang bris pa dang /_/brjod dang mos pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos/_/rngam pa'i zhal gdangs spyan zlog cing /_/
[\[161b.3\]]mche gtsigs phyogs bcur gom pa yis/_/'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad pas/_/'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul/_/o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M/_ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kra kro/_d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/_
[\[161b.4\]]hU~M kA ra bi dza ya/_nI la daN+Da/_ya mAt+na ka/_Ar+ya a tsa la/_ha ya grA ba/_a pa rA dzi ta/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_trai lokya bi dza ya/_ma hA ba la/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_'di dag mngon du phyung ba yis/_/ri bos gzhi 'gul byed cing /_/
[\[161b.5\]]rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang /_/sngags kyi sgra chen grag par 'gyur/_/hU~M mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can/_/gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin dang /_/gzhan 'joms bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal/_/stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis/_/rang rang bgegs kun rnam par 
[\[161b.6\]]gzir/_/ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par mdzad/_/gardza gardza/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_tshin+da tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_/khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[161b.7\]]po 'di dag kyang /_/blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bskal pa'i me ri nang rol du/_/bri'am bsam mam dmigs bya ba/_/mthing ga dkar po mthing nag dang /_/ljang sngon dmar gnag dud ka ljang /_/dkar ljang dung dmar mdog tu snang /_/khro mo lus dang grib 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]mar gnas/_/'khor lo nr-i mgo rdo rje stir/_/drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang /_/gshin rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug 'phyar/_/ral gri bden bral stir dbyug gshog_/ba dan brgyad thogs be ra~M nyid/_/rin chen nr-i mgo gsum gyi dbyug_/rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i 
[\[162a.2\]]mgo dang /_/thong gshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs/_/yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste/_/blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni/_/bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig_/pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rang lus rten dang brten pa 
[\[162a.3\]]yi/_/dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag_/lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs/_/thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas/_/gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste/_/khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang /_/ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang /_/bla bre rdo rje ra ba dang /_/'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang /_/nyi 
[\[162a.4\]]zla skar khung rdzing bu dang /_/bskyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs/_/cod pan nyi zla pad+ma ra bcas/_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang /_/rang 'byung tsit+ta'i 'khor lo na/_/thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid/_/ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros/_/cho 'phrul bstan 
[\[162a.5\]]dang gdug pa 'dul/_/so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi/_/ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom/_/'byung bzhi dngas ma yum nyid de/_/bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha'i khams/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud/_/zla ba nyi ma gnas 
[\[162a.6\]]pa yi/_/shrI ra tsit+ta'i thig le la/_/nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang /_/spyod yul bde bar sgyur ba dang /_/thig le so sor dgod par nus/_/phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste/_/bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid/_/thig le ye shes lngar ldan pa/_/thabs nyid dngas ma yum du bshad/_/
[\[162a.7\]]rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid/_/tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang /_/gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa/_/phra men nyid du shes par bya/_/gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid de/_/sgal tshigs la rten bde ba'i bcud/_/'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma/_/gnas rten bcu yi thig 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]le la/_/'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed/_/nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med/_/spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad/_/zla ba nyi ma la brten te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi lam rgyud de/_/thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang /_/re dogs med dang rnam par dran/_/bde ba'i yan lag 
[\[162b.2\]]bzhi ru 'gyur/_/'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya bzhis/_/rdo rje snying po'i pad+mar 'brel/_/bskyod pa rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas/_/nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char/_/de nyid kun du khyab pa las/_/ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur/_/bde ba chen po gnyis med pa/_/kha sbyar bsrub pa'i 
[\[162b.3\]]thabs las skyes/_/thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le/_/ma lus 'dus pa bcud kyi ro/_/rten la brten can nyams myong ba/_/lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes/_/chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga/_/thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste/_/gang la rten dang 'bar dang 
[\[162b.4\]]'dzag_/bde ba'i rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/_/de bzhin btsun mo dgyes skyed pa/_/mi phyed gnyis med lhan cig pa/_/gang de thabs las byung ba yi/_/dngos gnyis yul dang dbang po'i tshogs/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid/_/ma lus bde bar rang snang ba/_/
[\[162b.5\]]gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las byung /_/gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan/_/dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdam dang 'bebs/_/ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te/_/sgal tshigs brgyud pa thig le'i rgyun/_/dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya/_/ba spu thig le 'brel 
[\[162b.6\]]pa nyid/_/phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba/_/grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar/_/sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le/_/khams gsum bcud 'dus bde chen po/_/yungs kar lhung med brtan pa las/_/ma lus khyab pa'i 
[\[162b.7\]]tshul gyis snang /_/thig le bde chen thabs sbyor ba/_/thob dang gom pa'i rang bzhin las/_/zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas/_/rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste/_/sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya/_/snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos/_/bde ba chen po'i 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]thig ler brten/_/nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar/_/bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don/_/ma lus bde chen rgyan du snang /_/de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa/_/rang 'byung ye shes chen 
[\[163a.2\]]po ste/_/de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog_/ji snyed brtan g.yo snang ba'i chos/_/chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos/_/ma lus kun la mthun snang ba/_/rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/_/de dag gdod nas ma skyes pa'i/_/rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de/_/gang yang dngos min ngo bo 
[\[163a.3\]]nyid/_/shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no/_/ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs/_/ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/dpag med mthun par snang ba ste/_/me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid/_/sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel pa bzhin/_/ma lus 
[\[163a.4\]]rig pa'i thig le las/_/ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang /_/ji snyed rab 'byam ma lus pa'i/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra/_/nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i/_/'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa/_/brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang /_/byin 
[\[163a.5\]]brlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba/_/byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste/_/nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar/_/rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid/_/bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed par/_/ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas/_/gang du nam mkha' 
[\[163a.6\]]mtha' klas bar/_/bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar/_/nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang /_/sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar/_/ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang /_/nges dang ma nges dam pa dang /_/dman dang chags dang chags bral dang /_/zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang /_/rnam par ma 
[\[163a.7\]]med brtags pa'i chos/_/dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung /_/ma lus rig pa rang snang ba/_/snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa'am/_/rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar/_/sna tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min/_/gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i/_/ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/_/rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med/_/ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs/_/rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid/_/yon tan lhun grub rang snang bas/_/
[\[163b.2\]]de yi brnyan ma rang bzhin 'char/_/mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni/_/cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir/_/yang dag brtan par mi gnas pas/_/ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor shar/_/bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid/_/yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar/_/
[\[163b.3\]]dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir/_/bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te/_/skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i/_/gdul bya mtho dman rim pa la/_/rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/_/dang po nas bzung mthar thug par/_/rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du/_/de dag ngo la de ltar 
[\[163b.4\]]snang /_/gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste/_/thun mong yul du gyur phyir ro/_/ma lus tha dad med pa yi/_/phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus/_/bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas/_/mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos/_/rang 'byung bde ba chen po'i gzugs/_/dngas 
[\[163b.5\]]snyigs 'brel pa'i nus mthu las/_/zag pa yod dang med pa yi/_/dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang /_/rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la/_/nus pa'i khyad par so so yis/_/'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang /_/bde ba chen po la sogs pa/_/thig le nus pa'i stobs las 
[\[163b.6\]]snang /_/ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid/_/thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs/_/rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni/_/bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba/_/ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid/_/ma lus snod bcud kun du snang /_/thabs chen gsang ba'i rim 
[\[163b.7\]]pa nyid/_/khams bzhi las brten thig le nyid/_/g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim/_/bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis/_/gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la/_/zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam/_/me long dang ba'i ri bo yi/_/rtser phyin ma lus bltas 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]pa ltar/_/bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang /_/rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid/_/bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba/_/gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal/_/mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar/_/'dzag dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid/_/til 'bru 'bras 
[\[164a.2\]]bu smin pa ltar/_/ma lus til gyi phung po ltar/_/thig le'i lus su gnas pa yin/_/nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe/_/'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang /_/'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar/_/rnam par rol pa'i tshogs su snang /_/snang srid bde ba chen po 
[\[164a.3\]]nyid/_/tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na/_/thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang /_/rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis/_/thig le stong par thim pa na/_/ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su nges/_/snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun/_/bde chen rig pa'i gzugs 
[\[164a.4\]]brnyan du/_/rgya mtsho mjings nas bltas pa ltar/_/ma lus de ltar snang ba yin/_/rig pas nyams su myong ba dang /_/spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad/_/rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid/_/gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang /_/gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan 
[\[164a.5\]]phyir/_/thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi/_/cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing /_/dbang bskur byin brlabs sbyang ba dang /_/brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang /_/drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis/_/chu skyes snying po rdo rje can/_/nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba/_/rang 'byung rlung gi 
[\[164a.6\]]phyag rgyas bskyod/_/nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med/_/ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus/_/rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na/_/rig pa stong ba'i thig ler thim/_/a ta la rten thig le'i rim/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang /_/gsang 
[\[164a.7\]]ba'i thig le la rten pas/_/ma lus bde chen 'khor lo sgyur/_/lus kyi thig le dang por te/_/de nas rig pa'i thig le yin/_/de nas ye shes thig le nyid/_/tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim/_/de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med/_/bde chen nam mkha'i 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]khams nyid de/_/zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi/_/rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i/_/bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar/_/ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan te/_/rtogs pas nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid/_/mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di/_/dman dang 
[\[164b.2\]]yan lag ma tshang dang /_/dbang dang man ngag med pa dang /_/dka' thub can dang ma smin dang /_/skal med yal ba'i yul min pas/_/gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid/_/tha mal brod pa 
[\[164b.3\]]bskyed pa'i phyir/_/cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang /_/ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la/_/lhag par 'di yis rtogs 'gyur bas/_/lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin/_/gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas/_/lhag par mtshon par nye ba 
[\[164b.4\]]dang /_/gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa/_/lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/_/'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod/_/gang las gang de thabs 'di yis/_/mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs/_/thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing /_/dngos 
[\[164b.5\]]gzhi nyid ma yin pa'i phyir/_/gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin/_/gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis/_/de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar/_/ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la/_/de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de/_/dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no/_/rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin 
[\[164b.6\]]no/_/dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/ye shes rang 'byung lnga yi gzugs/_/zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang /_/de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis/_/zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid/_/'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no/_/
[\[164b.7\]]gang phyir chos dbyings ngo bo la/_/tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang /_/mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te/_/gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas/_/thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir/_/longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan/_/zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can/_/thabs dang drag pos tshar 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bcad phyir/_/de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste/_/lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad/_/gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i/_/steng 'og phyogs bzhi bar mtshams dag_/legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med/_/phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog_/rang gi sa gzhi 
[\[165a.2\]]legs brtags la/_/pra dang nyams kyis ltas brtags la/_/ma dag mtshan ngan spang byas la/_/dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya/_/sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa/_/gal te rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir/_/snang dang mi snang bdag po la/_/mgu bas bar chad med par bslang /_/
[\[165a.3\]]gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir/_/cho ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te/_/mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la/_/sa gzhi bdag gis dbang du bya/_/thun mong skyon bsal dag byas nas/_/mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing /_/dngos grub myur zhing nyams dga' ba'i/_/phyi nang dag pa 
[\[165a.4\]]chen por sbyang /_/rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos/_/gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la/_/lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas/_/lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlab/_/gang de'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/_/sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la/_/rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor 
[\[165a.5\]]lo spro/_/hU~M bzhi sngags dang bcas pas bsrung /_/de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir/_/ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de/_/las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas/_/rgyal ba kun la gsol btab la/_/'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bar/_/dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung /_/
[\[165a.6\]]gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis/_/ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag_/rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis/_/mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas/_/dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin/_/tshad ni rjes su mthun pa ste/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/yang na sor bzhi 
[\[165a.7\]]tshad du ste/_/yang na mdzub gang tshad du bya/_/yang na lus gang tshad du ste/_/yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid/_/yang na [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid du'am/_/nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya/_/yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad de/_/rang gi rig pa rjes mthun par/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad/_/
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te/_/yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas/_/mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni/_/gang dang 'brel pa'i cho ga brtsam/_/gzhan du longs spyod ma byas pa'i/_/ras bal dur khrod rgyu las byas/_/gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med/_/
[\[165b.2\]]byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs/_/thim pas ye shes thig skud de/_/rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/gsang ba'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brang sa/_/ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad/_/
[\[165b.3\]]gang gis gang mtshon de bzhin te/_/kha dog lnga dang phung po dang /_/khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir ro/_/rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir/_/tshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid/_/ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir tshon/_/kha 
[\[165b.4\]]dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/_/lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/_/gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya/_/pad+ma in+d+ra nI la nyid/_/rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis/_/mkhas pas 'byor ldan ci bder bri/_/yang na 'bras dang sA lu la/_/kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhin no/_/dman dang 'byor pa chung 
[\[165b.5\]]ba yis/_/'byung khungs lnga yis bri bar bya/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis/_/ye shes rin chen phyi nang med/_/dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya/_/o~M a~M hU~M swA hA/_/sarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/_/'bru bcu spung zhing 'bun pa yi/_/
[\[165b.6\]]sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/_/zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/_/ye shes rin chen rtsig pa ste/_/dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang /_/rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang /_/rin chen sa gzhi skyed shing dang /_/rdzing bu dril bu g.yer khas spras/_/rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par 
[\[165b.7\]]bya/_/gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang /_/thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin/_/tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa/_/mchog chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod/_/lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste/_/gza' brgyad nyi zla'i glo skar ldan/_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid/_/dra ba dra phyed rnam par spras/_/phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag_/gdul phyir rta babs bzhir bshad de/_/sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba dang /_/dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas spras/_/khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang /_/dur khrod 'dod 
[\[166a.2\]]yon ldan pa'o/_/dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas/_/skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad/_/rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rba rlabs 'khyil/_/thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung /_/'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan/_/zhing 'phan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas/_/
[\[166a.3\]]lha chen thod pa sbub stengs na/_/tsit+ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro/_/he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/ma lus bri zhing bsgom par bya/_/ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas/_/rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan/_/mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas/_/stobs ldan theg par gnas pa 
[\[166a.4\]]yin/_/spyod la skyon gyis ma gos pas/_/pad+ma 'bar bas mdzes par snang /_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/_/nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bde chen don las mi 'da' bas/_/'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/sku gsung yon tan phrin las 
[\[166a.5\]]thugs/_/yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas/_/lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams/_/rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul/_/thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas/_/chu srin klu phrug bzung ba bzhin/_/thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas/_/'brel ba bar chad med par gnas/_/
[\[166a.6\]]brtson 'grus 'khor ba spong ba'i phyir/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag ni mnyam par gnas/_/zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas/_/dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan/_/ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir/_/bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[166a.7\]]bskor byas shing /_/nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel bas/_/thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan/_/ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na/_/tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste/_/gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan/_/lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni/_/sku mdog sna tshogs 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzhugs tshul dang /_/gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas/_/pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang /_/gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis/_/gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul gyis/_/bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan/_/rang rang snying 
[\[166b.2\]]po gang yin pa/_/kha dog so sor phye nas ni/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/_/rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya/_/rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa/_/kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/_/rim pa ji bzhin dgod 
[\[166b.3\]]par bya/_/gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/dung chen ras chen la sogs pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid/_/rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de/_/stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid/_/gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas 
[\[166b.4\]]pa/_/chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom/_/bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid/_/ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas/_/phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar/_/rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya/_/rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas ni/_/yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las/_/
[\[166b.5\]]zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi/_/'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed/_/bru~M gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas/_/gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom/_/rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang /_/rang rig sa bon gnyis med las/_/'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid/_/
[\[166b.6\]]bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas/_/'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom/_/yongs rdzogs smin cing rtas pa la/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hos gnyis med de/_/'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam/_/las kyi bya ba kun zin nas/_/thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang /_/kun bzang 
[\[166b.7\]]mchod pa la sogs pa/_/lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis/_/mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya/_/rin chen sna lnga rta glang dang /_/'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang /_/bu dang chung ma bran khol dang /_/gnas dang zhing dang na bza' dang /_/rgyan phreng bza' btung longs spyod 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dang /_/rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang /_/mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang /_/ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal/_/kho ra yug dang lhun po dang /_/skye bo mang po bro glu dang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/_/mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod/_/dpa' bo sha lnga 
[\[167a.2\]]bdud rtsi lnga/_/bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang /_/sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog_/dag cing legs par dbul bar bya/_/thar ba la sogs zhing gi mchog_/dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis/_/bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te/_/rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya/_/lha mo mi mo rig 
[\[167a.3\]]pa mo/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin/_/dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/_/bde ba chen po rol mo yis/_/phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste/_/rin chen lha mo yo byad dang /_/reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis/_/rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la/_/gnyis med dag pa'i 
[\[167a.4\]]tshul gyis mchod/_/rol mo glu dbyangs bcas pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya/_/rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis/_/mtshan ma legs par snang ba na/_/sbyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang /_/mchod dang brtan pa'i cho ga dang /_/rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par 
[\[167a.5\]]bya/_/dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru/_/rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la/_/dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis/_/lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya/_/de nas gnang thob dbang phyug nyid/_/dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas/_/thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral 
[\[167a.6\]]ba'i phyir/_/skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/_/mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang /_/'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no/_/gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa/_/gang du mos pas 
[\[167a.7\]]spro bskyed phyir/_/rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de/_/sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_/rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang /_/gdul bya zhi dang khro ba la/_/so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag_/bris dang brdungs dang blugs 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]ba dag_/so so'i gnas su legs par dgram/_/ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor/_/'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med/_/gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni/_/bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlab phyir/_/bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/yab yum [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[167b.2\]]brgyad gnas par bya/_/bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la/_/bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya/_/nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la/_/rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod/_/'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo/_/bri dang bsgom pa dag kyang rung /_/'di ni phyi yi dkyil 
[\[167b.3\]]'khor ro/_/zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te/_/phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min/_/mthong dang brtan dag goms pa ni/_/rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung /_/brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis/_/
[\[167b.4\]]mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis/_/byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya/_/'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te/_/de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang /_/thun mong tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir/_/'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang /_/mkha' 
[\[167b.5\]]dag byin brlabs so sor gdon/_/rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/_/ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/_/gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas/_/gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang /_/
[\[167b.6\]]mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang /_/dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa/_/gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa/_/de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi 
[\[167b.7\]]la/_/thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can/_/phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/_/slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas/_/rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir/_/rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/_/sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba/_/rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]te/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/mthong bya don la sgrib pas na/_/de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad/_/tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don/_/lhag pa'i bden gnyis 
[\[168a.2\]]rtogs bsgoms pas/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg_/dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag_/rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag_/rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid/_/mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyangs/_/thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te/_/phyi 
[\[168a.3\]]nang med pa'i byang chub sems/_/dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te/_/rang rig byang chub sems kyi me/_/phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud/_/rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis/_/gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na/_/dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir/_/rnam 
[\[168a.4\]]gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam/_/gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/bar chad bgegs dang dbral byas la/_/bkug bcings bstims la rnal du gzhag_/bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan/_/'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de/_/las kyi cho ga 
[\[168a.5\]]thim pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis/_/'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya/_/de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de/_/sdong bu re la lha rnams kyis/_/snying po tshang bar gdags pa dang /_/gsol gdab gnang byin sras su bskyed/_/'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs 
[\[168a.6\]]nas/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/_/las bzhi me yi las byas nas/_/rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i/_/rang rang gnas su dag pa la/_/sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod/_/las kyi bya ba kun zin nas/_/thig le chen po ngang la bsdu/_/de nas 
[\[168a.7\]]gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te/_/ma lus byang chub sems nyid de/_/de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang /_/dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun/_/tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te/_/byang chub sems kyi 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rang 'byung mtho dman med pa yi/_/sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid/_/ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems la 'dus/_/de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba/_/dngos po ma yin dngos med min/_/gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min/_/
[\[168b.2\]]mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i/_/zab cing yangs la rgya che ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/_/rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas/_/gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/skye ba 
[\[168b.3\]]med las thams cad skyes/_/skyes pa nyid las skye ba med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag_/'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[168b.4\]]rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/_/gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/_/dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med/_/e ma'o 
[\[168b.5\]]ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong /_/'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med/_/ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems/_/dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid/_/g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas 
[\[168b.6\]]pa yi/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus la/_/rang 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang /_/bsams dang dmigs dang goms pa yi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang /_/lha dang lha min gsang ba dang /_/sha za 'byung po mi'am 
[\[168b.7\]]ci/_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]klu rnams dang /_/rgyu ba'i srogs chags ma lus dang /_/rtsa shing gel pa 'bras bu dang /_/phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa/_/ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de/_/byang chub sems su khyad par med/_/lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang /_/tshig gi 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tha snyad tsam du zad/_/byang chub sems la gnyis med par/_/rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan/_/snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang /_/gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas/_/ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa/_/snying rje byang chub sems yin te/_/mi 
[\[169a.2\]]'gal don du rab sbyor ba/_/kun rdzob byang chub sems su brjod/_/ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos/_/ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te/_/nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du/_/sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med/_/de dag 
[\[169a.3\]]ji ltar gnas kyang rung /_/byang chub sems las gzhan min yang /_/thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad/_/rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rang 'byung 'khor lo drug gnas pa/_/g.yo ba ya~M gis skyod byed pa/_/'gro ba kun gyi lus la gnas/_/'phen dang 
[\[169a.4\]]sdud pa'i rang bzhin can/_/snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char/_/smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas/_/rnam thar sku gsum rtsa mdud can/_/'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas/_/rang lus bde chen smin byed pa/_/de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas/_/sangs 
[\[169a.5\]]rgyas rin chen gab tse la/_/thung ngu a snying lte bar gnas/_/'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa/_/rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel/_/khyab cing rgyas pa'i snying po can/_/sum cu gnyis gnyis rtsa yig ldan/_/d+harma tsakra snying po'i gnas/_/rtsa bzhi yan lag 
[\[169a.6\]]brgyad kyi dngos/_/dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten/_/rgyu ba bzhi yis shes par bya/_/dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/_/a la brten pa'i hU~M gis sdud/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/_/bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la/_/rim pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 
[\[169a.7\]]'gyur/_/bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le can/_/'dab ma A li ldan pa yis/_/ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can/_/khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can/_/sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid/_/'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te/_/thabs dang shes rab bskul ba yis/_/bde ba 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]'byung 'gyur the tshom med/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na/_/thig le de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings/_/ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing /_/lus can kun la khyab par gnas/_/kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso/_/ma lus kun 'dus gnyis su med/_/spyi gtsug 
[\[169b.2\]]'dus pa'i snying po nas/_/rkang mthil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ka bas bzung /_/snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin bcud/_/dngas snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed/_/g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin/_/skad cig rim pa skye 'gyur 
[\[169b.3\]]ba/_/khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs/_/sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur/_/'di nyid gsum du bshad pa ste/_/skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid/_/rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad/_/de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang /_/bram ze 
[\[169b.4\]]gdol pa gar mkhan ma/_/yid 'ong na tshod dar la bab/_/nus dang chags pa che ba dang /_/bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug_/lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar phyed/_/skad snyan dran pas yid 'phrog ma/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bcu drug bcu bzhi dang /_/bcu gnyis ldan pa'i bu 
[\[169b.5\]]mo la/_/sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nas/_/tha mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i/_/gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las/_/gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/nyi ma zla ba rtse 
[\[169b.6\]]phrad pa'i/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo/_/'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs/_/ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag_/g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse gcig pa/_/smon pas yid gcig 'dres pa ste/_/'jug pa dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHste/_/shes pa bde bar 
[\[169b.7\]]'jug pa nyid/_/gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste/_/mthar phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/_/brjod bral thig le'i bstan pa mtshar/_/tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas/_/zhen pa ldog cing rig pa thim/_/rnam shes brgyal ba la sogs 'byung /_/yid 'ong 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]gzi ldan phyag rgya ma/_/mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang /_/phrad pas sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur/_/'dris pas bde ba brtan po 'byung /_/thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na/_/bskal par sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'i/_/rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas/_/
[\[170a.2\]]da lta bde ba chen por smin/_/thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas/_/mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas/_/'khyud dang phrad dang spyad pa yis/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye/_/dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang /_/dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas/_/gsang ba zhes ni 
[\[170a.3\]]bshad pa yin/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rim pa'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin nas/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i/_/tshom bu gsum par ldan pa yi/_/sum cu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la/_/rigs lnga ye shes lngar 
[\[170a.4\]]ldan cing /_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/_/bdun cu'i rim pa bsgom par bya/_/mos chung gsang bar spyod 'dod pas/_/tshom bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor te/_/bcu'am yang na [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'i/_/tshom bu tha ma bsgom par bya/_/'dir ni dkyil 'khor 
[\[170a.5\]]kun 'dus pa'i/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/_/gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor rim pa de bzhin te/_/rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro bo ni/_/rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom/_/rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs 
[\[170a.6\]]pa/_/ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya/_/dang por dad dang brtson 'grus dang /_/dam tshig lta sogs sngon song zhing /_/rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas/_/nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/skal ldan drod tshad mnyam pa'am/_/mi ldan 'phro 'dus sbyangs 
[\[170a.7\]]bas 'grub/_/rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba/_/ri rtse gsang 'dab chu gling ngam/_/dur khrod ri 'or nags 'dab ste/_/skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing /_/bar chad bral ba'i sa phyogs der/_/rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir/_/rin chen yid 'ong mdzes brgyan pa'i/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'khor khang phyi nang bar ldan pa/_/'chag sar bcas par brtsam par bya/_/rnal 'byor pho mo grangs mnyam pa/_/lta spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang /_/bro gar 'du 'phro yo byad dang /_/glu tshig sgra yi yo byad dang /_/bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang /_/rgyan dang bgo ba'i 
[\[170b.2\]]yo byad dang /_/A li kA li mnyam sbyar zhing /_/nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs/_/lha dang mi dang yo byad dang /_/gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas/_/de dag tshogs su bshad pa yin/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur nas/_/yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la/_/
[\[170b.3\]]mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/nam mkha'i char bzhin kun bkug la/_/yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs rgyan btags te/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang /_/bza' btung lha la lha rol zhing /_/'od kyis ma lus tshim pa dang /_/'gro 
[\[170b.4\]]mang bde ba thob par bya/_/bro lnga gar lnga stabs tshig lnga/_/bro gar rtse 'jo brjod pa yis/_/rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal/_/'gro ba'i phyi nang mun bsal te/_/rig 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang /_/glu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis/_/phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni/_/
[\[170b.5\]]'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing /_/chos kyi dung chen sgra yang sgrogs/_/phyi nang rgyan gyi yo byad ni/_/rin chen ze'u phrog rna cha dang /_/lag gdub rkang gdub mgul do dang /_/na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas/_/yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang /_/'gro bas blta ba'i 'os su 
[\[170b.6\]]'gyur/_/rlung dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing /_/sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te/_/byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas/_/A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba/_/bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas/_/bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i tshe/_/nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe/_/thun mong thun 
[\[170b.7\]]mong ma yin pa'i/_/spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas/_/mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye/_/zla ba'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs/_/bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi 'chad/_/mthong ba'i don la mnyam bzhag pas/_/brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur/_/sku ni phyag rgya 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]chen po ste/_/bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin/_/bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang /_/bde ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad/_/sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis/_/'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dag_/de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor/_/rdo rje lus thob de phyin cad/_/skye shi 
[\[171a.2\]]med pa'i g.yung drung yin/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/_/dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/_/de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/_/ye shes thig le de nyid la/_/ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog_/gang zag rim par 'jug pa rnams/_/
[\[171a.3\]]dang por dngos don mthong ba yis/_/tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing /_/bsam byas lhun grub nyid thob phyir/_/lta spyod ting 'dzin rim 'brel bas/_/bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad/_/gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang /_/tha mal pa dang log spyod dang /_/mos pa la sogs 
[\[171a.4\]]yul min te/_/nus dang grub pa thob pa yis/_/gsang ba lam dang 'brel par bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas/_/rim nas rim par brtan gyur te/_/gsal ldan mi g.yo thob pa la/_/nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas/_/pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te/_/spyod pa so so 
[\[171a.5\]]gnas pa yis/_/rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te/_/bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la gnas/_/yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs/_/gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bstan pa/_/rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil/_/ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul/_/'jig rten 
[\[171a.6\]]'das pa dkyil nyid de/_/'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad/_/rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de/_/cho 'phrul rang 'byung 'khor du gsungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de/_/rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang /_/khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad/_/lha ya ting 'dzin dkyil 
[\[171a.7\]]nyid de/_/spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad/_/gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa/_/goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis na/_/ji ltar snang grags chos thams cad/_/de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/dbang bskur cho ga phun sum tshogs/_/thabs kyi sa la sbyor byed pa'i/_/rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/_/rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po/_/ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid/_/rgyal ba 
[\[171b.2\]]kun gyi spyi gzugs te/_/'khor tshogs ye shes rgya mtsho la/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu/_/ye shes lha mo la brten nas/_/ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas/_/gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur/_/ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug gis/_/dang po nas 
[\[171b.3\]]bzung bcu pa'i bar/_/ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas/_/ting 'dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas/_/sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel/_/mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas/_/nges 'byed nyams 
[\[171b.4\]]ldan rnal 'byor la/_/rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs brten nas/_/zag med rdo rje sku la sbyor/_/rig pa brtan thob rnal 'byor pas/_/las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor pa/_/lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du/_/rig ma'i phyag 
[\[171b.5\]]rgya mdzes ma la/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs brten byas nas/_/cho ga thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing /_/brgyud pa dbang gi man ngag gis/_/sbyor ba nyams ldan rnal 'byor thob/_/ye shes rgya mtsho blo ldan zhing /_/thugs rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob/_/dam tshig 
[\[171b.6\]]dbang dang rig pa'i drod/_/rim par brgyud pa'i dbang thob cing /_/dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang /_/rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che/_/las dang bya ba ma rmongs shing /_/ma yengs brtson 'grus bar chad med/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po seng ge ltar/_/gzi chen gzhan gyis 
[\[171b.7\]]nyam nga med/_/byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can/_/tshig dang bden pa'i byin brlabs 'grub/_/de yis dbang bskur cho ga brtsam/_/dad dang dam tshig ldan pa dang /_/snying rje che la slob la brtson/_/brtson 'grus shes rab phun sum tshogs/_/bskal pa zhing 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]gi rdul snyed du/_/thos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i/_/'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis/_/tha mal bsam pa spang byas te/_/bla ma la ni de bzhin gshegs/_/'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya/_/bla ma sangs rgyas des kyang 
[\[172a.2\]]ni/_/snying rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing /_/skyon dang mnar dang slu sems spang /_/rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang /_/bdag gzhan don nus brtson 'grus ldan/_/brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing /_/dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi/_/gsang chen rigs su nges 
[\[172a.3\]]pa dang /_/gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na/_/dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya/_/ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor ba mod/_/ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul/_/tsan+dan dri bsung ldan pa'i ri/_/bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/_/ri bo dgon 
[\[172a.4\]]pa yon tan gnas/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i dgon pa der/_/rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya/_/sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la/_/zhing khams mtha' thug med gnas su/_/rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/_/ye shes lha mo la brten te/_/skad cig ye shes dbang bskur 
[\[172a.5\]]bas/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yon tan lhun grub pa/_/skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te/_/pad+ma spyan gyi sa la gnas/_/yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin/_/bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi/_/bde chen phyogs ris med par dgongs/_/'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin pas/_/
[\[172a.6\]]gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/_/sa thob goms brtan skyes bu la/_/ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho brang du/_/rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' bdag gis/_/rig pa'i lha mo na so med/_/rigs bral ting 'dzin stobs las grub/_/de la slob mas nges brten nas/_/ji ltar chu la 
[\[172a.7\]]ji bzhin du/_/ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur bas/_/rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni/_/nyams myong dbang du rang shar te/_/thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis/_/'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu/_/'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te/_/skad cig nyid 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]la rag lus pas/_/rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyal por bshad/_/lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la/_/slob dpon mthar nye lam gnas pas/_/rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs par/_/rdo rje thig tshad sbyor brjod pa'i/_/phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldang ba/_/sna tshogs 
[\[172b.2\]]dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs/_/sna tshogs rig pas dbang sgyur ba'i/_/sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du/_/stobs ldan bu mo la brten te/_/thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas/_/rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing /_/cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur/_/dang 
[\[172b.3\]]po yon tan kun ldan pa'i/_/rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste/_/dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/_/mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la/_/drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa/_/rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis/_/lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du/_/dad mos brtson 
[\[172b.4\]]'grus 'jug pa'i sems/_/mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs/_/dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang /_/gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang /_/go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang /_/snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba/_/rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul la/_/rdzas thabs ting 
[\[172b.5\]]'dzin dbang bskur bas/_/nus pa'i byin brlabs mngon shar nas/_/theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur/_/de nas skal ldan slob ma de/_/tha mal 'du shes kun bzlog ste/_/rang rang lhar byas gsal ba la/_/nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas/_/nyan pa'i dbang dang bsgom pa 
[\[172b.6\]]dang /_/'chang dang phrin las byed pa dang /_/rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang /_/rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la/_/ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang /_/thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas/_/mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshad/_/mi nus pa la bskur ba min/_/tshad ldan rnams la 
[\[172b.7\]]rim pas bskur/_/rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo/_/bcu drug [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ldan pa yi/_/dri zhim yon tan ldan pa la/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo/_/ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa/_/thabs dang 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]shes rab snod kyi mchog_/thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas/_/dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun/_/yungs kar tshad tsam rdo rje sems/_/rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las/_/gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te/_/rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo 
[\[173a.2\]]nyid/_/mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas/_/bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa/_/da lta nyid 'byung the tshom med/_/rdo rje nyi ma rab ldan pa'i/_/bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i yon tan nyid/_/byin brlabs rig ma lha mor byas/_/chags pa 
[\[173a.3\]]bskyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid/_/blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya/_/de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas/_/bla mas gnyis med gtad bya'i phyir/_/byin brlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang /_/gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni/_/slob ma 'di la legs gtad la/_/gsang ba'i gnang 
[\[173a.4\]]ba sbyin par bya/_/skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin/_/[{]di ring [,]de ring [}]phan chad bu mchog khyod/_/sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas/_/tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spongs/_/bde ba chen po nyams myong pas/_/dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spongs/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/_/
[\[173a.5\]]bde ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos/_/brtan pa bar chad med bsgoms pas/_/rdo rje 'chang gi sa la 'gro/_/de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye/_/gtan du 'bral bar ma byed cig_/sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin dang /_/rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas/_/thig le'i las la 
[\[173a.6\]]thogs pa med/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid/_/sa yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa/_/nyams myong brten cing gnyis med sbyar/_/rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid/_/ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba/_/drag pa ma yin dal 
[\[173a.7\]]ba min/_/dgongs pa nyams dang zhen chags min/_/A li kA li zhu ba'i sems/_/sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med/_/rdo rje pad+ma rab bskyod cing /_/'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las/_/nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na/_/byed pa rlung gi thig le bzung /_/rgyu ba bcad cing thig le 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]mnan/_/shes pa nam mkha'i ngang la gtad/_/dbang po shes rab che chung gis/_/lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am/_/ma thob bar du sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma/_/dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs/_/rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing /_/gzhan dbang longs 
[\[173b.2\]]spyod ma byas pa/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'ang rung /_/thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis/_/bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya/_/rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang /_/srin lag bcos ma la sogs pa/_/thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis/_/gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya/_/
[\[173b.3\]]'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas/_/bdag po gdung can rnam par sbyar/_/thig le myur bul rtags byung nas/_/rgyu ba rlung gi tshad du zung /_/nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la/_/'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po/_/myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob/_/gal te rtsa dang bral ba na/_/phaT 
[\[173b.4\]]dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur/_/dngas rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur/_/bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hU~M gis shes/_/sdus pa'i hU~M gis bsdams gnas pa/_/thig les lus la khyab par byed/_/dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste/_/gnyis pas nus pa bskyed pa yin/_/gsum pas 
[\[173b.5\]]nyams myong bskyed pa yin/_/bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed/_/lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas/_/mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub/_/rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa/_/nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsam/_/de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug_/sgo gsum nyes pa 
[\[173b.6\]]kun bral ba'i/_/sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la/_/dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya/_/dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir/_/gdams ngag rjes mthun sbyin par bya/_/gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste/_/lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid/_/drod mthar 
[\[173b.7\]]phyin dang sa brgyad dang /_/grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la/_/rang rig rtags dang thugs rje yis/_/'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang /_/mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi/_/pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi/_/sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang bar dang /_/gzugs 
[\[174a\]]
