[\[174a.1\]]tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur/_/dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste/_/bsgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin/_/dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas/_/phyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[174a.2\]]'khor dbang thob bya/_/gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la/_/thun mong tsam du nges pa med/_/dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/_/bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid/_/he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro/_/dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i/_/
[\[174a.3\]]ma nor lam ston slob dpon la/_/mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing /_/rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la/_/dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par/_/gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang /_/bsgom dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas/_/bskal pa bye ba dpag med du/_/'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur 
[\[174a.4\]]gyi/_/dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas/_/nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe/_/de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/_/byin brlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis/_/dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i/_/
[\[174a.5\]]rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la/_/thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na/_/rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang /_/rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis/_/tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing /_/byin brlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 
[\[174a.6\]]'gyur/_/gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas/_/tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang /_/bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas/_/dngos grub gang la thogs med de/_/las rnams gang brtsams 'grub pa dang /_/'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis/_/sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin 
[\[174a.7\]]nas/_/pad+ma spyan gyi sa thob ste/_/yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa/_/dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar/_/thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na/_/bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/brtson pas 'bras bu 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]tshol byed pa/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur/_/gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang /_/dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du/_/las dang ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis/_/'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung 
[\[174b.2\]]thugs kyi gsang chen po/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po/_/ma lus cho ga rgya chen po/_/dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi/_/'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du/_/gsang ba kun la shes par bya/_/rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis/_/cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis/_/me tog ldan pas 'khor 
[\[174b.3\]]lo nyid/_/mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis/_/dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir/_/slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya/_/de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste/_/khrus byas dri 
[\[174b.4\]]zhim gos bzang gyon/_/dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas/_/gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni/_/lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bar chad sbyor bsal bsrung ba bya/_/cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la/_/mtshan ma rdzogs par nan 
[\[174b.5\]]tan bya/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga/_/'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin/_/snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la/_/dam tshig legs par dbog par bya/_/tsan+dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu/_/lan gsum blud la snod dor ro/_/de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te/_/gsang 
[\[174b.6\]]ba'i don la nges par bya/_/rang rang 'brel ba'i lha nyid la/_/rin chen dor te brtag par bya/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la/_/bstim la dbyer med gnas pa la/_/rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir/_/legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya/_/mi shes rab rib bsal 
[\[174b.7\]]byas la/_/'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya/_/de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi/_/dag pa rim gyis bstan par bya/_/de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la/_/ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya/_/byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang /_/zhugs pa'i yon 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]tan bsam mi khyab/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/_/des na rigs su nges pa yis/_/dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan/_/rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas/_/rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro/_/de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[175a.2\]]rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje dam tshig bla na med/_/sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa/_/'di dag legs par bshad par bya/_/dus gsum 
[\[175a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/'das dang ma byon dus gsum du/_/rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar/_/rim pas dmod por bkas bcad pa'i/_/byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba/_/kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad/_/gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i/_/dam 
[\[175a.4\]]tshig chen po 'di nyid la/_/'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/_/rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang /_/rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang /_/lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang /_/klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang /_/dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 
[\[175a.5\]]'gyur/_/dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la/_/sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams/_/log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur/_/dam pa rnams kyis bkas bcad cing /_/byin brlabs dmod por rang bzhin grub/_/dam pa 'di las gang 'da' 
[\[175a.6\]]ba/_/rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur/_/dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la/_/dbang dang byin brlabs thob pa yis/_/dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad na/_/mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur/_/de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/_/dam tshig ces ni rnam par 
[\[175a.7\]]bsgrags/_/bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni/_/ma lus rang rig byang chub sems/_/mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol ba/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid de/_/gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa/_/don dam byang chub sems su brjod/_/ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni/_/
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba/_/rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/ma lus der snang ngo bo gcig_/rang ltar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa/_/kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad/_/gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang /_/man ngag lung dang nyams chags skong /_/mchog 
[\[175b.2\]]dang thun mong la sogs pa/_/dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa/_/'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir/_/skad cig gdung ba nyams mi bya/_/rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas/_/phyag rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas/_/rang gi sgo gsum mnyams par/_/chu bo lta bur 
[\[175b.3\]]bar chad med/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/_/theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas/_/snod med dman sogs log pa la/_/gsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya/_/dang por gsang bar srog gcig pas/_/byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas/_/rang srog 
[\[175b.4\]]rang gis gcod kyang sla/_/brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya/_/lam dang bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba dang /_/dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba dang /_/'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas/_/rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin/_/yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang /_/thun mong min par 
[\[175b.5\]]bshad par bya/_/dang por gsang ba'i lung thob nas/_/nus pa mngon du snang bar du/_/bdag dang gzhan phyir thun mong gi/_/'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing /_/kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa/_/thun mong dam las mi 'gal ba/_/thun mong dam tshig yin par 
[\[175b.6\]]bshad/_/thun mong ma yin gang zag gis/_/thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa/_/nyon mongs lnga dang spyod pa lnga/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga/_/grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid/_/skyes bu rigs phyed spyod yul te/_/thun mong rnal 'byor yul min pas/_/
[\[175b.7\]]thun mong ma yin zhes su bshad/_/dang po nas bzung rtags thob par/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi/_/lus sems ma yengs rtse gcig pas/_/rnam pa dang bcas dang du blang /_/sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par/_/ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe/_/'gal ba'i 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]sgo gsum mi 'byung bas/_/ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la/_/rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus/_/don las langs tshe snying rje dang /_/rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin/_/sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na/_/'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste/_/rgya mtsho 
[\[176a.2\]]rlan bzhin thob spangs med/_/bsrung med ye shes dam tshig ste/_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan par du/_/spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing /_/bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na/_/khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi/_/dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur/_/
[\[176a.3\]]gang zag gang la dga' ba la/_/dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni/_/gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir/_/dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan/_/dang po las can rnal 'byor la/_/rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig bstan/_/brten nas nyams ldan gang zag la/_/thun mong min 
[\[176a.4\]]pa'i dam tshig bstan/_/rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la/_/'da' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bstan/_/sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la/_/ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan/_/dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel/_/dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[176a.5\]]gyis byin brlabs pa'i/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di/_/thob nas dam par gang bsrungs pa/_/yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad/_/mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa/_/dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa/_/cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang /_/bsgrub pa gang dang gang 
[\[176a.6\]]yang rung /_/ma nyams tshul du rab brtson pas/_/myur du 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na/_/rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid/_/dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas/_/dam pa 'di la gang brten pas/_/yid bzhin nor bu 
[\[176a.7\]]lta bur gyur/_/dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi/_/bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di/_/kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing /_/gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te/_/las dang skal ba dman pa dang /_/rigs dman le lo che ba dang /_/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis/_/blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing /_/dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas/_/dam pa rnams la dmod byed pa/_/sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas/_/rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni/_/bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad/_/mkha' 
[\[176b.2\]]'gro ma dang rig 'dzin dang /_/kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i tshogs/_/de ma thag tu srog bcad nas/_/dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_/gal te 'jig par gyur na ni/_/'jig rten gzhan du skye 'gyur zhing /_/ji srid nam mkha' 'jig pa'am/_/phyi yi rgya mtsho 
[\[176b.3\]]zad pa'i tshe/_/thar te gzhan du nam yang min/_/dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang /_/rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang /_/byang chub sems nyid mi dran zhing /_/sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang /_/snod min gsang ba bshad pa dang /_/gsang ba'i don la skur ba ni/_/'dir yang sdug 
[\[176b.4\]]bsngal myong 'gyur zhing /_/skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag_/bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i/_/rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/_/gang du rtsa ba yan lag bcas/_/bsrung dang dbog par bya ba'i chos/_/thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i/_/thun mong spyi yi 
[\[176b.5\]]yul gyur pa/_/de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste/_/'di ni phyi yi dam tshig go/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba'i sems/_/thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim/_/rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe/_/thig le gnyis med nyams su byung /_/bde ba'i thig le'i bcud bsgyur bas/_/
[\[176b.6\]]tshogs drug rang snang thig le'i grogs/_/ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas/_/thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal/_/thig le rig pa khar dbyung min/_/'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis/_/tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur/_/rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod thabs kyis 
[\[176b.7\]]myong /_/tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog_/thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don/_/rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga/_/'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis/_/thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ltar/_/shes nas spang du med par gnas/_/rang 'byung gnas pa'i bcud lnga 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]ni/_/rang lus rten gyi don snang ba/_/khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis/_/dngas snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas/_/rang lus rtog pa dngas snyigs dang /_/kha dog yan lag nying lag gis/_/bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang /_/bde ba chen po nyid du 
[\[177a.2\]]gsungs/_/khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi/_/ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin te/_/ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas/_/rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs/_/thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril/_/nyi zla'i rim pa'i 'od gsal ba/_/sems lngas mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe/_/rten 
[\[177a.3\]]can rten dang gnyis med pa/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang /_/ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang /_/gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa/_/bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs/_/skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems/_/dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas/_/rlung dang thig 
[\[177a.4\]]le'i bzlas pa yis/_/thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal/_/bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis te/_/brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min/_/gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis/_/tha mal zad dang bde chen sbyor/_/gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa/_/da ltar nus pa 
[\[177a.5\]]rang gis myong /_/gzhan gyi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i don 'di ni/_/thabs kyis bden par mngon du bstan/_/tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir/_/kha na ma tho bag tsha bral/_/skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe/_/rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub/_/rang gi rtsa bcud so so las/_/
[\[177a.6\]]bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas/_/'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs bcas/_/thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin brlabs kyis/_/bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes/_/nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi/_/mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las/_/zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen pos/_/
[\[177a.7\]]lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las/_/ye shes lnga yi ros gang bas/_/ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub/_/'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi/_/rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin/_/dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa/_/shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang /_/yan lag bcu ru shes par bya/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni/_/spyir ni sum brgya drug cu ste/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang /_/nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /_/dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni/_/bsgrub med mnyam par 
[\[177b.2\]]rdzogs pa nyid/_/lhun grub bde gnas dam tshig dang /_/rnam dag byang chub gzung 'dzin bral/_/rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang /_/sems la gnas bcas dam tshig dang /_/ye nas ma bcos dam tshig dang /_/'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang /_/chos rnams dbyer 
[\[177b.3\]]med dam tshig dang /_/thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang /_/g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig dang /_/thams cad bsrung du med pa ste/_/'di dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin/_/thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang /_/ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang /_/ma byin 
[\[177b.4\]]len pa'i dam tshig dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i dam tshig dang /_/thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang /_/dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste/_/'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin/_/bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni/_/rdo rje skye gnas dam tshig dang /_/'dren byed gnas 
[\[177b.5\]]stobs dam tshig dang /_/lam la ston byed dam tshig dang /_/rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang /_/sgyur byed byang chub dam tshig dang /_/thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig dang /_/rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig ste/_/bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin/_/yum gyur 
[\[177b.6\]]dbyings phyug dam tshig dang /_/thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig_/shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin/_/glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang /_/thams cad mi chud dam tshig dang /_/thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang /_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste/_/
[\[177b.7\]]bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin/_/tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig dang /_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang /_/tshogs kyi phrin las dam tshig dang /_/phra men tshim byed dam tshig ste/_/bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin/_/yang dag don ston dam tshig dang /_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang /_/thams cad skad mjal dam tshig dang /_/yi ge med mjal dam tshig dang /_/stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang /_/ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang /_/bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig_/mi 
[\[178a.2\]]'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/_/bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin/_/shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi/_/nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang /_/rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang /_/sreg byed me yi dam tshig dang /_/'khrug byed chu yi dam tshig dang /_/g.yengs byed chen 
[\[178a.3\]]po'i dam tshig ste/_/shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang /_/phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni/_/thabs mchog lnga yi dam tshig yin/_/chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang /_/sgra ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang /_/dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang /_/ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang /_/
[\[178a.4\]]reg ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni/_/gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin/_/kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang /_/phyogs lnga yi ni dam tshig dang /_/dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste/_/gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin/_/bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang /_/lhun grub ye shes dam 
[\[178a.5\]]tshig dang /_/mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang /_/mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang /_/phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang /_/nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang /_/chos la skyon med dam tshig dang /_/brjod med spros med dam tshig dang /_/phyogs dus 
[\[178a.6\]]gnyis med dam tshig dang /_/gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig_/'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang /_/thams cad rgyas 'debs dam tshig dang /_/thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste/_/ngo bo ting 'dzin dam tshig yin/_/grub par bya ba lnga bstan pa/_/chos kyi 'khor 
[\[178a.7\]]lo'i dam tshig dang /_/rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang /_/pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang /_/don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang /_/'jigs byed rdo rje dam tshig dang /_/de bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang /_/thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste/_/sku yi dam tshig bdun du 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bshad/_/yang dag don ston la sogs pa/_/gsung gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid/_/rang la rdzogs par shes bya ste/_/'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub bya yin/_/rang rig dbang sgyur dam tshig dang /_/che mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang /_/rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang /_/
[\[178b.2\]]byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang /_/thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad/_/byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang /_/ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang /_/gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang /_/sna tshogs kun sgyur dam tshig 
[\[178b.3\]]dang /_/zad med gter ldan dam tshig dang /_/bsgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang /_/zad med gter chen dam tshig ni/_/yon tan dam tshig bdun du bshad/_/thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang /_/bdud sde tshar gcod dam tshig dang /_/sems can don byed dam tshig 
[\[178b.4\]]ni/_/phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad/_/spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang /_/chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang /_/gti mug chen po'i dam tshig dang /_/phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang /_/nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang /_/nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste/_/
[\[178b.5\]]mi spong ba yi dam tshig yin/_/gtan du ma yengs bsrung ba ni/_/mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang /_/bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang /_/sku gsung thugs sbyor dam tshig dang /_/lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang /_/thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang /_/rdo rje log 
[\[178b.6\]]'joms dam tshig dang /_/'khor ba zil gnon dam tshig dang /_/ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang /_/thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni/_/lta ba rgyun bsrung dam tshig yin/_/ting 'dzin rgyun bsgom dam tshig dang /_/bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam tshig dang /_/bzlas pa sgra 
[\[178b.7\]]snyan dam tshig dang /_/sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang /_/shes rab bde sbyor dam tshig ni/_/ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin/_/tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang /_/spyod lam bde 'byor dam tshig dang /_/rig pa thod rgal dam tshig dang /_/ma bcos gnas 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dag dam tshig dang /_/rang 'byung gnas bral dam tshig ste/_/cig car gnas pa'i bsrung thabs yin/_/thams cad skyed byed dam tshig dang /_/rgyud drug sbyor byed dam tshig dang /_/rtogs pas tshim byed dam tshig dang /_/khyab pa nam mkha'i dam tshig dang /_/
[\[179a.2\]]gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni/_/dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin/_/dmyal chen dmyal ba phal pa dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bar lce/_/lha dang lha min ru dra dang /_/rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste/_/chad pa'i skye gnas 
[\[179a.3\]]bstan pa yin/_/bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin/_/gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na/_/bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de/_/chad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin/_/gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin/_/gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na/_/bla ma grogs po brgya dag la/_/
[\[179a.4\]]bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya/_/bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya/_/gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya/_/sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya/_/de nas slar yang blang ba'am/_/bla mas gnang nas gnas par bya/_/gal te yul de mi gnas sam/_/lo gsum phan chad 
[\[179a.5\]]'das pa'am/_/gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong pas/_/ma dad 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas/_/bskang ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste/_/bskal pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar/_/bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te/_/rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal 
[\[179a.6\]]myong nas ni/_/ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar/_/mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor/_/yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya/_/sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya/_/bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig_/gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu btang /_/
[\[179a.7\]]de nas slar yang blang ba dang /_/dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya/_/dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par/_/gsang ba ston cing 'chad pa dang /_/dbang ma thob par bka' 'gom dang /_/bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang /_/tshad dang ldan pa'i snod min la/_/gsang 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]ba tshad du sgrogs pa dang /_/gsang ba nyams su mi len par/_/'phyar bas kun la spel ba ni/_/tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste/_/sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis/_/bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad/_/bla ma dang ni grogs 
[\[179b.2\]]rnams dang /_/pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang /_/rgyal 'bangs 'phangs nyes med sdang ba ni/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad/_/zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang /_/bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing /_/bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang /_/ma nyes ya kha 'byung ba 
[\[179b.3\]]dag_/dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad/_/dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas/_/rang rig nyams pa ma tshor zhing /_/bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad par dag_/sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/_/'grub cing bsngags pas 
[\[179b.4\]]thob pa ni/_/ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po yin/_/gal te ma nyams rtags byung na/_/bskang gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam/_/gal te nyams la rtags med cing /_/legs par snang na mi rung ste/_/bdag gi sa bon tshig pa ste/_/bde 
[\[179b.5\]]ba zad byas gtan du sdug_/ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs na/_/sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya 
[\[179b.6\]]ba/_/mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa/_/bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i/_/rtog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las/_/thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas/_/thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang /_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms 
[\[179b.7\]]pas/_/rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin pas/_/gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur te/_/zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin/_/de las gzhan pa bshad par bya/_/gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/_/dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dag_/phyi nang gsang ba'i rim 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]thob na/_/mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thob/_/mthong nas bsgom lam ma nges rigs/_/ting 'dzin gang bsgom bar chad med/_/tshe 'dis dbang sgyur 'jigs bral te/_/de nas sku lnga'i bdag nyid thob/_/mchog ldan mchog gis mchog thob pas/_/mchog 
[\[180a.2\]]gi dngos grub thun mong min/_/dad dang dam tshig shes rab dang /_/brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob/_/brten cing snying brtse dbang rdzogs shing /_/bsgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes/_/yid thub mi ldog brtan pa can/_/nyams thob dang du len pa ni/_/gcig dang lnga gsum 
[\[180a.3\]]gang zag gis/_/ri bo ri sul gsang bar dang /_/chu gling ngam grog brag rdzong dang /_/dur khrod ri phug chu mdo dang /_/yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar/_/cho ga byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid/_/las kyi cho ga gang yin pa/_/bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni/_/bdag dbang 
[\[180a.4\]]bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag_/sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis/_/sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam/_/dang po yid brtan gang yin kyang /_/gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de/_/cho ga ting 'dzin 'brel pa nyid/_/rang rang rtog pa ji bzhin du/_/
[\[180a.5\]]tha mal pa dang le lo dang /_/the tshom dad pa'i stobs kyis te/_/gal te de dag mi ldan na/_/sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na/_/gang zag skye bos smos ci dgos/_/gal te dgug pa'i las bya na/_/bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo ste/_/dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/_/
[\[180a.6\]]gong ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni/_/zhags pa lcags kyu sha stag ste/_/dmigs pa brtan cing rtags thob nas/_/mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni/_/rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar/_/che ge mo zhig dzaHhU~M zhes/_/dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzungs/_/mthu dang rdzu 
[\[180a.7\]]'phrul ldan yang rung /_/tha mal dbang med bzhin du dgug_/gal te de yi dgos pa dag_/myur du grub par ma gyur na/_/de dag legs par grub kyi bar/_/gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya/_/ngag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/_/'grub par 'gyur bar 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]gdon mi za/_/bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi/_/lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam/_/yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas/_/'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing /_/pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas/_/gang thim bdag gi dbang gyur zhing /_/bden pa bdar zhing ngag gis bcing /_/
[\[180b.2\]]yang na gang la gang chags pa'i/_/rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar/_/'dod pa grub na dam bcas shing /_/yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dga' ba'i thabs kyis bsten byas na/_/gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na/_/dbang drag phyag rgyas bsdigs bcing gzir/_/
[\[180b.3\]]dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrog nas/_/rol mo sgyu mkhan dag de yis/_/'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can/_/bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar/_/bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin brtan pa'i nus pa yis/_/gang yang rung ba'i sems can de/_/sna 
[\[180b.4\]]tshogs khro bo khro mo yis/_/'od dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis/_/bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta/_/dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'/_/ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub/_/med las dngos por nges grub cing /_/mi mthun brgyad sogs nges 'grub na/_/
[\[180b.5\]]yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag_/dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos/_/gal te gso ba'i las byas na/_/las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub/_/bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs kun bstims nas/_/mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru/_/thugs 
[\[180b.6\]]las chu yi lha mo bskyed/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas/_/bum par lha mo 'od du zhu/_/nad dang sdug bsngal byang bar bsam/_/dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang /_/sman dag rin chen spos dang 'bru/_/bdud rtsi snying po cha rkyen la/_/mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab/_/oM mA 
[\[180b.7\]]ma kI sarba pa ba du ru du ru swA hA/_/nad dang sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus/_/bkrus pas 'tsho bar the tshom med/_/bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas/_/sngon du bya ba sngon song bas/_/dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par/_/ma smas ma rul tshad ldan pa'i/_/dur khrod zhing 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]chen mtshan ldan la/_/khrus dang byug bdug kun byas nas/_/pho mo la sogs yin pa yi/_/las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/de dag maN+Dal gtsang ma yi/_/dbus su legs par bzhag nas ni/_/bdag nyid khro bo gang yang rung /_/gsal bas tshangs pa brgya 
[\[181a.2\]]byin rung /_/rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug_/phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya/_/gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang /_/ngu dang 'jigs pa'i sgra byung na/_/dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/_/dam chu byin la mnas bsgags te/_/gang 'dod las la mngag par bya/_/gal te 
[\[181a.3\]]'jig rten the tshom zos/_/de yis zos dang brgyal ba dang /_/'phral du bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis/_/bar chad med par bsgrub pa'i tshe/_/mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste/_/dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin/_/dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs 
[\[181a.4\]]gsum pa yin/_/bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sod yin/_/zhing chen kha nas hri byung na/_/ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad/_/ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur/_/lce yi ral gris de bcad na/_/cis kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te/_/lha min g.yul yang pham byed na/_/
[\[181a.5\]]dpa' bo stobs ldan smos ci dgos/_/de yi dbang po lnga dag la/_/mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod/_/rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin du/_/mkhas pas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te bcu bdun [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma'i/_/zhing mdzes bkru zhing byugs byas te/_/rgyan 
[\[181a.6\]]dang gos kyis legs par gdags/_/dri zhim dbang po dag pa la/_/bdag nyid dbang drag rnal 'byor gyis/_/ye shes 'jig rten gang rung ba'i/_/lha mo yid 'ong 'od 'bar ma/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bcings nas/_/rtags byung bar du bstim par bya/_/dri 
[\[181a.7\]]dang sgra dang 'od dag dang /_/'dar dang 'gul dang dgod pa dag_/dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad/_/lha dang gtam dang gnyis pa ste/_/dngos su langs pa tshad yin pas/_/dam bdar mnas bsgags dbang du bsdu/_/gal te sbyar du sad pa na/_/cho 'phrul che 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]zhing log ston na/_/dbang drag nga rgyal chen po yis/_/dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan/_/de dag chags pas rol spyad na/_/skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste/_/skye shi med par gnas pa dang /_/ma lus bde chen 'bar ba dang /_/zhing khams kun du bgrod pa 
[\[181b.2\]]dag_/thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gtsang ma byis pa rma med pa/_/yid 'ong legs pa btsal blangs nas/_/dag cing bdud rtsis dri byugs la/_/'da' hU ma tas legs byugs la/_/kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags/_/tshangs pa dang ni brgya 
[\[181b.3\]]byin dang /_/lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug_/rtag tu phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing /_/bdag nyid ha ya grI ba 'am/_/ya mAn+ta ka la sogs pa/_/gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la/_/drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya/_/rtags byung mthar thug mngon gyur 
[\[181b.4\]]nas/_/legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur/_/gal te 'dar zhing mi brjod na/_/o~M gyi 'od dang a mr-i tas/_/lce la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing /_/ha ye grI bas gad mos bsdigs/_/legs par smra bar the tshom med/_/gal te gsang ba'i las byed na/_/
[\[181b.5\]]gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor pas/_/dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo 'am/_/lha 'dre mngon du gnas pa'i sar/_/bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste/_/dud ka nag po 'od 'bar ba/_/spyan bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar/_/sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam/_/
[\[181b.6\]]mdun du hom khung khru gang tshad/_/gru gsum dur sol khrag chen byug_/nang du ling+ga bdud rtsi lnga/_/chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang /_/shes pa chags pa'i rten la byas/_/pho nyas ming rus bcas bkug la/_/bstims la phyag rgyas bcing bar bya/_/lcags sam nag 
[\[181b.7\]]po'i shing las byas/_/drag po'i phur pas gnas gsum gdab/_/hriHSh+TIHdrag pos g.yas g.yon nas/_/khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg byas nas/_/de nang drag po tsher ma can/_/nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas/_/lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]gal te dbye ba'i las byed na/_/bdag nyid ya mAn+ta ka ste/_/rngam zhing gdug gtum nga rgyal can/_/shin tu 'jigs shing bsdigs par bsgom/_/nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang /_/mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la/_/gang yin de nyid bris 
[\[182a.2\]]la blan/_/lha dang lha min gnyis la gtad/_/rlung gi phyogs su de yis bskyod/_/sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing /_/'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam/_/bar du khra dang bya rog 'thab/_/me chu rlung gis 'bud bsams na/_/de ni gang yin su yang rung /_/'bral 
[\[182a.3\]]zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rgyal po bram ze blon po dag_/gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs/_/mi gnas bskrad par bya ba'i phyir/_/bdag nyid a par tsit+ta ste/_/drag po khros pa'i tshul du bsgom/_/dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba yi/_/'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri/_/
[\[182a.4\]]steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la/_/mdun na gnas pa'i gdul bya de/_/rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon/_/pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis/_/'khrid cing 'tshog par rab bsams la/_/gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam/_/'dis ni dbugs med brgyal ba yang /_/gzhan du 
[\[182a.5\]]drag pos phyin 'gyur na/_/srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos/_/gal te dgra dpung pham 'dod na/_/bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste/_/ji ltar gnas par rab tu bsgom/_/de yi gzugs brnyan bris nas kyang /_/cho gas de ru byin brlabs la/_/sngags ni bdun 'bum 
[\[182a.6\]]la sogs pa/_/lcags sna bdun las bcu gnyis chad/_/ral gri snying por bcas pa la/_/gsal bar de dag rtags byung bzlas/_/'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang /_/ral gri skad ni 'don pa na/_/phyung bas g.yul las ldog pa dang /_/bskor bas dmag 
[\[182a.7\]]dpung 'bros par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na/_/bdag nyid gsal zhing brtan gyur nas/_/zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la/_/dur khrod ras la ming rus bri/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bstims la/_/nges par brtan pa'i ltas byung nas/_/he ru ka 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]yi zhabs kyis gnon/_/rta mgrin gad mo drag pos bsdigs/_/khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis gnon/_/bdag dang khyi yi sgroms nas gdon/_/bdag nyid them pa'i 'og tu gnon/_/yang na bdag gi 'og tu gnon/_/rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis/_/steng nas 
[\[182b.2\]]gnon cing bden pa bdar/_/bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/dbul po gter dang phrad 'dod na/_/bdag nyid las la goms pa yis/_/rigs lnga lhag pa'i lha gsal nas/_/so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam/_/dbang por mthong gi bar du ni/_/bsam 
[\[182b.3\]]zhing sngags bzlas bden pa bdar/_/mtshan ma brtan po gsal ba na/_/gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong /_/bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus/_/'dug gam smra 'am mthong ba'am/_/phra mo der ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas gter dang phrad gyur nas/_/
[\[182b.4\]]dbul ba kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/_/mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na/_/bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa/_/rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i zhag_/de yi zhun mar dud par bcas/_/'phrul gyi 
[\[182b.5\]]'o ma dag gis sbyar/_/rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrub/_/nyams dang drod rtags thob pa na/_/mig la legs par sngags kyis byug_/skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yi/_/phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong /_/gang zag rgyud ni brtag pa dang /_/sdug bsngal 
[\[182b.6\]]drag pos zhen bzlog cing /_/so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis/_/yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub/_/rkang mgyogs thob par 'dod pa yis/_/bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas/_/brtan zhing bar chad 
[\[182b.7\]]med thob nas/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/_/ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/_/skad cig dpag tshad brgyar 'gro ba/_/de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas/_/rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang /_/skad cig tsam 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gyis bgrod par 'gyur/_/gal te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis/_/rig 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na/_/sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas/_/phyag rgya gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/nam mkha' ling+ga zla ba la/_/hU~M las rdo rje cho ga gsum/_/rim par 
[\[183a.2\]]brtan pa'i dbang thob nas/_/dngas ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas/_/rdo rje zlar bcas rlung brten pas/_/gang 'thad zhing du bskyod pa'i sa/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yis/_/zhing khams dag pa'i bya ba 'grub/_/mdun gyi nam mkhar zla ba la/_/o~M la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur/_/
[\[183a.3\]]brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis/_/dngas ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin pa/_/zhing khams so sor bskyod byas nas/_/rang gis bsam pa bsgrub par bya/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la/_/tra~M las skyes pa'i cho ga yis/_/rin chen rlung 
[\[183a.4\]]zlar bcas pa yis/_/ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs/_/dngas ma lus yid bcas pa yis/_/dag pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/pad+mar bcas pa'i zla ba bsgom/_/hriH
[\[183a.5\]]las sna tshogs chos mchog sems/_/gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas/_/dngas ma'i lus yid gang yin pa/_/zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom/_/a 'am ha las rang nyid 
[\[183a.6\]]kyi/_/las kyi phyag rgyar goms par bya/_/brtan nas dngas ma rlung stobs kyis/_/zhing khams gang du mngon bsams pa'i/_/'dod pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing /_/'chi med rlung la dbang thob nas/_/cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan 
[\[183a.7\]]nas/_/mngon shes gdug pa 'dul ba yis/_/las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med/_/de nas gzhan yang chags ldan rim/_/skal bas dman dang sbyor bas zad/_/bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can/_/'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod/_/thabs ldan lus kyi 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]gong bu la/_/rang rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na/_/bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs pa/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis byed/_/bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas/_/sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro/_/ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin gyis/_/rang lus ma bcos gnas nyid bde/_/
[\[183b.2\]]brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas/_/sgrol ma dang ni thig le dang /_/gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/_/bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i/_/thabs kyis mtshon pa las byung bas/_/dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub/_/rang rten thig ler bcas pa yis/_/dngas ma'i 
[\[183b.3\]]rang bzhin khyab gnas pa/_/bskul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/ma lus bskyod cing 'gugs par byed/_/dngas snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/_/rlung gi thig les dbang sgyur nas/_/'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid/_/rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te/_/thig le snyigs mar 
[\[183b.4\]]nyams gyur pa/_/thabs dang rlung bcud stobs ldan pas/_/pad+ma la ni chu bzhin no/_/rang 'byung thig le'i rang bzhin las/_/rten dang zag pa snyigs ma dang /_/'khor ba'i rtsa dang sa bon dang /_/log rtog thig le zhen bcas pa/_/rang byung nam mkha'i thig les 'jig_/
[\[183b.5\]]rang lus bde chen snying po la/_/nam mkha' sprin ltar mi phyed cing /_/dngas snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid/_/thig le chu dang 'o ma dang /_/gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs kyis/_/dngas snyigs phye la dngas ma bstim/_/rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i/_/phyi nang dngos rtog 
[\[183b.6\]]ma lus pa/_/rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs kyis/_/der mi gnas par goms par bya/_/gang du sa bon snyigs bcas pa/_/nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas/_/gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i yid/_/de ma thag par rnam par brlag_/rlung dang rtsa dang thig 
[\[183b.7\]]ler bcas/_/thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas/_/ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin pas/_/mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol bas/_/rang sems rten bcas thig le ni/_/dngas ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa/_/kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can/_/gsang ba'i rig 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]pa'i gter kha 'byed/_/phyi nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas/_/snying nas bde bar 'bar gyur nas/_/rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar/_/mngon shes rin chen rtsa la phog_/rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char/_/de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i rtsa/_/'gyur 
[\[184a.2\]]med kun snang rlung la thim/_/dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs/_/gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis/_/rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel ba'i stobs/_/bskal pa du ma'i stobs 'gags te/_/dngas ma'i ye shes rlung du grub/_/phyin pa med par mthar 
[\[184a.3\]]song ba/_/bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur/_/bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni/_/ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de/_/bsgom dang mthar phyin khyad par gyis/_/bde ba chen po rigs mchog gnas/_/de nas gang yin brjod bya ba/_/zab mo kun rdzogs brtul 
[\[184a.4\]]zhugs can/_/dbang po dar zhing smin pa yi/_/chags can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas/_/spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo dang /_/gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa/_/'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas/_/thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang /_/ting 'dzin rlung gi 
[\[184a.5\]]dbang thob ste/_/'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dus su/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/_/lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu/_/rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa/_/bye brag brgyad cu gnyis 'dus pa'i/_/pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste/_/thig le dpa' bo lnga yi 
[\[184a.6\]]stobs/_/mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid/_/thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bcings la gzung zhing gnas par bya/_/de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas/_/bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas/_/tha mal zhen pa kun bral nas/_/rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes 
[\[184a.7\]]pa/_/dngas snyigs phye ba'i nyams dag gis/_/snyigs ma bag chags zhen bcas pa/_/de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan pas/_/rigs ngan thams la zhen chags dang /_/dran rtog ma lus pham byas te/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]lus pa/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du/_/ma lus dpang btsugs rgyal bar mdzad/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po la/_/dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i tshe/_/zag med yon tan gter chen de/_/
[\[184b.2\]]gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub/_/bde chen snying po thig le'i ro/_/dbab dang gzung bzlog 'byongs pa yis/_/rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe/_/bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang /_/skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thob cing /_/mi 'gyur 
[\[184b.3\]]chos sku thig le la/_/rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas/_/gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing /_/gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/bde chen nyams dang dga' ba'i gar/_/chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas/_/ji srid nam mkha'i 
[\[184b.4\]]mthar thug par/_/glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing /_/mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul/_/mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis/_/rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis/_/rdo rje bcud chen zlar bcas pas/_/nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i spongs mdzad cing /_/
[\[184b.5\]]dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khyud pa'i gar/_/rlung gi snying po rjod byed cing /_/srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las/_/bsgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad 
[\[184b.6\]]bya ba/_/rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa/_/bya ba las kyi rim pa dag_/bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin/_/dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te/_/de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir ro/_/rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang /_/dbang mi 'du ba bsgral phyir te/_/thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs/_/
[\[184b.7\]]bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing /_/nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya/_/gangs dkar 'dab dang yid 'dab pa/_/zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal/_/'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no/_/sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pas/_/dbang du bsdu 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ba'i gnas su bshad/_/dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas/_/'byung po 'du sar drag po shis/_/zhi la sa gzhi dkar ldan pa/_/zlum po sum rim o~M dang bcas/_/'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa/_/zhi ba'i thab kyi rang bzhin no/_/rgyas la ser po 
[\[185a.2\]]tsan+dan bcas/_/gru bzhi rim gsum tra~M dang bcas/_/rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa/_/thab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin/_/dbang la sa dmar chags 'od can/_/zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan/_/rim gsum hri dang bcas pa ni/_/dbang du bya ba'i thab yin no/_/drag po 
[\[185a.3\]]sa nag dur sol can/_/gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng /_/thod phreng 'od nag rim gsum hU~M/_/drag po thab kyi rim pa yin/_/'o ma can dang gser can dang /_/chags pa can dang tsher ma can/_/phrin las bzhi ni so so yi/_/yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad/_/
[\[185a.4\]]ling+ga kha dog so so ste/_/gnas kyang thab khung bzhi dang mtshungs/_/mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang /_/nas dkar chan dang 'o ma zho/_/dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas/_/zhi ba'i bsreg gtor rdzas su bshad/_/mar rnying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang /_/'bras 
[\[185a.5\]]dang chan rnams ldong ros dang /_/me tog gser dang tsan+dan bcas/_/gser phye gtor ma ser por bcas/_/'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de/_/dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur/_/tsha ba'i mar dang chang skyur dang /_/ram bu pad+ma rak+ta dang /_/'bras dmar tsan+dan zangs phye 
[\[185a.6\]]dang /_/gtor ma dmar po dbang rdzas yin/_/tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum/_/klung chen sha khrag sran chan dang /_/dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar/_/ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang /_/ming rus spel mar bcas gtor mas/_/bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad/_/
[\[185a.7\]]dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/_/mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po/_/logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod la/_/de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab/_/gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/_/mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas/_/logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te/_/
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab/_/zangs sam byu ru dmar shing rnams/_/mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam/_/logs la dbang gi lha bkod la/_/chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab/_/lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/_/mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum/_/logs 
[\[185b.2\]]la drag po'i lha bkod de/_/zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas gdab/_/o~M dang tra~M hri hU~M nyid las/_/'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal stengs su/_/e ba~M ma ya b+h+ru~M las bskyed/_/gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang /_/zla gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyibs/_/kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed/_/
[\[185b.3\]]rang rang sa bon gdan stengs la/_/'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga yis/_/las bzhi gtso bo las bzhin bskyed/_/'khor mang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba/_/phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags la/_/las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste/_/kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad/_/dbang 
[\[185b.4\]]bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan/_/las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can/_/cho gas gsal bar bskyed byas la/_/spyan drang bstim sogs las rdzogs bya/_/las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis/_/las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya/_/gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas/_/
[\[185b.5\]]las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag_/ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na/_/phra mo'i las rnams smos ci dgos/_/shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te/_/dang ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas/_/rdzogs pa'i skyil krung la gnas te/_/ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar bya/_/lho phyogs 
[\[185b.6\]]su ni kha bltas te/_/dga' ba'i 'du shes rtse gcig pas/_/rin chen skyil krung la gnas pas/_/dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya/_/nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te/_/chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa/_/pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te/_/ma lus dbang du 
[\[185b.7\]]bsdu bar bya/_/byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te/_/khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing /_/rus sbal dang ni gyad stabs kyis/_/gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhug_/so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag_/snga dro zhi ba'i las byas te/_/gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya/_/
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dgongs ka dbang gi dus nyid de/_/drag po nam gyi gung la bya/_/nam zla dus bzhir bsgrubs pas na/_/nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M che ge mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/_swA che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_hrI che ge mo pa shaM ku ru swA hA/_hU~M che ge mo mA ra 
[\[186a.2\]]ya phaT/_ling+ga'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs/_/dgug dang phur bu bzhi btab la/_/ril bu'am lhag ma gtubs pa de/_/so so lha yi zhal du bstabs/_/rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas/_/sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag_/kha dang mngar skyur tsha ba'i shing /_/ro yi 
[\[186a.3\]]mchod pa de bzhin te/_/rgyud bzang rgyal po smad 'tshong ma/_/shan pa'i khyim nas me blangs te/_/las dang mthun pa'i ra skyes mnan/_/sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin/_/pa pa ka dang dbang chen dang /_/gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi/_/sku mdog las bzhis 
[\[186a.4\]]phye ba ste/_/gun d+he sgrom dang zhags pa dang /_/rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid/_/rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu/_/spyan drang mchod ston las rdzogs nas/_/lto par b+h+ru~M las gzhal yas su/_/las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la/_/rang rang rtog pa'i cho 
[\[186a.5\]]ga bzhin/_/bsreg dang bro gar las byas pas/_/gang yang 'grub par the tshom med/_/zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can/_/sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba/_/de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_/zhi ba'i las ni rtsom pa yin/_/tshe thung nad mang dpal longs spyod/_/
[\[186a.6\]]phongs dang nyam nga 'jigs pa dag_/dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim/_/thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa/_/stong nyid thig le'i ngang du 'gag_/rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing /_/mngon shes skye 'jig thob bral bas/_/bde chen nam mkha'i ye shes nyid/_/rdo 
[\[186a.7\]]rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med/_/steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang dag_/bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du/_/nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar/_/'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs/_/kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing /_/'og gis phul zhing 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]steng gis drang /_/ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas/_/mi rtog gsal ba mthar phyin pa/_/seng phrug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar/_/thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/_/bde ba'i ye shes chen po la/_/ma lus yon tan rdzogs par gnas/_/chags can brtul zhugs bral ba 
[\[186b.2\]]yi/_/lus dang dran rtogs bag chags bcas/_/rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung /_/sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa dag_/steng sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin/_/dang por gsang ba'i rim thob pas/_/rlung dang thig le'i las goms nas/_/bde chen byang chub 
[\[186b.3\]]sems kyi ro/_/sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba/_/g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis/_/lus dang phyi nang dran rtogs bcas/_/nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skye/_/lus dang snang bar bcas pa yi/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa/_/bde chen thig le a dang 
[\[186b.4\]]gnas/_/thig le stong pa'i ri mo can/_/gsal bar shes pa rgyu bas mngon/_/'og nas bskul zhing steng nas mnan/_/dngas snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug_/bde ba'i rlung can yaM gi sgo/_/bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gyen du phul/_/rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can/_/dpa' 
[\[186b.5\]]bo lam nas thur du 'then/_/rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung /_/stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su thim/_/phyi nang rgyu ba chad pa dang /_/rig pa thig le'i ngang la gnas/_/bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang /_/sgra dang lus bde 
[\[186b.6\]]rgyug pa dang /_/dgod dang brgyal sogs gang byung ba/_/brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya/_/mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na/_/thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis/_/gdon dang spos dang gnon pa dag_/ji ltar rigs par brtags par bya/_/rang lus thig le'i nyams myong 
[\[186b.7\]]la/_/bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa/_/tha mal zhen pa bsgyur ba dang /_/bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa dang /_/dran rtogs rgyud sogs zhi ba dang /_/bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang /_/rlung dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang /_/
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]dran rtog a yi ngang du gnas/_/'di ni nang gi rim pa yin/_/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las/_/gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir 'byung ba/_/dka' thub can dang tha mal dang /_/thun mong lam las bzlog phyir ro/_/
[\[187a.2\]]'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin/_/tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi/_/bde chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas/_/yon tan khyad par kun du rdzogs/_/gnyis med 'khril ba'i ngo bo ni/_/bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas/_/gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag 
[\[187a.3\]]tshul bzhin dang /_/nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa/_/gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas/_/pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du/_/gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gang phul ba/_/lo dang zla ba ma yin par/_/myur du bde chen lus su 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/_/
[\[187a.4\]]dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang /_/nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni/_/bde chen gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas/_/gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang /_/zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi/_/rang gi ling+ga de nyid la/_/gsang ba'i phur ba bzhi rdzogs pa/_/gsang ba'i yul la 
[\[187a.5\]]btab pa yis/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la/_/las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan/_/rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis/_/pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa/_/nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa/_/gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dus su blta/_/gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag ni/_/
[\[187a.6\]]kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas/_/mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la/_/gzar bu gnyis bcas thab phul bas/_/thig le chen por 'bab par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang /_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa dang /_/dbang po dar cing smin pa dang /_/
[\[187a.7\]]thig le'i don la mos pa dang /_/rlung dang bcud la goms pa yis/_/rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun/_/dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yid/_/gdul bya'i don du de bshad do/_/gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang /_/dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/_/thabs dang 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]sbyor ba la brtson zhing /_/nyi zla rtse sbyor dbang thob nas/_/gzung zlog 'byangs pa'i gar thabs kyis/_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don/_/sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye/_/nyi zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_/rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas/_/khams bzhi 'dus 
[\[187b.2\]]pa'i snying po las/_/bde chen thig le mi rtog pa/_/thabs kyis da ltar mngon du snang /_/thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis/_/skal med las kyis dman pa la/_/dbang dang brgyud pa bral ba yis/_/tshig dang rigs pas ci bstan kyang /_/rigs ngan rgyal sar bzhag pa 
[\[187b.3\]]ltar/_/bdag phung gzhan brlag 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid/_/gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas/_/zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/mkha' 'gro gsum la gang brten nas/_/ye shes thig le rgya dpag med/_/rim pas mthar 
[\[187b.4\]]thug gnas su 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas/_/rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang /_/dran rtog nam mkhar gsal ba dang /_/bde chen sngon du smin pa yis/_/'chi med sangs rgyas sa la sbyor/_/'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang /_/lha mo tshogs kyis byin 
[\[187b.5\]]brlabs nas/_/rol rtsed sna tshogs sgyur byed cing /_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing /_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing /_/rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes/_/nam mkha'i mthar thug bar du ni/_/bde 
[\[187b.6\]]chen ye shes zag pa med/_/ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can/_/nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa/_/rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//
[\[187b.7\]]de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas/_/thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i lam/_/rim pa nyid du bshad par bya/_/dad dang brtul zhugs che ba dang /_/theg pa chen por rigs nges shing /_/snying brtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan/_/sgrub la 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]brtson pa'i gang zag gis/_/lus dang longs spyod 'tsho ba dang /_/bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis/_/dang por bla ma mnyes byas la/_/thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang /_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/rang byung ye shes rang snang ba/_/gcig dang 
[\[188a.2\]]du ma med tshul gyis/_/bden pa gnyis med 'brel ba nyid/_/byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs kyi/_/rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang /_/rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/_/rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa/_/thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/_/'phel dang 
[\[188a.3\]]dga' bde longs spyod phyir/_/rgyas pa'i las la 'bad par bya/_/dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang /_/rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang /_/gdug pa dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/_/rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo/_/dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs pa/_/gang gis 'dul 
[\[188a.4\]]bar mi nus pa/_/gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir/_/drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam/_/gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la/_/dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya/_/de nas yon tan rgyas par bya/_/de nyid dbang bsdu las la sbyar/_/gal te dbang du ma gyur na/_/drag pos 
[\[188a.5\]]gzir te bsgral bar bya/_/gal te log par ltung srid pas/_/'og min gnas su phaT kyis 'phang /_/nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za/_/dang por sngon bya'i las kyis ni/_/nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag_/de nas nus pa thob pa ste/_/de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas/_/
[\[188a.6\]]thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub/_/zag med lam la goms sbyangs pas/_/cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi/_/gdul bya zhing dang nus mthu dang /_/byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags/_/mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas/_/ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin du/_/
[\[188a.7\]]dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin/_/las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang /_/sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa/_/cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis/_/lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar 'gyur/_/nga rgyal rin chen gzi brjid kyis/_/dpal dang longs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]spyod 'phel ba dang /_/tshe dang lang tsho stobs ldan zhing /_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis/_/bdud dang gdug pa rgyal po dang /_/lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma/_/phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur/_/zhe sdang rdo rje ting 
[\[188b.2\]]'dzin gyis/_/cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas/_/chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na/_/gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/_/rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings/_/rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas/_/sbyor ba rlung gi goms stobs can/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[188b.3\]]nang la gnas gyur pas/_/nyams kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te/_/rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang /_/rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa/_/nus pa brtan pas mngon du 'gyur/_/gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid/_/gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang /_/bstim 
[\[188b.4\]]zhing gnas pa gang yin pa/_/de dag nyid du bshad pa yin/_/d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang /_/rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na/_/e ba~M ma ya las bzhi dbyibs/_/kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa/_/bag chags sa bon snyigs ma dang /_/rtog dang tha mal zhen 
[\[188b.5\]]pa'i rdzas/_/nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te/_/thig les de nyid zhi ba dang /_/rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas/_/rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas/_/nus pas dbang du 'dus pa dang /_/thig les ma bcos nam mkha'i ngang /_/srog dang thig ler bcas 
[\[188b.6\]]bsdus pa/_/a yi ngang du thim 'gyur de/_/rgyu ba dngas shing 'phar ba gnon/_/mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya/_/rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo las/_/'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang /_/bskyod pa rlung gis las rung bas/_/nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal/_/
[\[188b.7\]]thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas/_/bde chen dbang thob zhen chags bral/_/ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na/_/rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung /_/kha dog grangs dang snying po dang /_/dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi/_/khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bzhugs tshul de nyid de bzhin no/_/'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du/_/gtum mo byin za'i las bskul bas/_/dngas snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag_/mi shigs thig ler mchod pa phul/_/phyi nang rgyu ba ma lus pa/_/rang 'byung 'khor lo 
[\[189a.2\]]thig le mchog_/spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa/_/phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas/_/thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad/_/de nyid nang du rtsa 'khor lo/_/thig les nang du nyams skyed pa/_/rim pa 'di ni nang du bshad/_/dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa/_/skal ngan 
[\[189a.3\]]rigs chad yul min pa/_/gsang bas gsang ba zhes bshad do/_/dang por blo ldan gang zag ni/_/ma lus bden pa dbyer med la/_/rang bzhin rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/_/phung po khams dang skye mched la/_/thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don/_/ye nas 
[\[189a.4\]]sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid/_/de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa/_/gang la brten nas rtogs pa la/_/lam gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te/_/sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs/_/ma lus yon tan rang shar bas/_/thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la/_/tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 
[\[189a.5\]]'bras bu nyid/_/dbang po cig car spyod yul yin/_/gang su blo dang mos pa dang /_/rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la/_/thun mong sgom thun khyad par can/_/rim pa'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya/_/dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun/_/rang sa nyid na mi dmigs pa/_/ma bcos 
[\[189a.6\]]ma bsal mi gnas pa/_/dngos po ci la'ang mi brtag cing /_/de nyid la yang mi rtog pa/_/'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par/_/bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis/_/bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa/_/gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa/_/ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[189a.7\]]rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid/_/bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom/_/gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag_/chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na/_/ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pa yis/_/ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid/_/rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' dag 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/sprin kyang rang 'byung dag pa ltar/_/byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa/_/chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no/_/gang du snang srid ma lus pa/_/phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de/_/de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du/_/goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe/_/de nyid 
[\[189b.2\]]rnal 'byor de nyid ni/_/stong pa chen po rnal 'byor yin/_/sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa/_/ma brtags mi rtog cir mi gnas/_/'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas/_/bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin/_/de nas de las langs pa'i tshe/_/sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu dang /_/'ja' 
[\[189b.3\]]tshon dbu ba chu bur ltar/_/snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin/_/rig pa phyi nang ma lus pa/_/stong pa'i cho 'phrul snang du zad/_/ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste/_/de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar/_/zhen chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom/_/ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni/_/dpag med ngo 
[\[189b.4\]]bor rang snang yang /_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba/_/de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la/_/rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i phyir/_/snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin/_/'gro ba gang dang gang dag las/_/snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas/_/sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis/_/de 
[\[189b.5\]]snyed spyod la mtha' yas te/_/don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston/_/tha mal ba dang thabs nyid dang /_/lus ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par/_/don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab/_/gang du byams dang snying rje yis/_/ma khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te/_/theg pa chen po'i rigs 
[\[189b.6\]]chad cing /_/dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin/_/rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste/_/nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar/_/ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi/_/ngo bo bden min [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa min/_/chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med/_/sgo gsum 
[\[189b.7\]]'di ltar brtan pa ni/_/thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin/_/de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/_/rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa ni/_/yi ge hU~M du gsal bar bsgom/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/'phro 'dus hU~M du gsal bar bya/_/rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa las/_/thig le mi 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]dmigs stong par blta/_/ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan/_/gang bsgril hU~M bcas gsal bar bya/_/rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med/_/sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan te/_/'phro 'du phra mo'i rang bzhin sku/_/gsal la skyon dang bral bar bsgom/_/de 
[\[190a.2\]]nas rang rang tshad gyur pa/_/rigs pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid/_/zhi dang khro bo skabs nyid du/_/ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya/_/yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/_/yang na zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom/_/gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar yang /_/yan 
[\[190a.3\]]lag lha ni tshang bar bsgom/_/goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun/_/de ltar gsal bar brtag par bya/_/rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom pa/_/phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin/_/sgo gsum bsgom la rab 'bad pas/_/rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das/_/ma 
[\[190a.4\]]lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste/_/phyogs gcig pa yi spyod par gsungs/_/de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag_/gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu/_/brtags te de ltar bsgom par bya/_/'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid/_/yang na ye shes lnga nyid de/_/gnas gcig snying por gnas 
[\[190a.5\]]par bya/_/de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang /_/sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang /_/khro bo khra mo 'khor du bsgom/_/yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya/_/zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang /_/tshom bu spros pas spros bcas yin/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/_/tshom bu lnga 
[\[190a.6\]]la khro bcas bsgom/_/yang na sku gsung thugs ldan pa'i/_/tshom bu gsum dang bcas pa yi/_/khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom/_/rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog_/khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi/_/mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis/_/tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams 
[\[190a.7\]]bsgom/_/slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas/_/rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/_/rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa/_/sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs/_/dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te/_/de nas 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/_/de nas yo byad lnga ldan pas/_/ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i/_/skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas/_/tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya/_/thabs dang 
[\[190b.2\]]shes rab 'brel ba yi/_/pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par/_/yo byad 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas/_/dgon par 'khor khang rab brtsigs te/_/rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu/_/brtags te yo byad longs spyad cing /_/rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis/_/zhag ni sum cu phrag 
[\[190b.3\]]drug gam/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/_/tshe la dbang sgyur zag med thob/_/de nas brgya phrag bcu drug gis/_/sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/_/skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa/_/rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya/_/'byor pa'i longs spyod tshang ba ni/_/
[\[190b.4\]]bde ba'i longs spyod tshogs su bshad/_/lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs/_/thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas/_/tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas/_/tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad/_/bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs 
[\[190b.5\]]pas/_/rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med/_/lha mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi/_/'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob/_/zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis/_/gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku/_/zhing khams kun la gnas par byed/_/gal te mtshan mar zhen 
[\[190b.6\]]dbang gis/_/rtogs pa'i stobs ni chung gyur na/_/byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku/_/mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa/_/cha lugs mngon du byung na yang /_/zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min/_/gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang /_/thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis su/_/nus pa'i khyad 
[\[190b.7\]]par che chung gis/_/phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni/_/dkar mo bong chung skad che la/_/bzhin lus gtsug phud g.yas su 'khyil/_/yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing /_/rlung khar lci bas zhi ba bya/_/zla dang yan lag mang ba dang /_/phra zhing bshan la gzangs su ring /_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas/_/rnam 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas/_/'phel ba'i dus su 'di dag gzung /_/bzhin mdog pad 'dra sog ka la/_/smin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed/_/lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing /_/bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med/_/
[\[191a.2\]]'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma/_/khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med/_/gtsang sme'i rtog bral gsod par bshad/_/gang du nus pa brtan thob pa/_/de dag sa nas sar sbyong ba/_/rig pa'i skyes 
[\[191a.3\]]bu dam pa nyid/_/rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa/_/ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing /_/ma lus gsal bar mthar phyin pa'o/_/rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir/_/rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa/_/rig 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o/_/ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu 
[\[191a.4\]]med kyang /_/sa sbyong sems dpa' bskyed du med/_/bder gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig_/rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob pa'o/_/gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na/_/bdag nyid sgo gsum lhar lta zhing /_/'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol/_/ting 'dzin phyag 
[\[191a.5\]]rgya chen por smin/_/khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar/_/ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog_/rnam par smin ces de la brjod/_/zag pa zad pa rdo rje lus/_/phyin cad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral/_/bde ba chen po lung thob pas/_/zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang 
[\[191a.6\]]bral/_/zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus/_/ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu med/_/bsgrubs pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa/_/rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med/_/'jig pa lnga bral zag pa zad/_/dbang sgyur gsum la dbang thob pas/_/bde ba longs spyod dpag 
[\[191a.7\]]tu med/_/grangs med bskal par don byed cing /_/mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs/_/rgyal tshab skyes bu sa sbyong ba/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/_/nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing /_/mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las 'das/_/'jigs 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das/_/rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas/_/gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral/_/ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i mthu/_/mtshan ma sdug po yul las 'das/_/'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing /_/gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i 
[\[191b.2\]]rigs/_/nam mkha' mthar thug med pa ltar/_/bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis/_/bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing la/_/ting 'dzin rig pa'i me byung bas/_/zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du/_/ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs pa/_/bsgoms dang ting 
[\[191b.3\]]'dzin rig pa yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa/_/phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin/_/de nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing /_/ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis/_/mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste/_/zhing khams bye ba'i dbang thob cing /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras/_/dbang 
[\[191b.4\]]dang cho 'phrul kun thob pa/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab/_/mnyam bzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis/_/rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka' la gnas/_/zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang /_/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang bzhin la/_/spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/
[\[191b.5\]]phyogs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas/_/dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur/_/dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te/_/dang po bslab pa mthar phyin cing /_/thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yis/_/gsang ba nang gi don la sbyar/_/thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas/_/lus dang 
[\[191b.6\]]spyod yul bcas pa dang /_/lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa/_/bde chen thig le nyid du blta/_/lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas/_/thig le bde bar snang ba nub/_/sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le/_/dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor bas/_/ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis/_/thabs kyi 
[\[191b.7\]]rim pa bskul las shes/_/bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba/_/mi rtog bde ba cha shas med/_/mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag_/stong nyid 'brel pa'i ri mo can/_/tha mal bya ba kun bral ba/_/spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin/_/thig le bzhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/'dzag 'bar 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]thim gang bde ba ni/_/sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan/_/lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum/_/til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltar/_/ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang ba/_/ma lus 'od dang snying po ltar/_/snang srid thig le chen po nyid/_/bde ba chen pos khyab 
[\[192a.2\]]par gsal/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni/_/khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste/_/mi shigs thig le bde ba'i bcud/_/ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas/_/nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste/_/thig le gcig gis kun khyab pas/_/
[\[192a.3\]]bde chen snying rjes gcig tu 'khyil/_/de nyid bde chen phyag rgya ste/_/nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad/_/de nyid nges par las rung bas/_/thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i/_/bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par/_/so so'i thig ler sku 'phros shing /_/khams lnga ye shes ro dang 
[\[192a.4\]]bcas/_/sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan/_/mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra/_/rang lus smin nas snang bar spro/_/gang nas gang la spros gyur pa/_/de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste/_/bde ba'i thig le grangs las 'das/_/ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs/_/mi phyed ro yis 
[\[192a.5\]]gang khyab pas/_/grangs 'das bde chen tshogs rdzogs nas/_/ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang /_/gang de de yis rgyas btab pas/_/de nyid bde chen thig ler smin/_/rnam pa phyi nang snyigs mar bcas/_/bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin/_/snyigs ma 'byung ba'i lus 
[\[192a.6\]]las 'das/_/snying po bar chad med pa'i lus/_/thig les tha ma'i snod gang bas/_/ma lus bde ba chen por smin/_/de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang /_/rlung gi 'dren pa'i stobs ldan pa/_/rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs/_/skad cig mngon shes lngar smin cing /_/
[\[192a.7\]]'gro ba ris dang thar par 'gyur/_/mi shigs a la thig le thim/_/'byung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing /_/'gyur 'jig med pa'i lus la gnas/_/'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid/_/snang ba thig le nyid du ste/_/thig le thung ngu a ru thim/_/gnyis med bde ba 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]cha shas bral/_/'di ni zag med rang byung ba/_/rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid/_/dper na me dang tsha ba'am/_/rgya mtsho dang ni rlan bzhin no/_/rlung dang thig le rig pa dang /_/tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang /_/'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur thob/_/bde ba'i phyag rgya 
[\[192b.2\]]chen po ni/_/ma lus zag med thig le ste/_/rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid/_/snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad pas/_/ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal/_/rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas/_/ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid/_/'du bas sgyur ba'i spyod yul lam/_/
[\[192b.3\]]mun 'gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du/_/rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams dag_/bde chen phyag rgya chen por 'gyur/_/gang dag bsgoms pa'i skyes bu ni/_/tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa/_/rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa/_/bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par/_/bde chen thig ler lhun 
[\[192b.4\]]gyis grub/_/dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam/_/rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar/_/goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin/_/rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa/_/reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang /_/bde chen thig le nyams su 'bar/_/bskal pa du mar gnas gyur 
[\[192b.5\]]cing /_/'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun/_/rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub/_/gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na/_/mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba yis/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs/_/mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub/_/dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang /_/bde 
[\[192b.6\]]chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/e dang ba~M la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung /_/dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis/_/ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la/_/phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/_/gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas/_/
[\[192b.7\]]bde chen mchog la rol par bya/_/ye shes nyi zla mnyam ldan pas/_/re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung /_/lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang /_/bdag po gdung can phrad pa las/_/nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar/_/dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i tshe/_/ma lus bde bas khyab gyur 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]na/_/g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char/_/gal te nyams pa'i ltas byung na/_/thabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis/_/rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid/_/dngos bral lhan cig skyes 
[\[193a.2\]]pa nyid/_/rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin/_/lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe/_/ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas/_/bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu gnas/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid/_/sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis/_/so so bde ba'i pho brang 
[\[193a.3\]]du/_/thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe/_/sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/_/nyams myong ro yis rgyas btab bo/_/lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas/_/rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i/_/rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya/_/gal te nyams na bsam pa'am/_/blta dang mnyan 
[\[193a.4\]]pa la sogs pas/_/bar chad med par bsgom par bya/_/rig pa bde bar gang smin pas/_/sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin/_/spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas/_/goms pa'i thabs la dbang sgyur bas/_/rten dang brten par bcas pa yi/_/thig le rlung la dbang sgyur 
[\[193a.5\]]zhing /_/lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo/_/mkha' 'gro rnams la dbang byed nus/_/thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang /_/zlog dang sbyor la dbang sgyur te/_/gal te mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe/_/dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin/_/phyin cad mchod dang nus pa sbyin/_/rang gi skabs 
[\[193a.6\]]ni ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing /_/dbang sgyur lam la goms par bya/_/nyi zla 'dres pa'i bde ba nyid/_/zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe/_/sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing /_/sems kyi bde ba bar chad med/_/gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe/_/
[\[193a.7\]]ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste/_/lus sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid/_/tshad dang rgya dbyings ro las 'das/_/dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te/_/thig le sa bon zag pa bral/_/bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi chad/_/rang nyid thig ler 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]nyams myong bas/_/snying po'i thig le bral ba med/_/phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med/_/rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid/_/'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba/_/bral thob med pa'i ngo bor gnas/_/gang du yon tan tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa/_/bde chen chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyun las byung /_/
[\[193b.2\]]tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub/_/gzhan na med de rang nyid snang bar zad/_/rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med/_/zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong /_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen 
[\[193b.3\]]po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid/_/phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi/_/che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya/_/mthar phyin lnga yi rang bzhin ni/_/
[\[193b.4\]]rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi/_/mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid/_/thun mong 'bras bur yang dag bshad/_/yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur ni/_/thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs 
[\[193b.5\]]pa/_/tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa/_/bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa ste/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/_/ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa/_/zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste/_/ma lus kun la mnyam 
[\[193b.6\]]du gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/rgya dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi/_/dag dang ma dag ci snang yang /_/blang dor phyogs ris yongs kyis med/_/rang 'byung 'od gsal maN+Dal la/_/ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te/_/thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med 
[\[193b.7\]]pas/_/ma lus bsam pa skong bar mdzad/_/rang byung ye shes lhun grub ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo bas/_/ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang /_/zhen dang ched du byas pa med/_/sa dang lam la sogs pa yi/_/theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni/_/rang rang ltos pa'i 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]mthar thug kyang /_/che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral/_/skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas dpag med yon tan rnams/_/rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/_/ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis/_/nyi zla'i bde ba mngon thob ste/_/rdo rje 
[\[194a.2\]]'chang gi sa la bkod/_/dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas/_/sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te/_/bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang /_/che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te/_/nam 
[\[194a.3\]]mkha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yis/_/bde chen ye shes rgyas par gnas/_/bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa ltar/_/ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid/_/sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba/_/kun gyi yon tan bdag nyid gnas/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' 
[\[194a.4\]]yas pa'i/_/nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni/_/gdul bya'i rdul snyed gnas kyi bar/_/skad cig 'du 'bral med par gnas/_/bcud 'dus thig le chen po ni/_/bde ba'i zag med thig le ste/_/a dang bde bar 'brel ba yi/_/ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/
[\[194a.5\]]thig le'i bye brag brgyad cu'i rtsa/_/bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro/_/ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing /_/ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa/_/zag med thig ler ro gcig pas/_/nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin 
[\[194a.6\]]nyid/_/sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le/_/dngas ma lnga 'dus snying po can/_/gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste/_/bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po/_/thig le ro yis gang phye ba/_/dpag med sku gsung yon tan thugs/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rang snang ba/_/thig 
[\[194a.7\]]le phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/_/phyi nang dngas snyigs ma lus pa/_/rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid/_/gzhan med phyogs med rang snang ba/_/phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid/_/gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni/_/yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste/_/bde ba chen po'i snying po las/_/
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dpag med yon tan rnam par 'phrul/_/bde ba chen po'i thig le ni/_/'du 'phro brel bas zag pa med/_/phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med/_/thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin/_/rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te/_/thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[194b.2\]]mthas gtugs chos thams cad/_/bde ba chen por gsal bar myong /_/mtshan dang dpe byad tshad 'das pa/_/rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid/_/ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun/_/rang la rdzogs pa nyid du gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni/_/rang 'byung thig le chen po ste/_/
[\[194b.3\]]A li kA li zhu ba las/_/nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung /_/gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu/_/nam mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i ngang /_/khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med/_/lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa/_/bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/_/nam mkha' lta 
[\[194b.4\]]bur dpag tu med/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/_/gsang ba'i thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi/_/rgyal ba kun dang lhan cig tu/_/ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/ma gsungs rig pas nyams 
[\[194b.5\]]btang bas/_/mi 'dzin longs spyod chen po'i gnas/_/rang 'byung nyi zla rten gyi ro/_/ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med/_/gsang ba'i thig le bcud 'dus pa/_/nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro/_/gnyis med 'khril ba'i stobs las byung /_/mkha' dbyings byang chub 
[\[194b.6\]]'byor pa'i sems/_/ma btang ma spros thig le che/_/nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du/_/bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/_/yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang /_/nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_khams kyi rdul snyed de/_/re re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/rdul snyed nam 
[\[194b.7\]]mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/yab yum gnyis med 'brel pa yi/_/thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa/_/gang yang mi sgrib thig le'i ro/_/snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa/_/sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud/_/bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i/_/ma lus kun dang 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]lhan cig tu/_/mos dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis/_/cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni/_/la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul/_/de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang /_/la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste/_/la lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing /_/la lar mnye 
[\[195a.2\]]dang rdebs dang 'bud/_/'gyed dang 'dud dang 'gying ba yi/_/dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston/_/'o dang 'tshir dang dgod pa dag_/sna tshogs rol pa 'di dag gis/_/ma chags pa dag chags byed cing /_/chags pa myur du nyams par byed/_/tha skam myur du bengs byed 
[\[195a.3\]]cing /_/bde chen lo tog skyed par byed/_/bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi/_/lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas/_/steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu/_/rol cing glu ni len par byed/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba che/_/lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar 
[\[195a.4\]]rdul dang bral ba ste/_/rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i snang ba nub/_/ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gis rlabs/_/bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed/_/rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen
