[\[195a.5\]]ni/_/nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste/_/bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta/_/gang tshe 'gro ba tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs 
[\[195a.6\]]pa na/_/dga' dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas/_/dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che/_/skye rga na 'chi re dogs ngo tsha mi tsha grags pa'i chos brgyad tshod kyang byis pas mi shes so/_/gang zhig thabs dang shes rab 
[\[195a.7\]]bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa/_/rgya mtsho la ni sa bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste/_/nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te/_/rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas skams to/_/'di ni glu 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]ru blangs pa yis/_/rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/_/rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te/_/dpa' bos sgeg mo'i tshul 'dzin cing /_/dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du/_/glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis/_/tha mal yid rtogs bcad nas ni/_/bde chen 
[\[195b.2\]]yid ni 'phrog par mdzad/_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang /_/zhing thabs bde ba rmad 'byung ba/_/'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa/_/dpag med mtha' mas cir snang yang /_/rang byung ye shes byang chub sems/_/thig le gcig gi ngo bo las/_/
[\[195b.3\]]mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis/_/'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro/_/thabs la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas/_/thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi/_/ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/_/thabs chen sgyu ma rmad du byung /_/
[\[195b.4\]]sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings/_/sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/_/ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag_/thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/_/kun nas 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_/kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid/_/bya ba byed la byas pa med/_/zad 
[\[195b.5\]]dang 'phel ba med pa yi/_/dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab/_/ye shes thig le rang snang ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog_/mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni/_/gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med/_/nam mkha' rang 'byung rtag pa ltar/_/'pho 
[\[195b.6\]]'gyur med pas de bzhin no/_/nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa bzhin/_/rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med/_/ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems/_/ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal/_/sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun/_/ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas/_/
[\[195b.7\]]rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir/_/mkhyen dang bsgribs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la/_/rang gi cha shas chos bral bas/_/nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun/_/skad cig ma 'dres tshul du mkhyen/_/rang rig byang chub sems nyid 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]las/_/mtho dman blang dor ma dmigs pas/_/'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang /_/ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra/_/dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams/_/rang 'byung rig pa rang snang bas/_/ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams/_/rang snang gzhan las 
[\[196a.2\]]thob bya med/_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/_/rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro/_/tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis/_/ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang /_/mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no/_/gsung ni nam mkha' khyab par ni/_/phyogs 
[\[196a.3\]]bcu khyab par sgra sgrogs pa/_/mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/_/bsam yas 'dul thabs sna tshogs snang /_/thugs ni ma lus mkhyen pa'i thugs/_/phan dang bder bcas brtser ldan pa'i/_/mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro/_/ye shes thugs la khyad par med/_/
[\[196a.4\]]yon tan tshad khyad bral ba ste/_/nam mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba/_/dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir/_/byin brlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul/_/phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba/_/'gro 'ong med pa'i don tshul gyis/_/dpag bsam bum dang rin chen gyi/_/bya byed 
[\[196a.5\]]med par don rnams rdzogs/_/ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing /_/rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med/_/ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te/_/bde ba chen po chos kyi sku/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/_/gnyis med ngang la kun rdzogs pas/_/de nyid tshad bral mnga' 
[\[196a.6\]]brnyes pas/_/longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/_/sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du/_/rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku/_/ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas/_/ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid/_/mi 
[\[196a.7\]]'jigs gnyen po kun bral ba/_/rdo rje sku zhes rnam par bstan/_/gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i/_/'od gsal nam mkha'i mtha' dbus med/_/sku bzhi mtha' yis ma reg pa/_/dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o/_/ma lus dbye ba mtha' spangs shing /_/de ltar kun dang 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]mnyam par gnas/_/don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur ba/_/brjod med don gyi gsung nyid do/_/sku dang phyag rgya gzigs tshul gyis/_/ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la/_/brjod med tshul gyis gang ston pa/_/brda yi gsung du rnam par bstan/_/gang yang rung ba mthong 
[\[196b.2\]]thos tshe/_/dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar/_/dngos pos byang chub nam mkhar rtogs/_/byin brlabs rtogs pa'i gsung zhes bya/_/gang gi don du gang snang ba/_/gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing /_/gzhan dag pham byed mi thub pa/_/zil gyis gnon 
[\[196b.3\]]pa'i gsung du brjod/_/tshig gcig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas/_/mos pa de rnyed rnam grol cing /_/yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs/_/'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung /_/ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med/_/rtog la rnam rtog mtshan 
[\[196b.4\]]ma yang /_/mi rtog ye shes grol ba'i thugs/_/gnyis med bde ba chen po yis/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol/_/ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe/_/'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs/_/bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang /_/rang 'byung gnyis kyi phyogs bral bas/_/
[\[196b.5\]]gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas/_/'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs/_/ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing /_/ma lus kun gyi ngo bo la/_/skye 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong /_/mi 'gyur rdo rje thugs zhes bya/_/dpag med nam mkha'i zhing khams dang /_/
[\[196b.6\]]che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i gdan/_/zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang /_/ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi/_/'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang /_/gzhan yang yon tan chen po ni/_/mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ltar/_/
[\[196b.7\]]dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te/_/zag med che ba'i yon tan snang /_/gzhan yang mdzad pa'i phrin las ni/_/gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa/_/mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te/_/mtha' thug med par rnam par snang /_/'di dag bsdus pas bshad bya na/_/zhi rgyas 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dbang drag la sogs pas/_/mtha' yas bzhis ni rnam par bsdus/_/lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub/_/mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni/_/bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud 
[\[197a.2\]]chen po las lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/_/dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/_/gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod/_/gter 'dzin rgyal po stobs po che/_/rang gi lag gi 
[\[197a.3\]]rdo rje nyid/_/dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te/_/bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis/_/rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis/_/'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag_/'khrugs shing rnam par g.yo mdzad de/_/kun du rab g.yo rnam par g.yo/_/stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor 
[\[197a.4\]]yug bcas/_/'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de/_/rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi/_/ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang /_/ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang /_/'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad de/_/rgyal ba'i tshogs 
[\[197a.5\]]kun mnyes par byas/_/kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa yis/_/zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi/_/'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di/_/sna tshogs sgras ni glu ru blangs/_/o~M AHhU~M a la la ho/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs/_/mi 
[\[197a.6\]]rtogs gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas/_/gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas min skye 'jig med/_/dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku/_/sna tshogs 
[\[197a.7\]]mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben/_/de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku/_/mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang nam mkha'i ngang du bye brag med ho/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/mi zad par ldan 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang /_/'gro ba rnams ni yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes med par mdzes/_/rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med ho/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab cing rgya cher nam mkha' 'dra/_/ma lus go 
[\[197b.2\]]zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrogs pa/_/rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mos dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang ho/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub/_/bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba/_/thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral 
[\[197b.3\]]med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol ho/_/de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa/_/bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la/_/gsang ba 'di ni gtad par mdzad/_/nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/bstan pa 
[\[197b.4\]]kun gyi rang bzhin te/_/ma lus kun gyi thabs su snang /_/gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste/_/dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud/_/chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba/_/gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud/_/rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas/_/dam pa 'di la bsngags par 
[\[197b.5\]]mdzad/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po/_/zab mo'i lung gi nges don 'di/_/rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis/_/thams cad la ni me long ltar/_/bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas/_/ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing /_/brtags pa'i phyi rol chos la zhen/_/
[\[197b.6\]]slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang /_/rdo rje spun la sdang sems che/_/zab mo'i don la skur byed cing /_/gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang /_/ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che/_/dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing /_/rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i/_/phyi nang gnyis lta'i gang zag la/_/
[\[197b.7\]]bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/_/lus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang /_/gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na/_/dbang dang dngos grub nams kyang min/_/rmongs pas gal te byin na ni/_/de nyid mnar med dmyal bar ltung /_/dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/_/phun 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing /_/dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas/_/lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na/_/dman pa'i longs spyod nams kyang min/_/theg pa che la mos pa dang /_/brtul zhugs snying brtser gus par ldan/_/rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen 
[\[198a.2\]]bkur zhing /_/skyon dang spyo ba yongs su bzod/_/bskal par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug_/nyes dang legs pa ci la yang /_/ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med/_/rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shes dang /_/'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i/_/dam pa 'di la gsang 
[\[198a.3\]]ba gtang /_/slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing /_/gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas/_/rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis/_/gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs/_/blun po mun pas chod pa rnams/_/log par zhen pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/mthong ba'i chos 
[\[198a.4\]]la dmyal bar smin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/_/ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas/_/rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed pa/_/dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste/_/bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub/_/rdul snyed 
[\[198a.5\]]zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing /_/tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i/_/'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/_/de bas rgyal sras gcig gi yul/_/rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba yi/_/grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs/_/a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 
[\[198a.6\]]'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la 
[\[198a.7\]]mi tra dang /_ban+de dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/slad nas bi ma la mi tra nyid la ze mo dge slong mas yang dang yang du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams so//_//
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]{D834}]@##/_/bod skad du/_gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[198b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/_/'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang 
[\[198b.3\]]dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par gsal ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/_yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/_lhag pa'i ye 
[\[198b.4\]]shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/_rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil pa/_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog 
[\[198b.5\]]la sogs te/_/rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/_ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_shar bu'i rgyan dang /_gzugs sna tshogs dang /_sgra sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_ro sna tshogs 
[\[198b.6\]]dang /_reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la/_mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/_rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/_rnam par thar ba brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang 
[\[198b.7\]]med par kun du yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang /_stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang /_dbang gi rma bya'i khri dang /_thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal le bar gsal zhing /_mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba/_lhun gyis 
[\[199a.2\]]grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/_ye shes drug gi phyag_/ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/_sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang 
[\[199a.3\]]ldan pa 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[199a.4\]]pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang /_de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang /_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_le brgan dang /_ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/_btsun mo dam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings dang /_sra ba'i dbyings dang /_mnyen pa'i dbyings dang /_dro ba'i dbyings dang /_bskyod pa'i dbyings 
[\[199a.5\]]la sogs pa/_btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyis dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang /_/
[\[199a.6\]]byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang /_btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang /_mnyan par bya ba dang /_bsnam par bya ba dang /_myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang /_byang 
[\[199a.7\]]chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang /_btsun mo 'das pa dang /_da ltar 'byung ba dang /_ma byon pa'i tshogs dang /_'joms pa chen mo reg pa dang /_'joms pa chen mo reg byed dang /_'joms pa chen mo reg shes dang /_btsun mo 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rtag par ma yin pa dang /_chad par ma yin pa dang /_bdag tu ma yin pa dang /_mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis 
[\[199b.2\]]su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs dang /_yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/e/_e/_e ma'o/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang /_dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs dang rang snang ba nyid 
[\[199b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[199b.4\]]snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun du bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du 
[\[199b.5\]]brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/o~M chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings/_/kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum/_/ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/_/bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal/_/nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/_/
[\[199b.6\]]ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba/_/dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir/_/nang dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan/_/rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas 
[\[199b.7\]]pa yi/_/sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de/_/kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs/_/zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to/_/zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang /_
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do/_/sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso/_/kun du bzang po rdo rje yid/_/ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te/_/shar phyogs mngon dga'i bsam yas na/_/nI la lta 
[\[200a.2\]]bu'i gter 'byin pa/_/gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas/_/byang chub mchog gis nang gtan dgrol/_/mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas/_/'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus/_/
[\[200a.3\]]sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to/_/zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to/_/zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[200a.4\]]nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/_/skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/_/me rlung 
[\[200a.5\]]gos dkar sgrol ma ste/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing /_/thams cad ma lus chos so cog_/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa min/_/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do/_/
[\[200a.6\]]zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to/_/de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes 
[\[200a.7\]]dben/_/srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing /_/snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas/_/phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/_/thams cad mchog gi snying po bas/_/gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal/_/nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/_/btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i 
[\[200b.2\]]sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/skye ba med las thams cad skyes/_/skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/'gag 
[\[200b.3\]]pa med las thams cad 'gag_/'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/_/gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[200b.4\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/_/dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong /_/'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med/_/ces 
[\[200b.5\]]brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/_/sna tshogs 
[\[200b.6\]]snang la rang bzhin gsang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang /_/gzhan du min yang shin tu gsang /_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/_'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig 
[\[200b.7\]]pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/_/rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul/_/sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang /_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/_/bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin/_/sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de/_/bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/_/rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin/_/nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor/_/bcings 
[\[201a.2\]]med rnam par grol med pa'i/_/ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/_/bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/_/ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo /_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes 
[\[201a.3\]]su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to/_/bton nas kyang las 
[\[201a.4\]]kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang /_yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de bltams pa dang /_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_dka' 
[\[201a.5\]]thub mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas pa dang /_bdud btul ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun du mkhyen pa dang /_thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun du mkhyen pa 
[\[201a.6\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun du gzigs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun du gsan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun du don spyod pa dang /_zag pa med pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang /_/kun du sku bsam gyis 
[\[201a.7\]]mi khyab pa dang /_kun du thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun du zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun du gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to/_/de ltar snang 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_bla na med pa'i theg 
[\[201b.2\]]pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so/_/gsung ngo /_/gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 
[\[201b.3\]]'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa la dgos pa dang /_las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang /_las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/'khor 
[\[201b.4\]]ba'i skyon dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o dkyil 'khor bsam yas par/_/snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i/_/gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgyal/_/mtha' dang bral bas 
[\[201b.5\]]bdag med pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos/_/ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis/_/stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par/_/phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor/_/
[\[201b.6\]]rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin/_/mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/_/de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang /_/rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste/_/rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med/_/yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su/_/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de/_/
[\[201b.7\]]de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas/_/rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/_/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/_/log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/_/phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin/_/log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/_/gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/_/log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]nyid kyang /_/gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma/_/rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul/_/nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/_/bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/_/rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog_/theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la/_/theg pa gcig 
[\[202a.2\]]gi 'bras bur gnas/_/yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/_/rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'/_/chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/_/ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir/_/'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston/_/'dul ba mdo 
[\[202a.3\]]sde chos mngon dang /_/dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/_/ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par/_/phyogs bcur kun du rab grags pa/_/gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te/_/rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/sde snod kun dang rgyud 
[\[202a.4\]]kun gyi/_/ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa/_/'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs/_/chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam/_/ston pa'i don dang mthun phyogs su/_/ming nyid tshig tu btags nas bstan/_/ston ming tshig la dngos po med/_/ces brjod pas chos 
[\[202a.5\]]thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/a'o srid rtse'i 
[\[202a.6\]]nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros/_/rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang /_/gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa/_/log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med/_/stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs/_/dmigs bya dmigs 
[\[202a.7\]]med med par dran dbang sgyur/_/ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams la/_/gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin/_/zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin 
[\[202b.2\]]gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang /_rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/_de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do/_/nam mkha' kyang kun la khyab par gnas so/_/de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar ba'i don 
[\[202b.3\]]ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/_/mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang /_/rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar/_/bla med don rtogs 
[\[202b.4\]]thabs chen 'di dag tu/_/rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus/_/a ho/_/bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa/_/sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam/_/bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu 
[\[202b.5\]]thob par 'gyur/_/phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i/_/dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug_/dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs/_/byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog_/bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yi/_/
[\[202b.6\]]ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i/_/rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro/_/theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i/_/yang na kun la mthun nas 'byam par 'jug_/yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu 
[\[202b.7\]]med/_/'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs/_/dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa/_/'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu/_/tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa/_/tshangs gnas lha sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]kyang /_/rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan na/_/ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin/_/'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis/_/bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang /_/so 
[\[203a.2\]]so rang rig blo la snang bar zad/_/ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang /_/'khrul ba'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med/_/mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog_/log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 
[\[203a.3\]]'dzin gyur na/_/dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur/_/yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na/_/bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong /_/theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni/_/ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas/_/
[\[203a.4\]]nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par/_/nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang /_/'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med/_/mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par/_/sku gsung yon 
[\[203a.5\]]tan phrin las rmad 'byung dang /_/'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang /_/'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang /_/de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med/_/ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 
[\[203a.6\]]thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs rgyud chad pa dang rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos 
[\[203a.7\]]thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las/_/shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]phyogs kun gang par gsal gyur nas/_/bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan/_/de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun/_/spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/_/'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/_/brten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no/_/a/_ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha 
[\[203b.2\]]nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya wa ra la/_sha Sha sa ha/_k+Sha/_i I/_u A/_e ai/_o au/_/'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/rab tu g.yos kun du g.yos nas chos thams 
[\[203b.3\]]cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/a ni stong dang mi stong gi/_/dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin/_/thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun/_/yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas/_/a nyid sna 
[\[203b.4\]]tshogs par snang ba'i/_/ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/_/sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus/_/mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/_/'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming /_/tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas/_/sna 
[\[203b.5\]]tshogs don kun smra zhing ston/_/dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems/_/bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang /_/dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis/_/rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/_/ye shes sems dpa'i 
[\[203b.6\]]sku gsung thugs/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/_/yi ge mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs/_/sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste/_/yi ge dngos po yod ma yin/_/dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/_/sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar 
[\[203b.7\]]gyi/_/ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa/_/dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste/_/yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod/_/mgo ni ma nor lam yin te/_/tshig ni shes rab ming du smras/_/shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod/_/a ni skye med de bzhin nyid/_/Tha ni sgyu 'phrul 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rdo rje nyid/_/Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid/_/Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid/_/D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid/_/Na ni kun du sgyu 'phrul nyid/_/tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid/_/ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid/_/da ni dra bas lham me nyid/_/d+ha ni dra bas 
[\[204a.2\]]'khyil pa nyid/_/na ni dra bas kun du 'gyur/_/ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog_/kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog_/ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog_/g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog_/nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o/_/tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog_/tsha ni snyan 
[\[204a.3\]]gyi sku yi mchog_/dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog_/dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog_/nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o/_/pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog_/pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste/_/ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin/_/b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog_/ma ni 
[\[204a.4\]]gsung yang 'jig par byed/_/ya ni skye ba rnam par dag_/wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin/_/ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste/_/la ni stong pa dag pa'o/_/sha ni rtag med dag pa ste/_/Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin/_/sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa/_/ha ni mtshan ma med 
[\[204a.5\]]pa nyid/_/k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/_/i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su/_/I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin/_/u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su/_/U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams/_/e ni rdul snyed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su/_/ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams/_/o ni thams cad 
[\[204a.6\]]'jig par byed/_/au ni thams cad zhig pa yin/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus/_/a ho/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid 
[\[204a.7\]]sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/a ho/_/thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo/_/'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis/_/'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]'khor 'byin pa'i dam/_/'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/_/a ho/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 
[\[204b.2\]]yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi pa dang /_nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du bstan/_
[\[204b.3\]]gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du bstan pa yin/_lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/_lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin/_/gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul 
[\[204b.4\]]gnyis ka yang /_skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so/_/dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/_/thams 
[\[204b.5\]]cad kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas/_/kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang /_/gzhan du min la shin tu gsang /_/don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu/_/mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung /_/'di ni byang chub snying po mchog_/a ho/_/
[\[204b.6\]]rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/_/rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor/_/skye mched khams rnams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po/_/sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 
[\[204b.7\]]'khor nyid/_/thams cad byang chub sems ma yi/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus/_/rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs/_/dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings/_/dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang /_/thams cad 'gro 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]ba'i gnas nyid de/_/de yis ma bskyed gang yang med/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu/_/de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung /_/kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te/_/bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas/_/de las bskyed cing de las spro/_/dngos grub 
[\[205a.2\]]thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas/_/dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan/_/gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na/_/mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro/_/sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/_/gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang /_/mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi/_/'jug dang 
[\[205a.3\]]ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems/_/g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas/_/'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te/_/bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir/_/bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sgyur te/_/bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs/_/shin tu sgeg 
[\[205a.4\]]pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/_/yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba ra 'bar/_/dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar/_/gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/_/kun du tshim byed bro bsung thim/_/lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro/_/'od gsal 'phro bas kun du 
[\[205a.5\]]'bar/_/bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings/_/a la la ho/_/gsang ba'i dbang po pad+mar ldan gyur nas/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/_/pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs/_/sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs/_/kun du 'od gsal pad+ma spyan yang 
[\[205a.6\]]rdzogs/_/yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan/_/thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol/_/a la la ho/_/de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las/_/
[\[205a.7\]]khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin/_/gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/_/byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin/_/bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin/_/gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/dbang po rdo 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]rje gsang ba'i rgyal/_/yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings/_/sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter/_/dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas/_/gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro/_/dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang /_/phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams/_/
[\[205b.2\]]gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed/_/'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs/_/gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni/_/lta ba dman la bshad byas na/_/dus min par ni srog zad nas/_/mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur/_/khab len gyis ni lcags sdud 
[\[205b.3\]]ltar/_/mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/_/ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur/_/de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya/_/shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis/_/blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/_/gzhan du nams kyang 
[\[205b.4\]]sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas/_/thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa 
[\[205b.5\]]las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/_/sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/_/yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/_/sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[205b.6\]]mngon rdzogs pas/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang /_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing /_/longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong /_/ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub/_/
[\[205b.7\]]nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing /_/'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang /_/chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te/_/'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang /_/thams cad stongs shing lhung bar 'gyur/_/dgug dang btang dang bcing dang dgrol/_/gso dang bsad dang 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]pham dang rgyal/_/ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i/_/ming tshig gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyis/_/mun la snang byung ji bzhin du/_/'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/_/ston pa mchod brtson rtogs 
[\[206a.2\]]pa gsal/_/dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/_/ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/_/'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag_/dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/_/dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/_/zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/_/'phel 'grib 
[\[206a.3\]]med par 'byung ba ste/_/dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin/_/sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/_/dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par/_/rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin/_/gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa/_/de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes/_/de phyir 
[\[206a.4\]]dngos dang dngos med pa/_/'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/_/pho mo ma yin ma ning min/_/mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min/_/kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/_/gnas su ma yin gang yang min/_/de bzhin nyid dbyings 
[\[206a.5\]]ye shes te/_/thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/_/thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas/_/tha dad min la tha dad pa'i/_/nad dang nang gi phyi rol pa/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol/_/'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog_/gang gis glang chen 
[\[206a.6\]]myos 'dra'i sems/_/mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na/_/dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur/_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[206a.7\]]dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/e ma'o snying por lam bcas pas/_/'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog_/rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po/_/byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i ngang /_/snying po nyid ni snying 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]por kun bcas kun du gnas/_/de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun du gnas/_/a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[206b.2\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags 'chang rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i/_/thabs dang shes 
[\[206b.3\]]rab ldan par gnas/_/byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar/_/de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i/_/dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal/_/gcig dang spros pa thams cad med/_/dkyil 'khor spros med zlum 
[\[206b.4\]]po'i tshul/_/ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos/_/ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor/_/thugs rje byin brlabs 'phros pa yis/_/ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro/_/ye shes lnga 
[\[206b.5\]]dang sku gsung thugs/_/byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab/_/rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung /_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i/_/thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang /_/dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas/_/stong smon mtshan med 
[\[206b.6\]]'od gsal 'jug_/de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad/_/der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan/_/rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/_/nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar/_/ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/ma chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan/_/zad 
[\[206b.7\]]med ye shes gter gyur pas/_/yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan/_/ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir/_/ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas/_/re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir/_/dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar/_/yid bzhin rin chen rgyan 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gyis bskor/_/thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir/_/'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor/_/gsang ba de nyid nges pa las/_/'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/_/thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor/_/thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor 
[\[207a.2\]]mchog_/'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang /_/gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum/_/ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten/_/zhes nyid la nyid bshad do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa 
[\[207a.3\]]las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/_/lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs 
[\[207a.4\]]bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/_/rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/_/kun 'byung dkyil 'khor 
[\[207a.5\]]chen por spyod/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/gru chad bzhes brgyan bar khyams dang /_/kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/_/rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/_/seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung /_/nam mkha' 
[\[207a.6\]]lding gi khri chen la/_/nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/_/gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/_/'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang /_/g.yas nas mthong thos mnam pa dang /_/myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/_/gru chad la ni mthong byed dang /_/thos byed mnam byed 
[\[207a.7\]]myong byed rnams/_/btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas/_/bar khyams la ni thub drug dang /_/mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang /_/bya bdag ni gnas par bstan/_/sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni/_/btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/_/ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/_/mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/_/mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan/_/ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/_/mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/_/gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi 
[\[207b.2\]]byin can/_/'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil pa ste/_/dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/_/sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni/_/de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/yang dag thar ba'i 
[\[207b.3\]]gzugs sku dang /_/'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/_/mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston/_/ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/_/tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/_/ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/_/de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la/_/so so 'dra bar snang ba ni/_/
[\[207b.4\]]de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang /_/las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang /_/dper na me long chu zla bzhin/_/de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la/_/sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan/_/dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs/_/rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul/_/gzhan 
[\[207b.5\]]yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin/_/'og min bla med gnas mchog tu/_/sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la/_/de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste/_/sku yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston/_/me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du/_/
[\[207b.6\]]dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel/_/'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na/_/byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/_/me long bzhin du sku la snang /_/de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung /_/bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob/_/chos sku dpag med brjod du med/_/longs spyod 
[\[207b.7\]]zad med rin chen gter/_/sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs/_/spyod yul kun du maN+Da la/_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/_/thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog_/de la sogs te bsam yas mchog_/skye shi med 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa'i g.yung drung sku/_/nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas/_/zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku/_/thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/_/de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/_/zhes brjod 
[\[208a.2\]]pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi 
[\[208a.3\]]gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/a ho/_/dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/_/ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang /_/mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i 
[\[208a.4\]]dbyings/_/ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med/_/ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du/_/ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/a'o zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang 
[\[208a.5\]]ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang /_/nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing /_/kun du bzang 
[\[208a.6\]]po dgyes te/_phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshad dpag tu med pa/_rgyas pa/_mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas 
[\[208a.7\]]ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med/_/kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i/_/srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te/_/mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung /_/dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang /_/'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang /_/gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa/_/bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 
[\[208b.2\]]'grub/_/dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i/_/'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor/_/shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba/_/rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom/_/stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/_/zad med bsod 
[\[208b.3\]]nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur/_/b+h+ru~M/_rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs/_/rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi/_/mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad/_/bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa/_/dus bzhi rgyal ba kun 
[\[208b.4\]]dang mnyam par 'ub/_/thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung /_/spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/_/dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon/_/thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug 
[\[208b.5\]]dus gnas bzhugs/_/nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa/_/mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya/_/rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku/_/shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa/_/bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du 
[\[208b.6\]]byon/_/thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par sbas pa yi/_/dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa/_/shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 
[\[208b.7\]]'chang ba/_/thugs rje byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi/_/bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro/_/rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur/_/zhes nyid la nyid du ched du brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje 
[\[209a.2\]]las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud d+he/_hU~M badzra b+h+r-Ika/_o~M dzI na dzI ka/_swA rat+na ng+h+r-Ika/_A~M A ro lI ka/_hA~M bradz+nyA ng+h+r-Ika/_mA~Md+hA twA shwa ri/_lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/_mA~M mo ha ra ti/_pA~M rA ga ra ti/_tA~M badzra ra ti/_k+ShIM hi rA dzA ya/_tra~M A ka sha gar+b+hA ya/_hrI ha hU~M ba da ma/_dzri ku ru pA 
[\[209a.3\]]Na hrI/_hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_tra~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH_hrI gI ti rA go\u0f85ha~M/_a nr-i d+ya rA ga ya mI/_mai d+hA ra Ni swA hA/_b+l+hIM ni s+sa ra ma bA ya swA hA/_hU~M swa rA dzA ya swA hA/_mu~M shrI a ra~M gA ya swA hA/_dzaHd+hU pa pra bi sha/_hU~M puSh+pa a bi sha/_ba~M dI pa su khi ni/_ho gan d+he tsit+taM/_hU~M ya 
[\[209a.4\]]mAn+ta krita phaT/_pradz+nyAn+ta krita phaT/_hU~M big+h+nAn+ta krita phaT/_hU~M pad+mA n+ta krita phaT/_o~M ma hA badzra d+ta ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_o~M ma hA rat+na d+ha ra mahA kro d+te shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/_o~M ma hA ran+ta d+ha ra mahA kro d+te shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_o~M ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/_
[\[209a.5\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/_a a a badzra b+ta dra sa man+ta a/_o~M mu ne krIM swA hA/_o~M mu ne tru~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne spu~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne bra~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne k+Sha swA hA/_o~M mu ne ye swA hA/_e h+ye hi/_b+ha ga bA na/_ma hA kA ru ni ka/_tri sh+ya ho/_sa ma ya sta~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_o~M AHhU~M 
[\[209a.6\]]swA hA/_ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_sa sa sa sa sa/_ma ma ma ma ma/_ya ya ya ya ya/_o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_o~M ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/_/yon tan phrin las rmad po che/_/de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig_/o~M 
[\[209a.7\]]badzra sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_o~M badzra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas/_/gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang /_bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do/_/de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po/_/ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku 
[\[209b.2\]]gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo /_/o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA A dar+sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA pra t+ya bek+She NA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA sa man+ta shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma 
[\[209b.3\]]hra kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ThA na shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma 
[\[209b.4\]]ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to/_/gsal bar gyur to/_/'bar bar gyur to/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/_/sna 
[\[209b.5\]]tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung /_/gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab/_/sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags/_/thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog_/rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las/_/bde ldan gsung gi don 
[\[209b.6\]]'byung ba'ang /_/thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na/_/grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/_/ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste/_/theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang /_/log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad/_/byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus/_/bsdus nyid phyogs 
[\[209b.7\]]bcur rnam par grags/_/sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs/_/gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med/_/brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra/_/kun la grags shing so sor 'jal/_/dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin/_/gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/_/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin/_/theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang /_/de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te/_/gdul pa'i thabs su so sor thos/_/ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang /_/de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med/_/yi ge 
[\[210a.2\]]med dang rig pa'i gsung /_/ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang /_/thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis/_/'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal/_/gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog_/de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams/_/de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang /_/
[\[210a.3\]]dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched 
[\[210a.4\]]du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/o~M hU~M badzra satwa hU~M/_badzra pra b+hA na hU~M/_mU~M badzra gan d+ha hU~M/_o~M tsakra maN+Da la hU~M A~M/_lA~M badzra gan b+hA Sha lA~M/_swA rat+na pra b+hA na swA~M/_o~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha A~M/_o~M pad+ma pra b+hA na A~M/_pa~M badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na pA~M/_hA~M badzra ga tIk+Sh+Napra b+hA na ha~M/_ta~M badzra 
[\[210a.5\]]ga na d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na ta~M/_shI rat+na pra b+hA na shI hU~M/_badzra gan d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hU~M/_trA~M khaD+ga pra b+hA na trA~M/_trA~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tri/_hrIH_pad+ma pra b+hA na hrIH/_badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIH_ha badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na ha~M/_a badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AH_me kA la pra b+hA 
[\[210a.6\]]na me/_hU~M badzra gan d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA Sha hU~M/_thA~M pra b+hA na maN+Da la thA~M/_swA~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha ha~M pra b+hA na swA~M/_hU~M rat+na swa~M sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+hA na swA hrIH_badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIH_mu ut+pa la nI la bra b+hA na mu/_A badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AH/_phaT badzra a maH_mut+ga ra pra b+hA na phaT 
[\[210a.7\]]phaT/_o~M badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na o~M o~M/_phaT ma hA badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/_hU~M ma hA rat+na badzra ga na d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hU~M hU~M/_phaT hriH_pad+ma mut+ga ra pra b+hA na hrI hrIH/_o~M ma hA badzra pad+ma badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/_a karma mut+ga ra badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/_a karma badzra 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hU~M/_a a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to/_/'bar bar gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang /_kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[210b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/_chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/yang dag don gyi gsang 
[\[210b.3\]]mchog ni/_/bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis/_/yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim/_/thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings/_/sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun/_/thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim/_/gsal 
[\[210b.4\]]'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi thigs pa ni/_/kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/_/kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin/_/yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/_/rtog ge spyod yul yong ma yin/_/zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i/_/gsal ldan brtan 
[\[210b.5\]]pa'i spyod yul te/_/gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med/_/thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang /_/rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa/_/dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med/_/dus gsum 
[\[210b.6\]]bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'/_/sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim/_/thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de/_/dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor/_/shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis/_/byang chub rdo rje thig le 
[\[210b.7\]]yin/_/dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang /_/rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis/_/kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/_/yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te/_/ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma/_/de yis ma zin gang yang med/_/rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa/_/yang 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dag gshegs dang log rtog dang /_/gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs/_/phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun/_/de la gsad cing gzung du med/_/kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin/_/skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas/_/de la rtag 
[\[211a.2\]]'grus gsal bar gyis/_/de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni/_/rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste/_/thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du/_/yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur/_/mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus/_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/_/skye 
[\[211a.3\]]'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun/_/rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim/_/thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus/_/ho/_chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[211a.4\]]snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod 
[\[211a.5\]]pa 'di brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas/_/thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya/_/gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/_/snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'/_/mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/_/rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/_/lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/_/sbyar ba 
[\[211a.6\]]phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/o~M dang mU~M gnyis rtse sbyar te/_/'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa/_/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar/_/zla ba rtul 'bru sbas dril gsil 
[\[211a.7\]]zhing /_/'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/mU~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/o~M bsgreng rtse 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]mor 'khor lo 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/lA~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/_/
[\[211b.2\]]'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/swA~M rtser 'bar ba rin po che/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/mA~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 
[\[211b.3\]]'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/A~MH_gyi rtser pad+ma 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/pA~M bsgreng rtse mor 
[\[211b.4\]]dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/hA~M gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi 
[\[211b.5\]]sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/tA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/_/ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan/_/rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/_/pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[211b.6\]]rin chen te/_/gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang /_/bi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de/_/me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma/_/mar me byug la sogs pa yis/_/las la 'khril cing chos la brtan/_/dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul/_/gong gi phyag rgya chen po 
[\[211b.7\]]bzhin/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/_/sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon/_/thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang /_/rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/_/lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH/_/sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang /_/'dud tshul 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]'khril ba gong ma bzhin/_/thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/_/mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no/_/gseg par dang ni pi bang dang /_/go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/_/me dang chu ru rab tu bstan/_/yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings/_/kun bzang mnyam 
[\[212a.2\]]bzhag ye shes 'phro/_/yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil/_/gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te/_/yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de/_/yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/_/phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na/_/ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad 
[\[212a.3\]]kun/_/phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/_/yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/_/de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su ma 'phror 'bar/_/de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis/_/rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du/_/bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar/_/de la 
[\[212a.4\]]sogs te bsam mi khyab/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/_/'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston/_/theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang /_/phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang /_/zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la/_/so sor mthun byas kun du snang /_/dper na gar 
[\[212a.5\]]mkhan nyid 'dra ba/_/lus las ma dgod sna tshogs ston/_/mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/_/'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med/_/gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro/_/bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid/_/mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun/_/phyag rgya chen po'i ngang 
[\[212a.6\]]du gnas/_/gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa'ang min/_/de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad/_/mthe bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin/_/mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin/_/srin lag mthe bo chags pa che/_/mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog_/hU~M hoH/_mdzub mo gnyis 
[\[212a.7\]]sbyar rin chen mchog_/gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don/_/srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog_/bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad/_/tra~M te ru ha/_mdzub mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog_/gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog_/srin lag steng 'og 'khor 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]lo mchog_/mthe'u chung steng 'og smra gsung yin/_/hrIH_p+ha~M TA~M ha~M/_mdzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog_/gung mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos/_/srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog_/mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad/_/ha tru~M a b+ha~M/_/phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 
[\[212b.2\]]'dis/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang /_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs/_/glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis/_/sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs/_/phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa/_/dag par 
[\[212b.3\]]gsal bas phyag rgya yin/_/yi ge so so gsal ba yis/_/gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das/_/dzaHdang hoHla sogs pa yis/_/gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching /_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[212b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so/_/hU~M lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas/_/ye shes rdo rje gsor 
[\[212b.5\]]zhing spro/_/e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/_/cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/_/cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/_/rdo rje 'chang 
[\[212b.6\]]rgyal thams cad kyi/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya/_/hU~M/_/ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/_/rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar/_/bde chen snying la gnas pa dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/_/thams cad kun 
[\[212b.7\]]la de ltar 'debs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/_/hU~M/_phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/_/rdo rje rdo rje drag chen dang /_/rang nyid che ba'i bdag 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]nyid dang /_/'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/_/thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na/_/nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba 
[\[213a.2\]]yin/_/de las rdo rje gsung 'byung ba'o/_/o~M badzra dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M phaT/_o~M/_lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/_/snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin/_/snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas/_/ye shes 'khor lo gsor 
[\[213a.3\]]zhing spro/_/e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pa ni/_/cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed pas/_/cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/_/
[\[213a.4\]]'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya/_/hU~M/_ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/_/rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/_/bde chen snying la gnas pa dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/_/thams 
[\[213a.5\]]cad kun la de ltar 'debs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/_/phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/_/o~M/_'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang /_/
[\[213a.6\]]rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/hU~M/_btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/_/thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na/_/nam mkha'i khams kun 
[\[213a.7\]]bkang ba yin/_/de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba/_/o~M tsakra dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M phaT/_/o~M/_lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/_/pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin/_/pad+ma sems dpar rang gnas 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]pas/_/pad+ma dgra sta gsor zhing spro/_/e ma'o pad+ma che mchog gi/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/_/cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/_/cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid 
[\[213b.2\]]las/_/pad+ma 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya/_/o~M ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/_/rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/_/bde chen snying la gnas pa dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/_/thams cad kun la 
[\[213b.3\]]de ltar 'bebs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/hU~M/_bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs/_/phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/_/pad+ma dgra sta drag chen dang /_/rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid 
[\[213b.4\]]dang /_/'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis/_/thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni/_/nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin/_/de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung 
[\[213b.5\]]ba/_/o~M pad+ma dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M phaT/_/swA~M/_lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/_/yon tan chen po dpa' bo yin/_/rin chen sems dpa' rang gnas pa/_/ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing spro/_/e 
[\[213b.6\]]ma'o rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/_/cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/_/cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen mchog tu gyur bas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/_/swA~M/_rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/_/rin chen 'chang 
[\[213b.7\]]rgyal thams cad kyi/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya/_/swA~M/_ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/_/rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/_/bde chen snying la gnas pa dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/_/thams cad kun 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]la de ltar 'debs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/_/phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/_/rin chen dbyug pa drag chen dang /_/
[\[214a.2\]]rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis/_/thams cad rin chen nyid pas na/_/nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba 
[\[214a.3\]]yin/_/de las rin chen gsung 'byung ba/_/swA~M rat+na dz+wa lA na lA rka swA~M phaT/_/hU~M/_lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/_/las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin/_/las kyi sems dang rang gnas 
[\[214a.4\]]pas/_/ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro/_/e ma'o las kyi che mchog gi/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/_/cis kyang mi shig mi phyed la/_/cis kyang ma g.yis ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/_/
[\[214a.5\]]hU~M/_rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/_/ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya/_/hA~M/_ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/_/rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin/_/bde chen snying la gnas pa 
[\[214a.6\]]dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/_/thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs/_/phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus 
[\[214a.7\]]ni brtan phyir ro/_/ha~M ral gri ral gri drag chen dang /_/rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/_/phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro 'dis/_/thams 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]cad ral gri nyid pas na/_/nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin/_/de las phrin las gsung byung ba'o/_/hA~M karma dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M phaT/_mU~M lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las/_/sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur/_/bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul 
[\[214b.2\]]du/_/rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis/_/lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/_/dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i/_/thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni/_/yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur/_/mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas/_/o~M dang ha~M 
[\[214b.3\]]ni ma thal bar/_/lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom/_/lhan ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur/_/o~M dang ha~M ni thal tsam du/_/kun du gru bzhir bdag gnas te/_/lan gsum gsor la gang brtson pa/_/tshe dang skal pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/longs 
[\[214b.4\]]spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur/_/de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham/_/'brel pa mnyam par lan gsum gyis/_/khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas/_/yin la dmigs dang las thams cad/_/dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/_/de las gtum pa'i 
[\[214b.5\]]mdog gnas te/_/drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni/_/kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing /_/bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa/_/khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu/_/rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa na/_/ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges/_/o~M badzra da ha dz+wa la ha na badzra 
[\[214b.6\]]pa tsa dz+wa la badzra hU~M phaT/_chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa/_/sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te/_/shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag_/skad ni gsung bsnyan bde ba mo/_/lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das/_/chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las/_/rab tu gsor la 
[\[214b.7\]]gang brtson pas/_/mU~M la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom/_/rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar/_/mu~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/kun du dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i/_/'dod pa bzhin du mthun pas 'grub/_/o~M badzra g+haN+Da pA sha d+ha rma d+hA ra/_hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas de bzhin 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag 'tshal gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215a.2\]]pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog_/phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de/_/sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya/_/'bru lnga spos 
[\[215a.3\]]lnga rin chen lnga/_/snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga yis rab mnyam la/_/rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/_/lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi/_/rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/_/gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi/_/bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/_/sen zlum tsam gyi 
[\[215a.4\]]nyi zla la/_/tsa na 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan/_/yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las/_/phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri/_/bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang /_/rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor/_/glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi/_/sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/_/yum dang 'jo ma sems 
[\[215a.5\]]ma dang /_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/_/dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i/_/zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la/_/bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/_/shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis/_/
[\[215a.6\]]bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya/_/rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o/_/mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/_/sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/_/phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing /_/mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi/_/sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi/_/mdzes par bris 
[\[215a.7\]]shing spras pa dang /_/kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar/_/dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/_/rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang /_/rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/_/glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/_/bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/_/do shal dpung 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]rgyan se mo do/_/bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang /_/rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi/_/lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi/_/bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/_/dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul/_/skal 
[\[215b.2\]]ldan gsal ba'i khyab bar gyis/_/rim gyis yang na cig char du/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing /_/mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom/_/gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la/_/stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/_/dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan 
[\[215b.3\]]drangs mchod/_/mnyes nas 'grub pa'i dam tshig mchog_/bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/_/srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus la/_/dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/_/phyogs bcu dus 
[\[215b.4\]]bzhir gshegs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang /_/khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur/_/lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad/_/gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa/_/rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la/_/mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[215b.5\]]nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/_/goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/_/kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug_/de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/_/de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/_/rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/_/bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig_/rab tu gces dang 
[\[215b.6\]]yid 'thad dbul/_/dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod nas/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/_/nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/_/nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/_/dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas/_/phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang /_/
[\[215b.7\]]rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/_/snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung /_/yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/_/phyag chen po yi 'phang du ni/_/dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya/_/mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/_/yang na sa gzhi mnyam pa la/_/dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]du bya/_/yang na lus gang tshad du ste/_/yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad/_/phur bu srang bu tshon phye dang /_/gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs/_/thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/_/mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya/_/yang na khru ni bcu 
[\[216a.2\]]drug dang /_/nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom/_/sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod/_/yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/_/
[\[216a.3\]]ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon/_/kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/_/lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/_/'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye/_/ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog_/yi ge'am gdan nam snying po 'am/_/phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par/_/byin brlabs ya 
[\[216a.4\]]mtshan rmad po che/_/'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam/_/sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas/_/rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur/_/dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa/_/smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/_/phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/_/mi dmigs thugs kyi 
[\[216a.5\]]dkyil 'khor las/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo /_/rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/_/'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/_/phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/_/kun du bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin/_/kun du 
[\[216a.6\]]bzang mo rang gnas pas/_/ye shes dril bu gsil zhing spro/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas yum chen gyi/_/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/_/cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/_/cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/_/bde chen yum du gyur pas na/_/kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas 
[\[216a.7\]]btab/_/mU~M/_kun du bzang mo'i thus nyid las/_/rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi/_/rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/_/mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya/_/mU~M ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te/_/rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar/_/bde chen yum du 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gnas ba dang /_/dbang chen dus la brtson ba yis/_/thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/_/'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/_/rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/_/bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs/_/phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/nyid kyi lus
