[\[216b.2\]]ni brtan phyir ro/_/mU~M dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang /_/yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis/_/phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/_/dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/_/btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/_/thams cad dril bu 
[\[216b.3\]]nyid pas na/_/nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin/_/de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba/_/mU~M g+ha dz+wa lA na lA rka mU~M zhes brjod pas phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[216b.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos thabs dang /_/shes rab 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/de nas yid dang chos mthun par/_/thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang /_/shes rab dril bu chos la brtan/_/hU~M dang mU~M 
[\[216b.5\]]gyi snying po 'bar/_/de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar/_/oM dang mU~M gyi mchog tu brtag_/shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs/_/'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten/_/de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni/_/'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste/_/de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor/_/
[\[216b.6\]]de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor/_/de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa/_/de las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin/_/de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod/_/de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa/_/thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor/_/de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis/_/
[\[216b.7\]]o~M dang mU~M gyi mtshon bzhin du/_/rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po/_/thugs kar brtan pa'i tshul du 'bar/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin/_/mU~M las phyag rgya chen po ni/_/dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum/_/mchod 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gnas chos la brten par 'dzin/_/thams cad kun du phyag rgya yi/_/thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang /_/sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa/_/yon tan phrin las kun du rdzogs/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du 
[\[217a.2\]]dmigs/_/de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa/_/de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las/_/o~M hU~M swA~M gyi rtser 'dzin pa/_/nyid las yang dag bskyed tshul du/_/shes rab yum du shin tu brtags/_/rdo rje 'bar bas rab brten pa/_/thabs 
[\[217a.3\]]chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab/_/gcig dang dum yongs kyis med/_/de las 'gro don phrin las 'char/_/yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i/_/rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las/_/rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor/_/gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas/_/bsnyen 
[\[217a.4\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/_/nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog_/dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/_/rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun/_/de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/_/rang sems bsod brtan pa yin/_/ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/_/gzhan 
[\[217a.5\]]nas yod 'ong ma yin te/_/thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid/_/de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung /_/shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid/_/thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/_/ye shes la ni ye shes rol/_/ye shes rol pa nyid gang gsog_/rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa 
[\[217a.6\]]dang /_/byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te/_/bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis/_/sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog_/cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing /_/yo byang lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/_/sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/_/ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson pa/_/zhag ni 
[\[217a.7\]]sum cu phrag drug gam/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/_/dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/_/de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/_/sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/_/ye shes thig le de nyid la/_/ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]mchog_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang /_/rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/_/mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang /_/
[\[217b.2\]]rgya chen gsung las don byung ba/_/mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo /_/gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/_/mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te/_/rang byung ye shes gnas med snang /_/log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing /_/
[\[217b.3\]]ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/_/thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na/_/'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang /_/bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/stangs dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga/_/byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na/_/'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur/_/
[\[217b.4\]]skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de/_/gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi/_/ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges/_/dad med nyams na phung par 'gyur/_/zhes ched du brjod do/_/rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[217b.5\]]pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so/_/ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te/_/rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis/_/thams cad ma lus 
[\[217b.6\]]maN+Da la/_/de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la/_/rig par byung gyur pa yis/_/mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i/_/chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/_/'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi/_/gzung 'dzin rnam 
[\[217b.7\]]rtog zhags pa yis/_/rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/_/kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/_/rtog dag mi rtog rang rig dang /_/yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don/_/rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang /_/
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun/_/thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/_/gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag_/ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis/_/don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/_/de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/_/thams 
[\[218a.2\]]cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni/_/nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te/_/thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che/_/dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis/_/thams cad chos sku phyag rgya 
[\[218a.3\]]che/_/yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/_/ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te/_/mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la/_/yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che/_/de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas/_/don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 
[\[218a.4\]]'khor du/_/dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal/_/dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas/_/kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur/_/sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol/_/don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang /_/byang chub phyogs rnams 
[\[218a.5\]]rab tu rdzogs/_/'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor/_/a hoHchos sku phyag rgya de dag las/_/las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/drag po gtum po gdul ba'i phyir/_/bdag 
[\[218a.6\]]nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni/_/chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis/_/bgegs kyi ling+ga mnan par bya/_/gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur/_/mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog_/'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du/_/shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur/_/thams cad 
[\[218a.7\]]gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir/_/bdag nyid ha ya grI bar bsgom/_/dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te/_/mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gdeng /_/ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na/_/thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu/_/mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]'brang /_/ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir/_/bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste/_/gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom/_/gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag_/de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na/_/yon tan nam 
[\[218b.2\]]mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/_/dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom/_/gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan/_/de 
[\[218b.3\]]bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na/_/gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin/_/zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/_/rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus/_/bya byed med par dkyil 'khor 
[\[218b.4\]]spyod/_/lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs/_/a hoH/_chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni/_/dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges/_/nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa/_/phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na/_/gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub/_/de ni rgyal ba kun dang 
[\[218b.5\]]mnyam/_/the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur/_/'jig rten pa yi lha sgrub na/_/lha yi snying po gang yang rung /_/bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na/_/lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na/_chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te/_/rang dang 
[\[218b.6\]]spyi yi don rtogs nas/_/skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs/_/phyag rgya chen po de dag la/_/nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i/_/snying po ma nor don bris na/_/ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang /_/dbag tshad med pa'i 
[\[218b.7\]]phyag rgya che/_/sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad/_/zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam/_/a ho/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/_/bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/_/rdo rje lam las pad+mor 
[\[219a.2\]]dkyil/_/rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor sgyur/_/nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/_/gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/_/tra~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/_/tra~M gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang /_/
[\[219a.3\]]gsang ba kun la mnyam par bya/_/gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las/_/gzhan du smra bar bya ba min/_/gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/_/gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/_/yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro 
[\[219a.4\]]thim/_/o~M dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung /_/rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la/_/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor/_/lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/_/gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/_/hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 
[\[219a.5\]]mchog las/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/_/o~M khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas/_/las rnams ma lus kun byos shig_/pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun/_/khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/_/smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/_/gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo 
[\[219a.6\]]nyid/_/hrIH_yi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las/_/chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim/_/oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis/_/dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/_/rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la/_/mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min/_/bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal 
[\[219a.7\]]yas su/_/gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/_/hU~M o~M swa~M a~M ha~M rnams las/_/dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/_/
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing /_/dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/_/nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/_/'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/_/dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang /_/go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang /_/gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang /_/
[\[219b.2\]]snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na/_/dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras/_/ngan song thams cad med pa dang /_/gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas/_/tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/_/kun du bzang po la sogs mtshan/_/mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur/_/lus 
[\[219b.3\]]dang phung por bcas pa'i sa/_/rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin/_/rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa/_/bla med kun du bzang por 'gyur/_/yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la/_/de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_/pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams/_/sangs rgyas bka' 
[\[219b.4\]]las mi 'da' zhing /_/de yi dgos pa byed pa dang /_/sgro dang skur pa la sogs pa/_/de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur/_/tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/_/mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/zhes ched du brjod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa 
[\[219b.5\]]las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor 
[\[219b.6\]]phyir/_/dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya/_/byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas/_/mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas/_/mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing /_/byang chub sems su brtan par gzung /_/bya ba med las bya byed bya/_/mi gnas gnas 
[\[219b.7\]]la gnas par bsgom/_/b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga a/_/shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas/_/'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab/_/dus gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas/_/b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim/_/thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]'bar/_/a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar/_/phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing /_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman/_/thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/_/mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang 
[\[220a.2\]]yang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus/_/thams cad yi ge hU~M du gyur/_/hU~M nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil/_/'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste/_/yang na 'od 
[\[220a.3\]]zer 'bru lnga yi/_/lnga pa'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i/_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog_/ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la/_/ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi/_/thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya/_/nyi 
[\[220a.4\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi/_/gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang /_/pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che/_/de dkyil yi ge hU~M gnas pa/_/shin tu phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar/_/gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang /_/gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[220a.5\]]shes rab spyan la 'dris pa dang /_/nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par/_/shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom/_/shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas/_/phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du/_/thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam yas spro/_/spros kyang hU~M las nyams pa 
[\[220a.6\]]med/_/bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med/_/spro med bsdu med de bzhin las/_/yi ge mu~M du thim par gyur/_/thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/_/shin tu gsal zhing 'dres pa dang /_/phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom/_/sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas/_/
[\[220a.7\]]thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya/_/'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms/_/yang na phyag rgya chen po ste/_/bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom/_/gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams/_/phra ba'i tshul de 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]snga ma bzhin/_/mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan/_/dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan/_/rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar/_/rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar/_/phyag rgya chen po de dag las/_/phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang /_/nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan/_/
[\[220b.2\]]bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom/_/thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad/_/zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya spro/_/sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing /_/bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed/_/de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de/_/'bras bu mngon 
[\[220b.3\]]du ma smin kyang /_/sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'byung /_/lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub/_/theg pa dman par yong mi skye/_/bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur/_/byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin/_/zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so/_/rdo rje 
[\[220b.4\]]gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod 
[\[220b.5\]]pa 'di brjod do/_/rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul/_/byin gyi brlabs dang mngon sum par/_/rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/_/thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/_/yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/_/rnam smin oM du shes par bya/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 
[\[220b.6\]]'khor nyid du bsgom/_/yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/_/rnam smin mu~M du shes par bya/_/yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/_/yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig_/bro gar 
[\[220b.7\]]tshogs kyi sprin phung la/_/hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/_/dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar/_/bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i/_/sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po/_/yum gyi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/_/sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/_/dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/_/grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de/_/'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid/_/mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar 
[\[221a.2\]]zhing /_/dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang /_/mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs/_/yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/_/nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag_/nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom/_/hU~M du gyur 
[\[221a.3\]]pas rnam par dag_/dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar/_/skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/_/gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/_/ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs/_/ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid/_/sgyu ma snang ba mig yor tshul/_/sbyor sgrol bya ba 
[\[221a.4\]]kun byas kyang /_/rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med/_/snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing /_/mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis/_/dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing /_/byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas/_/yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan/_/cho ga 
[\[221a.5\]]rdzogs par shes pa yi/_/rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/_/lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi/_/tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la/_/khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/_/'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par sgom/_/de bzhin 
[\[221a.6\]]gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs/_/pad+ma'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs/_/khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/_/tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/_/rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/_/thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog_/khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/_/tshom bu 
[\[221a.7\]]gcig gi lha rnams bsgom/_/khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang /_/pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs/_/ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis/_/dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/_/rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni/_/mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]shing /_/spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i/_/thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i/_/rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil/_/'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom/_/chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya/_/gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che/_/yang na sku gsung thugs 
[\[221b.2\]]nyid de/_/thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/_/rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar 
[\[221b.3\]]byed/_/rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas/_/sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni/_/thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis/_/dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'od zer rnam pa mang po spro/_/gnyis su med par 
[\[221b.4\]]bstim par bya/_/dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub/_/rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom/_/sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/_/so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/_/
[\[221b.5\]]gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang /_/ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas/_/dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya/_/le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis/_/the tshom med par bsgrub byas na/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob/_/sgrub 
[\[221b.6\]]pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni/_/rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 
[\[221b.7\]]'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/_/rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_/bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis/_/'dzul lam nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur/_/glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/_/chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[222a.2\]]'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub/_/bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni/_/yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub/_/A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/_/sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas/_/thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/shes 'jug mtshan nyid 
[\[222a.3\]]'byor pa'i gzungs/_/'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/_/nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/_/rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags/_/mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi/_/skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi/_/khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin/_/pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs/_/thabs 
[\[222a.4\]]dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i/_/sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum/_/rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs/_/mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla/_/ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal sgom/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/_/ma lus par 
[\[222a.5\]]ni bsgoms par 'gyur/_/dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig_/dkyil 'khor kun du rab sbyor bas/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad grub 
[\[222a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na/_/skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med/_/ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/_/rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur te/_sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di 
[\[222a.7\]]phyung ngo /_/a hoH/_/ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis/_/chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam/_/'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i/_/zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs btags ming tsam pa/_/A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]snying po nyid/_/phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs/_/thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsal/_/mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi phrin las rdzogs/_/rdo rje 
[\[222b.2\]]gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa 
[\[222b.3\]]chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/_/phyogs rtogs yang 
[\[222b.4\]]dag nyid ma rtogs/_/'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang /_/rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/_/yi ge sgro btags ming tshogs la/_/brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te/_/khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/_/ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[222b.5\]]ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog_/gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/_/sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' 
[\[222b.6\]]ba'i/_/bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs/_/'byung ba zhes rab rigs kyi yum/_/chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/_/byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs/_/dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/_/kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/_/bdag nyid chen po 
[\[222b.7\]]lhag pa yi/_/thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing /_/snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/_/bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/_/ye shes dgyes la mnyes par dbul/_/zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/_/ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/_/rol mo'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mtha' yas mchog_/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/_/de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/_/phyogs cu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/_/ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/_/dbang sgyur mchog nyid 
[\[223a.2\]]dam pa yin/_/dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/_/rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung /_/phyogs dus 
[\[223a.3\]]dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/_/sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis/_/bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/_/ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/_/rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[223a.4\]]thams cad kyis/_/'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog_/gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/_/phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis/_/nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/_/
[\[223a.5\]]bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/_/shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing /_/dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/_/'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/_/'das dang da ltar byung ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas/_/
[\[223a.6\]]brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs/_/'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun/_/'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/_/'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/_/'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/_/'di yis gsang 
[\[223a.7\]]ba'i nges don med/_/btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/_/kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog_/thos bsams bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i/_/shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung /_/snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/_/lus dang longs spyod gtong la 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]sbyin/_/gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/_/rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin/_/dus min par ni srog zad nas/_/bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/_/zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do/_/dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/dkyil 
[\[223b.2\]]'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom 
[\[223b.3\]]ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog_/gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/_/rang bzhin dbyer med 
[\[223b.4\]]gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing /_/ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin/_/'gro 'ong med par dus gsum cig char rdzogs/_/dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med/_/rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te/_/rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med/_/
[\[223b.5\]]bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa/_/khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i/_/mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la/_/bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa/_/dad ldan 'ga' 
[\[223b.6\]]yis 'tsham par ci theg gi/_/bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa/_/gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/_/bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba/_/bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas/_/de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing /_/
[\[223b.7\]]bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te/_/shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing /_/bya byed las 'phags gyin da 'dug byed pa/_/gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob/_/ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas/_/dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]de/_/ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la/_/blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang /_/mchod cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te/_/nam mkha' gzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa 
[\[224a.2\]]na/_/sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do/_/rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la/_/thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing /_/mi rtog sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad/_/bsnyad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/_/bdag med bdag chen 
[\[224a.3\]]thams cad 'byung ba'i gter/_/ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i/_/thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med/_/ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing /_/thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin/_/zhes brjod pas chos dang ye 
[\[224a.4\]]shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/_/mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/
[\[224a.5\]]e ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po/_/grub pa chen po ye shes che/_/blang dor med pa'i sa chen po/_/mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/_/rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter/_/thams cad la yang me long bzhin/_/bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo /_/gang na 
[\[224a.6\]]gsang chen 'di yod par/_/me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la/_/spu gri so ni gtams pa la/_/'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/_/khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du/_/lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/_/dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir/_/dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas 
[\[224a.7\]]la spyod/_/de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang /_/'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag_/snga phyi med par mnyam yin par/_/nges pa med par yang dag gsungs/_/'jig rten 
[\[224b.2\]]'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang /_/ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa/_/sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te/_/skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/_/de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing /_/sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa/_/de dag gnyis med dbyings su 
[\[224b.3\]]sbyor/_/thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de/_/thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/_/thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi/_/de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog_/ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang /_/yang dag don gyi snying po ni/_/gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de/_/rang rig sgrib med 
[\[224b.4\]]dag pa yin/_/de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni/_/bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te/_/de ni ma nor lam yin par/_/a yis b+ho d+hi rab tu bsdus/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni/_/gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med/_/gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro/_/byin 
[\[224b.5\]]brlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog_/don bsdus gsung rab bzhin bcu gnyis/_/de las lhag pa'i don smra ba/_/de ni rnam dag lam min te/_/rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin/_/thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/_/de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad/_/
[\[224b.6\]]tshad bzhin phab pa'i don yin te/_/dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing /_/'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs chen te/_/'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas/_/bya ba med la byas pa med/_/zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter/_/bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod/_/
[\[224b.7\]]za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal/_/gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtogs pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas 
[\[225a.2\]]pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/_srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/_/de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin 
[\[225a.3\]]tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /_shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal 
[\[225a.4\]]pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo /_/de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /_'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba dang /_yong 
[\[225a.5\]]med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang /_lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang /_bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/_/de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar 
[\[225a.6\]]nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang /_mgo sna tshogs pa dang /_lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang /_lus sna tshogs pa dang /_yan lag mang po dang /_yan lag sna tshogs dang /_gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs 
[\[225a.7\]]pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang /_'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang /_'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa/_gzugs dang /_ro dang /_dri dang /_kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa/_rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]kyis phyogs kun du khams 'khrugs par byed pa/_nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/_myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_lha'i ris dang /_tshangs pa'i ris dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu 
[\[225b.2\]]che man cad dbang du bsdus so/_/de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so/_/e ma'o 'gro ba yongs ni bder gshegs la ma yin te/_/sdug bsngal sreg 
[\[225b.3\]]mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang /_/yon tan rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di/_/sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon po yin/_/rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms/_/kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste/_/rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam 
[\[225b.4\]]yas pas/_/thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms/_/sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la/_/rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing /_/byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad/_/'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa/_/
[\[225b.5\]]a hoH_dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad/_/byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang /_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod 
[\[225b.6\]]pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 
[\[225b.7\]]'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/_hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la na maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hU~M zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[226a.2\]]tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas/_'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/_rab tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_/kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem rab tu chem chem/_
[\[226a.3\]]kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun du shig shig go/_/gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/_kun du gtor gtor ro/_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug 
[\[226a.4\]]chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs 
[\[226a.5\]]stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/_dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod 
[\[226a.6\]]kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/_/la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho 
[\[226a.7\]]phyogs su bzhugs so/_/la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so/_/la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so/_/de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang /_rngam pa'i nga ro 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dang /_'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so/_/btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/_/rigs 
[\[226b.2\]]lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig 
[\[226b.3\]]tu smras pa/_thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer zhing shin tu gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad 
[\[226b.4\]]kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ha ha ha/_khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung /_nang grol kun drangs/_yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas 
[\[226b.5\]]khrag kun 'thungs/_/rus pa kun 'chos so/_/de nas hU~M hU~M hU~M e A ra li dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so/_/de nas 'byung bo ma lus pa'i rgyal po'ang rgyal po 
[\[226b.6\]]dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/_'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/_'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/_/srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang /_tshangs ma dang /_'khrug mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_'jug sred mo dang /_gzhon nu mo dang /_dmar mo dang /_
[\[226b.7\]]bdud rtsi mo dang /_zhi ba mo dang /_be con mo dang /_srin mo dang /_za ba mo dang /_dga' ba mo dang /_ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang /_gcig spyod mo dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_grub mo dang /_rlung mo dang /_gsod byed mo dang /_me mo dang /_phag mo dang /_rgan byed mo dang /_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sna chad mo dang /_chu lha mo dang /_nag mo chen mo dang /_ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /_bum rna sngo gnag chen mo dang /_gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/_bran dang yang bran g.yog dang yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus 
[\[227a.2\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pa rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku 
[\[227a.3\]]dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/o~M hU~M a~M badzra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/_dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du 
[\[227a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang /_dmar mo dang /_dga' mo dang /_gsod byed mo dang /_nag mo chen mo dang /_dmar ser chen mo dang /_sngo gnag chen mo dang /_ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to/_/bcom 
[\[227a.5\]]ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang /_'khrug mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_'jug sred mo dang /_gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang /_zhi ba mo dang /_be con mo dang /_za ba 
[\[227a.6\]]mo dang /_srin mo rnams 'khril to/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad+ma chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang /_gcig pu spyod pa dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_gru mo dang /_rlung mo rnams 'khril to/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun 
[\[227a.7\]]du las kyi sku la me mo dang /_phag mo dang /_rgan byed mo dang /_sna chad mo dang /_chu lha mo rnams 'khril to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]tu bcum par gyur to/_/de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang /_rkun mo'i tshogs dang /_rmongs mo'i tshogs dang /_thal byed ma'i tshogs dang /_sbos mo'i tshogs dang /_gtum mo'i tshogs dang /_sme sha can 
[\[227b.2\]]gyi tshogs dang /_ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to/_/'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag chas chags nas 'khod do/_/de nas shin 
[\[227b.3\]]tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_kAng+ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_dur bya 
[\[227b.4\]]gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /_'ug gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/_/'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do/_/
[\[227b.5\]]de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar 
[\[227b.6\]]du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/_/'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so/_/de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga 
[\[227b.7\]]la bar yud tsam gyis bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]o~M badzra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+he a~M a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas 'thon to/_/mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnam nas uts+tshuSh+ma 
[\[228a.2\]]kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te/_dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/_phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/_sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo /_/de'i dus su 'jig rten 
[\[228a.3\]]drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun du dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to/_/de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su mchi 'bangs 
[\[228a.4\]]su mchi/_'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/_mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing /_/snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig_/rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang /_/dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog_/ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 
[\[228a.5\]]'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go/_/thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/_bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang /_/ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/_/dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/_/dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol/_/bdag cag so so'i 
[\[228a.6\]]'khor bcas kyis/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/_/ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang /_/gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/_/g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i/_/sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi/_/gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi/_/de yi dgos 
[\[228a.7\]]pa ci yang rung /_/ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/_/gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir/_/smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na/_/bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying /_/gas gtubs dum bur ral bar mchi/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas de'i chung ma'i tshogs dang 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]sring mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/_/bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun/_/dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/_/dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams/_/las kyi dngos grub stsal du 
[\[228b.2\]]stsol/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khra bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u 
[\[228b.3\]]ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung thugs 
[\[228b.4\]]rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo /_/oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da tsarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na 
[\[228b.5\]]da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI sarba duSh+TA~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI hU~M 
[\[228b.6\]]phaT/_o~M ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma hU~M phaT/_o~M hriHme hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/_badzra gau rI haH/_badzra tsau rI haH/_badzra pra mo he haH/_badzra be tA lI haH/_badzra tsaN+Da lI haH/_badzra puk+ka sI haH/_
[\[228b.7\]]badzra g+hasma rI haH/_badzra sma shA nI haH/_badzra siM ha mu khI he/_badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/_badzra sr-i gla mu khI he/_badzra shwa nA mu khI he/_badzra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khI he/_badzra kAd+ha mu khI he/_badzra kha ga mu khI he/_badzra u lU ka mu khI he/_badzra Ar+ya te dza te dA dzaMH_badzra a ma ka hU~M/_badzra 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]lo kA ba~M/_badzra b+ha sh+mi pa la ya ba to hoH/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ru lu ru lu hU~M/_e h+ye hi A na ya dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHrA~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya 
[\[229a.2\]]phaT/_/o~M khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/_/thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/_/'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/_/de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/_a li u le/_ta li ta pa ti/_daMSh+Ta~M/_go nA ro/_tri kha ra~M 
[\[229a.3\]]yo gi nI khA hi hoH/_hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig rab tu tshig rab tu tshig kun du tshig go/_/'bar rab tu 'bar kun du 'bar ro/_/thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang kun du rab tu gang bar gyur 
[\[229a.4\]]to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[229a.5\]]nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/dbang po'i yul de rig pa'i rnams/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing /_/mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na/_/thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya/_/bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/_/khro bo khro mo thams cad 
[\[229a.6\]]kun/_/gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na/_/bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/_/zla med chen pos de skad gsungs/_/yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu/_/las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs/_/
[\[229a.7\]]rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/_/thabs chen re re bskyong na ni/_/pad+ma chags med re re 'byung /_/rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na/_/sems can thams cad bla na med/_/byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang /_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]bsgom byas te/_/dbu yi dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo/_/lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na/_/rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo/_/rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mchongs na/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad thams 
[\[229b.2\]]cad dang /_/bdud dang log 'dren thams cad gnon/_/yan lag thams cad bsgul bsig na/_/ba spu bu ga re re nas/_/khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro/_/de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis/_/phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du/_/khro bo'i don rnams rdul 
[\[229b.3\]]phran snyed/_/thugs rjes gdul zhing dbyings su bstim/_/thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus/_/thams cad rdo rje'i brag stengs dang /_/me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar/_/'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin/_/steng gi 
[\[229b.4\]]bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs/_/'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i/_/rdo rje thong gshol nri spar dang /_/rdo rje gtun chen dril bu'o/_/shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/_/rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang /_/sti ra 
[\[229b.5\]]chen po'i dbyug pa'o/_/lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/_/rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang /_/gshin rje chen po'i rkang bzung ba'o/_/nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/_/sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang /_/khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs/_/rgya mtsho 
[\[229b.6\]]che rnams rked par gtub/_/byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/_/rin po che yi dbyug to dang /_/nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can/_/gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o/_/mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag gis 
[\[229b.7\]]gdul bar 'gyur/_/gal te de yis ma dul na/_/byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/_/rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs/_/i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/_/'byung po de kun rab tu btul/_/shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/_/rdo rje ye 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]shes me lce 'bar/_/me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed/_/drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams/_/me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus/_/lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/_/rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/_/rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar/_/bden bral 
[\[230a.2\]]nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/_/srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus/_/nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/_/rlung gi ba dan nr-i mgo gdengs/_/shin tu drag po glang po'i brjid/_/tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/_/g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus/_/'og 
[\[230a.3\]]tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir/_/phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste/_/phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams/_/'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o/_/gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel/_/me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/_/thams 
[\[230a.4\]]cad ma lus sreg par byed/_/chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/_/thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/_/thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed/_/gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas/_/mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang /_/rdo rje mdung 
[\[230a.5\]]chen dgra star bcas/_/mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni/_/mda' dang mdung dang sti ra dang /_/gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so/_/dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni/_/sti ra dbyug to chen po dang /_/'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar/_/dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la/_/rdo rjes dkrug cing 
[\[230a.6\]]rab tu gsol/_/shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/_/sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang /_/rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar/_/nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol/_/lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni/_/sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su/_/dmar gyi ar+g+ha 
[\[230a.7\]]rab tu gsol/_/nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/_/sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang /_/pad+ma chags med rab tu 'bar/_/dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol/_/byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/_/sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang /_/rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar/_/dung chen dmar gyis 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]bkang ba gsol/_/khro mo rnams kyang khro dang mthun/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni/_/rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad/_/ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/_/'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyag 
[\[230b.2\]]rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa/_/gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/_/gru bzhi 
[\[230b.3\]]sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/_/'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/_/thod sprul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/_/'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug_/khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag_/gtum pa'i dom gyis sbar bas ni/_/dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung /_/smug 
[\[230b.4\]]gnag sngo gnag ser gnag dang /_/dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/_/ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon/_/rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs/_/sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas/_/steng gi 'jig rten khor yug 
[\[230b.5\]]bcas/_/rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang /_/ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs/_/rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams/_/btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang /_/sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing /_/slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi 
[\[230b.6\]]gtso/_/bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/_/rang gi stan dang lag cha dang /_/ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas/_/zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom 
[\[230b.7\]]ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/a ho/_/bskal par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar ba yi/_/nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i/_/ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa/_/ro tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas/_/zhen pa'i gdug mo shin tu gsal ba dka' ba yi/_/mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis/_/snyigs mar bcas shing 
[\[231a.2\]]mtshams sbyor kun ngam zil gyis gnon/_/rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun byung kun du gsal/_/ho/_chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang /_/dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang /_/
[\[231a.3\]]'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid par/_/drag po bdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab/_/bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang /_/bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun du rtog_/de rnams zil gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs 
[\[231a.4\]]byed par/_/rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus 'bras bu smin pa rab smin ltar/_/dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs/_/dpag med bsam yas lhun grub pas/_/rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal/_/ho/_/khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug bar 'jigs pa ma 
[\[231a.5\]]yin zhing /_/zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yong ma yin_/de nyid gnyis su mi pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun du khyab/_/rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i/_/rnam dag byang chub mchog gi 
[\[231a.6\]]dbyings te gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal/_/ho/_rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes 
[\[231a.7\]]pa chen pos nyid kyi byin brlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid de/_/sangs rgyas kun du bzang po nyid/_/'di 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]yin gzhan na med pa ste/_/rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing /_/srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun/_/sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du/_/ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste/_/rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las/_/ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas 
[\[231b.2\]]mngon rdzogs pa/_/snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis/_/nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan/_/gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum na/_/'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing /_/phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad/_/ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis/_/chos bzhi rnam 
[\[231b.3\]]dag che ba'i lta/_/ye shes sku ste khyad par che/_/chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan ma ni/_/'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku/_/gtum rngam gdug pas mtshan pas na/_/zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku/_/gdul bya zhing du rab sbyong zhing /_/chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na/_/
[\[231b.4\]]gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku/_/snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba/_/thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang /_/rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na/_/nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku/_/gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis/_/thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid/_/gzhan du me gtong 
[\[231b.5\]]mtshan bas na/_/de nyid phrag dog nyid sku rdzogs/_/stong gsum stong gi stong chen po/_/'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa/_/rdul dang bye ba la sogs pa'i/_/bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan/_/de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid/_/'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings/_/
[\[231b.6\]]chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog_/snying po thig le bsam yas nyid/_/'jigs byed dbu dgu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag_/sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin/_/de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags/_/gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags/_/
[\[231b.7\]]yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do/_/bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid/_/thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa/_/gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che/_/ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa/_/phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags/_/brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku/_/ci 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]yang med las cing yang snang /_/skal bzang mchog gi sgyu 'phrul ba/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/_/brtags pa zig gnon chos nyid spyan/_/spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid/_/ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor/_/rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig 
[\[232a.2\]]pa/_/gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs/_/pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid sku gsung /_/mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig_/ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad las/_/khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba yi/_/me yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug glog_/bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na/_/
[\[232a.3\]]bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin/_/sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las/_/sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa/_/ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po/_/mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las/_/gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni/_/shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang /_/thugs rje 
[\[232a.4\]]dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis/_/'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa/_/dbyings nyid bde la skyod pa ste/_/'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don/_/rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o/_/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/_/sgyu 'phrul 
[\[232a.5\]]dkyil 'khor mthas klas par/_/rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni/_/brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te/_/thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don/_/rang dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba/_/thig le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs/_/
[\[232a.6\]]dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la/_/zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa/_/sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams/_/nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod/_/gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul ba/_/dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni/_/khros pa'i dam tshig 
[\[232a.7\]]snying rje yis/_/mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni/_/gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i rgyal/_/gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden/_/'gro la mgon du gyur pas na/_/dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i/_/chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]sbrul/_/dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag_/dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i/_/g.yang gzhi stag gi pags chen bgos/_/'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni/_/skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa/_/mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags/_/nga rgyal 
[\[232b.2\]]lag gis 'du byed pa/_/nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste/_/kun du bzang po'i spyod yul la/_/sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M gis sdud za 'thung /_/rdo rje thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis/_hU~M mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags/_/mi mched gti mug chen po ni/_/
[\[232b.3\]]nyon mongs rgya mtsho rngub pa'i phyir/_/b+han d+ha klong chen 'thung bar snang /_/'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen po/_/bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa/_/rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung /_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed/_/'jigs byed thabs kyi dam tshig gis/_/bsam 
[\[232b.4\]]yas 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/_/rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni/_/zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling /_/tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen po/_/rdo rje sku yi byin brlabs kyis/_/thig le mi g.yo bde ba las/_/rang bzhin rol pa chen 
[\[232b.5\]]pos ni/_/rdo rje phra men pho nya'i tshogs/_/khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzod/_/ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid/_/ha ni thig le zhi khro snyoms/_/ha ni thig le dbang chen yin/_/ha ni thig le drag po nyid/_/ha ni thig le rol pa nyid/_/ha ni thig les phrin las nyid/_/ha ni thig 
[\[232b.6\]]les chags dbang 'dul/_/ha ni thig le las kun rdzogs/_/he ni thig le ye shes thugs/_/he ni thig les gsung snyan pa/_/he ni thig les tsham ngam lce/_/he ni thig le rol pa nyid/_/he ni thig le dbang rtags yin/_/he ni thig les drag shul ba/_/he ni thig les 
[\[232b.7\]]thugs chen rdzogs/_/he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba/_/'jigs byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te/_/dra bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/_/hU~M ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/_/hU~M ni ye shes thugs sku nyid/_/hU~M ni ye shes thugs sku gsung /_/hU~M ni ye shes yid bzhin 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]las/_/hU~M ni thig le ye shes so/_/phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs/_/phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs/_/phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs/_/phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs/_/phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs/_/phaT ni chos thugs thugs 
[\[233a.2\]]kyi thugs/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho/_/dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho/_/gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho/_/sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho/_/yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho/_/pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho/_/kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho/_/byin 
[\[233a.3\]]gyi brlabs kyis dgyes pa ho/_/chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho/_/ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho/_/ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho/_/gnod pa sdud pas dgyes pa ho/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho/_/des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/_chos thams 
[\[233a.4\]]cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod 
[\[233a.5\]]nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/_/'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso/_/btsun mo tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/_/zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/_/'jigs pa'i 
[\[233a.6\]]tshogs chen de dbus su/_/bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/_/'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso/_/btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/_/khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/_/
[\[233a.7\]]zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/_/lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/_/bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/_/'jigs byed rin chen rigs 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]kyi gtso/_/btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/_/khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/_/zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/_/lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/_/bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 
[\[233b.2\]]dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro/_/'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/_/'jigs pa'i phrin las rigs kyi gtso/_/btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/_/khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/_/zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/_/las bzhi 
[\[233b.3\]]dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/_/lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/_/bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung 
[\[233b.4\]]thugs/_/yon tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom/_/rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par/_/tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom/_/glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang /_/shes rab thabs su shes pa dang /_/byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 
[\[233b.5\]]dang /_/brda la sogs pa'i yon tan dang /_/bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/_/longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi/_/mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig gi le'u ste 
[\[233b.6\]]sum cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/_/chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro/_/gsang sngags 
[\[233b.7\]]spyi yi dkyil 'khor las/_/shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang /_/lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad/_/rang gi rig pas ci nus par/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis brlab/_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang /_/ma rig tshon gyis ji bzhin du/_/goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab/_/'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzla sa/_/gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni/_/tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag_/dang por 
[\[234a.2\]]mchod sbyin dam pas mchod/_/gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni/_/ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod/_/'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas/_/khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya/_/bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog_/gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/_/
[\[234a.3\]]'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing /_/thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/_/bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul du/_/de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim/_/dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na/_/de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing /_/ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin/_/pho 
[\[234a.4\]]nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams/_/de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur/_/yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la/_/phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams/_/lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/_/dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/_/rdo rje dung chen dmar rtsis dgang /_/dung dang srog shing gsar rnying dang /_/zhing 
[\[234a.5\]]'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang /_/ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun/_/'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /_/nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rdeng dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/_/re ba med par rab tu bsgrub/_/bsnyen pa dang 
[\[234a.6\]]ni nye bsnyen pa/_/sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos/_/zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na/_/dkyil 'khor mthun pa nyid du sbyar/_/zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/_/drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu/_/'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus 
[\[234a.7\]]dbul/_/de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag_/'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig las/_/nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do/_/a ki du na dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/_ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M ma hA badzra shrIhe ru ka badzra kro d+he shwa ri sarba du Sh+TAn hU~M phaT/_ru 
[\[234b.2\]]lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi ng+ha mu kha hU~M phaT/_ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka pad+ma ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/_ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M karma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba 
[\[234b.3\]]a ga ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa rU be hU~M phaT/_ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M/_ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka_/ma hA sa ma ya ha he hU~M phaT/_ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka man+t+ra dz+wa la ma hA 
[\[234b.4\]]maN+Dal kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/_oM oM oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/_swA~M swA~M swA~M/_A~M A~M A~M/_hA~M hA~M hA~M/_badzra ma hA ka pA la khang+ga daN+De na dz+wa la sid d+ha/_ma hA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid d+hod b+hA be/_sa~M ha ra Na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ma hA yo ga ad d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/_ru lu ru lu/_a la la hoH/_ho sems nyid thig ler rab 
[\[234b.5\]]gnas pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka_/tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas/_/sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig_/o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_o~M a~M hU~M sur s+t+wa~M/_ka ma la ma hA su kha mA lai ma 
[\[234b.6\]]nu sa man dz+wa la ni d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la hoH/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen 
[\[234b.7\]]pos phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma sam yo gi nI dzaH/_zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun du pad+mar gyur te/_dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs 
[\[235a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing /_o~M a b+hi tsa ra ba shIn zhes brjod pas lha'i tshogs dang /_klu'i tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin chen po dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad 
[\[235a.3\]]rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/_/de nas yang ha ha a bi ra tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/_la la ni mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/_/de 
[\[235a.4\]]nas yangs 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to/_/mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/_o~M pad+ma sa ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes brjod pas kun du sku chags 
[\[235a.5\]]pa'i bdag nyid dang /_kun du gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang /_kun du thugs chags par gyur pa dang /_kun du rin po che chags pa chen po dang /_kun du phrin las chags pa chen por gyur te/_shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_dbus chen por khrag gi dpa' 
[\[235a.6\]]klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to/_/de yang kun du sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun du gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun du thugs lnga'i 
[\[235a.7\]]rol pa dang /_zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang /_rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to/_/de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma hA rat+na ti la ka'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen po'i 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]thig le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so/_/de nas de nyid du sku dang /_dbu dang /_phyag dang /_zhabs dang /_'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[235b.2\]]yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po/_/thong thong ji de lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis/_/o~M a b+hi tsar ba shI na hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa smod 
[\[235b.3\]]cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng 
[\[235b.4\]]rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to/_/de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badzra a~M a~M zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/_mi mthun pa'i lus brdzes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par 
[\[235b.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas dgyes pa chen po dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 
[\[235b.6\]]'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo /_/o~M khrag [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dba' klong 'khyil ba yi/_/keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum/_/'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang /_/gru chad bzhis 
[\[235b.7\]]brgyan rab brjid pa'i/_/gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/_/'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/_/thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid/_/stan mang po lha chen brten/_/dgyes pa chen po kun du bzang /_/phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad pa yi/_/thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]brjid/_/'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i/_/rdo rje snying po thig le thugs/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/_/khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni/_/dgyes pa chen po'i tshul 'chang ba/_/phyogs bzhi grwa dang bcas par ni/_/sprul pa'i rnal 
[\[236a.2\]]'byor phra men rnams/_/ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas/_/'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni/_/rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang /_/pad+ma'i gzhal med rde'u chung brdung /_/zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang /_/kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste/_/btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/_/
[\[236a.3\]]gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang /_/sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par/_/bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin 
[\[236a.4\]]gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi/_/sgyu 'phrul 
[\[236a.5\]]lam gyi dkyil 'khor las/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par/_/'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin/_/shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes/_/tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu/_/spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/_/yid du 'ong 
[\[236a.6\]]ba'i sa gzhir ni/_/rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri/_/o~M dang mU~M gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/de las phra mo rdo rjes dgang /_/phra bar sa bsdus mthil du gzung /_/yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags/_/gang gi yul yang dbang du gyur/_/mi mthun gzugs su 
[\[236a.7\]]brtags pa ni/_/dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin/_/lugs ka bzhin du ha~M du brtag_/de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung /_/gsang nas ngag lam ha~M du bya/_/rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag_/drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis/_/gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang /_/
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bdag nyid hU~M gi tshogs bcas pa/_/ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom/_/bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs/_/mU~M du byin brlabs yi ger bstim/_/brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis/_/nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu bsgom/_/brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas/_/nyams su lon par 
[\[236b.2\]]ma gyur tshe/_/'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor/_/dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang /_/rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o/_/de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba/_/rab tu blo yi thig gnas ni/_/gzhan du nams kyang mi bstan cing /_/gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs/_/longs 
[\[236b.3\]]spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang /_/rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no/_/rmongs la 'phar dang brtson 'grus zhan/_/nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te/_/smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du/_/sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la/_/srog chags khwa yi gtam bzhin du/_/nams kyang 
[\[236b.4\]]smra bar mi bya'o/_/byed pa rdo rje gsha' yi tshogs/_/bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling bzhi'i lam/_/kun du bzang po thabs tshul ba/_/tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/_/chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba/_/kun du bzang mo shes rab tshul/_/
[\[236b.5\]]gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs/_/tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de ni chos khams a la bstim/_/chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings/_/kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum/_/de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags/_/sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams/_/de yi dbyings nas 
[\[236b.6\]]'byung bar ni/_/'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag_/mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par/_/goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang /_/chu las sa bzhin 'gro ba dang /_/bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang /_/tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang /_/phyogs bcu kun du phyin 
[\[236b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/_/k+Sha lam a yi tshon bzhin du/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/_/de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o/_/de nyid gsal 
[\[237a.2\]]bar mnyam sbyor las/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/_/oM lA~M a yi tshon bzhin du/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/_/de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o/_/de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las/_/sangs 
[\[237a.3\]]rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/_/swA~M la~M a yi tshon bzhin du/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/_/de nyid khyad par lam mchog go/_/chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/_/
[\[237a.4\]]o~M la~M a yi tshon bzhin du/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/_/de nyid gsum lam mchog grub pa'o/_/chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/_/hA~M la~M a yi tshogs bzhin du/_/
[\[237a.5\]]sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/_/de ni phrin las ye shes so/_/de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni/_/rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom/_/de nyid ha dang k+ShaHnyid de/_/mU~M gyi tshogs kyi 
[\[237a.6\]]lha rnams bsgom/_/sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa/_/de nyid hU~M lam phyag bsnams pa/_/rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs/_/dbus nas hU~M gi lo tsa na/_/lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya 
[\[237a.7\]]bcings shing /_/hU~M hU~M hU~M gis lan gsum du/_/rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab/_/mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul/_/'bru lnga rgya bcings byin gyis brlab/_/bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri/_/zhi ba rgyas pa lan 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gsum gyis/_/de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur/_/bcu pa drag po mthing gnag dbung /_/'gying ba'i gar gyis gsor ba yis/_/gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdebs pa'i/_/phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na/_/phaT phaT hU~M gis gsor ba yis/_/snying po thugs rtags phyag 
[\[237b.2\]]bsnams pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las/_/bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur/_/ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad/_/brgyan pa sgegs pa pho nya dang /_/tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang /_/mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag_/drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can/_/
[\[237b.3\]]sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas/_/bum pa bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang /_/rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang /_/gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang /_/gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang /_/ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul/_/de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[237b.4\]]yi dgos pa thams cad ni/_/ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes
