[\[237b.5\]]'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ye nas dag chos la/_/log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub/_/thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes/_/thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las/_/rnam rtog mi mthun so 
[\[237b.6\]]sor gyur/_/la la'i sman la la la'i dug_/sman du ma gyur gang yang med/_/thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las/_/mi mthun khyad par so sor snang /_/sus kyang ma byas su byed yod/_/rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcing /_/sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang /_/khams 
[\[237b.7\]]gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang /_/dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang /_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong /_/rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed/_/sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs/_/de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya/_/kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin/_/gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod/_/rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs/_/thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod/_/snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis/_/bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings/_/
[\[238a.2\]]bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med/_/bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems/_/bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong /_/bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad/_/sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris 'grub/_/gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin/_/
[\[238a.3\]]gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub/_/rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang /_/rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug_/klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar 
[\[238a.4\]]bsgom/_/gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim/_/o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHa/_/yang na yi ge A~M gyis bya/_/yang na yi ge hrIHlas gtang /_/dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya/_/a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/hU~M bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo 
[\[238a.5\]]rje ste/_/thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed/_/nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing /_/byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o/_/o~M bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste/_/ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang /_/thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi/_/trA~M bdag nyid nga 
[\[238a.6\]]rgyal yon tan te/_/snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed/_/zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor/_/yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o/_/hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste/_/nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag_/
[\[238a.7\]]chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o/_/A bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste/_/don rnams ma lus grub par byed/_/log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba'i/_/mU~M bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te/_/le lo g.yeng ba 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sel bar byed/_/thugs rje myur ba las byung ba/_/rgyal ba kun du thogs med pa'o/_/nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing /_/dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed/_/dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsum ste/_/lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga/_/'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes 
[\[238b.2\]]rab mtshon/_/hU~M du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng /_/ra~M gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang /_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/_/thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya/_/de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas/_/ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom/_/'bru gcig 
[\[238b.3\]]'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang /_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom/_/nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsol/_/de nas longs spyod lnga kun dang /_/ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang /_/lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom/_/o~M hU~M trA~M hrIH
[\[238b.4\]]aH_o~M badzra a mr-i te kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_/o~M bi shud d+he a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_o~M d+harma a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_o~M AHhU~M zhes brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/_/bdud rtsir gyur/_sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams/_/rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/gcig 
[\[238b.5\]]la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing /_/mU~M gyi dbyings su bstim par bya/_/'byung ba che rnam de dag la/_/lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya/_/rigs pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing /_/'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de/_/yum lnga dag tu bsgom 
[\[238b.6\]]par bya/_/de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do/_/rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis/_/phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na/_/de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun/_/smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/_/a hoHe ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs 
[\[238b.7\]]kyis/_/bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom/_/de nas lha dang gnyis med nas/_/bdag nyid yi ge o~M dang mU~M/_/gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim/_/bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom/_/sku mdog gangs la nyi shar 'dra/_/zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la/_/nyi ma stong gi gdan 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]khri ldan/_/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/_/khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes/_/slas dang byi mo tshogs kyis bskor/_/a ho 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/_/
[\[239a.2\]]shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o/_/lho yi rtse la rin po che/_/nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas/_/byang gi rtse la don yod grub/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom/_/phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom/_/snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas/_/de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/_/
[\[239a.3\]]bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar/_/re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/_/'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed/_/dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o/_/bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed/_/sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan pa dang /_/a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid 
[\[239a.4\]]ni/_/byang chub sems dang sha chen dang /_/dri chu dri chen ma~M sar bcas/_/pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang /_/gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams/_/dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar/_/bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab/_/rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir/_/gtsang sme med par dag par 
[\[239a.5\]]bya/_/dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/_/phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom/_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing /_/dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang /_/bskal pa yun ring gnas pa dang /_/dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te/_/tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag 
[\[239a.6\]]gsung /_/bdag nyid yi ge hU~M gyur nas/_/longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/_/oM AHhU~M du gyur par bsgom/_/'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro/_/slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar/_/shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom/_/gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas 
[\[239a.7\]]gdab/_/'thungs na ngan song sgrib par byang /_/tra ta/_rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing /_/lha la rtag tu mchod byas na/_/bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur/_/mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na/_/drag po gtum po'ang 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]lhan ner 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang thob 'gyur na/_/lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/_/the tshom med par bsgrub par gyis/_/rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim/_/gsang ba'i snying 
[\[239b.2\]]po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi byin gyi brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni/_/'phrul chen bzhi 
[\[239b.3\]]bcu rtsa lnga nyid/_/khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas/_/de nyid sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa/_/dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs/_/thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/_/chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/_/phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/_/de nyid ngag 
[\[239b.4\]]lam kun khengs par/_/hU~M gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom/_/lus nyid hA yi tshogs la bstim/_/gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas/_/kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis/_/de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/_/dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/_/mgyogs su 'gro bar 
[\[239b.5\]]lcags kyis spang /_/dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang /_/gang du bya ba byin par byed/_/de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/_/zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/_/dal bus hU~M zhes bsdus pa yis/_/bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/_/thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/_/
[\[239b.6\]]chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/_/phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/_/de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par/_/o~M gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom/_/lus nyid aHyi tshogs la bstim/_/gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/_/kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis/_/
[\[239b.7\]]de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/_/mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po/_/blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang /_/gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/_/de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/_/zhi 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/_/dal bus o~M zhes bsdus pa yis/_/bdag gi lus la gzud par 'gyur/_/thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/_/chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/_/phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/_/de nyid ngag lam kun 
[\[240a.2\]]khengs par/_/swA~M gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom/_/lus nyid swA~M gyi tshogs la bstim/_/gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/_/kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis/_/de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/_/swA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/_/nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la/_/
[\[240a.3\]]blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'dud/_/de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing /_/gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/_/de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/_/rgyas bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/_/dal bus swA~M zhes brjod pa yis/_/bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur/_/thams 
[\[240a.4\]]cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/_/chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/_/phyogs bcu gang bas gsal 'bar bsgom/_/de nyid dag la lus khengs par/_/A~MHgyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom/_/lus nyid A~MHgyi tshogs la bstim/_/gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/_/kha dog 
[\[240a.5\]]dmar po'i tshon phye yis/_/de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/_/A~MHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/_/rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang /_/ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur/_/de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing /_/gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/_/de yi gzugs 
[\[240a.6\]]las 'byung 'dod na/_/dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la/_/dal bus A~MHzhes brjod pa yin/_/bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur/_/thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/_/chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa/_/phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/_/de nyid ngag 
[\[240a.7\]]lam lus khengs par/_/hA~M gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom/_/lus nyid hA~M yi tshogs la bstim/_/gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/_/kha dog ljang gu'i tshon phye yis/_/de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/_/hA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/_/las kyi rigs chen gang 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]'dod gzugs/_/dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang /_/zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags can rnams 'du ba dang /_/nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur/_/de yi bstan pa 'dzin par byed/_/de yi 'khor la logs spyod cing /_/gnas par dga' 
[\[240b.2\]]ba bzhin du 'gyur/_/de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/_/snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la/_/dal bus ha~M zhes brjod pa yis/_/mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char/_/bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/_/gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su/_/nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang 
[\[240b.3\]]gis/_/sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung /_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[240b.4\]]dpal kun du bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum/_/dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang 
[\[240b.5\]]snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs mU~M du brtags/_/de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/_/mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/de zla'i ngang tshul de bzung nas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka_/shes rab yum dang ldan par 
[\[240b.6\]]bsgom/_/lam du zhugs la de lus dgang /_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/de bzhin rigs rnams o~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun par rnam 
[\[240b.7\]]par bsam/_/brtan pa AHyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na/_/nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags/_/'phro 'du rigs dang 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mthun pa'i grangs/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcing /_/des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/_/rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas/_/gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs/_/dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum/_/shin 
[\[241a.2\]]tu chos kyis bsgrags pa la/_/gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngar byin brlabs lA~M du brtags/_/de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/_/lA~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las/_/rgyal ba thams 
[\[241a.3\]]cad byin gyis rlob/_/de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/_/she rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin/_/sbubs nas zhugs 
[\[241a.4\]]la de lus dgang /_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/rdo rje rigs rnams hU~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam/_/brtan 
[\[241a.5\]]ba hA yi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag bya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grags/_/sgom dang bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/
[\[241a.6\]]lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar gsungs/_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom/_/yon ton sku gsung yid bzhin gter/_/dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo/_/chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/
[\[241a.7\]]ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la/_/dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba/_/sbyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs oM du brtags/_/de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/_/oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba las/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]rgyal pa thams cad byin gyis rlob/_/de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las/_/yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na/_/sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin/_/
[\[241b.2\]]sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/rin chen rigs rnams swA~M du bsgom/_snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun par shin 
[\[241b.3\]]tu bsam/_/brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang 
[\[241b.4\]]mngon sum na/_/dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing /_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi/_/rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom/_/gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal/_/gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang /_/ci 'dod 'ong dang smra yang rung /_/mtshon dang 'jigs 
[\[241b.5\]]pa mang ba dang /_/bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar/_/dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum/_/bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa/_/dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/ljon pa'i lcugs phran la sogs la/_/dang por gnas lnga byin gyis rlob/_/de nas 
[\[241b.6\]]gnas lnga shes rab bsgom/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/las bzhi 'bru ba'i ba~M du brtags/_/de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/_/ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba las/_/rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob/_/de nyid 
[\[241b.7\]]mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas/_/sangs rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_/
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]de go mas blo bde gsal spro thim/_/ming dang snying po bcas pas dgug_/rdo rje gsung rnams o~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun 
[\[242a.2\]]par shin tu bsam/_/brtan pa o~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/_/bsgoms nas 
[\[242a.3\]]bzlas dang mngom sum na/_/chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing /_/chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas/_/ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags/_/dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul pa/_/dbab par 
[\[242a.4\]]bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs hA~M du brtags/_/de ni e yi tshogs yin te/_/de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/_/me yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms/_/de nyid steng 
[\[242a.5\]]gi lha rnams te/_/bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/don yod dang tshul de bzung nas/_/don yon mchog gi tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rgya gram byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs 
[\[242a.6\]]la de lus dgang /_/rgya gram tshon gyis khengs pa dang /_/so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/rdo rje la la rnams hA~M bsgom/_/snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs 
[\[242a.7\]]la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]par ni/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni/_/dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing /_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/phyogs su 'gro dang dprog pa dang /_/tshe bstung ba dang las rnams dang /_/mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i 
[\[242b.2\]]mchog_/rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur/_/srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das/_/ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid du mkhyen to/_/mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 
[\[242b.3\]]sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/a hoHbsam bya bsam par zin pa yi/_/bsam pas mi zin bsam mi khyab/_/bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab/_/rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid 
[\[242b.4\]]zad mi shes/_/ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa/_/de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin/_/a hoH/_rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes 
[\[242b.5\]]bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 
[\[242b.6\]]phyung ngo /_/dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams/_/kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas/_/shes pa blo che khongs yangs la/_/zab par spyod la mi skyo bar/_/zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin/_/dung chen snod du chu yis bsing /_/rten du rung bar ting 'dzin 
[\[242b.7\]]dang /_/dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan/_/mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dbog_/o~M dang mU~M gyi blo bstan nas/_/gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang /_/sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/_/phung po khams dang skye mched sbyar/_/longs spyod lnga ldan 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]mchod sbyin bya/_/rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzI na oM/_oM badzra ku la hU~M badzra/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta swA~M rat+na swA~M/_oM pad+ma ta thA hr-i da ya A ro lika_/hA pradz+nyA hA~M/_d+hA twI shwa ri mU~M/_dwe Sha ra ti lA~M/_mo ha ra ti A~M/_rA ga ra 
[\[243a.2\]]ti pA~M/_badzra ra ti tA~M/_mU~M mU~M mU~M/_lA~M lA~M lA~M/_A~MHA~MHA~MH/_pA~M pA~M pA~M/_tA~M tA~M tA~M/_e ba~M ma ya/_ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_sa sa sa sa sa/_ma ma ma ma ma/_ya ya ya ya ya/_s+t+wa~M hoHzhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams 
[\[243a.3\]]cad kyi mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang /_/spyan chen mo dang /_mA ma kI chen mo dang /_/gos dkar mo chen mo dang /_dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du 
[\[243a.4\]]kun du snang par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bci bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos sgyu 'phrul 
[\[243a.5\]]chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo /_/sgeg mo mchod pa byin bsdu ba/_/gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i 
[\[243a.6\]]gzugs brnyan la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin/_/de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa/_/ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de nyid hU~M gi lha rnams te/_/bdag med mtha' bral 
[\[243a.7\]]mi dmigs las/_/rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsag nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_/rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang /_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]so so'i snying po ming yang bod/_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/ming yang snying po bcas pas dgug_/rdo rje lha rnams hU~M du bsgom/_/snod nas sgeg mo khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi chogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs 
[\[243b.2\]]dang mthun pa nyid du bsam/_/brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/_/bsgoms 
[\[243b.3\]]nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing /_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba/_/gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/_/spyi gtsug 
[\[243b.4\]]kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs e nyid sbyin/_/de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa/_/e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de nyid swA~M gyi lha rnams te/_/bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/rang gi ngang tshul de 
[\[243b.5\]]bzung nas/_/sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rje byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_/rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang /_/so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug_/
[\[243b.6\]]de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/rin chen lha rnams swA~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snyig po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam/_/brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes 
[\[243b.7\]]byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing /_/rjes su 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]chags pa'i phyag bzhis/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba/_/gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du 
[\[244a.2\]]brtags/_/de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa/_/ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de nyid oM gyi lha rnams te/_/bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/rang gi [(]dang tshul [,]ngang tshul [)]de bzung nas/_/sangs rgya pad+ma tsa na ka/_/shes rab 
[\[244a.3\]]yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_pad+ma'i tshogs kyi khengs pa dang /_/so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/pad+ma'i lha rnams 
[\[244a.4\]]o~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs gyur bar/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snyig po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa 
[\[244a.5\]]med pa'i sems nyid las/_/sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing /_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag bzhis/_/rigs 
[\[244a.6\]]dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba/_/gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin/_/de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/de nyid 
[\[244a.7\]]goms la gsang mtshan pa/_/ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/de nyid hA~M gyi lha rnams te/_/bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/_/rang gi dang tshul de bzung nas/_/sangs rgya pad+ma tsa na ka/_/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/_/de las 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]rdo rje byin brlabs te/_/pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/_/sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang /_/las kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang /_/so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug_/de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/_/las kyi lha rnams hA~M du bsgom/_/snod gnas gar mkhan 
[\[244b.2\]]khengs gyur par/_/yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/_/phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/_/rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/_/sangs rgyas las kyi 
[\[244b.3\]]sprin tshogs bsgom/_/phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/_/'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni/_/bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/_/sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing /_/rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/_/rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu 
[\[244b.4\]]rtsa gnyis kyi/_/lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang /_/sgo ba sgo ma mang po dang /_/dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang /_/lha dang klu yi tshogs bcas las/_/mngon du smra bar bya bar mthun/_/rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang /_/bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang /_/gsad dang bskrad 
[\[244b.5\]]pa'i tshogs bcas dang /_/bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang /_/nor 'dod pa dang ci bya ba/_/ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/dus med par ni mchod dang phrad/_/ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to/_/gsang 
[\[244b.6\]]ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 
[\[244b.7\]]'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo /_/rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis/_/nges par bsgom par bya ba ni/_/rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas/_/gzugs su bri'am 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rten bcas la/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom/_/de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te/_/rang lus mdog dmar dang tshul 'dzin/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du 
[\[245a.2\]]brtags/_/de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing /_/goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du/_/lam nas ngag gi dbang por bsdu/_/o~M las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/_/snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/_/ming dang snying po 
[\[245a.3\]]goms pas dgug_/mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na/_/lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/_/rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham/_/yid la goms pa gsal pa ni/_/gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur/_/blon po'i sa 'dzin mchod pa bsham/_/yid la goms pa gsal ba 
[\[245a.4\]]na/_/gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom/_/de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te/_/rang lus mdog dmar dang tshul 'dzin/_/spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/_/'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags/_/de goms gar gyi dkyil 
[\[245a.5\]]'khor bsgom/_/dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing /_/goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du/_/lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu/_/A~MHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/_/snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/_/ming dang snying bo goms par dgug_/mngon sum 
[\[245a.6\]]gsal bar gyur pa na/_/lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/_/rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham/_/de la las su stsal pa na/_/gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/_/yud tsam rtag par 'dod bsgrub rnams/_/ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/dbang 
[\[245a.7\]]phyug lha chen lha dbang po/_/rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la/_/chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan/_/'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams/_/ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/de yi dgos pa thams cad ba/_/ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/_/ces brjod pas 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun du gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod chen po kun du snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges 
[\[245b.2\]]pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[245b.3\]]gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang /_/rigs gsum pa dang /_rigs tha dad pa dang /_phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i 
[\[245b.4\]]gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so/_/sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang /_/sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang /_/
[\[245b.5\]]sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa/_/gdug pa'i sbrul rnams bsal ba dang /_/'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la/_/gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur cing /_/ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la/_/gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir/_/lnga pa zhes ni rab tu bsngags/_/bdag gis 
[\[245b.6\]]gdug par mchod pa'i phyir/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las/_/bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog_/lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin/_/mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu/_/nyi shu brgya 'am stong dang khri/_/bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po/_/kha dog nag po lce 
[\[245b.7\]]gsum 'bar/_/gdug pa klu yi tshogs [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas/_/'khor mang 'jigs brjod skyi bung bas/_/mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca' bya/_/mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams/_/phral te go ran byas pa na/_/gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding /_/nA ga pu ka la nA ga phaT ces brjod/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'di la goms par gang brtsom pas/_/nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung na/_/me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin/_/rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por/_/kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas/_/rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang /_/de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/sa la bdag 
[\[246a.2\]]tu bya ba ni/_/thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam ste/_/o~M dang mu~M gyi tshogs kyis dgang /_/rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las/_/'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/de la gshog pa rab brkyang ste/_/rdo rje thal mo drag tu rdab/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/_de nas yig 
[\[246a.3\]]'bru shin tu gshig_/de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng /_/de nas yig 'bru 'phrul bskyed pa/_/nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste/_/sa gzhi mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/de la shin tu dngangs 'gyur te/_/phyogs bcu kun du 'bros par 'gyur/_/de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[246a.4\]]'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor/_/'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa/_/gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir/_/rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas/_/nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung /_/de la yig 'bru drug brjod na/_/de la gnod par mi nus shing /_/gdug pas mchod cing bkur 
[\[246a.5\]]bar 'gyur/_/de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur/_/mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang /_/mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la/_/gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni/_/snying gar a~M gyi 'bru rnams te/_/kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang /_/gzugs su snang ba kun bzhugs te/_/
[\[246a.6\]]thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas/_/rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam/_/de la rab tu 'jigs par brkyang /_/yi ge dang po tha ma mig_/a~M gyi tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan/_/mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang /_/thod pa'i dbyig par chas nas ni/_/lce la sngags ni dran pa yis/_/
[\[246a.7\]]rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing /_/gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur te/_/phyogs bcu kun du 'bros par 'gyur/_/de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur/_/o~M mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hU~M hU~M dza dza/_'di la goms par gang brtson pas/_/nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas/_/bkur gnas 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mchod pa byed pa dang /_/sgrub pa thams cad myur bar 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos 
[\[246b.2\]]'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/_/tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom/_/nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te/_/lo dang zla ba gsum dang lngar/_/rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang /_/rdo rje 
[\[246b.3\]]phyag bsnams dril bu la/_/sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/_/rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/_/rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/_/khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal/_/rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/_/spyan bgrad 
[\[246b.4\]]mche gtsigs sdang mig 'bar/_/brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/_/shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/_/de yi snying po bzlas nas ni/_/de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/_/de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni/_/gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu/_/bzhin bzlog mig 
[\[246b.5\]]gis bltas nas ni/_/lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod/_/brgyal 'gyur a~M nas dmar rtsi dbab/_/de las hU~M zhes bya ba yid/_/dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na/_/mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/_/tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams 
[\[246b.6\]]bsgom/_/nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te/_/lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun/_/de yi dung chen gang ba dang /_/rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/_/sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/_/rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/_/rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/_/
[\[246b.7\]]sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/_/khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal/_/gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor/_/rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/_/spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/_/brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/_/shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/_/de 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]yi snying po bzlas nas kyang /_/o~M zhes pas ni rked par gcad/_/des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/_/sa las gser dang chu las sa/_/yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni/_/ji bzhin ji bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/_/de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges/_/de bsnyen nyams 
[\[247a.2\]]su lon pa yin/_/de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni/_/ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/_/dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta/_/o~M gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod/_/brgyal 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab/_/ngag las a~M zhes bya bas ni/_/bzlas brjod bcas de bdag 
[\[247a.3\]]nyid bstim/_/de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges/_/de bsnyen nyams su len pa yin/_/de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni/_/ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la/_/bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni/_/o~M las drag tu phaT ces pas/_/brgyal 'gyur a~M las dmar rtsi 
[\[247a.4\]]dbab/_/de las hU~M zhes bya ba yin/_/dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na/_/'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa/_/byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo/_/phyag rgya bzhugs yun la sogs pa/_/gcig pu cha yi ting nge 'dzin/_/rdo rje dung 
[\[247a.5\]]chen gang ba dang /_/rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/_/sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/_/rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/_/rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/_/khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal/_/rang gi rang bzhin 
[\[247a.6\]]der bsgyur nas/_/spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/_/brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/_/shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/_/de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang /_/o~M zhes bya bas rked par gcad/_/des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/_/sa las gser dang chu las 
[\[247a.7\]]sa/_/yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba/_/ji bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges/_/de la 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/_/de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/_/de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni/_/ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/_/dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta/_/a~M 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]las drag tu phaT ces pas/_/brgya la 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab/_/de las hU~M zhes bya ba yid/_/dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na/_/mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul chen po de nyid las/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa/_/khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 
[\[247b.2\]]'khyil/_/bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/_/spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/_/brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/_/shig shig drag tu gyur pa las/_/mgyogs par phyogs su song ba na/_/de yi snying po mchog bzlas nas/_/hU~M zhes pas ni 
[\[247b.3\]]bskul ba yis/_/dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed/_/des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/_/de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par/_/thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/_/o~M la drag tu phaT ces pas/_/gang la bya ba mngon bsam nas/_/se 
[\[247b.4\]]gol snol mar gtogs pa yis/_/brgyal 'gyur o~M las dmar rtsi dbab/_/yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchod bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o//_//
[\[247b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_phyogs skyong par gyur pa sde dpon dang chung mar bcas/_bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus 
[\[247b.6\]]par dam bcas shing /_/rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang /_snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so/_/dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang /_/lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni/_/'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams/_/keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur/_/rlon 
[\[247b.7\]]pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod/_/thod par 'thung za med pa'i nang /_/mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang /_/zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang /_/rnga dang lda ldi khrag 'thor zhing /_/gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor/_/dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/_/ming tsam 'dzin 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]par byed pa yis/_/zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te/_/rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/_/de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid/_/de yi dgos pa ci yang rung /_/ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub/_/'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul/_/o~M kha~M d+hu ha 
[\[248a.2\]]swA hA/_dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang /_/lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni/_/'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu stong /_/me tog sil ma bkram pa dang /_/ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang /_/rin chen bcal dang brdung ba dang /_/rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan/_/rin chen khang pa'i 
[\[248a.3\]]gnas su ni/_/lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing /_/rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung /_/gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/_/gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid/_/rin chen me tog la sogs dang /_/lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor/_/lha yi tshogs mang kun 
[\[248a.4\]]gyis bskor/_/dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/_/ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te/_/rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/_/de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/_/gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang /_/de yi dgos pa ci yang rung /_/ma lus 
[\[248a.5\]]rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub/_/de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid/_/o~M sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha/_/rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor srung /_/'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi/_/lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/_/'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya/_/me tog sil mar 
[\[248a.6\]]bkram pa dang /_/rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa/_/sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/_/ci legs par ni rab tu smra/_/rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus/_/mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i/_/bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/_/rin chen bcal dang 'thung ba dang /_/rol 
[\[248a.7\]]mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan/_/rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing /_/bzhon pa dmag [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'khor bar mchis/_/rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/_/gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs/_/gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid/_/rin chen me tog 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]phyogs su 'thor/_/rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/_/dri za med pa'i bdag po dang /_/dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams/_/'di bzhin gus par bdag cag bgyid/_/dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/_/ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zhabs kyi 
[\[248b.2\]]mthil du bris nas kyang /_/rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/_/de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/_/gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang /_/de yi dgos pa ci yang rung /_/ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub/_/de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid/_/o~M sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hu ho 
[\[248b.3\]]swA hA/_rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/_/'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis/_/lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni/_/'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya/_/me tog sil ma bkram pa dang /_/rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa/_/sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/_/
[\[248b.4\]]ci legs par ni rab tu smra/_/rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus/_/mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par/_/bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/_/rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang /_/rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan/_/rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing /_/
[\[248b.5\]]bzhon pa dmag [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'khor bar mchis/_/rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/_/gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/_/gzugs mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid/_/rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor/_/rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/_/gnod 
[\[248b.6\]]sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang /_/chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams/_/de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid/_/dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/_/ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang /_/rang gi snying po 'di 
[\[248b.7\]]brjod na/_/de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/_/gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang /_/de yi dgos pa ci yang rung /_/ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid/_/de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid/_/o~M d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she o~M hU~M/_zhes mgrin gcig 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]tu smras pas/_srid pa ji srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/a ho/_de bzhin 
[\[249a.2\]]gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par/_/'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i/_/ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing /_/de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus/_/thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid 
[\[249a.3\]]ma nor lam nyid la/_/gsang ba'i snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa/_/nga nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do/_/ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul bar 
[\[249a.4\]]gyur pa gnas dang /_snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis/_de 
[\[249a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/_ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so/_/e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal/_/dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par/_/dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 
[\[249a.6\]]'byor thugs/_/kun du bzang po rdo rje'i sku/_/ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso/_/khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul/_/thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso/_/khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhin mdzod/_/ser 
[\[249a.7\]]gnag mthing gnag ljang gnag dmar gnag dang /_/sngo gnag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i sku/_/bskal par bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i/_/ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i/_/bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i/_/skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'od bzhin du/_/che btsan dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms/_/mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing /_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs/_/za byed brkam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal/_/khrag mtsho mtha' med skems shing sgal 
[\[249b.2\]]tshigs 'joms/_/khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyu/_/dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid/_/'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas bsgegs/_/rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad/_/rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs 
[\[249b.3\]]rgyal bas dbu la brgyan/_/smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyu bas/_/phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud/_/sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa/_/'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang /_/sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas/_/
[\[249b.4\]]'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong /_/khros pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas/_/srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar/_/'jig rten dus gcig mid mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod/_/ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar 
[\[249b.5\]]ba yis/_/srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad/_/rkan sgras rol pas 'gro la pheg brdabs bzhin/_/khams gsum kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad/_/zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol/_/'jig tshogs sad pa'i ko rlon g.yang gzhi bsnams/_/
[\[249b.6\]]klu 'dul yon tan sbrul nag stong gis bklubs/_/'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan/_/'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso/_/'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku/_/mang po'i 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas/_/zhe sdang 
[\[249b.7\]]'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso/_/zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i/_/rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso/_/gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]sku/_/mi 'byed khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan/_/nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso/_/'jigs tshogs sad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas/_/zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs chog pa'i dus mtha' med/_/'jigs pas phebs par dga' zhing shin tu 
[\[250a.2\]]sdang /_/phrag dog 'dul ba phrag dog kun gyi gtso/_/phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku/_/bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing /_/lam nor gdug par bcas pa phaT kyis gsod/_/zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams/_/sku 'dra 
[\[250a.3\]]'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan/_/zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad/_/zhabs chen g.yon mang brkyang bas lha gnon bdud la khyab/_/zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum/_/rdo rje se gol phyar brdabs gnyid cher rab sel 
[\[250a.4\]]mdzad/_/'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyu ba'i/_/'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod/_/zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag_/'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon/_/bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la/_/ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin brlabs 
[\[250a.5\]]dang /_/thugs rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis/_/brda tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las sbyong zhing /_/shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du/_/skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char/_/byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter/_/khrag 'thung 
[\[250a.6\]]sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bka' drin dran pa'i glu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/_gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 
[\[250a.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi/_jo mo'i yang jo mo/_/mi srin mo chen mo/_/mi srin mo dang /_tshangs ma dang /_'khrug mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_'jug sred ma dang /_gzhon nu ma dang /_dmar mo dang /_bdud rtsi mo 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dang /_zhi ba mo dang /_be con mo dang /_srin mo dang /_za ba mo dang /_dga' ba mo dang /_ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang /_gcig pu spyod dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_grub mo dang /_klung mo dang /_gsod byed mo dang /_mi mo dang /_phag mo dang /_rgan byad mo dang /_sna chad mo dang /_
[\[250b.2\]]chu lha mo dang /_nag mo chen mo dang /_ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /_bum rna sngo gnag chen mo dang /_gsus 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang /_rgyal mo dang /_blon mo dang /_sde dpon mo dang /_g.yog dang yang g.yog dang /_bran dang /_yang bran la sogs pa/_slas 
[\[250b.3\]]dang byi mo dang /_bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di/_/gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin/_/thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang /_/gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams/_/nga yi thugs las sprul 
[\[250b.4\]]pa yin/_/tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/_/sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang /_/lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang /_/sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam gling du/_/nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di/_/phyogs bcu kun du spel ba dang /_/de yi 
[\[250b.5\]]gzugs la gtad pa ni/_/yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas/_/phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang /_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams/_/spyod dang bsgom dang bzlas pa dang /_/sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis/_/bsgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang /_/bstan 
[\[250b.6\]]pa 'dzin par nus pa yi/_/gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad/_/gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no/_/mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing /_/yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan/_/zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che/_/sbyor ba gnyi ga mkhas 
[\[250b.7\]]pa dang /_/lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang /_/gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing /_/bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o/_/nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la/_/bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa/_ci nus par ni shin tu brtson/_/sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas/_/gang gi yid 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]kyang mi 'khrugs shing /_/mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub/_/bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul/_/zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis/_/nges pa can la shin tu gtad/_/gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o/_/thogs med phyal bar 'dod pa spyod/_/bud 
[\[251a.2\]]med yon tan kun yod cing /_/'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod la/_/rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang /_/'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te/_/nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams/_/nams kyang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas/_/gzhan ni bstan par ma 
[\[251a.3\]]gsungs so/_/dad ldan srun cing blo rno ba/_/dad pa che zhing chos la gus/_/chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing /_/gnas pa dga' zhing lung nyan pa/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub/_/mchod pa'i gnas shom sdom pa srung /_/bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas/_/gsang 
[\[251a.4\]]sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas su/_/nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste/_/thogs pa med par mngon sum la/_/sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing /_/mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la 
[\[251a.5\]]mchod/_/dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang /_/gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la/_/'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing /_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/_/nges pa'i don ni mi ston la/_/nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams/_/rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin/_/rigs ngan pho mo 
[\[251a.6\]]'dod spyod ni/_/spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che/_/blo zhan phrag dog sgro skur can/_/gnyid che chang dad brtson 'grus chung /_/slob la mi gus nan tan med/_/slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung /_/gal te dam la gnas na yang /_/nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la/_/mngon 
[\[251a.7\]]du dga' bar mi nus te/_/lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang /_/grol ba dka' zhing nus mthu zhan/_/mun dang lkog dang skye bo la/_/gar dben phrad par 'dod spyod cing /_/'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag la/_/tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa/_/dngos kyi don dang 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]mthun pa las/_/gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya/_/bskal ba'i 'jig rten bar du yang /_/thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing /_/nams kyang bstan par mi bya'o/_/'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir/_/gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni/_/rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de/_/
[\[251b.2\]]rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin/_/bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/_/zhes brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur te/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las 
[\[251b.3\]]rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo /_/e e ma/_e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi/_/ngang nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi/_/lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter/_/yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun du gnas/_/chos mang chos nyid mnyam 
[\[251b.4\]]pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las/_/las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di/_/kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin/_/chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad 'tsham par bstan/_/sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bder gshegs nyid yin rab tu gsal/_/rdo rje 
[\[251b.5\]]gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig chen pos bud med btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de la mchod sbyin chen po 
[\[251b.6\]]ni/_/thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral/_/de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/_/blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/_/gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/_/'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas/_/bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya/_/mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po 
[\[251b.7\]]dag_/bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul/_/bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/_/longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/_/dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/_/bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che/_/gzhan na 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]yod pa ma yin na/_/lha srid la sogs smos ci dgos/_/rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/_/phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing /_/gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/_/zhes brjod pas/_mnyes pa chen pos 'jig 
[\[252a.2\]]rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir/_/dam tshig chen po ched du brjod do/_/bla med theg 
[\[252a.3\]]par nges gyur pas/_/nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang /_/byas la mi sogs tshogs gyur te/_/tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs/_/bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu/_/'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang /_/ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/_/ma lus kun 'dus 
[\[252a.4\]]rnam par dag_/yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing /_/sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/_/srog med srog gcad gcad du med/_/srog dang skyes bu log rtogs tsam/_/bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med pas/_/'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min/_/gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir/_/
[\[252a.5\]]blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/_/chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/ming dang tshig tu btags pa [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nyid la ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]spyod pa/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhes btags tsam yod ma yin/_/ma chags pa la chags pa dang /_/chags pa nyid na chags med pa/_/de ni tshangs mchog 
[\[252a.6\]]rgyal po ste/_/shin tu chags pa chen po yin/_/bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/_/yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/_/gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/_/'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/_/bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog_/gti mug 
[\[252a.7\]]chags dang zhe sdang dang /_/nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo /_/dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/_/dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro/_/yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog_/ye nas dag mnyam rtog pas spyad/_/bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/_/rtsa ba yin te rigs med 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]'gyur/_/mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni/_/yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o/_/mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi/_/mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/_/mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur/_/'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/_/rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal pa dag_/
[\[252b.2\]]gso la nye bar mi brtson dang /_/skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed/_/nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang /_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/_/yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/_/'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/_/yan lag dam 
[\[252b.3\]]tshig nyams gyur na/_/'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung /_/dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/_/gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/_/yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/_/gcig la bcu phrag 
[\[252b.4\]]gnyis su dbye/_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/_/srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i/_/rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro/_/gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/_/thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/_/bsgrub med dam pa ma lus 
[\[252b.5\]]'grub/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog_/rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste/_/'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/_/dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis/_/sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob/_/bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/_/
[\[252b.6\]]'jigs med kun du bzang por sbyor/_/ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs/_/ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/_/ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub/_/nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang /_/de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog_/ces brjod pas/_de bzhin 
[\[252b.7\]]gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_sngags 'chang rnams 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]don yod par bya ba'i phyir/_/dam tshig sum brgya ba'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas/_/sngags 'chang rnams kyi don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/_/log rtogs mi bzad rdul phran snyed/_/rtog 'dul gnyen po 
[\[253a.2\]]bsam mi khyab/_/'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang /_/rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun/_/nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang /_/rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis/_/lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab/_/de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan/_/yang dag nyid dang 
[\[253a.3\]]log rtogs gnyis/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas/_/de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/_/ye nas ngo bo nyid med na/_/nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med/_/thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur/_/kun rdzob chu zla ltar yin pas/_/cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 
[\[253a.4\]]'grub/_/rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/_/don dam skye 'gag med pa ste/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/_/ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig sum brgya drug cu pa'i rtsa ba bco lnga pa mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de 
[\[253a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/_thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi/_/yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam pa 'byung /_/sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 
[\[253a.6\]]'bar/_/ra~M/_srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te/_/yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar/_/ha~M/_dbang po dang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni/_/lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi/_/a/_zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/_/thugs rje byin brlabs 
[\[253a.7\]]rmad po che/_/hU~M/_'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa/_/'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs/_/ho/_bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong /_/trAM ta/_sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong bzhin/_/phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag_/bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed/_/hri/_gsal zhing 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dag gis gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/_de dag gi sde dpon dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams/_rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/_gshin rje tshe bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa 
[\[253b.2\]]dang /_bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang /_yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang /_srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang /_yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang /_lha'i rgyal po dbang 
[\[253b.3\]]phyug chen po dang /_ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang /_rmu rje btsan pa rgyal po chen po dang /_phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang /_khyab 'jug chen po kun du rgyu ba dang /_klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang /_lha'i rgyal po li phyin chen po dang /_gnod sbyin chen 
[\[253b.4\]]po lag rgyu ba dang /_bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang /_klu bdud chen po yam shud dmar po dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_za byed dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_'byung po'i tshogs dang /_pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[253b.5\]]rab tu 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/_dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag_/gzugs su brnyan pa rab tu 'jigs/_/
[\[253b.6\]]sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum/_/dri ni mi zhim rul myags bsung /_/ro ni kha skyur tsha bar bro/_/reg bya tsha rtsub mi gdug spyod/_/zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing /_/nga rgyal keng rus brag tu gtams/_/gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs/_/'dod chags khrag gi 
[\[253b.7\]]chu chen 'brug_/phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs/_/sti ra chen po'i longs spyod la/_/stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang /_/kAng ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs/_/sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'joms/_/bam dang rul dang myags pa dang /_/bye dang 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]skad gdangs dang /_/skad dang nga ro drag tu 'don/_/hU~M he he phaT b+h+yo ru lu/_/khro bo chen po tshogs pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal 'bar ba/_/bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom/_/so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su/_/rgyud drug sems can thams 
[\[254a.2\]]cad las/_/ma rungs gdug pa thams cad du/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa bkug nas ni/_/lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim/_/lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/_/hoH/_gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni/_/'byor ba rnam pa kun gyis mchod/_/nr-i yi tshil dang tsha ba'i 
[\[254a.3\]]mar/_/dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgyun du dbul/_/a hoH/_yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad/_/stong ngam 'bum du dbul bar bgyi/_/nag po'i tsher ma dug shing ngam/_/gzhan yang bsreg rdzas gdug gsum dang /_/gnon pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 
[\[254a.4\]]thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor spyir bstan pa'i hoMH/_o~M hU~M hrA~M hrIHAH/_gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las hauMH_thams cad ma lus par 'dir 'dus pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khros pa'i rgyal pos sgyu 'phrul 
[\[254a.5\]]dra ba bstan pa las khro bo rngam pa'i tshogs su bsgoms nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/byang chub mchog gi snying po ni/_/mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyi/_/dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing /_/rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis/_/byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 
[\[254a.6\]]'gyur/_/drag po gtum po bsgrubs pa ni/_/b+ha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag_/mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/_/khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung /_/lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgoms shing /_/mngon du byung ba'i zhal 'bar te/_/bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lhar gyur nas/_/
[\[254a.7\]]ling+ga yang nas yang bsdus te/_/dbyings kyi dkyil du bstim par bya/_/hU~M gis bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phang /_/zhal gyis rang sngags khri 'bum du/_/rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su/_/yang nas yang du gsol bar bya/_/'gro lnga sems can thams cad kun/_/
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur/_/ya ma yang lhag par mdzes/_/sku mdog dung ka la sogs dang /_/mche gtsigs khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang /_/zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba dang /_/gang la sogs pa bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/mtshan 
[\[254b.2\]]ma bzung nas rang sngags don/_/mngon par dbang pos bltar yod par/_/ril bu bsdus nas dbyings su mchod/_/the tshom med par 'grub par nges/_/dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa/_/dpa' bos dgos pa yod pa'i phyir/_/kun la phan pa de gyis shig_/hoHhU~M dzaHdang 
[\[254b.3\]]phaT dang spo la sogs/_/'dren pa'i mchog tu des gsungs so/_/mtshan ma ming ru bsdus pa yang /_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du/_/smon pa byang chub lam du gzhug_/mtshan ma'i bag chags med par bya/_/dbyings nas spro zhing a la bstim/_/a ho/_/thugs nyid la ni 
[\[254b.4\]]thugs brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms 
[\[254b.5\]]shing /_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan par gnas/_/thams cad hU~M du bsdus nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom/_/me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du/_/me lha ag+ne dzaHsa bkug nas/_/ra~M zhes bya ba'i me sbar te/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/_/
[\[254b.6\]]zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya/_/hU~M gtum po'i tshogs chen rab tu 'bar/_/dud ka nag po'i mdog 'dra la/_/'bar ba'i 'od zer mang por 'khrugs/_/nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang pos brgyan/_/seng ge glang chen stag rngam dang /_/phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams/_/phaT dang hU~M 
[\[254b.7\]]dang ha la sgra/_/skad drag phyogs bcur nam mkha' 'khrug_/phaT/_khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/_/yul dang gnas kyi phyag rgyas mdzes/_/ha he/_slas dang byi mo bran mo dang /_/b+h+yo/_ci bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor/_/so so'i stan dang lag cha dang /_/rngam pa'i 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]nga ro rang sngags sgrogs/_/mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang /_/shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid phaT kyi ngang nyid du/_/gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hos bsdus nas su/_/rgyud drug sems can kun bsdus nas/_/
[\[255a.2\]]khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya/_/lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/_/yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang mthun/_/gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin/_/mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang mthun/_/AH/_gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/_/hU~M/_zhal gdangs spyan bgrad khro 
[\[255a.3\]]zhal bsgom/_/rdo rje gtan pa gdengs pa dang /_/thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis bskor/_/hU~M sgra drug po'i tshogs kyis 'bar/_/'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkug nas su/_/zhal du bstims na lhag par 'grub/_/rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/_/'khor gyi tshogs kyang 
[\[255a.4\]]snga ma bzhin/_/bskang ba'i tshul du sbod gtong bya/_/hU~M/_gtum po dmar po mchu rings po/_/'bar ba rdo rje phreng bas bskor/_/'od chen 'bar ba 'phro ba yis/_/'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig brdubs/_/hU~M/_khro bo'i tshogs kyis sngags rnams dang /_/gnas 
[\[255a.5\]]dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang /_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/so so'i rang sngags rdzogs par 'don/_/ha he b+h+yo/_gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis/_/hU~M rdo rje thugs rje byin brlabs kyis/_/'jig rten khams ni kun bkang ste/_/gtum 'khrug ma lus 
[\[255a.6\]]thams cad kun/_/rdo rje mthu yis btul bar gyur/_/hU~M rdo rje zhe sdang 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/skad cig yud la rlag mdzad de/_/brlag par ma gyur gang yang med/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las drag po hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu drug 
[\[255a.7\]]pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma sdud pa zhes bya bas/_/'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir/_/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus/_/dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]'bar/_/thams cad ma lus dbyings su sbyor/_/hrIH/_dkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las/_/'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang /_/rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams pas bskor/_/gzhan yang rgyan gyi dam pa mchog_/kun gyis de la brgyan cing bskor/_/me lha spyan drangs 
[\[255b.2\]]snga ma bzhin/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/_/pad+ma rigs kyi khro bor bsgom/_/dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni/_/gzhan yang sprul pa mang po yi/_/phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bskor/_/rngam pa rang sngags drag tu sgrogs/_/hrIH/_bdag nyid ma chags 
[\[255b.3\]]rdo rje ste/_/dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas/_/phyogs bcur 'gro ba thams cad dang /_/gdug pa yid can ma lus kun/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_s+pho Tas bkug nas su/_/dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya/_/dgongs pa grub cing ngan song sbyong /_/hrIH/_gzhal yas 
[\[255b.4\]]dkyil 'khor mang bo'i tshogs/_/dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dra la/_/tha ma pad+ma ljon shing dang /_/pad+ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bsgom/_/gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor kun la mdzes par brgyan/_/bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas/_/mchod pa lha rdzas sna 
[\[255b.5\]]tshogs dang /_/zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams dang /_/dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa/_/lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin/_/rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni/_/'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi/_/ci 'dod las de grub par 'gyur/_/sngags ni yi ge ra~M dang hrIH/_mdog ni 
[\[255b.6\]]dmar smug 'od po che/_/phyogs bcu khyab cing hrI la bsdu/_/dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod/_/hrIH/_rdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis/_/phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab 'byam kun/_/dpal dang gzi byin tshe la sogs/_/pad+ma 'bar ba de bsdus nas/_/sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam 
[\[255b.7\]]pa dang /_/gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs/_/ci 'dod las rnams dbang du 'gyur/_/lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/_/hrIH/_'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/skad cig yud la dbang du bsdus/_/dbang du ma gyur 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gang yang med/_/hrIH/_sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/_dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di 
[\[256a.2\]]dag nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar/_/'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug_/bsod nams zhing 'gyur mchog tu 'bar/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang bar bsgom/_/rdo rje rin po che yis bskor/_/rgyal 
[\[256a.3\]]ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam//trA~M/_ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar/_/dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor/_/gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs dang /_/khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste/_/'od chen dkar po 'bar ba dang /_/phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang sgyur/_/
[\[256a.4\]]lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bskor/_/mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang /_/dkar la dri zhim shing rnams dang /_/gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis/_/dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul/_/bdag nyid rin chen rab 'bar nas/_/trA~M/_dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar/_/
[\[256a.5\]]khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te/_/mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/pA sha hoHdang dzaHhU~M gis/_/phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste/_/dbyings su thim par 'od 'phro bsgom/_/thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/_/gzhan nas yod pa'ang ma yin te/_/sgyu ma'i 
[\[256a.6\]]ye shes brtan pa yin/_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni/_/rin chen dbyings la rdo rje 'bar/_/dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis 'khor bar bskor/_/gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis/_/phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul/_/yon tan rgyal ba'i zhing dang mnyam/_/
[\[256a.7\]]trA~M/_glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun/_/mchod yon rin chen dpal 'phel gyis/_/phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas/_/rdo rje dbyings kyis rgyas par rol/_/hoHtrA~M/_nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]khams 'di rab 'byam kun/_/skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de/_/rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos 
[\[256b.2\]]thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus mtha' med/_/bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yin/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/_/bde gshegs nyid la mi zhen shar/_/o~M/_dkyil 
[\[256b.3\]]'khor zlum por 'bar ba las/_/'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing /_/'od ni ser por rab tu 'bar/_/rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs/_/bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/sa bon yi ge oM ser te/_/me lha spyan drang 
[\[256b.4\]]snga ma bzhin/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams/_/kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang /_/'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang /_/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan/_/gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu/_/
[\[256b.5\]]phyogs bcu gnas pa de dag tu/_/tsakra lcags kyus bkug nas su/_/dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim byas nas/_/gtum 'khrug gdug pa ma rungs pa/_/lhan ne lhang nge zhi bar 'gyur/_/o~M gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba 
[\[256b.6\]]yi/_/o~M dang seng ge mgos bskor te/_/brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun/_/rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya/_/rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar/_/rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang /_/byang chub mchog 'bar lhan ner bsgom/_/mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo/_/gzhan 
[\[256b.7\]]yang 'gro drug ma lus kun/_/zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/gar dang glu yis mchod byas te/_/phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa/_/gdug pa'i yid ni rnam bor nas/_/lha dkar po yi 'od du 'gyur/_/bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar/_/gti mug rdo rje 'khor 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de/_/zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[257a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/_/khros 
[\[257a.3\]]pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/_/bkug nas rdo rje phur pas btab/_/rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul/_/e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel 
[\[257a.4\]]bsdams nas/_/bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo/_/myos nas gal te tshig par 'gyur/_/ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la/_/chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas 
[\[257a.5\]]lnga la/_/mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/_/rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab/_/chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/_/ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams/_/'gugs 'gyur ci yang phyi bzhin 'brang /_/ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 
[\[257a.6\]]'gyur/_/ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags/_/nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur 
[\[257a.7\]]pas gdab/_/rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul/_/ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams na/_/gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/_/yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur/_/ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/gsal ba'i gzi 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]brjid 'tsher ba la/_/dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/gtum chen rngam po'ang lhan ner 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i ngo bor brtag_/lhan ne gsal ba'i phur bas gdab/_/'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul/_/ya yi tshogs 
[\[257b.2\]]kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams/_/'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlabs/_/thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin/_/gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas/_/gang 'dod las de byed 
[\[257b.3\]]par bsgom/_/sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/_/shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can/_/thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/_/dbang dang byin brlabs rmad po che/_/lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas/_/'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas/_/so so'i las rnams bskos pa 
[\[257b.4\]]de/_/ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i/_/ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung /_/dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/_/ji ltar rang gis mna' bor ba'i/_/sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed/_/dam tshig de las 'das gyur na/_/mgo lus snying yang tshal ba bdun/_/yak+Sha khro 
[\[257b.5\]]bos gtubs par 'gyur/_/de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis/_/ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos/_/las de mngon du ma byas na/_/rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin/_/rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/_/rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i/_/las 
[\[257b.6\]]rnams yongs su bya ba dang /_/'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs/_/phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob/_/bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos/_/zhes bsgo'o/_/khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no/_/khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i/_/bro gar glu 
[\[257b.7\]]tshig chen pos ni/_/thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/_/mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/_/'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/_/sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/lhan ner 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'dod na thim par byed/_/rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed/_/seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/thams cad kun du za bar byed/_/rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/_/bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/_/bro 
[\[258a.2\]]gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/thams cad kun du za bar byed/_/kun la rab tu nyams par byed/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo yi/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/spod cing gtong bar byed pa ste/_/thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/_ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal/_/sdong gcig 
[\[258a.3\]]dang ni me reg tu/_/dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang /_/khros pas ka li rab tu bya/_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes 
[\[258a.4\]]bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yid dang /_chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang /_shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus/_yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so/_/thabs 
[\[258a.5\]]thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'dus/_rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/_thams cad dbyings dang /_dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas/_tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de/_don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no/_/thams cad ma lus mi 
[\[258a.6\]]lus shing /_/mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de/_/de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang /_/thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin/_/de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang /_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas 
[\[258a.7\]]gyur pas/_/ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur/_/shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin/_/de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste/_/rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas/_/'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]par sbyor/_/'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod/_/gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/_/nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa/_stong dang mi stong mi 
[\[258b.2\]]gnas de bzhin nyid du 'dus/_/rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro/_/'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang /_/mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa/_/skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog_/
[\[258b.3\]]ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gis gsal/_/thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen ngang du bsdus/_/phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang /_/zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun/_/skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyis 
[\[258b.4\]]su yang dag 'ub/_/mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa/_/ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas/_/ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs/_/lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 
[\[258b.5\]]'bras spyod/_/mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan/_/'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad/_/a ho/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sa bcu gnyis dang /_thabs kyis mchog dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[258b.6\]]ma lus par yid dang /_chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang /_/'bru lnga 
[\[258b.7\]]gnas pa'i byang chub ste/_/o~M dang mU~M du 'brel pa yi/_/byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung /_/spyir na brjod pa thams cad kyang /_/kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a/_/skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga/_/de ni byang chub sems yin te/_/dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba/_/
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa/_/zad med rin chen gter yin te/_/mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags/_/e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa/_/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/_/nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba/_/kun la khyab cing
