[\[259a.2\]]sna tshogs sprin/_/bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab/_/byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/_/yon tan mi zad gter du gyur/_/ho/_ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/_/dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le'i ngang /_/ye shes dbyings nyid 
[\[259a.3\]]gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul/_/snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas/_/ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dam pa ni/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas/_/dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas 
[\[259a.4\]]shing /_/mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs mchog gi gnas/_/rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus/_/ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus/_/chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug_/ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la/_/ma 
[\[259a.5\]]chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan/_/thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis/_/dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor/_/chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong /_/nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/_/rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang /_/dngos po med 
[\[259a.6\]]dbyings skad cig ma/_/de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam/_/phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste/_/ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog_/thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas/_/a ho/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/_/
[\[259a.7\]]nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus/_/bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus/_/lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus/_/gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te/_/a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim/_/a ho/_mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]brjod mi lang /_/mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab/_/ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab/_/ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med/_/'gro med yong med mi gnas pa'i/_/thugs rje byin brlabs rnam par 'phro/_/zhes nyid la nyid gsung ngo /_/
[\[259b.2\]]dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/_/thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal/_/dbyings su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na/_/byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus 
[\[259b.3\]]par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te/_b+h+ru~M dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/ma dang a yi dkyil 
[\[259b.4\]]'khor la/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas/_/bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te/_/de yis phyogs bcur gang bar bsgom/_/b+h+ru~M dang dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug_/sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog_/lus ngag sems la thim par bya/_/nr-i nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod/_/
[\[259b.5\]]bum pa mchog ni bzang po yi/_/tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te/_/yang nas yang du dgug bya ste/_/mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang /_/dbyings su yang ni spa bar bya/_/rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis/_/brtan zhing 'khor los dgag par bya/_/snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim/_/sangs 
[\[259b.6\]]rgyas thams cad ma lus kun/_/rgyal po tshe dpag med pa bsgom/_/sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la/_/rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang /_/yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog_/rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang /_/gzhan yang 'gro ba'i 
[\[259b.7\]]don bya ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog_/bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na/_/tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/_/sgra skad drag po bton nas ni/_/thams cad ma lus thul bar bya/_/dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur/_/
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang /_/tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub chen dang /_/thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis/_/ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed/_/tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma/_/dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar/_/phyag na rin chen gang ba yi/_/phyag rgya sna 
[\[260a.2\]]tshogs cir yang bsgyur/_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/_/gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la/_/phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no/_/de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med/_/yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di/_/rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar/_/sngags bzlas cho ga bar ma 
[\[260a.3\]]gcod/_/'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya/_/o~M o~M o~M o~M o~M/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_swA~M swA~M swA~M swA~M swA~M/_A~MHA~MHA~MHA~MHA~MH/_hA~M hA~M hA~M hA~M hA~M/_brU~M brU~M brU~M brU~M brU~M/_bA bA bA bA bA/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_A A A A A/_yu yu yu yu yu/_sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a a a 
[\[260a.4\]]a a/_o/_tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na/_/bder gshegs la yang tshe dpag med/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/_/phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis/_/'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas/_/'gro lnga 
[\[260a.5\]]tshe rnams dbang du bsdu/_/phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis/_/'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas/_/gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste/_/snying po lnga la bstim par bya/_/phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis/_/steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te/_/dbang phyug lha chen 
[\[260a.6\]]la sogs dang /_/bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las/_/nr-i tshe rab tu dgug par bya/_/'khor lo'i 'bru la bstim nas ni/_/de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de/_/nr-i yi gnas lngar bstim par bya/_/o~M o~M badzra ka pa tsa badzra rak+Sha hU~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/_
[\[260a.7\]]phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste/_/'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste/_/'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim/_/oM/_yid bzhin bum pa'i rin po che/_/rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan/_/rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang /_/'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar lnga/_/sngags 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas/_/yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom/_/rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas rigs kyi bu de yis/_/yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas/_/mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/
[\[260b.2\]]mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod 
[\[260b.3\]]pa 'di brjod do/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings/_/kun du bzang po thugs rje'i ngang /_/sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs/_/mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis/_/rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te/_/o~M dang mU~M du 'byor par bsgom/_/thams 
[\[260b.4\]]cad dbyings su thim par bsgom/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang /_/thig le man+t+ra de dag tu/_/nr-i thal man+ta bzang po'i thig_/rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang /_/rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang /_/'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yis/_/rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum 
[\[260b.5\]]bri/_/dkyil 'khor rgyu dang ldan par bya/_/mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par dbul/_/ya~M/_dud ka'i ye shes 'od 'phros nas/_/a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/dzaHlas lcags kyu grangs med pas/_/de yis snying du zhugs par bya/_/ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[260b.6\]]'khor du/_/dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis/_/gang dgug de yi snying ga nas/_/drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/_/ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis/_/gang dgug de yi snying ga nas/_/drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/_/sngags 'di 
[\[260b.7\]]rab tu brjod par bya/_/o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M ho/_a nr-i pra du/_ming pra be sha/_ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya/_/lag gnyis sor mo spyir bsnol te/_/khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni/_/srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis/_/bar du mthe bo de drangs te/_/o~M ming pra be sha 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]A A/_/thal ba yungs kar drag tu rdeg_/ming de khong du zhugs par bya/_/babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcing /_/gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni/_/lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa/_/lha zhig na ni mchod par bya/_/gdon zhig na ni tsan+dan gur gum 
[\[261a.2\]]bsres nas ni/_/de blud sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya/_/o~M badzra d+ha ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_gal te smra ru mi btub na/_/lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te/_/khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar/_/gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtug_/sngags o~M badzra b+hA Sha bi dze pra be sha 
[\[261a.3\]]hU~M hU~M zhes lan mang du bzlas pas/_/ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'/_/bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam/_/lce yi thor to a dkar po/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du/_/o~M dzaHd+hIHdmar po bsgom byas na/_/gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid TAk+ki hU~M 
[\[261a.4\]]bsgoms la/_/a dang nr-i la sogs pa yi/_/lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung /_/o~M TAk+ki hU~M dang rang sngags kyis/_/lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya/_/pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya/_/gzhan yang dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHste/_/gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa de ni/_/byis pa lo grangs 
[\[261a.5\]]bcu gnyis pa/_/gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya/_/thig le bum pa me long 'bar/_/gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad ni/_/smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs/_/phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo sder/_/dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug_/dzaHhU~M/_dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu/_/
[\[261a.6\]]bcol cing bya ba de bzhin no/_/TAk+ki hU~M dzaHsa mi btub na/_/ha ya grI ba gnas dang yul/_/zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni/_/drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug_/srog gi snying po ma nor bar/_/gzir cing drag tu drang bar bya/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/dgug 
[\[261a.7\]]pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung /_/nem nur med par dgug par bya/_/bya ba sna tshogs las zin na/_/sngar byas bum pa lnga po la/_/sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga/_/rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang /_/gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung /_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]o~M badzra a mr-i ta a a a/_o~M ma hA badzra a mr-i te phaT/_dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do/_/o~M bud d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA zhes bzlas/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der/_/ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod/_/ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig_/yang nas yang du mngon 
[\[261b.2\]]gsal du/_/byang chub mchog gis rtag sgoms shig_/de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/brda phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob/_/ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do/_/pra dbab pa'i le'u 
[\[261b.3\]]ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//_//dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hI shwa ri dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas/_byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros nas/_/'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang /_dbang po dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i yang 
[\[261b.4\]]rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_sde dpon dang /_'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/_'jigs byed chen mo rnams da ltar dang /_dus phyi ma'i dus su la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos/_la la ni longs spyod 
[\[261b.5\]]'phel bar bskos/_la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/_la la ni gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/_la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bskos/_la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/_la la ni 
[\[261b.6\]]nyams shing rmongs par bskos/_la la ni bskams shing 'phro bar bskos/_gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par bskos nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/_/'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du sdud/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs 
[\[261b.7\]]kyis/_/'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/'di ni rang byung lha yi lha/_/byams dang snying rje ldan par rol/_/thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/_/thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]yang /_/bag chags sogs par mi 'gyur te/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs/_/thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par/_/gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med/_/de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir/_/rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal 
[\[262a.2\]]gnas/_/de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang zhi ba de dag gang la goms par bsgom/_ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang /_rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to/_/lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir lcags kyu zhags 
[\[262a.3\]]pa s+pho Ta ba~M/_ma hA de bA hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_lha yi dbang po'i snying ga nas/_/yang nas yang du rnam par drang /_/ma ma trag sha ma hA de ba gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M/_lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar/_/lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan/_/gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar/_/
[\[262a.4\]]lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni/_/yid bzhin rin chen bum chu gsol/_/yon tan rin chen sna lnga ste/_/lha rnams kun gyi re ba skong /_/btsun mo ut+ma ta gnas pa/_/rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan/_/bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang /_/lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul/_/
[\[262a.5\]]lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu/_/srog dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya/_/mdun nas dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa drang /_/rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/_/je nye je nye gnyis med par/_/lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas/_/ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug_/lha chen 'khor bcas thams cad 
[\[262a.6\]]kyang /_/de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur/_/gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so/_/byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun/_/rigs sngags 'chang 
[\[262a.7\]]gi dngos grub tu/_/rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus/_/bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka/_/gong don byung ba bzhin du bsgom/_/lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing /_/lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom/_/bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par/_/yang 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dag don du gsal bar bsgom/_/de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung /_/gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/_/mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan/_/lag g.yas rdo rje tri shUl la/_/lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol/_/in tra sA ya swA hA/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_tra mi ta hU~M hU~M 
[\[262b.2\]]su ra ta bag+h+ra dzAHdzA dzA hU~M hU~M/_zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas/_bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka/_'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis/_/lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drang /_/rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/_/de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas/_/las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug_/thams cad thams 
[\[262b.3\]]cad grub par byed/_/kun la 'byin cing kun la za/_/lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun/_/ma lus par ni yang dag 'du/_/bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang /_/rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni/_/bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/_/sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin/_/
[\[262b.4\]]phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te/_/'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis/_/'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus/_/d+h+r-i ta d+h+r-i ta swA hA/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na du r+thid swA hA/_ha~M ha~M ha~M/_rat+na dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_zhes snying po lan 'bum du bzlas te/_/srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya/_/
[\[262b.5\]]bdag nyid rat+na he ru ka/_/'phags skyes po yi snying ga nas/_/dzaHyis rab tu bzung nas ni/_/bdag gis mdun du dgug par bya/_/rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/_/de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang /_/gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug_/mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar/_/
[\[262b.6\]]'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu/_/yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub/_/rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni/_/bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka/_/sku mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin/_/phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te/_/snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas/_/ting 'dzin phyag 
[\[262b.7\]]rgya bsgyur rung zhing /_/lha nyid du ni gsal gyur nas/_/rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni/_/shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste/_/lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol/_/lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul/_/nub phyogs klu rnams re ba skong /_/sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ka can/_/de ni rab tu dbang bsdu phyir/_/bi rU D+ha ka swA hA/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_nA ga shi ni bi ya phag sha phag dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni/_/de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu/_/bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas/_/mig mi bzang gi snying ga nas/_/dza 
[\[263a.2\]]yis rab tu bzung nas drang /_/rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/_/de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i/_/dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang /_/ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug_/mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par/_/dbang gi las rnams grub par byed/_/rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni/_/
[\[263a.3\]]bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin/_/gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing /_/rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag bzlas/_/ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang /_/rnam thos dag ni rab tu 'grub/_/gzugs ni rin chen bai DUr+ya/_/yang na mdog ni 
[\[263a.4\]]sngo zhing 'tsher/_/phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thogs/_/g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol/_/dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes/_/bai shrang Na ye swA hA/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_ku ber/_kang kang /_yang yang /_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par/_/yang dang yang du 
[\[263a.5\]]bzlas par bya/_/bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/_/dza yis rnam thos snying nas drangs/_/dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya/_/rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/_/yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu/_/rin chen spros shing las rnams bsgrubs/_/
[\[263a.6\]]ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po bsgrub pa dang /_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i 
[\[263a.7\]]gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so/_/hU~M/_gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/_/'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/_/khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/_/mche ba zang yag za byed che ho/_/hU~M/_rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/_/thug chem ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che/_/dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho/_/hU~M/_khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal/_/'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms/_/sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho/_/hU~M/_khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po/_/khros 
[\[263b.2\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/_/dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/_/sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/_/hU~M/_bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/_/bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/_/'jigs byed chen po 
[\[263b.3\]]thig le che ho/_/hU~M/_rdo rje brag chen sra ba po/_/rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po/_/rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/_/rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho/_/zhes ched du blangs so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263b.4\]]dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal 
[\[263b.5\]]mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/_/kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i/_/thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul/_/snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/_/chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing /_/yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par/_/gang 
[\[263b.6\]]gis de ltar rig pa de/_/gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/_/snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid/_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas/_/lha spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/_/chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer 
[\[263b.7\]]med pa'i/_/mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o/_/thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i/_/de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba/_/de ni ye shes gnyis can te/_/de yis yang dag snying po mthong /_/de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa/_/shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin/_/rang bzhin 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dbyings nas 'od gsal ba/_/sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs/_/de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin/_/de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin/_/de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga/_/rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/rtogs nyid 
[\[264a.2\]]bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis/_/lha gsal dngos po med bsgoms na/_/mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul/_/rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na/_/rang bzhin med la ci yang 'grub/_/'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med/_/ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis/_/bdud 
[\[264a.3\]]dpung dkyil du ta la btsugs/_/thams cad byang chub shing bsdus te/_/gdug pa ngang gis mi dga' nas/_/ta la bcad skams yong mi gcod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin/_/bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa/_/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 
[\[264a.4\]]bsgoms te/_/ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal na/_/thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/_/kun la dbang sgyur cis mi tshugs/_/bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de/_/las mthun ji ltar snang ba bzhin/_/bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod gcig_/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong 
[\[264a.5\]]yin/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/_/chen po rags pa thabs kyis rtogs/_/so so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog_/gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin/_/kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas/_/snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun/_/de bzhin nyid las 
[\[264a.6\]]ma g.yos phyir/_/g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med/_/gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus/_/'dus nyid gnas su thibs pa yi/_/thams cad de lta bu yi ngang /_/mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs/_/de nyid sems dpa' 
[\[264a.7\]]bzhugs gnas yin/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de/_/sems dpa'i nyid dang rigs mthun pas/_/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/_/rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la/_/gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig_/sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul/_/snang ba 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]nyid ni dngos po med/_/dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston/_/phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/_/dbang po rnams sems byang chub sems/_/yul dus po de chen po yin/_/bdag rtog rnam pa khro bo yin/_/rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin/_/de sems rang rig nyid ces 
[\[264b.2\]]bya/_/thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun du bzang /_/de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin/_/gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na/_/sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs mthun pas/_/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang /_/
[\[264b.3\]]sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa/_/kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin/_/gang yang dngos po ma yin te/_/dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang /_snang ba nyid na gang yang med/_/bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang /_/dngos po med de yang dag nyid/_/de ni cis kyang mi tshugs 
[\[264b.4\]]pa'i/_/sa rdo dran med ma yin te/_/de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas/_/gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni/_/rigs mchog dam pa rgyu yin te/_/rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir/_/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/_/skyes bu blo rtsal rab 
[\[264b.5\]]ldan pas/_/kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te/_/'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang /_/byang chub sems la gnas bcas pas/_/dper na mngal dang sgo nga yis/_/mngon du ma gyur bsgribs gyur kyang /_/rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin/_/rnam rtog gzugs ni bor ma 
[\[264b.6\]]thag_/thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing /_/rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi/_/dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs/_/bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob/_/byang chub mchog la rol bar 'gyur/_/lha mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[264b.7\]]pa po/_/lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur/_/bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod/_/tha mar skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob/_/rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'gyur te/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun/_/rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed/_/bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor/_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/_/mi rtag 
[\[265a.2\]]pa yi tshul yang ston/_/nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul/_/byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul/_/bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul/_/lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings/_/kun la mthun pa'i tshul yang ston/_/rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med/_/ma g.yos 
[\[265a.3\]]bzhin du kun du ston/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/de lta bu yi ngang du gnas/_/zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/nyid la nyid de skad ces brjod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i 
[\[265a.4\]]zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/_dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du brjod 
[\[265a.5\]]pa 'di brjod do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/_/log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed/_/rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab/_/'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang /_/rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun/_/nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang /_/rang rig 'khrul 
[\[265a.6\]]pa'i rtog pa yis/_/lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab/_/de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan/_/yang dag nyid dang log rtogs nyid/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na/_/de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/_/ye nas ngo bo yod yin na/_/nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub 
[\[265a.7\]]med/_/thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur/_/kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas/_/cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/_/rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/_/don dam skye 'gag med pa ste/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/_/gnas ngan dus na log rtogs nyid/_/gzung 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na/_/bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid/_/snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis/_/cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/so so rang bzhin nges zhe na/_/yang dag lam nyid bcos su med/_/de bas yang dag blo chen gyis/_/thams cad dngos 
[\[265b.2\]]po med par bshad/_/dper na dug gi rigs shes pas/_/dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang /_/ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang /_/bsgrub na ras ya na'i sman/_/bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub/_/nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa/_/mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs pas 
[\[265b.3\]]na/_/rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang /_/gang na med de de yin te/_/nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang /_/rang dang spyi yi don brtags na/_/mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag_/so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas/_/thabs chen du 
[\[265b.4\]]ni rnam par spro/_/mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas/_/shes rab dbyings su rnam par sbyor/_/gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni/_/ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te/_/gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad/_/rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/chos dang bdag dang 
[\[265b.5\]]dngos po rnams/_/ngo bo nyid la sogs brtags pa/_/rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te/_/log rtogs spros pa'i rgyun yin la/_/thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste/_/bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag 
[\[265b.6\]]med/_/ma rig pa ni spang du med/_/rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu med/_/thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim/_/sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa ni/_/sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa/_/mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang /_/skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig_/dbyings nyid mi dmigs 
[\[265b.7\]]de bzhin nyid/_/de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che/_/mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la/_/rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang /_/chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag_/sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/_/yod med gnyis ga dbyer med pas/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/_/thugs 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste/_/mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros/_/gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/_/gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/_/de ltar gti mug spang du med/_/rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/_/zhe sdang rang dang 
[\[266a.2\]]spyir bstan pa/_/kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi/_/sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun/_/'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/_/zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsgrub med/_/chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig 
[\[266a.3\]]phyir/_/sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa/_/dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na/_/sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te/_/mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/_/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni/_/bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[266a.4\]]med/_/snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings/_/mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid do/_/thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin/_/kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya/_/mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar/_/rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te/_/chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs te/_/
[\[266a.5\]]chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs phyir/_/don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/_/thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa/_/'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/_/gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/_/zhe sdang spyi yi 
[\[266a.6\]]mtshan nyid ni/_/yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na/_/rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de/_/gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med/_/nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_/khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa/_/pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad 
[\[266a.7\]]pa ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/_/nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med/_/chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas/_/kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying nyid/_/de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te/_/chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying bar skyes/_/skye 'gying nyid na 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]chos nyid de/_/'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag_/'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir/_/chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying /_/'gying bas zil gyis gnon pa nyid/_/chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te/_/sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med 
[\[266b.2\]]phyir/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/_/thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni/_/nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab/_/gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rnam par byang 
[\[266b.3\]]ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/zhi ba sgrub nga rgyal spang du med/_/'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/_/srid pa kun la zhen pa ste/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/_/chags spangs ma chags bsgrub tu med/_/chos kyi dbyings su ro 
[\[266b.4\]]gcig phyir/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/_/'dod cing chags pa sgyu ma sred/_/mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir/_/mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/_/chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir/_/mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/_/spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig 
[\[266b.5\]]phyir/_/chos nyid chos can dmigs su med/_/rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i/_/chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin/_/mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod cing chags/_/'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te/_/sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/_/bden pa gnyi gar 
[\[266b.6\]]dbyer med gcig_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/_/thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags spros pa ni/_/'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan/_/rnam par byang 
[\[266b.7\]]ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas/_/'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med/_/phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/_/gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la/_/sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan/_/thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/_/phrag dog spang zhing yangs bsgrub med/_/chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/_/phrag dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/_/mi dmigs 
[\[267a.2\]]pa las mi gzhan te/_/mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi/_/thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pas/_/chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum 
[\[267a.3\]]la/_/phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang /_/rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te/_/sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med pa'i/_/bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur na/_/thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la/_/phrag 
[\[267a.4\]]dog rnam par spros pa ni/_/gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/_/gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/_/phrag dog rang dang spyi bstan pa/_/rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/_/dog pa spang zhing yangs bsgrub med/_/sems can rnam pa mang po kun/_/nang gi chen po lnga 
[\[267a.5\]]sogs bstan/_/rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/_/thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas/_/ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin/_/de ltar nges par ci mthong na/_/sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad/_/kun la gnod par byed mi nus/_/de bzhin thabs dang shes 
[\[267a.6\]]rab rtogs/_/dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur/_/thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/_/lam gyi dge spyad stegs bcas kyang /_/mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes/_/skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob/_/thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni/_/mtshams med sems can ma 
[\[267a.7\]]lus kun/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad/_/bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob/_/ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te/_/snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag_/gang phyir byang chub 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]sems de ni/_/rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal/_/nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs/_/ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs/_/chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/_/'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/_/nyon mongs 
[\[267b.2\]]thams cad byang chub rgyu/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas/_/de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/_/mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin/_/
[\[267b.3\]]gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/_/thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub/_/bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med/_/don dam cir yang ma grub la/_/sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni/_/nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol/_/thabs chen dag 
[\[267b.4\]]gis ma zin na/_/dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis/_/nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang /_/rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/gnyi ga yod pa ma yin pas/_/'khor ba yongs su shes pas na/_/
[\[267b.5\]]de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'/_/nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams dag_/thabs la mkhas pas zin 'gyur yang /_/grol la thar bar mi 'gyur na/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/_/'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun/_/rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang ltung /_/
[\[267b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang /_/phal la med pas mi rung na/_/sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi/_/skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung /_/bdud rtsi dang du blang bar gsungs/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na/_/sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur/_/grub pa'i 
[\[267b.7\]]rdzas su de phyir gsungs/_/shes rab mnyam pa ma rtogs na/_/byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur yang /_/drang srong 'tsho dang rtag mthun dang /_/ji srid 'tsho yi bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa/_/de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/_/chos rnams thams cad yongs su 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]dag pa yi/_/rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon/_/rgyu rnams rang bzhin dag pa dang /_/'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te/_/rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag_/phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te/_/sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba/_/gzung ba'i 
[\[268a.2\]]yul nyid 'byung ba che/_/rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas/_/'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag_/'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni/_/sems can kun gyi rus pa ste/_/rdo rje byang chub sems yin te/_/sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin/_/dri chen dri chu gur gum chu/_/so so'i lus la gnas 
[\[268a.3\]]pas dag_/don dam dmigs med dag pas ni/_/phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang /_/gang gi ngo bo ma yin te/_/skye 'gag med pas ye nas dag_/kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang /_/chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas/_/mi 
[\[268a.4\]]dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang /_/de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam/_/de bas gtsang sme med par spyod/_/sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman/_/gtso ru dang du blang bar bya/_/de bas sems can phyin ci log_/chos rnams thams cad dag par ma shes te/_/
[\[268a.5\]]thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs/_/kha cig gis ni 'tsho ba'i bar du zos/_/kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du/_/sha spangs rtswa dang chu la zos/_/zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs/_/rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni/_/rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i 
[\[268a.6\]]phyir/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa mtshan/_/mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam spangs te/_/
[\[268a.7\]]mkhyen pas dbul la gnas mi 'gyur/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag gsungs/_/byang chub sems dang sha chen dang /_/dri chen dri chu rak+ta dag_/sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya/_/dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub/_/tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub/_/mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis/_/gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis/_/yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing /_/ye nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni/_/dus 
[\[268b.2\]]gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur/_/lha ni mi spang don nyid ni/_/lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi/_/bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i/_/dus gsum bder gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung 
[\[268b.3\]]thugs kyi rdo rje bdag po ste/_/yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don/_/dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa'i don med 'gyur/_/bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/_/yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor nas su/_/lha nyid du 
[\[268b.4\]]ni rtag tu bsgom/_/bder gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub/_/rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya/_/byang chub ston pa 'dren pa po/_/long ba dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin/_/slob dpon 
[\[268b.5\]]de la smod pa ni/_/dper na na mun khung sgron bsad na/_/mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin/_/sdug bsngal nyam thag yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon/_/de bas de la gus pa rtag tu gyis/_/lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas/_/shin tu gtso bor 
[\[268b.6\]]blang bar bya/_/drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas/_/shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya/_/rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni/_/bla med byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i/_/chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus/_/byang chub rin chen sar nges pas/_/de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni/_/rang la rang 
[\[268b.7\]]gis mtshon btab na/_/rang srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar/_/rang gis srog gcod phung bar 'gyur/_/tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa/_/mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang /_/ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i/_/sdug bsngal kha 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]brgyud myong bar 'gyur/_/yun ring rtag tu mi thar ba'i/_/shin tu nyam thag myong bar 'gyur/_/grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod/_/gnyis med dad pas rjes spyod spun/_/bder gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin/_/shes rab gsal bas 
[\[269a.2\]]rtag tu gdung /_/zhes gsungs/_gsang ba gzhan la mi bsgrags shing /_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams/_/rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas/_/mnyam pa'i spyod pas la dor te/_/phul dang mi 'dra 
[\[269a.3\]]yang dag rtogs/_/ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang /_/skye bo kun la rab tu gsang /_/gsang ba'i brda ngag sna tshogs gsungs/_/thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin/_/gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te/_/thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas kyis/_/snod ma 
[\[269a.4\]]yin dang blo rtul rnams/_/las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang /_/brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di/_/las 'phro ngan la bsgrags 'gyur na/_/dper na gtsub shing mes gtsubs nas/_/gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang /_/gzhan yang tshig par gyur pa 
[\[269a.5\]]bzhin/_/chos don bzang po me dang 'dra/_/skal ba chung zhing shes rab dman/_/blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams/_/mnyam pa nyid la skur 'debs pas/_/ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur/_/gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal rmyong 'gyur na/_/gsang ba 'phel bar 
[\[269a.6\]]byed pa yang /_/smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing /_/sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sems can don phyir gsang /_/rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/_/sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni/_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med 
[\[269a.7\]]pa'i/_/mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge o~M/_/de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/_/phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/_/sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/_/bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]che/_/gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan/_/yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te/_/goms shing brtan par bya ba yin/_/de bas bar chad brtson med na/_/dper na sa bon tshig pa las/_/'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste/_/bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[269b.2\]]khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas/_/phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la/_/dmigs med gcig dang du mar bral/_/mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med/_/mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis/_/phyogs 
[\[269b.3\]]bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang /_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med/_/gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam/_/kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med/_/mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min/_/chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par/_/snang zhing bya ba 
[\[269b.4\]]byed nus pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang /_/dus gsum khams gsum thams cad dang /_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/_/yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang /_/sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas/_/sngags 'chang rgyal por rtogs byas nas/_/
[\[269b.5\]]bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med/_/dang las ma g.yos par gnas na/_/phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang /_/rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/_/thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la/_/ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad 
[\[269b.6\]]pa'i/_/gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom/_/de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste/_/de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur/_/yan lag 
[\[269b.7\]]ma nyams sngags bzlas shing /_/'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/_/lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na/_/byang chub rab 'byam thob par 'gyur/_/dam tshig chen po las 'das na/_/nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]sngags kyi spyod pa don bsgrub pa/_/rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na/_/de mi srog kyang der zad 'gyur/_/dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags bzlas dang /_/phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa bzhi/_/brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas gzung /_/rnal 'byor brtson 
[\[270a.2\]]'grus chung 'gyur na/_/mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs/_/ji ltar ral gyi so la nan tan du/_/skyes bus myur du ma bzung na/_/lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur/_/de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags pa/_/'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/rnal 
[\[270a.3\]]'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni/_/sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal/_/don dam ma nyams dag byas shing /_/brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub/_/sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal/_/cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/_/tshogs na yang ni nyes 
[\[270a.4\]]pa med/_/ma tshogs na yang nyes pa med/_/ma tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang /_/'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med/_/ces gsang ba'i tshig 
[\[270a.5\]]tu'o/_/dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bco lnga mdo bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang /_spyod lam dang /_lta stangs bstan pa/_theg pa chen po lhun grub don 'dod 
[\[270a.6\]]na/_/rgya chen zab yangs shes rab myur/_/zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde/_/nga dang bdag med yangs pa bde/_/gnas su chos dbyings gnyis med bstan/_/thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams/_/thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum/_/che chung 
[\[270a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/_/g.yog 'khor lha srin sde mang gtso/_/bdag gi mtshan gzugs shin tu spags/_/chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la/_/shes rab myur du don 'gro ba/_/'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa/_/byang chub sems mchog a re 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bde/_/shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor la/_/thugs rje rol pa'i ye shes 'phyo/_/gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde/_/ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su/_/ye shes sgron ma'i mda' 'phangs nas/_/gti mug mun pa rnam bsal te/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal 
[\[270b.2\]]bde ba'i mchog_/dge dang mi dge gnyis su med/_/rnam rtog mtshan ma yod mi 'dzin/_/rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/_/dge sdig med pas shin tu bde/_/bde dang mi bde gnyis med pas/_/ye shes chags med rnam par dag_/thams cad dbyer med ye shes 
[\[270b.3\]]yin/_/sems nyid dang bas a re bde/_/rgyan du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes/_/ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi/_/phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang /_/ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde/_/longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/_/gtsang dang sme ba'i blo mi 'dzin/_/thams 
[\[270b.4\]]cad chos nyid ro gcig pas/_/gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde/_/shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin/_/'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med/_/gnyis med tshim pas a re bde/_/thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i ngang /_/
[\[270b.5\]]lta dang lta ba gnyi ga med/_/ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong /_/'di dang pha rol gnyis med phyir/_/'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min/_/yan lag stabs chen ma mchongs par/_/phyogs bcu stong khams thams cad na/_/thub 
[\[270b.6\]]mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med/_/chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/_/zag med zab pas don brtags na/_/dag par ma gyur gang yang med/_/ye shes ma bcos kun du gsal/_/
[\[270b.7\]]rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/_/ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang /_/ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis/_/gsal ba'i sgron ma bsgribs gyur te/_/khams gsum mun nag rgyun du 'khor/_/rnam rtog mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong /_/de la su zhig byed pa yod/_/yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas/_/rang la rang gis bcings par zad/_/thams cad ma lus chos so cog_/snying po yod pa ma yin te/_/sgyu ma mig yor sprul pa dang /_/smig rgyu 
[\[271a.2\]]'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul/_/de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa/_/de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad/_/sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin/_/skye med phun sum tshogs yin te/_/byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs/_/zhes nyid la nyid brjod do/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bzhugs 
[\[271a.3\]]gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so/_/rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas/_/thams cad skye shi med pa'i tshul/_/mnyam nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom/_/
[\[271a.4\]]khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug par bya/_/bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par/_/yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya/_/sku rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas/_/khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[271a.5\]]bsgom/_/mngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtong /_/thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud/_/bsgrub pa gcig gam yang na gnyis/_/gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya/_/pho nya mang pos nr-i bkug nas/_/zhing la yang nas yang du gzhug_/snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung /_/
[\[271a.6\]]de nas bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni/_/bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag_/rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum/_/de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung /_/'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya/_/zhing de ldem ldem por gyur dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga 
[\[271a.7\]]yis bskul bar bya/_/de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod/_/gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgom par bya/_/dbang po lnga dang dbang po'i tshul/_/yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i tshul/_/rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom/_/de nas zhing de 'gul 'gyur nas/_/zhing de drag tu 'gul ba dang /_/shin 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]tu zhags pas bsdam par bya/_/yan lag rnams kyang gzhum par bya/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan/_/ha ya grI ba'i skur bsgoms shing /_/sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas/_/phyogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim/_/de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas/_/rdo rje ting 
[\[271b.2\]]'dzin de yis ni/_/brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya/_/de nas par par byed pa dang /_/a nr-i bri du gang yin pa/_/rdo rje drag tu bdeg cing dbab/_/thod pa'i kha nas nr-i phyung nas/_/rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis gcad/_/rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim/_/gnyis su med par bsgom par 
[\[271b.3\]]bya/_/de nas zhing de langs pa dang /_/rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur/_/bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya/_/las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug_/zhing des rab tu smras pa'i tshig_/dpa' bo ci bgyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang /_/las rnams ma lus kun bgyid do/_/
[\[271b.4\]]de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/_/thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur/_/bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang /_/ri brags gnyen po bgegs gnas dang /_/nags khrod stong pa tsher ma can/_/ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma can/_/rab tu rnam par dben pa dang /_/gnod 
[\[271b.5\]]sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas/_/de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya/_/dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang /_/bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams/_/lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas/_/'bru rnams thams 
[\[271b.6\]]cad bcang bar bya/_/rtag tu tshogs chen mchod par bya/_/gsum dang lnga ru bar mi gcad/_/kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'/_/btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te/_/mar me rtag par gtang bar bya/_/rgyu ni nr-i yi mar las bya/_/yan lag bsku ba'ang de bzhin to/_/sdong bu 
[\[271b.7\]]pad+ma'i rgyu las bya/_/snod ni dung chen srubs med pa/_/lcang lo yod dang med kyang rung /_/de byi pu tra ma byung ba/_/mdog ni ban lang can la yod/_/rdo rje bsgrub pa bar gcod phyir/_/rtag tu mtshams ni gcad par bya/_/nr-i yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas/_/sbom po ma 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]yin phra ba nyid/_/de la ki la ya byas nas/_/phur bu'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis/_/lan 'bum du ni bzlas par bya/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la/_/khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/_/'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom/_/de nas gnyis med sbyor 
[\[272a.2\]]tshul du/_/sgrub po rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/sgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa/_/phyogs bcu rnams su mtshams kyang gcad/_/dngos grub ma thob bar du ni/_/bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum/_/bag yod mgo la me 'bar bzhin/_/bar mtshams med par bsgrub 
[\[272a.3\]]par bya/_/de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/_/lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du sdud/_/rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams/_/yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni/_/lus sbed nus nas mngon 
[\[272a.4\]]du dbyung /_/de ma yin par shin tu gsang /_/sku'i sgrub pa nges pa'i don du bka' stsal to/_/ro langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//_//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba nges par ched du brjod pa 'di 
[\[272a.5\]]brjod do/_/phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi/_/thams cad dbyer med maN+Da la'i/_/nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas la/_/pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas/_/rin chen zad med pho brang sa/_/che chung dpag tu med pa yi/_/byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la/_/bde 
[\[272a.6\]]ldan byang chub rab bkod nas/_/ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te/_/lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs dang /_/dbang po lnga yi lta spyod kun/_/phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/_/gong gi dkyil 'khor tshad nyi zla/_/mi 'khrugs pa yi sa gzhi la/_/pad+ma ma chags 
[\[272a.7\]]gdan bting nas/_/thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul/_/yan lag dbang po thams cad kun/_/rang bzhin yongs su dag pa dang /_/ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o/_/ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te/_/lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor/_/yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi 'khor/_/kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang /_/thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te/_/phyogs bcur spro zhing ngan song sbyong /_/gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor spro/_/'das dang ma 
[\[272b.2\]]'das thams cad kun/_/bder gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyor/_/yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na/_/rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo/_/'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad/_/snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag_/bzang mdzes legs pa'i gos bgos na/_/
[\[272b.3\]]'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur/_/de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar/_/ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur/_/skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/_/rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar bsgom/_/tshig tsam ma yin blo gting du/_/bdag dang dbyer med nyid du'o/_/thabs dang 
[\[272b.4\]]shes rab ldan gyur nas/_/shar gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/_/seng ge'i stabs chen mchong bar bya/_/ljags kyi yi ge tra~M bsgoms la/_/lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas dang /_/hri yang bsam gyis mi khyab spro/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/_/gsung gi 
[\[272b.5\]]dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba/_/gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab kun du grags/_/sgra dang ming tshig so sor gsal/_/ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs/_/thar dang ma thar gnyi ga brjod/_/nges pa kho na yang dag tu/_/de bzhin 
[\[272b.6\]]nyid kyis yong ma gsungs/_/sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du/_/tra~M gi yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas/_/dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi/_/mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/tra~M yang bsams pas 'od 'phro 'bar/_/phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma 
[\[272b.7\]]lus thos/_/'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos/_/sgra dang thos pa gnyis med pa'o/_/de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams/_/so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas/_/yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang /_/'gro drug ma 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]lus thams cad kun/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol/_/dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis/_/kun la tshim par yang dag mchod/_/'gro drug ma lus thams cad la/_/ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed/_/thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar 
[\[273a.2\]]ston/_/de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs/_/ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan/_/gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te/_/tshom bu gcig gam yang na gsum/_/lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te/_/thabs dang shes rab 
[\[273a.3\]]phan tshun du/_/lha gsal 'od 'phro bstim byas te/_/dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom/_/ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas/_/bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par/_/gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis/_/lta 
[\[273a.4\]]spyod ya char ma gyur par/_/dkyil 'khor dag la gsal bsgoms na/_/dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan nas/_/rkang pa'i stabs chen bskyod byas shing /_/lag gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas/_/bro dang gar gyi phyag rgyar bya/_/dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar 'phro 
[\[273a.5\]]ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag_/shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar/_/thabs dang shes rab de grub shog_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yis/_/bdud bzhi dag ni 'joms par byed/_/theg mchog rdo rje'i rig 'dzin pa/_/thabs dang shes rab de grub shog_/
[\[273a.6\]]bdag nyid rigs pa'i rdo rje yis/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal med par shog_/me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/thabs dang shes rab gsal 'gyur shog_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas/_/ma rig mun pa med par byed/_/thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bas/_/
[\[273a.7\]]thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog_/shin tu sra zhing skye shi med/_/rdo rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa/_/'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung /_/thabs dang shes rab byams ldan shog_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/yon tan phyogs su kha bstan te/_/lus bskyod 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]yan lag bsgul bsigs nas/_/stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i gter/_/zad med nor bu rin po che/_/ma lus kun gyi re ba skong /_/thabs dang shes rab de grub shog_/nam mkha'i dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa/_/yang na thams 
[\[273b.2\]]cad gser btso ma/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shes/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang /_/thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gnas nas/_/de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te/_/thabs dang shes rab mnyam 
[\[273b.3\]]'gyur shog_/bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che/_/ye nas chags med byang chub zhing /_/yang dag nyid du thams cad gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas/_/yan lag 
[\[273b.4\]]dang po bskyod byas te/_/gar rnams shin tu gsal byas nas/_/stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya/_/chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang /_/pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab de grub shog_/las dang nyon 
[\[273b.5\]]mongs nub 'gyur ba'i/_/bag chags mtshan ma rdul tsam med/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/byang chub chags med dkyil 'khor ni/_/gang nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbyings/_/mi gnas tshul gyis dbyings na bzhugs/_/thabs dang shes rab myur 
[\[273b.6\]]grub shog_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/_/byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te/_/lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing /_/phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas/_/rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya/_/yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis/_/bskal pa bsam 
[\[273b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sgrib pa thams cad byang byas te/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis/_/bdud bzhi bcom nas mi mthun bsal/_/bya byed med la don rnams grub/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa/_/sna tshogs kun du 'gyur ba'o/_/ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/thams cad ma lus don grub pa/_/las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/_/nan tan chen po bya ba rdzogs/_/
[\[274a.2\]]thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang /_/gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/bder gshegs ma lus thams cad kun/_/phyogs dus kun du bdag 
[\[274a.3\]]nyid che/_/mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag_/thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pas/_/bder gshegs kun la rnam par 'phro/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/_/bde ba'i dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bsdu/_/
[\[274a.4\]]thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi/_/nang du ma 'dus gang yang med/_/de nyid bder gshegs dkyil 'khor nyid/_/thabs dang shes rab bde grub shog_/rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbur bsdu zhing /_/ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro/_/phyogs bcu gsal 
[\[274a.5\]]bar gang gyur nas/_/thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog_/de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa yi/_/thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te/_/thams cad kun du bzang por ston/_/thabs dang shes rab gtsor grub shog_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs 
[\[274a.6\]]kyis/_/phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la/_/chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/_/thabs dang shes rab mchog 'grub shog_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/_/de bzhin nyid kyi sku yod pas/_/ma mthong rmongs la nam mkha'i mdog_/thabs dang shes 
[\[274a.7\]]rab dbyings grub shog_/sku ni sna tshogs cir yang snang /_/thabs chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul/_/nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul/_/rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul/_/pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya'i tshul/_/lha mi rnams la dge bcu tshul/_/dud 'gro rnams 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]la e na ya/_/gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la/_/ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston/_/de lta bu yi sku ston pa/_/thabs dang shes rab sku grub shog_/thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms nas/_/rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan/_/yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor bkod/_/
[\[274b.2\]]ye shes rgyan gyis pho brang brdung /_/gnyis med dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul/_/mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub tu/_/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog_/chos dbyings dam pa bdag med pa/_/mi dmigs dbyings su ma lus 
[\[274b.3\]]'dus/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas/_/thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog_/bder gshegs dkyil 'khor dbu bskyod na/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo/_/lag gi 'du byed bskul bskyod na/_/rig 'dzin zhing khams dag par byed/_/rkang 
[\[274b.4\]]chen dag gis stabs mchongs na/_/'gro drug gnas rnams stongs par byed/_/spyan gyis phyogs bcu blta byas na/_/bdud bzhi dpung rnams pham par byed/_/thabs dang shes rab ma lus kun/_/de lta bu yi don grub shog_/thams cad ma lus de bzhin te/_/de 
[\[274b.5\]]ni gang yang mi dmigs la/_/skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang /_/'ong dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med/_/rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo yi/_/sna tshogs byed la byas pa med/_/de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/rnal 'byor las rnams grub par shog_/thabs dang shes rab thams 
[\[274b.6\]]cad kyis/_/de lta bu yis longs spyod na/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/_/srid gsum 'gro rnams thams cad la/_/dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/_/lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]chos kyi bde spyad nas/_/bla med rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[274b.7\]]yis/_/dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen/_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/_/sangs rgyas zhing la dbang sgyur te/_/spyod yul kun du maN+Da la/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/rnal 'byor las su 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]rung rnams kyis/_/'di lta bu yi las rnams bya/_/'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang /_/lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang skar mi 'gyur/_/theg pa dman par yong mi skye/_/ngan song gsum du yong mi ltung /_/gnas ngan longs 
[\[275a.2\]]spyod mi bde ba'i/_/ngan pa'i sa ru yong mi ltung /_/rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur/_/tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/_/lus byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs/_/dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med/_/skad gdangs snyan cing 'gro don byed/_/bdag gi longs spyod thams 
[\[275a.3\]]cad kun/_/gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub/_/tshan po che yi mthu stobs ldan/_/'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed/_/gzhan la gnod pa yong mi byed/_/snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan/_/mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa/_/bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par spyod/_/
[\[275a.4\]]mthar ni skye shi med pa'i sa/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che/_/bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la/_/dbang sgyur spyod pa'i dngos grub thob/_/rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don/_/ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni/_/gsang don nges pa'i don ston pa/_/bla med 
[\[275a.5\]]mchog tu grub par shog_/dbyer med byang chub thor tshugs can/_/shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas/_/mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur/_/theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu/_/dkyil 'khor mi zad 'byung ba'i gter/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/byi dor ma byas 
[\[275a.6\]]shin tu gsal/_/bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang /_/sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul/_/skye shi med pa rdo rje yi/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i gter yin te/_/yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ldan/_/bla med byang chub 'grub gyur nas/_/ye shes rdo rje lhun grub 
[\[275a.7\]]shog_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig_/thams cad kun gyi ston pa po/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes/_/sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog_/de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs/_/sku gsung thugs kyang grub par shog_/rnal 'byor pa 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyis/_dus thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing bro thabs bya'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba 
[\[275b.2\]]las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan las/_/sgyu dang dra ba 'brel 'gyur nas/_/sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas/_/mthun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo /_/rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba/_/rnam rtog mthun pa'i las 
[\[275b.3\]]snang ngo /_/de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang /_/bde gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te/_/bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs/_/bla med gzugs dang rdo rje sku/_/de la sogs te sku bsam yas/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa/_/thabs kyis 'gro 'dul sku ston 
[\[275b.4\]]te/_/byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku/_/chags med zhing du sku ston cing /_/dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang /_/sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/_/rnam dag sku ston ma yin te/_/log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la/_/so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston/_/de tshe skye shi med pa'i 
[\[275b.5\]]sku/_/las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku/_/thar dang ma thar sna tshogs kyang /_/sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med/_/snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni/_/badzra zhes ni gdags pa yin/_/ji snyed sku ston bsam yas pa/_/thams cad ma lus 
[\[275b.6\]]rdo rjer bsdus/_/'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni/_/de la sogs te sku bsam yas/_/byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung /_/sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang /_/'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na/_/dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad/_/thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 
[\[275b.7\]]'khor snang /_/gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te/_/dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so/_/dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas/_/rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du/_/bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas/_/ye nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag_/'di ni 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]dngos grub mchog yin par/_/kun du rgyal gyis de skad bshad/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba/_le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las bshad de/_bod la ma 
[\[276a.2\]]'gyur zhes 'byung ngo /_/rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyor zhing dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las 
[\[276a.3\]]'di skad ces gsungs so/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni/_/mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te/_/ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung /_/mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis 
[\[276a.4\]]dbang bsgyur na/_/ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub/_/spyod yul thams cad maN+Da la/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong /_/longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing /_/ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas 'grub/_/yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/_/phyi nang snod bcud ye 
[\[276a.5\]]nas dag_/dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/_/de nas rdo rje mnyam yin no/_/dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na/_/shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom/_/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/_/shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom/_/ting 'dzin de ni goms pa 
[\[276a.6\]]dang /_/thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang /_/sprul pa'i tshul de shes par bya/_/de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas/_/de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom/_/phyi nang snod bcud hU~M du bsdu/_/gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste/_/spyir ni gang bsgom kun du 'dra/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[276a.7\]]dpa' nyid du 'du/_/yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid/_/yi ge hU~M du shin tu bsdu/_/nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par/_/yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang /_/'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang /_/slar yang hU~M la bstim par bya/_/hU~M nyid mi 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dmigs dbyings su thim/_/thim 'gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar/_/shin tu 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la/_/thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom/_/de bzhin nyid du 'dris 'gyur nas/_/a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro/_/e ma gsal bar 'byor 'gyur 
[\[276b.2\]]nas/_/nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar bsgom/_/hrI gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom/_/nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang /_/thams cad bsdu zhing phra bar bsgom/_/de bzhin yi ge hU~M gnas pas/_/mthing ga 'tsher la gnas pa 
[\[276b.3\]]yi/_/'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom/_/'od 'phro dbyings su slar bsdus nas/_/shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom/_/rdo rje 'od 'phro gsal 'bar nas/_/dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/_/de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas/_/shin tu phra zhing 'dus par 
[\[276b.4\]]bsgom/_/de bzhin gnyis med gsal 'gyur nas/_/sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom/_/de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang /_/dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom/_/gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom/_/blo yi shes rab che chung las/_/rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya/_/
[\[276b.5\]]yang na cig car bsgom par bya/_/nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu/_/chu dkyil dngas par gsal ba bzhin/_/de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des/_/ji ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub/_/mkha' la 'phyo ngang rig 'dzin gnas/_/chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung 
[\[276b.6\]]mi 'gul/_/ri brags la sogs thogs med 'dzul/_/chu la mi 'bying mes mi 'tshig_/dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/mi snang ba dang mang por sprul/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur zhing /_/tshe dang dus la bsring 
[\[276b.7\]]bstung dang /_/stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang /_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams/_/khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_/bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas/_/tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur/_/lus 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa/_/ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes/_/thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston/_/'gro ba ma lus don yang byed/_/las 
[\[277a.2\]]rnams thams cad kun byas nas/_/skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/_/mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan/_/mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub/_/bsgrub med spangs med chos kyi dbyings/_/'gro med 'ong med de bzhin 
[\[277a.3\]]nyid/_/de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas na/_/'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang /_/tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/_/las ngan kun du skye mi 'gyur/_/theg pa dman par yong mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur/_/zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/rgyud 
[\[277a.4\]]kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang bar bya brgyud dngos grub thob par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnams kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so/_/dang por 
[\[277a.5\]]de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom/_/de nas bdag gi snying gar a gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo/_/a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang /_phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom/_'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim/_ma dang a las nyi 
[\[277a.6\]]ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom/_hrI las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/_hU~M shin tu 'od 'bar bar bsgom/_snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon gang ba gcig phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom/_bzhi bcu rtsa 
[\[277a.7\]]gnyis kyi sngags dang /_yig 'bru dang /_phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/_'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/_'dug 'bru bzhis mtshams gcad/_rtag tu hom bya/_tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya/_mang po mi nus pa'i don du hom gang bgyi yang rung /_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyi ni rdo rje sems dpa'/_drag po yang rdo rje/_dbang pad+ma he ru ka/_rgyas pa rat+na he ru ka/_zhi ba bud+d+ha he ru ka/_spyan drang ba ni e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru NI ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang /_mchod pa dang ar+g+ha dbul ba ni 
[\[277b.2\]]drag po'i mgor ni/_sngags ril hU~M/_zhi ba la mgor ril a~M/_bar ma rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar/_/spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la shAn+tiM bsnan/_spyi ni la so so rang sngags rdzogs/_drag po lho/_dbang nub/_rgyas pa byang /_zhi ba shar/_spyi 
[\[277b.3\]]gang yang rung gru gsum dang thod pa kha gdangs so/_/zla gam dang /_pad+ma dang /_chags med de/_phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang /_chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /_dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /_las kyi phyag rgya dang /_thabs dang /_shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang /_lhag pa'i 
[\[277b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga mdo 'di ltar yang 
[\[277b.5\]]bshad de/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/_/thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du/_/dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te/_/don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/_/yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni/_/snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/_/mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor 
[\[277b.6\]]bas na/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod/_/'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam/_/byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas/_/bde chen mi zad gter du 'gyur/_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni/_/lus dang zas kyis 
[\[277b.7\]]bsgribs 'gyur te/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas nas gnas su 'gro/_/skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur/_/rnag khrag ngan skyugs rtag tu mthong /_/bde la spyod pa'i dbang yang med/_/rtsub cing gdug pas bsrung bar 'gyur/_/thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]ni/_/'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing /_/bder gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed/_/yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur/_/thugs rje tshul gyis khro ston zhing /_/shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jog_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yis/_/yang dag 
[\[278a.2\]]mchog gi bde ba 'grub/_/ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni/_/bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de/_/rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings su rol/_/thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang /_/kun du khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/_/shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam/_/byang chub sems 
[\[278a.3\]]dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong /_/sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur/_/thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni/_/yon tan bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te/_/nga med bdag med mi dmigs la/_/su zhig de la nga rgyal skyed/_/dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/_/shin tu rgyal 
[\[278a.4\]]ba'i khyu mchog 'grub/_/lha srin bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob/_/phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba/_/nga dang bdag med don rtogs na/_/dog dang yangs pa gnyis med de/_/bde mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub/_/phrag dog 
[\[278a.5\]]dngos po mi shes shing /_/nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su 'gro/_/gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na/_/shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la/_/dbang byar med cing gzhan 
[\[278a.6\]]dbang 'gyur/_/mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub/_/phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni/_/nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_/phyin ci log la phrag dog ste/_/thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor/_/bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/gnyis med don yang rtogs 
[\[278a.7\]]par 'grub/_/nga med bdag med dbyings su thim/_/lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur/_/yid la lha ni rtag bsgoms na/_/rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/bdag gis kun du dbang bsgyur te/_/rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyis 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bsgrub bya ba/_/sgrol dang sbyor bas mthar phyin 'gyur/_/sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin/_/rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang /_/sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor sgrol dang /_/dbang po'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang /_/thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang /_/mngon 
[\[278b.2\]]du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo/_/yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs/_/shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor/_/thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/dbyings dang dbyings su thams cad sgrol/_/rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab/_/thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/sbyor sgrol 
[\[278b.3\]]phrin las bdag la rdzogs/_/byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro/_/ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed/_/rig 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed/_/bla med zhing rnams dag par byed/_/sku gsung lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul/_/rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te/_/
[\[278b.4\]]theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod/_/zad mi shes pa'i gter yang 'grub/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku/_/thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog_/thugs rje sprul pa dpag med kyis/_/'gro drug dus gnas ma lus mkhyen/_/
[\[278b.5\]]'gro ba nyid na nyid kyi sku/_/nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen/_/'khor ba nyid ni bde gnas so/_/chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'/_/dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang 
[\[278b.6\]]bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po/_sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i 
[\[278b.7\]]ngang /_/dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i/_/brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor/_/tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman/_/grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman/_/bsil dro 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa/_/thugs rje'i byin rlabs de ltar ston/_/byin rlabs ya 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]mtshan rmad po che/_/chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/_/ji ltar bde ba'i ro myong zhing /_/myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med/_/chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[279a.2\]]gnas rnams tshar gcod cing /_/lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa yi/_/nyon mongs gnyi ga med par ston/_/gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_nga dang bdag med gnyis med pa'i/_/shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis/_/dran smra med pa'i sdug bsngal bsal/_/rmongs 
[\[279a.3\]]med sgrib pa dag par byas/_/ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis/_/bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol/_/byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing /_/thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar sgron/_/phrag dog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/_/nga dang bdag 'dzin 
[\[279a.4\]]rnams la ni/_/thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam sbyor zhing /_/dog dang yangs pa gnyi ga med/_/rgya chen yangs pa'i blo ldan pas/_/'di la mi chud gang yang med/_/thams cad yangs pa nyid du sbyor/_/lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed/_/nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i 
[\[279a.5\]]dam tshig ni/_ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa la/_/nga dang khyod ces bya ba med/_/thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste/_/gnyis med mtshan nyid bsnan du med/_/che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas/_/bya ba dag ni med par bstan/_/nga rgyal bdag med rtogs pa yis/_/dregs 
[\[279a.6\]]pa'i gnas rnams stongs par byed/_/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa/_/ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag_/so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas na/_/rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid/_/rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis/_/
[\[279a.7\]]thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor/_/ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal/_/ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing /_/nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yi/_/sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid du 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]sbyor/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/_/rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis/_/ma lus de bzhin nyid du sdud/_/sdud dang mi sdud gnyi ga med/_/yang dag kho na nyid du'o/_/bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad ma lus rnam par dag_/nyid kyi dbyings 
[\[279b.2\]]las mi gzhan phyir/_/bde dang mi bde gnyis ka med/_/thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste/_/ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang btsan par/_/yang dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs/_/bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med/_/de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du/_/dus bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i 
[\[279b.3\]]dam tshig ni/_gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog_/thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor/_/'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang /_/'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i/_/ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/_/dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi/_/
[\[279b.4\]]mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor/_/lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste/_/ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos/_/ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/byang chub lam chen 'di yin te/_/thams cad 
[\[279b.5\]]dbyer med nyid du 'dus/_/byang chub don sgrub ye nas rdzogs/_/mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim/_/rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_theg pa che mchog rigs su nges/_/rigs te byang chub bstan pas gzung /_/thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes na/_/
[\[279b.6\]]rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin/_/skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med/_/las dang las kyi bag chags med/_/cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms/_/skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin/_/byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni/_phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu 
[\[279b.7\]]med pa'i/_/snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su thim/_/mdor na zhing khams ma lus par/_/yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi/_/ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams/_/zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/gsang sngags chen po grub 'dod pas/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob/_/chos kyi dbyings dang sems 
[\[280a.2\]]can ni/_/gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig_/de ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni/_/rdo rje bzhugs gnas yin par bshad/_/mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis/_/so so yod pa ma yin te/_/nyon mongs 
[\[280a.3\]]gnyen pos bcos su med/_/thams cad dbyings su ro gcig pas/_/de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med/_/cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med/_/mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin/_/nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog_/gzhal yas khang brtan zhes bya ba'i 
[\[280a.4\]]dam tshig ni/_phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun/_/rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba ni/_/dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med/_/sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan/_/ye shes rgyu las grub pa'o/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/zag pa zad las grub pa 
[\[280a.5\]]yi/_/nams kyang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings/_/sna tshogs kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_gdol pa can gyi chos min pas/_/ci ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub/_/rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na/_/stong par bya 'am mi stong bya/_/thams cad dbyer med ngang 
[\[280a.6\]]yin pas/_/kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che/_/thams cad khyab par yungs 'bru'i tshul/_/bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o/_/'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ma rig log rtog bsam yas kyis/_/'jig rten khams rnams bsam yas 
[\[280a.7\]]pa/_/'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/_/yang dag byang chub sems rig na/_/ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag_/nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste/_/thams cad ma lus bde gnas so/_/lam lnga ston byed ces bya ba'i dam 
[\[280b\]]
