[\[280b.1\]]tshig ni/_ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te/_/nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas/_/lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin/_/rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med/_/gnyis med de ni yang dag lam/_/thabs dang shes rab ngang nyid du/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag rtogs 
[\[280b.2\]]bya zhing /_/bla na med pa ston par bya/_/yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang /_/de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang /_/sems can blo yi rim pa bzhin/_/so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal/_/'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste/_/
[\[280b.3\]]rgya mtsho klung du chu 'bab bzhin/_/thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid/_/theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa/_/rab tu rtogs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_shes rab blo chen rab ldan pas/_/don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/_/srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su/_/thugs 
[\[280b.4\]]rje snyoms pa bsam mi khyab/_/don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston/_/mi mthun zhags pa 'khor ba gcod/_/bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed/_/thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus/_/sgyur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rang rig ye shes 
[\[280b.5\]]dbang thob nas/_/dkar po tshon gyis mdog sgyur bzhin/_/dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang /_/de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste/_/'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal thar byed lam/_/thar dang ma thar gnyis med na/_/thams cad ma lus 
[\[280b.6\]]byang chub rgyu/_/mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang /_/log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/_/sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam/_/mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/_/ye shes 
[\[280b.7\]]gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs/_/dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med/_/thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/_/spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen/_/de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la/_/gnyis 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]su med pas dbang bsgyur te/_/ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing /_/thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur/_/ye nas dngos po med pa la/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/rig 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_shes rab rnam 
[\[281a.2\]]gsum goms byas nas/_/ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te/_/rtag tu yangs pa chen po bsgom/_/rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi/_/rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste/_/tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin/_/brgya brgya dag tu bsnur zhing gnas/_/lus ma bor bar 
[\[281a.3\]]sangs rgyas pa'o/_/zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_shes rab chen po rnam dag pas/_/spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur/_/shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med/_/de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas/_/zad med 
[\[281a.4\]]rin chen gter du 'gyur/_/mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog_/'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab/_/bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi/_/dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med 
[\[281a.5\]]pa'i/_/de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i rigs/_/thams cad gnyis su med pa la/_/bsgrub dang sgrub pa yod ma yin/_/ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la/_/de la lam gyis bcos su med/_/thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang /_/
[\[281a.6\]]phyin ci log gi blo log nas/_/log rtog gnas na longs spyod pa/_/ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab/_/'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/_/nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas/_/byang chub lam chen rtogs par 
[\[281a.7\]]ston/_/gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/ming dang tshig tu brtags nas ston/_/ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang /_/rdo rje gsung la spros pa med/_/spros med de ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/kun du brda 'jal 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ye shes gsung /_/sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/_/thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o/_/bsgyur ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/_/snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/_/de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te/_/thams 
[\[281b.2\]]cad ye shes dbyings su bstim/_/zad med ye shes gter ldan pas/_/thugs rje byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/so sor don rtogs rnam par dag_/thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[281b.3\]]'bum phrag dang /_/'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la/_/gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang /_/sngon gyi thugs rje byin brlabs kyis/_/thar dang ma thar gnyi ga la/_/so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis/_/thar pa bskul zhing ngan song 
[\[281b.4\]]sbyong /_/rang rig dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/de na ji snyed yod pa yi/_/mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang /_/rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 
[\[281b.5\]]'khor dang /_/sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang /_/ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul/_/yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i/_/brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni/_/gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi/_/chos rnams thams cad ye 
[\[281b.6\]]nas dag_/thams cad thugs su gyur pas na/_/sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min/_/thugs la thugs ni mi gnas pa'o/_/bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag_/phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/_/bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor 
[\[281b.7\]]te/_/skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas/_/bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis/_/dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom/_/ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de/_/chos kyi dbyings su thams cad thim/_/stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/_/'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi khyab/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi/_/thams cad gdul bya chud ma zos/_/ngan song 
[\[282a.2\]]sbyong zhing byang chub zhing /_/ye shes rdzogs chen kun tu ston/_/ye shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/_/yang dag shes pas rab brtags na/_/rang bzhin med la cir yang snang /_/snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de/_/
[\[282a.3\]]de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni/_/kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can/_/thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang /_/'di ni ye shes gas gsung mchog yin/_/bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/mtha' dang dbus 
[\[282a.4\]]med kun du khyab/_/khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung /_/sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa dang /_/dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra/_/ji ltar pi bang lag thogs na/_/sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang /_/dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid/_/phyogs dus dbyer med ces 
[\[282a.5\]]bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad dang /_/dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun/_/phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/so sor snang ba thams cad kun/_/rang rig rgyal 
[\[282a.6\]]por yang dag 'du/_/rang rig de nyid thams cad yin/_/'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin/_/'dus byas snang dang mi snang gnyi ga min/_/yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de/_/rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi/_/
[\[282a.7\]]ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal/_/'jig dang gzhig par bya ba min/_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag_/ces gsungs so/_/de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang /_/'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku/_/rtog pa can la 'khor ba'i lus/_/so sor 'tsham par don ston cing /_/ston pa nyid la dngos po med/_/chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang /_/kun la de ltar rtogs par byos/_/lhun grub bde gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma 
[\[282b.2\]]lus thams cad la/_/byang chub snying po yod pa ltar/_/rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/_/byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus/_/phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun/_/bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na/_/bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas/_/spyod yul thams cad smon 
[\[282b.3\]]mi dgos/_/che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas/_/thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te/_/gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas/_/thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin/_/thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas/_/bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba 
[\[282b.4\]]min/_/de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas/_/thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go/_/chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyi nang snod bcud bdag rnams la/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas/_/chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad 
[\[282b.5\]]ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i/_/de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te/_/thams cad kun nas 'khyil bar gnas/_/zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_zag 
[\[282b.6\]]bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra/_/sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni/_/zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi/_/mang po spros pas 'phro mi 'gyur/_/nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min/_/zad med rin chen gter yin pas/_/thams 
[\[282b.7\]]cad kun la khyab pa'o/_/rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/ye nas rnam par dag pa la/_/rnam rtog rkyen gyis glo bur du/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rar gnas/_/rang rig sgrib med dag pa yis/_/mya ngan 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]'das dang 'khor ba gnyis/_/rang bzhin med par don rtogs na/_/sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag_/gzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyin ci log tu rnam brtags na/_/bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang /_/de la 'dzin pa 
[\[283a.2\]]gnyis zhugs nas/_/rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang /_/yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/_/dngos po thams cad stong pa yin/_/dngos dang dngos nyid mi gnas pa/_/de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin/_/yum 'gyur dbyings phyug ma'i dam tshig 
[\[283a.3\]]ni/_'byung ba lnga la brten 'gyur na/_/thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas/_/skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin/_/thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin/_/de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis/_/le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod/_/de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs 
[\[283a.4\]]gyur na/_/bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas/_/chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun/_/rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga dag_/rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin no/_/'bras bu rnam par 
[\[283a.5\]]dag pa yi/_/'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/_/snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/_/de nyid chos sku chen po yin/_/sems can don byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_byang chub sems su don gcig pas/_/rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung /_/thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa 
[\[283a.6\]]spyod/_/nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed/_/nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang /_/phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin/_/der rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o/_/rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang /_/sgyu ma mig yor 
[\[283a.7\]]tshul shes pa/_/gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus/_/de nyid yang dag yin par bshad/_/sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni/_/yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin/_/ming tshig sgra la mi rten par/_/blo yi gting du go bar bya/_/sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]thams cad ma lus chos so cog_/sems nyid las ni gzhan na med/_/sems dang chos su dbyer med pas/_/byang chub lam de ring ba min/_/gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/_/rtog med rang rig kho na tsam/_/sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas/_/
[\[283b.2\]]brjod med spros med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang /_/so so'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa/_/ba spu tsam yang brjod pa med/_/bsod nams chen pos bstangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas zhing nyid 
[\[283b.3\]]dag pa'o/_/las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas/_/de nyid dbyings las spros pa med/_/mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rnam dag sku gsung sprul ba dang /_/che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang /_/byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te/_/snang 
[\[283b.4\]]ba nyid na dbyings su 'ub/_/phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis/_/khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor/_/de nyid log rtogs sna tshogs snang /_/de las ma gtogs gang yang med/_/ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_blo med byang chub smon mi 
[\[283b.5\]]dgos/_/'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun/_/ye nas byang chub snying por gnas/_/de bzhin dbyings kyis kun du khyab/_/ji lta ba yi ngang gnas la/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas/_/gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na/_/su zhig bcos shing su yis 
[\[283b.6\]]rtogs/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/rang rig ye nas dag pa yi/_/sus kyang ma bcos ngang gis gsal/_/ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi/_/ye shes can gyi spyod yul de/_/kun dang thun mong de 
[\[283b.7\]]ma yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de/_/skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs/_/thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa/_/zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/_/bdag dang bdag gi med pa 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]yi/_/shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung /_/chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na/_/sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/rang rig ye shes don rtogs na/_/skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/_/byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_gzung 'dzin bral ba'i 
[\[284a.2\]]ye shes kyis/_/chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing /_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur/_/bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te/_/theg pa dman dang phyin ci log_/thams cad 
[\[284a.3\]]mnyam pa'i dbyings su dgod/_/phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang /_/rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang /_/snang ba nyid na dbyer med de/_/mtha' dang dbus med zlum po yi/_/de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang /_/mtha' 
[\[284a.4\]]dang dbus med du ma min/_/gang du mi 'gro kun du khyab/_/kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o/_/thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing /_/thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na/_/mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste/_/
[\[284a.5\]]kun du zad med rin chen gter/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste/_/rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid/_/mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan/_/thabs gnyis shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun/_/
[\[284a.6\]]thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te/_/thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/_/sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyis ka med/_/sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang /_/snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/_/de nyid shes rab yin par bshad/_/rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o/_/shes rab 
[\[284a.7\]]nyid la thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las/_/rol ba sna tshogs cir yang 'byung /_/'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med/_/med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang /_/thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung /_/mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]shes rab kyis/_/shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos/_/kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis/_/gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na/_/gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros na/_/kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po/_/
[\[284b.2\]]de yis ma byas gang yang min/_/kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min/_/shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig_/bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na/_/gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur/_/thams cad sbyor byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ye nas lha dang lha mo yin/_/
[\[284b.3\]]dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang /_/dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o/_/phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/_/'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor/_/dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor/_/rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o/_/thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig 
[\[284b.4\]]par sbyor/_/yang na shes rab dbyings ma la/_/bder gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la/_/bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te/_/gnyis su med par ldan par bya/_/rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas/_/byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro/_/phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa 
[\[284b.5\]]dang /_/'gro ba mang po bde thob nas/_/slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim/_/thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar/_/bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs/_/phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs/_/bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs/_/
[\[284b.6\]]thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na/_/ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub/_/'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin/_/sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin/_/sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus bsgral/_/thams cad ma lus par sgrol byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa/_/
[\[284b.7\]]gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/_/bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa yis/_/dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya/_/shin tu khro bo chen po yis/_/thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar/_/chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral/_/
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas/_/thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya/_/ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la/_/gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/_/thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te/_/ye shes me 
[\[285a.2\]]chen bsgom byas na/_/thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya/_/dbyings su yang ni bstim byas te/_/de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlabs/_/rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur/_/de ltar bsgral ba kun byas kyang /_/bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med/_/phung po lnga 
[\[285a.3\]]po bshig pa la/_/bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zha/_/ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin/_/rnam shes med pas bsad byas na/_/gnas pa nyid na dngos po med/_/sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang /_/sus kyang mi zin 
[\[285a.4\]]sod pa med/_/'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na/_/rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun/_/phyin ci log las bzlog byas te/_/ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te/_/byang chub zhing la dgod par bya/_/de tsam la ni bsgral zhes 
[\[285a.5\]]gdags/_/bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas/_/byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na/_/gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin/_/thabs nyid shes rab shes rab nyid thabs te/_/gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems so/_/
[\[285a.6\]]sbyor ba ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_dbang po yul dus sbyor ba dang /_chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang /_so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang /_dbang po yul dus lha dang lha mor sbyor ba dang /_rtag chad mu bzhi khro bo 
[\[285a.7\]]khro mor sbyor ba dang /_mngon sum du sbyor ba'o/_/sgrol ba ni thabs kyis sgrol ba dang /_'pho bas bsgral ba dang /_dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral ba dang /_thams cad ma lus par dbyings su dus gcig bsgral ba dang /_thams cad thugs rje chen pos gnyis su 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]med par sgrol ba'o/_/'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de/_ya char ma gyur par bya'o/_/dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad do/_/ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'jig rten 
[\[285b.2\]]'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med/_/rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa/_/kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang /_/spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med/_/thams cad ye nas stong pa la/_/gang gis len 
[\[285b.3\]]cing gang la spyod/_/snang srid ma lus thams cad la/_/thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang /_/bcing par mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs/_/chags med ye shes chen po yin/_/ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings/_/de ltar rang rig yin par bshad/_/gnyis 
[\[285b.4\]]su med par rtogs gyur na/_/blangs pa nyid na kun du bzang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/ye nas dngos po yod ma yin/_/rang bzhin ngang gis 'od gsal la/_/ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyis/_/ming dang 
[\[285b.5\]]tshig la dngos po med/_/ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis/_/nga dang bdag tu med pa la/_/so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung /_/'dzin pa'i dngos po yong med de/_/chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam/_/ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang /_/rjod par byed dang brjod pa med/_/chos 
[\[285b.6\]]rnams thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du snang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nyid la ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]spyod de/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhes bya ba btags pa tsam/_/thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig yin no/_/rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thog ma med nas phyin ci log_/bdag dang bdag gi med pa la/_/rnam rtog mtshan 
[\[285b.7\]]ma so sor 'dzin/_/'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin/_/mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom nas/_/rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya/_/chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thugs rje 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams/_/gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min/_/'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor/_/blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis/_/chos kyi don po mchog nyon la/_/'khor ba spang med 
[\[286a.2\]]sangs rgyas zhing /_/thams cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs/_/rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin/_/'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de/_/sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[286a.3\]]gnyis su med par 'byor byas na/_/nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan/_/pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/bsgo dang bsgo bar bya 
[\[286a.4\]]ba med/_/pad+ma 'dam nas skyes pa 'dra/_/ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun/_/bdag las gud na gcig kyang med/_/bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas/_/nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing /_/don rnams bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rdo rje rigs kyis thams 
[\[286a.5\]]cad bcom/_/rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin/_/pad+ma rigs kyis chags med 'gyur/_/sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/_/thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs te/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis lta/_/skye 'chi 
[\[286a.6\]]med pa lhun gyis grub/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /_/phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa/_/gzhan na yod 'ong ma yin te/_/rang byung ye shes gnas med yin/_/mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang /_/bla med byang chub skur snang ba/_/me long lta bu'i 
[\[286a.7\]]tshul bzhin du/_/sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni/_/sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/_/brjod med rang bzhin kun du go/_/nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra/_/ma brjod stong gsum grags pa yi/_/gsung brjod bsam 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gyis mi khyab pa/_/brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med/_/de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa/_/yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags pa/_/gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/_/mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med/_/de nyid sna 
[\[286b.2\]]tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa/_/bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur/_/dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba/_/sku gsung yang dag ldan 'gyur na/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ub/_/spyod 
[\[286b.3\]]yul ma lus thams cad la/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung /_/mi zad pa yi gter chen 'grub/_/gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi/_/po de'i dkor ni rin po che/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad/_/mdzad dang mdzad par 
[\[286b.4\]]bya ba med/_/ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos/_/sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod/_/spyod med ngang gi dkyil 'khor la/_/chags med tshul du rnam par rol/_/bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang /_/byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/_/rtsa ba lnga 
[\[286b.5\]]zhes brjod mod kyi/_/brjod pa nyid na yong med de/_/mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang /_/de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin/_/kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/_/de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur/_/bsam gyis mi khyab kun du khyab/_/nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i 
[\[286b.6\]]dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/de bzhin nyid kyis kun du khyab/_/snod bcud ma lus thams cad la/_/snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar/_/snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra/_/chos rnams thams cad sems 
[\[286b.7\]]yin te/_/sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la/_/sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i/_/skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung /_/thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te/_/de bzhin theg chen bla 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]med la/_/byang chub sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas/_/theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung /_/thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus/_/sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_bdag med ye shes rang rig gis/_/dngos dang dngos med 
[\[287a.2\]]bag chags bsregs/_/rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang /_/sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun/_/dngos po med par rtogs byas na/_/'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag_/mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas/_/'gro dang gnas par bya ba min/_/rtog pa thams cad ye 
[\[287a.3\]]nas tshogs/_/thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_sems can ma lus thams cad ni/_/sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis/_/bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na/_/pha rol phyin rdzogs 
[\[287a.4\]]sa bcu bsgrubs/_/sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te/_/mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad 'god/_/khrus kyi mchog ni 'di yin no/_/g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_sems can ye nas dag pa la/_/bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[287a.5\]]sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas/_/ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor/_/chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra/_/de la gzung du med pa ltar/_/kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis/_/ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas/_/thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhes bya 
[\[287a.6\]]ba'i dam tshig ni/_rang rig phyin ci ma log pa'i/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis/_/thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang 'gyur na/_/thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas/_/thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/ji 
[\[287a.7\]]ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs/_/mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin/_/chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/_/snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin/_/rang bzhin med par kun du snang /_/de 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]nyid chos sku yin par bshad/_/cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o/_/so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs/_/bdag dang bdag tu ma brtags pa/_/de lta bu yi ngang du snang /_/chos rnams sgra ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa 
[\[287b.2\]]yang /_/dngos po med las dngos po sgra/_/brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min/_/chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos/_/thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba/_/tshig gis mtshon pas gud na med/_/sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min/_/don nyid sgra las gud na med/_/
[\[287b.3\]]chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/_/sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro/_/de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang /_/yod pa ma yin kun du mnam/_/the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis/_/chos kun de ltar 
[\[287b.4\]]shes par gyis/_/dri yis rab tu tshim 'gyur yang /_/dri dang dngos po gnyis su med/_/dngos grub thams cad de ltar ro/_/chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/gzhi rtsa med las thams cad byung /_/de 
[\[287b.5\]]bzhin dbang po dngos med dang /_/rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yi/_/rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na/_/ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub/_/ro dang ro ru rtogs pa yang /_/rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma/_/chos thams cad reg bya ltar shes par bya ba'i dam 
[\[287b.6\]]tshig ni/_gzugs rnams dbu ba rdos pa 'dra/_/tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin/_/mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du gnas/_/rnam shes sgyu mas dbang sgyur na/_/mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges/_/bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong /_/de nyid bsod nams tshogs 
[\[287b.7\]]chen te/_/bde ba chags med ye shes yin/_/reg gi dngos grub de ltar ro/_/'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_yang dag nyid la gnas bcas na/_/phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag_/rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs/_/sgyu mar 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]'dzin pa yum gyi dbyings/_/gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med/_/gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang /_/thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas/_/nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/_/'dus byas nyid kyi dngos grub bo/_/'dus byas kun du 
[\[288a.2\]]'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang /_/log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/_/gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong /_/rigs dang rgyud du brtag tu med/_/rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med pas/_/phyi nang snod bcud rnam par snang /_/snang ba 
[\[288a.3\]]nyid na chos kyi sku/_/cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub/_/kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro/_/glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_sems can ma lus thams cad kun/_/rnam rtog 'du byed mang pos g.yengs/_/ji ltar bus pa shed ma bye/_/bya byed 
[\[288a.4\]]mang pos g.yengs par gnas/_/bya byed mang po bdag med pas/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/_/mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas/_/'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan/_/dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams thams cad skye med 
[\[288a.5\]]pas/_/shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur/_/rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob/_/chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/_/kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste/_/spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul/_/kun kyang rang 
[\[288a.6\]]bzhin ye nas zlum/_/thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu/_/rang bzhin chen pos kun du khyab/_/rang byung de nyid dngos med par/_/kun gyi phyag rgya sgyu yin no/_/chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi/_/bdag 
[\[288a.7\]]la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus/_/ye nas bde gnas zhing du'o/_/chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ye nas dbyings su ro gcig pas/_/de la nga dang bdag ma rtogs/_/rang bzhin rnam par 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]dag pa la/_/gtsang dang sme ba'i blo tsam med/_/thams cad bder gshegs snying po bas/_/rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'go/_/shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs/_/ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos/_/thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_
[\[288b.2\]]shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis/_/brtag rtog mtshan ma kun bshig nas/_/mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya ru/_/thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs/_/rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la/_/de nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i/_/snang ba nyid na byang ba med/_/de nyid 'jig 
[\[288b.3\]]pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas/_/gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye/_/'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med/_/dngos med de la su zhig gsod/_/gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la/_/skye dang 'chi ba de la 
[\[288b.4\]]yod/_/ye shes can gyis brtags pas na/_/skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med/_/thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas/_/ngan song gnas rnams yan chad du/_/yang dag par ni dbyer med de/_/gang yang spang bar bya ba 
[\[288b.5\]]min/_/theg pa mtho dman bsam yas pa/_/don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/_/ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun/_/bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o/_/thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad kun du bzang po yi/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 
[\[288b.6\]]rnams la/_/thogs pa med par spyad byas te/_/bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag_/de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtag_/gzhan yang stong khams thams cad ni/_/shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams/_/rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod/_/
[\[288b.7\]]thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phyogs dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs par/_/theg pa dman dang lta ba dman/_/des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur/_/mi mnyam pa yi don nyid kun khyab kyang /_/nyon mongs sdug 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs/_/de yis yang dag nyid mi mthong /_/ma mthong ba la mi chud bya/_/thams cad bsrung du med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la/_/bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med/_/dge dang mi dge gnyi ga med/_/
[\[289a.2\]]nyon mongs spang zhing byang bsgrub med/_/de bzhin nyid kyi klong gyur na/_/bde dang mi bde dbyer med de/_/ye nas dag mnyam nyid du gnas/_/de la bsrung bya rdul tsam med/_/thams cad bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_sems can khams gsum 'khor ba yi/_/
[\[289a.3\]]thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi/_/phyin ci log la 'jol nyog spyod/_/gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags/_/des na 'khor bar rtag tu 'phyan/_/de bas rang sems rtogs byas te/_/le lo med par yongs spangs te/_/nga med bdag med mnyam par bsrung /_/thams cad 
[\[289a.4\]]'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_rdo rje sems dpas bkas bcad pa/_/sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun/_/don bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na/_/yak+Sha khro bo med dbal gyis/_/snying nas drangs te khrag 'thungs nas/_/ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur/_/de 
[\[289a.5\]]yi sdug bsngal bzod [(]blag [,]glags [)]chad/_/dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/_/dam rdzas so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/rigs lnga so sor dbye ba yi/_/rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/_/rin po che ni rta yi sha/_/pad+ma rigs ni a ri ka yi sha/_/don yod nam mkha' 
[\[289a.6\]]lding gi sha/_/bder gshegs rigs ni sha chen no/_/dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar/_nges par dang du blang ba'o/_/yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu/_/yang na mtshan nyid med par brtag_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni/_/bder gshegs dkyil 'khor 
[\[289a.7\]]ma lus kun/_/ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba la/_/thams cad kun la yod par bshad/_/ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/bla na med pa'i mchog yin te/_/rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyis/_/bar ma chad par rtag tu bsgrub/_/byang chub shing 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]drung skye bar 'gyur/_/bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub/_/skye 'chi med pa'i pad 'grub ste/_/sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur/_/spyod yul thams cad smon na shes/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bdun 
[\[289b.2\]]cu drug pa'o//_//gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na/_/nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye/_/byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/_/bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad/_/rigs chad nyid du skye bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas/_/
[\[289b.3\]]rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la/_/sku ni 'ja' tshon tshul 'dra bar/_/snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom/_/'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par/_/gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom/_/lha yi sku rnams gsal bsgoms na/_/bsod nams tshogs 
[\[289b.4\]]chen thob par 'gyur/_/de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na/_/ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/_/yi dam lha de spangs byas na/_/ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong /_/sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa'i don ni/_sngags dang 
[\[289b.5\]]phyag rgya bar mi gcad/_/rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i lam yang yin/_/mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin/_/don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te/_/rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya yin/_/dug gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te/_/yang dag don chen klung 'dod 
[\[289b.6\]]pas/_/dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags/_/yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/phyag rgya bskyod dang yi ge o~M/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/_bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po/_/yon tan zad med 
[\[289b.7\]]sbyin pa yin/_/byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa/_/chags med zhing du 'god pa yin/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing /_/'khor ba'i lam rnams stongs par byed/_/ma rig mun sel sgron ma yin/_/long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan/_/de la rtag tu 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]mchod byas na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring /_/rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/_rdo rje rigs kyi spun yin te/_/thog ma med nas las mthun pas/_/lta spyod mthun pas 'dir skyes te/_/gcig la gcig ni mig dang 'dra/_/
[\[290a.2\]]shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya/_/dam tshig ngan sems dpya byas na/_/dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur/_/de bas dam tshig 'da' ma byed/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab/_/phyin ci 
[\[290a.3\]]log gis rab bsgribs nas/_/dbul po gter dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra/_/de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis/_/chos la skyon yod ma yin te/_/sems can don phyir shin tu gsang /_/theg pa dman dang phyin ci ldog_/de la 
[\[290a.4\]]gsang don bstan gyur na/_/rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par/_/'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la/_/shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas/_/gsang don de nyid log par khrid/_/ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor/_/de bas shin tu gsang bar bya/_/thugs rje chen po 
[\[290a.5\]]dang ldan pas/_/thar lam kun la mkhas par bya/_/shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na/_/sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin/_/theg pa mtho dman don nyid ni/_/so sor 'tsham par bstan dgos so/_/dang du blang dang mi spang ba/_/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spyad/_/chags 
[\[290a.6\]]pa med par gyur pa dang /_/dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni/_/dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung /_/ma rtogs pa zhes spyad gyur na/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po'i nang du skye/_/yang na dam tshig 'di lta bur/_/ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da' ste/_/byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 
[\[290a.7\]]'gyur/_/'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa na/_/mnyam pa de yi dbyings na gnas/_/shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/bya lam nam mkha' gcod bzhin gyis/_/'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun/_/mkha' la rlung chen 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]'phro ba bzhin/_/yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa/_/chu la nya chen 'phyo ba ltar/_/rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis/_/tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos/_/rdo rje theg mchog kha 'ches la/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par/_/
[\[290b.2\]]gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing /_/thugs thub dag gis spyad byas pa/_/dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/_/mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med/_/ji la mi gnas yul la spyod/_/spyod par byed dang spyod pa 
[\[290b.3\]]med/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni/_/rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na/_/'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor/_/yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing /_/kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la/_/chos dang gang zag gnyis med na/_/
[\[290b.4\]]'di ni byang chub sa pa yin/_/las dang nyon mongs thams cad la/_/mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing /_/rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing /_/spang dang mi spong 
[\[290b.5\]]byed 'gyur ba/_/'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin/_/dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing /_/dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas/_/lha dang mi yi skye gnas te/_/'dod khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing /_/tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi/_/
[\[290b.6\]]rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing /_/gzugs tshogs dag la bdag tu rtog_/'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye/_/mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par/_/ming bzhi med par ma shes te/_/skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas/_/srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye/_/thams 
[\[290b.7\]]cad mnyam par ma shes na/_/ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing /_/snying rje yang dag med 'gyur na/_/'di ni mi bzad chen po yi/_/dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin/_/chags med dngos po mi shes nas/_/thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing /_/lus kyis bsgribs 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]dang zas kyis bsgribs/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po'i gnas su skye/_/nga dang bdag med mi shes shing /_/chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas/_/shes rab mi gsal don med pas/_/dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs/_/'di ni byol song gnas su skye/_/shin 
[\[291a.2\]]tu nga rgyal cher bskyed cing /_/thams cad bdag gir bzung bas na/_/kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed pa/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye/_/theg mchog mtho dman thams cad dang /_/'jig rten lta ba thams cad kun/_/ye shes chen pos rab brtags na/_/rang 
[\[291a.3\]]bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/_/rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med/_/shes rab chen po mig ldan pas/_/mtho dman gnas dang lam drug dang /_/rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/_/so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs/_/sngags mchog bla na med pas ni/_/mtshan ma kun dang mi brtag 
[\[291a.4\]]par/_/mtshan ma kun dang thams cad med/_/kun dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/so sor lta ba brjod mi bya/_/spyi ni log rtog bsam yas pa/_/ye nas yod pa ma yin te/_/so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis/_/gzung 
[\[291a.5\]]'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te/_/ci yang med la cir yang snang /_/snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med/_/de ltar rtogs na bder 'gro'i gnas/_/rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni/_/cir yang spyod kyang rang bzhin med/_/mkha' la bya 
[\[291a.6\]]chen lding ba bzhin/_/chu la skyar chen 'phyo ba bzhin/_/mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin/_/rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni/_/thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod/_/bde ba'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur/_/de la su zhig chags par 
[\[291a.7\]]byed/_/spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin/_/bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs/_/de lta bu yi ngang du spyod/_/'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin/_/lta spyod ya char ma gyur par/_/sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad/_/kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang /_/
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]spyod pa dag dang yong mi mthun/_/kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang /_/mnyam pa'i lta ba yong mi shes/_/kha cig lta spyod gnyi ga med/_/yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis/_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas/_/yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs/_/bla med theg 
[\[291b.2\]]chen ngang gnas ni/_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de/_/kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la/_/dag dang ma dag gnyi gar 'dzin/_/thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/_/rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag_/kun rdzob tu 'ang dbyer med de/_/lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/_/
[\[291b.3\]]thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni/_/bla med theg pa las 'phags pa/_/don dam du ni nor bdun no/_/kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so/_/mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin/_/thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston/_/thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag_/thams cad dag 
[\[291b.4\]]ces bya ba yang /_/dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/_/snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag_/dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las/_/rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus/_/ma lus chos kun 
[\[291b.5\]]dbyer mi dmigs/_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/_/rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin/_/mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung ba/_/yon tan chen po gnas yin te/_/zhing khams mi bzad gnas kyang yin/_/'di ni rin chen rigs su gsungs/_/
[\[291b.6\]]chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/_/chags dang chags par bya ba med/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa ste/_/nyes pas mi gos pad+ma bzhin/_/thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas/_/'di la bya bar la tsam med/_/ma byas bzhin du don grub pa/_/skyon 
[\[291b.7\]]yon byang chub nyid du sbyor/_/'di ni las rnams grub pa yin/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral/_/gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid/_/dbyer med pa yi tshul rtogs te/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]rigs/_/snang srid ma lus thams cad la/_/gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing /_/mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa/_/'di ni me yi rigs su bshad/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/dngos por snang la gzung du med/_/bskyod na 
[\[292a.2\]]thams cad kun smra ste/_/'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad/_/dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las/_/'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni/_/thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/_/thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed yin/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/sra zhing 
[\[292a.3\]]brtan pa'i gnas yod pas/_/dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te/_/'di ni sa chen yin par bshad/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/de bzhin nam mkha' chen po yis/_/phyi dang nang gi go 'byed pa'o/_/thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de/_/'byung ba bzhi po 
[\[292a.4\]]thams cad kyang /_/thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'ub/_/nyon mongs lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur/_/phyin ci log ni yang dag ste/_/nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin 
[\[292a.5\]]gshegs/_/dngos med rtogs na byang chub lam/_/ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro/_/de bas thos bsam bsgoms pa yis/_/yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te/_/thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor/_/'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na/_/yang dag don la 
[\[292a.6\]]chags byed de/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/ma chags pa la chags pa dang /_/shin tu chags mchog chen po yin/_/rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te/_/snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin/_/thams cad pad+ma brdzus skyes yin/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyi 
[\[292a.7\]]sa ru skye/_/zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/_/phyin ci log la zhe sdang zhing /_/zhe sdang dngos po med shes na/_/sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te/_/cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/_/mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni/_/thams cad kun la dbyer med de/_/de ltar ma rtogs 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]kun la snang /_/de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes/_/des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong /_/yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/_/zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin/_/gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/don dam du ni dbyer med la/_/
[\[292b.2\]]kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul/_/snang ba nyid na dngos med pas/_/de la su zhig bdag tu 'dzin/_/thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa/_/shes rab can gyi gti mug yin/_/de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/mnyam pa nyid la gnas 
[\[292b.3\]]bcas nas/_/phyin ci log dang theg dman la/_/shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang /_/nga rgyal zhi ba so so min/_/rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus/_/'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin/_/de bzhin dag par shes par byos/_/phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/nga dang 
[\[292b.4\]]bdag tu 'dzin pa ste/_/'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin/_/mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing /_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus/_/mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom/_/de bas phrag dog chen po yin/_/phyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings/_/gzung dang 'dzin pas shin 
[\[292b.5\]]tu dog_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/_/dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam/_/de nyid shes pas las rab 'grub/_/phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_phung po lnga por snang ba yang /_/kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed/_/bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul/_/
[\[292b.6\]]so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing /_/lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas/_/so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med/_/gang gis de la dngos bzung na/_/ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur/_/de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med/_/snang med de nyid 
[\[292b.7\]]sna tshogs ston/_/snang dang mi snang gnyis su med/_/de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas/_/gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/_/kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi/_/bde dang mi bde dngos po med/_/gnyi ga ma yin lung ma 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]bstan/_/sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang /_/tshor dang 'byung ba gnyi ga stong /_/stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin/_/de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin/_/'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_/gsum tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin/_/so so 
[\[293a.2\]]mtshan nyid bshig pa na/_/dngos po med de de bzhin nyid/_/dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa/_/byed med par kun du 'jug_/khams gsum ma lus thams cad la/_/mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab/_/khyab med dngos po yod ma yin/_/de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan/_/
[\[293a.3\]]'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas/_/rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te/_/lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho/_/der rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin/_/med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung /_/de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni/_/rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas/_/khams gsum 
[\[293a.4\]]btson ra kun du 'khor/_/yang dag don phyir rig pas ni/_/'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de/_/de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni/_/dngos po med de skad cig ma/_/ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad/_/sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad/_/kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes 
[\[293a.5\]]te/_/de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/_/kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min/_/gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs/_/'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te/_/mtho ris 'gro'am ngan song 'gro/_/rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par ro/_/bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang shes na/_/'di ni ye shes 
[\[293a.6\]]chen po yin/_/kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni/_/sems can ma lus thams cad la/_/ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang /_/rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te/_/ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong /_/ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la/_/ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_/dkar 
[\[293a.7\]]dang dmar dang ser ba dang /_/ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan/_/chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas/_/byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir/_/shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa/_/de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/pad+ma 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]rA ga zhes brjod de/_/chags dang chags par bya ba med/_/chags med phyir yang dmar po'o/_/yon tan gter chen zad mi shes/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/_/de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la/_/zad med rin chen gter 'gyur ba/_/mdog ni 
[\[293b.2\]]gser gyi mdog tu bstan/_/chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas/_/las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/_/kun du las ni ljang gu'i mdog_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[293b.3\]]las/_/cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med/_/kha dog nag po dngos po la/_/tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med/_/de bzhin kun la shes par byos/_/phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du/_/dbyer med ngang du gnas 
[\[293b.4\]]pa la/_/ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir/_/phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya/_/sems can ma rig mdongs pa la/_/nyon mongs ma rig bsal bya'i phyir/_/ye shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas/_/ma rig mun pa sel bar byed/_/de phyir de la shar zhes bya/_/
[\[293b.5\]]sems can ma lus thams cad la/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing /_/ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas/_/de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya/_/sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun/_/ye shes chen po bdag med pas/_/sdug bsngal rab tu byang 
[\[293b.6\]]byas nas/_/de la byang gi phyogs zhes brjod/_/de ltar ma lus thams cad la/_/thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub/_/rnam rtog mtshan nyid byung gyur na/_/de yi yon tan chen po rdzogs/_/de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun/_/rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 
[\[293b.7\]]su 'dus/_/phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul/_/phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta/_/ma rig phyin ci log rnams kyis/_/phyogs rnams so sor bzung 'gyur na/_/rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur/_/dbang po lnga zhes 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing /_/phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin/_/dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor/_/gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/snang zhing dngos po med pa dang /_/lha dang lha mor dngos por 
[\[294a.2\]]brtags/_/bdag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o/_/sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang /_/sgra nyid dngos po med par shes/_/sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni/_/chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin/_/dri yi dngos por snang ba yang /_/dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med/_/dri snom 
[\[294a.3\]]chos kyi dri yin te/_/shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs/_/ro yi dngos por snang ba yang /_/ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin/_/ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro/_/bde ba de yis tshim par byed/_/reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang /_/reg bya'i dngos po yod med de/_/reg byar snang ba 
[\[294a.4\]]longs spyod yin/_/bde ba chen po chos kyi sku/_/mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis/_/dbang po'i yul la chags 'gyur na/_/rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing /_/ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad/_/rtsa ba sog ma'i me bzhin du/_/khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 
[\[294a.5\]]'gyur/_/de bas ye shes chags med rtogs/_/byas la mi sogs bsod nams byos/_/kun la spyod cing mi gos pas/_/ye shes chen po rtag tu bsgoms/_/mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang /_kun rdzob sgyu mar 
[\[294a.6\]]mnyam pa dang /_don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa dang /_chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang /_rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o/_/de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/_chos rnams ma lus thams cad 
[\[294a.7\]]kun/_/de bzhin nyid dang stong ba'i mtha'/_/yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings/_/mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med/_/gzung du med cing sman pa med/_/ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin/_/thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/_/
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]kun rdzob sgyur mar mnyam pa dang /_/'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni/_/sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang /_/'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed/_/rtogs pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang /_/'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te/_bya byed snang zhing dngos po med/_/chu zla'i tshul du 
[\[294b.2\]]thams cad gnas/_/thams cad snang la rang bzhin med/_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung /_/yod dang med pa gnyi ga min/_/don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de/_/'dus ma byas nyid 'dus 
[\[294b.3\]]byas snang /_/snang ba nyid na dngos po med/_/dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te/_/de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/_/'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni/_sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las/_/ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/_/gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te/_/rang 
[\[294b.4\]]bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung /_/so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni/_/thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam/_/mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni/_/shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam/_/rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni/_rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa/_/rang bzhin med 
[\[294b.5\]]pa don gyi gzhi/_/'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/_/nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing /_/kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas/_/thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul/_/thams cad kun la yud rtog cing /_/rtog dang 
[\[294b.6\]]brtag par bya ba med/_/dus gsum kun du mi dmigs pa/_/'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin/_/log rtogs dbang po'i spyod yul spangs/_/dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par/_/thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid/_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin/_/mnyam pa rnam 
[\[294b.7\]]lnga de ltar brtags/_/chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/_/ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang /_/thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtags/_/'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]te/_/rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil/_/ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul/_/yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang /_/'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang /_/yang na 'das pa'i dkyil nyid de/_/'jig rten sna tshogs 
[\[295a.2\]]'khor yin no/_/tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing /_/byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i/_/gnyis su med par thim gyur na/_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan/_/'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang /_/sna 
[\[295a.3\]]tshogs snang ba thams cad kun/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtags/_/thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni/_/chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang /_/ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston/_/stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen 
[\[295a.4\]]dang /_/thams cad 'jal ba'i sgra yang yin/_/bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te/_/brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin/_/'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung /_/chos nyid dngos po med pa la/_/dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa/_/bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad/_/
[\[295a.5\]]chags med ye shes tshul yin te/_/de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na/_/rig 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar 'gyur/_/ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri/_/kun du bde gnas thob par byed/_/bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la/_/bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur/_/
[\[295a.6\]]tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur/_/dngos por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs/_/de lta bu yi ro mchog gis/_/thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su longs spyod ldan/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin/_/bde ba chen po rdzogs 
[\[295a.7\]]pa'o/_/rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/_/rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang /_/sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur/_/bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar 'gyur nas/_/sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed/_/dpung gi 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/_/mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed/_/tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/kun la thogs pa med par spyad/_/thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed/_/mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed/_/yon 
[\[295b.2\]]tan chen po 'phel bar byed/_/khro bo gtum pa'ang zhi bar byed/_/thams cad kun la spyad bde ba/_/chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/_/dbyings su bsdus pa'i dkyil yin te/_/'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni/_/de lta bu 
[\[295b.3\]]yi tshul du gnas/_/'khor gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu/_/rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul/_/'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te/_/mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang /_/sngags mchog dam pa ma lus 
[\[295b.4\]]'don/_/de nas phra men 'khor bsdus nas/_/so so'i las dang mthun byas te/_/so so'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs/_/ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/_/ma lus thams cad byos shig par/_/lhag ma byin nas dbang yang 
[\[295b.5\]]bskur/_/gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la/_/'dod yon lnga yi sbyin pa btang /_/de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas/_/dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brten nas/_/rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/_/bdag la thams 
[\[295b.6\]]cad bsdu bar bya/_/de ltar bsgrub pa'i ngang 'chang ba/_/ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas/_/rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas/_/theg dman spyod par yod mi 'gyur/_/mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur/_/skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/_/sangs rgyas zhing 
[\[295b.7\]]yang sbyong bar byed/_/ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed/_/yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub/_/dbang po yul du snang ba kun/_/yul rnams yod pa ma yin te/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid/_/dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste/_/snang ba'i dngos po 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rnam bshig na/_/so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas/_/gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi/_/nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim/_/thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so/_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/_/
[\[296a.2\]]snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te/_/rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid/_/nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni/_/kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la/_/de dang bdag tu rnam par rtog_/bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin/_/kun gzhi dngos po med pa la/_/bag chags sogs pa'i 
[\[296a.3\]]gnas med de/_/snang ba'i dngos po med pa la/_/nyon mongs blo yis blang du med/_/bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med/_/de ltar sgo byed dngos po med/_/med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa/_/khams gsum btson rar rtag tu 'khor/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/_/
[\[296a.4\]]snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la/_/skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin/_/rtog pa nyid kyang ma grub na/_/yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub/_/yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni/_/snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa/_/phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med/_/de ltar rang bzhin dmigs su med/_/
[\[296a.5\]]rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra/_/rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa/_/'di ni kun du 'byung ba yin/_/de ltar don rnams dngos po med/_/chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba/_/de gsum gcig dang so so min/_/de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid/_/gcig pa ma yin so so min/_/chos 
[\[296a.6\]]kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings/_/thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing /_/gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med/_/de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin/_/rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med/_/byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni/_/shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba/_/yangs la 
[\[296a.7\]]rgya che gting zab pa/_/shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te/_/gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/_/'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min/_/shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa/_/mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang nyid ni/_/dmigs med tshul du de ltar 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]snang /_/dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang /_/rang rig kho na tsam du zad/_/sems can ma lus thams cad kyis/_/de ltar khong du chud par byos/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang /_/bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/sems can ma lus thams cad la/_/snying rje'i 
[\[296b.2\]]thag pa ma chags par/_/nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing /_/byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis/_/de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la/_/snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyang nas/_/nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed/_/snying rje chen po skye ma byed/_/de bzhin skye bo phal rnams 
[\[296b.3\]]la/_/las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing /_/thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par/_/dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa med/_/sems can nga dang bdag med la/_/thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de/_/bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya/_/thams cad dri ma med par bya/_/chos 
[\[296b.4\]]rnams thams cad stong pa bas/_/de la dngos dang rtog pa med/_/nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la/_/de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/snang ba thams cad dngos med pas/_/yod dang med pa thams cad kun/_/mtshan nyid med pas 
[\[296b.5\]]mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/_/chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang /_/bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas/_/kun la smon cing chags su med/_/byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni/_/shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas/_/rtog ge'i spyod 
[\[296b.6\]]yul de ma yin/_/ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med/_/sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu/_/byang chub de nyid sems yin no/_/sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/_/sems can ma lus thams cad dang /_/dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin/_/thams cad ma 
[\[296b.7\]]lus chos so cog_/sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub/_/bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad/_/skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/_/ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad/_/spyad pa nyid na chags pa med/_/dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas/_/'di ltar snang ba thams cad la/_/
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang /_/snang ba nyid na dngos po med/_/de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs/_/gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces/_/med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de/_/ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu/_/tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi/_/
[\[297a.2\]]thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med/_/thams cad ma lus stong zhes te/_/dran med brdos pa ma yin pas/_/rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing /_/'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/_/brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do/_/shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o/_/thams cad 
[\[297a.3\]]gnyis med rtags gyur na/_/de nyid don dam dbyings yin te/_/gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med/_/yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur/_/med las btsal na skur btab ste/_/yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/_/de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/_/rnam par 
[\[297a.4\]]rtog pa mi mnga' ste/_/de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med/_/rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu/_/tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang /_/don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgom/_/de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang /_/'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang /_/theg chen sgom las nyams pa 
[\[297a.5\]]med/_/gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i/_/blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas/_/ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas/_/don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/_/sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na/_/tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgyas/_/de bas don tshig ldan par byos/_/
[\[297a.6\]]'on tang the tshom med par 'grub/_/rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis/_/dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig_/rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan/_/byed med pa'i brtson 'grus 
[\[297a.7\]]kyis/_/des ni byang chub snying po len/_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang /_dam tshig ni gnas yin no/_/phyag rgyas bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te/_ched du brjod pa 
[\[297b.2\]]'di brjod do/_/gsang ba de nyid kho na las/_/byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o/_/mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i/_/'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/_/ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba 
[\[297b.3\]]min/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ub/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun/_/chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa/_/log rtogs nyon mongs rdul tsam med/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang /_/de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/_/bdag 
[\[297b.4\]]nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/_/mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi/_/rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas shing /_/phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba/_/bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su/_/las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/_/de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog_/bdag nyid 
[\[297b.5\]]phyag rgya kun gyi bdag_/ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin/_/'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o/_/rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa/_/bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa/_/mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o/_/rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni/_/
[\[297b.6\]]phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/_/thams cad shes rab ngang du gnas/_/rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du/_/ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol/_/bde min ma chags tshogs chen po/_/yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs/_/lhag pa'i 
[\[297b.7\]]phyag rgya chen po ni/_/nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste/_/mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang /_/gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa/_/lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang /_/yan lag stabs chen bsgul bsigs kun/_/nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]gnas/_/'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa/_/rang byung chen po lha yi lha/_/thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed/_/dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o/_/las dang las kyis mi gos pa/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing /_/ma chags 
[\[298a.2\]]pa la chags pa dang /_/shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/_/de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la/_/sku gsungs thugs ldan zad mi shes/_/yon tan mi zad gter du 'gyur/_/gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o/_/sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o/_/rnam par rtog med 
[\[298a.3\]]tshul gyis ni/_/thams cad kun la chags med rol/_/'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khyab/_/'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang /_/thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa/_/ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag_/kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro/_/rigs bzhi ma 
[\[298a.4\]]lus thams cad kun/_/mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus/_/rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste/_/lhun grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du/_/phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni/_/thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin/_/dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na/_/
[\[298a.5\]]sems can kun gyi yong mi 'da'/_/de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin/_/kun la khyab cing thams cad snang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na/_/bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun/_/mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na/_/'di lta bu la rtag tu 
[\[298a.6\]]gnas/_/de lta bu yi blo med na/_/rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par bzung 
[\[298a.7\]]ba 'di ched du brjod do/_/kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin 'di/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi/_/rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin/_/sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang /_/gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/_/ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyis/_/don du 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/_/rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang /_/de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/_/gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'/_/sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/_/de 
[\[298b.2\]]nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung /_/de ni nges par lung bstan te/_/sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin/_/sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas/_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du 
[\[298b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o//_//'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/_gsang 
[\[298b.4\]]ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog_/gsang ba chen po 'di yod par/_/me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing /_/spu gri so ni gtams las kyang /_/'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/_/khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du/_/
[\[298b.5\]]lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/_/thams cad la yang me long bzhin/_/bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo /_/ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/_/rdo rje tha ram sgrom phye nas/_/yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba/_/skal ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol/_/yi ge kun la mi snang zhing /_/bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa 
[\[298b.6\]]ni/_/skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te/_/kun dang thun mong de ma yin/_/dper na seng ge'i 'o ma ni/_/gser gyi phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi/_/snod gzhan dag tu blugs pa ni/_/snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma'ang 'bo/_/yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la/_/dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang /_/gser las gyur 
[\[298b.7\]]pa rdul tsam med/_/de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang /_/nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]{D835}]@##/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i phreng zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng gi don bsdus pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 
[\[299a.2\]]sems dpas rig pa'i byin brlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang /_bla re dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs dang /_sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang /_bdug spos la sogs pa'i phyi'i mchod pa bzhis mchod 
[\[299a.3\]]de/_/lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299a.4\]]rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma lags pa thabs gang gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems 
[\[299a.5\]]dpa' chen po nyon cig_/don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyis su 'dus so/_/bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o/_/bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na/_/phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag_/byed 
[\[299a.6\]]spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste/_/sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa la/_/mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/_/sa rnams mnyam pa nyid du sbyor/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis/_/chos kun sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir/_/dngos dang dngos med bag chags 
[\[299a.7\]]bsregs/_/yang na ye shes me zhes bya/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin ni/_/med min rgyu 'bras mthun pas 'grub/_/de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis/_/rig pas tshogs su 'gyur bas so/_/lam gyi nang na nye lam bde rdzogs pa/_/thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste/_/
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang /_/blang dor med pa'i sku gsum rdo rjes 'thob/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//sems dpa' chen po dam tshig 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 
[\[299b.2\]]pa'i phyir ngas bshad do/_/gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang /_/'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni/_/bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa can/_/de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//sems 
[\[299b.3\]]dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni/_/rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob bo/_/thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te/_/rdo rje dril bu rig pas 'dzin/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi/_/chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang 
[\[299b.4\]]gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//sems dpa' chen po mchod pa'i mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drongs/_/kun la phan pa'i sman yin te/_/rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis/_/thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya/_/'phags 
[\[299b.5\]]pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//kun du 'od kyi sa las 'das/_/pad+ma'i spyan du gyur pa na/_/rig pa'i byin brlabs chen po las/_/rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro yi tshul/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te/_/mtshan dang dpe 
[\[299b.6\]]byad kun las grol/_/rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang /_/mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan/_/de ni thig le rdo rje yin/_/'di zhes gang zag bdag med par/_/rtogs par bya phyir ngas bshad de/_/mkhas pas de la 'byor par gyis/_/'phags 
[\[299b.7\]]pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de na sems dpa' chen po spyod yul thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshegs/_/gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis/_/
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste/_/sku gsum zhes kyang de la bya/_/ye shes lnga dang 'gro ba lnga/_/mnyam pas so so dbyer med de/_/sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bsgyur na/_/spyod yul kun du maN+Dal/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las 
[\[300a.2\]]gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' thos nas bshad do/_/rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/_/sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi/_/kun du rin chen lta bu ste/_/don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'grub/_/
[\[300a.3\]]dbu mig rna ba sma lce la/_/o~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/_/gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/_/sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la/_/hU~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/_/sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/_/sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i sor 
[\[300a.4\]]mo la/_/trA~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/_/sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/_/sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la/_/hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/_/sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/_/sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo 
[\[300a.5\]]la/_/AHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/_/sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/_/sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//sems dpa' chen po 
[\[300a.6\]]nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do/_/rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/_/lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi/_/tshom bu lnga yi lha bsgoms na/_/thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/_/rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul 
[\[300a.7\]]lags kyis/_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas/_/byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol/_/rdo rje gsor ba'i dga' mchog 'di/_/'dzum zhing 'khyil pa'i gnas su gsor/_/mi dmigs bde dang 'phro ba ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung /_/rnal 'byor rig 'dzin 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]mar ldan pas/_/na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams/_/grub pa'i rdzas su dbang bskur nas/_/gsol na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/_/glu dang tshig gi sgra rnams yin/_/gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te/_/bsgrags nas dngos grub mchog 
[\[300b.2\]]tu 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/_/bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te/_/'od kyi 'du 'phro byin gyis brlab/_/dngos grub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom 
[\[300b.3\]]ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra bai ro tsa na o~M/_o~M satwa badzra hU~M/_o~M rat+na badzra trA~M/_o~M d+harma badzra hrIH/_o~M karma badzra AH/_o~M badzra ak+Sho b+h+yaHhU~M/_o~M badzra satwa hU~M/_o~M badzra rA dza hU~M/_o~M badzra rA ga hU~M/_o~M badzra sAd+hU hU~M/_o~M badzra rat+na saM b+ha ba trA~M/_o~M 
[\[300b.4\]]badzra rat+na tA~M/_o~M badzra sU r+ya trA~M/_o~M badzra d+h+wa dza trA~M/_o~M badzra hA sa trA~M/_o~M badzra a mi tA b+ha hrIH/_o~M badzra tIk+ShA hrIH/_o~M badzra tsakra hrIH/_o~M badzra pA sha hrIH/_o~M badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/_o~M badzra karma hA/_o~M badzra rak+Sha hA/_o~M badzra yak+Sha hA/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti hA/_hoH_badzre shwa ra d+hA tu o~M/_o~M badzra bud+d+ha 
[\[300b.5\]]lo tsa na hU~M/_o~M badzra mA ma kI tra~M/_o~M badzra paN+Da rA ba si nI hA/_o~M badzra sa ma ya tA rA hA/_o~M badzra lA s+yai hU~M/_o~M badzra d+hU pe hU~M/_o~M badzra a~M ku sha hU~M/_o~M badzra de shwa re b+h+yaHde hU~M/_o~M badzra mA le trA~M/_o~M badzra buSh+pe trA~M/_o~M badzra pA sha trA~M/_o~M badzra rat+na ra ti trA~M/_o~M badzra gI t+yi hrIH/_o~M badzra A 
[\[300b.6\]]lo ke hrIH/_o~M badzra s+pho Ta hrIH/_o~M badzra nr-i t+ye hA/_o~M badzra gan+d+he hA/_o~M badzra g+haN+Da hA/_o~M badzra ra ti hA/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti hU~M/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti trA~M/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti hrIH/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti hA/_'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//sems dpa' 
[\[300b.7\]]chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do/_/lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du/_/yan lag lnga la 'byor bas na/_/bskyod pa thams cad phyag rgya yin/_/de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to/_/de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/_/thabs dang shes rab ngang nyid du/_/lag gi 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]'du byed bsgoms nas ni/_/thal mo dam sbyar rtsa bsnol gshibs/_/rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal to/_/sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan/_/gung mdzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams/_/so sor rtse sprad phyir bkyed de/_/srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig rgya/_/rkang sor 
[\[301a.2\]]g.yas kyis g.yon pa mnan/_/lag mthil g.yas kyis g.yon pa mnan/_/mthe bo rtse sprad pang du blang /_/rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/g.yas kyi mdzub mo g.yon gyis bzung /_/tshogs pas gcig la gcig bzung ba/_/'di ni sbyor 
[\[301a.3\]]ba'i rgya mchog go/_/mthe bo gnyis dang mtheb chung gnyis/_/so sor rtse sprad zlum po ste/_/lhag ma 'od 'phro rting phye ba/_/mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin/_/rting sprad gung mo rtse sbyar te/_/mdzub mo tshigs bcag gung la sbyar/_/srin mtheb rtse sprad mthe chung sba/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i 
[\[301a.4\]]phyag rgya yin/_/gung mdzub srin lag rtse sprad de/_/mthe chung ngos la sbyar bar bya/_/mthe bo rtse sprad zlum po ste/_/snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin/_/thal mo sbyar nas so sor bgrad/_/bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te/_/glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya/_/don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya 
[\[301a.5\]]yin/_/phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni/_/thugs kar bcing zhing nyid du mos/_/'du 'phro sgrol zhing mkha' la dgrol/_/las dang thun mong nyid du bshad/_/rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni/_/thugs kar rang ni dkur brten nas/_/gcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya 
[\[301a.6\]]chen yin/_/lag pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang /_/gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po rgya chen yin/_/lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/g.yon gyi mtheb mdzub rtse sprad de/_/g.yas kyi gung mo brkyang nas gdeng /_/rdo rje 
[\[301a.7\]]'dod pa'i rgya chen yin/_/lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/_/so so'i gung mo tshigs dang por/_/ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs/_/rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin/_/rting sbyar gung mo'i rtse sprad de/_/mtheb mdzub srin lag tshigs bcag ste/_/dag du mdzes pa 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]mthe chung sbas/_/rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin/_/mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bar bya/_/lhag ma 'od ltar byas na ni/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin/_/lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas ni/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/g.yas pa gru mor 
[\[301b.2\]]gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin/_/g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag nas/_/sor mo'i tshigs bcag sprad byas te/_/kha yi thad kar gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje bzhad pa'i rgya chen yin/_/g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin/_/ma phrad tsam du bsdus 
[\[301b.3\]]pa las/_/g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa/_/rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin/_/g.yas kyi lag ngar sgreng ba la/_/mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad de/_/lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya/_/g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/_/rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin/_/lag pa 
[\[301b.4\]]rgya gram rtse bsnol nas/_/mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse sprad de/_/bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin/_/sor mo nang du bsnol ba las/_/gung mo rtse sprad mdzub sbyar te/_/mthe bos gung mo mnan pa ni/_/rdo rje smra ba'i rgya chen yin/_/
[\[301b.5\]]lag pa'i mkhrig ma bsnol ba las/_/gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por/_/ngos bzhir sa yi sor mo brten/_/rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/_/phan tshun thags su btags pa las/_/mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng bar 
[\[301b.6\]]bya/_/rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang /_/kha 'gram gnyis su gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang /_/
