[\[301b.7\]]thugs kar dam du gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom nas ni/_/lag gi 'du shes 'di dag gis/_/'du 'phro mos pa bskyed nas ni/_/bcing zhing mkha' la dgrol bar bya/_/mthe bo mthe chung nang du sprad/_/
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gung mo rtse sbyar bzhi yang bsgreng /_/rdo rje 'dzin ltar rting sprad pa/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/rting sbyar mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar te/_/mdzub mo'i mig tu mthe chung drang /_/lhag ma rtse gsum ltar byas pa/_/rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya 
[\[302a.2\]]yin/_/lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas kyang /_/sor mo ut+pal ltar byas pa/_/g.yas kyi sor mo gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin/_/rkang pa gnyis kyi pus mo dang /_/lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams/_/sprad nas lag pa 
[\[302a.3\]]gdengs pa ni/_/kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas/_/ldan pa g.yas su byo ba las/_/chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni/_/rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin/_/g.yon pa skong skong po byas te/_/g.yas pas gru 
[\[302a.4\]]mo bzung nas kyang /_/bskor zhing sor mo 'phro ba ni/_/rdo rje bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar nas/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/mthe chung sbrel nas mdzub mo bsgreng /_/rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya/_/mthe chung 
[\[302a.5\]]lu gu rgyud du sbrel/_/sor mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng /_/thal mo bkan te lta ba ni/_/rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin/_/srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis/_/so sor rtse mo sprad pa las/_/'phral ba'i thad kar drangs pa yi/_/rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/
[\[302a.6\]]'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal mo ches dbyangs mthun par bstod pa/_
[\[302a.7\]]o~M phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam na/_/rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas/_/bla med lha dang lha mo yi/_/grub pa'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso/_/sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum/_/mthu 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]chen khro bo khro mo dang /_/pho nyar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan/_/oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni/_/'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun/_/rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na/_/phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig_/o~M dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams/_/thugs rje chen 
[\[302b.2\]]po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams/_/grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/o~M khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/cir yang sprul pa'i 
[\[302b.3\]]sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs te/_/rol par khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtog pa bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[302b.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gcer bu ba dang kun du rgyu la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags kyi las kyis ma hA de ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang /_gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang /_phra men ma thams cad bskul 
[\[302b.5\]]nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid/_'tshe bar bgyid/_shin tu sdug bsngal bar bgyid/_de la thabs gang gis bzlog par bgyi/_sbyor ba gcad par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nyon cig_/'di ni de bzhin 
[\[302b.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos sngon chad bshad de/_lag na rdo rje khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang /_srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyang zlog par byed do/_/gnon par byed 
[\[302b.7\]]do/_/sbyor ba gcod par byed pa kun du rgyu la sogs pa gzhan lta ci smos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags zlog cing gnon pa dang /_/sbyor ba 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gcod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/o~M badzra dz+wa la badzra hU~M/_man+t+ra su~M b+ha ni/_o~M badzra dz+wa la hU~M/_o~M brU~M hU~M brU~M trU~M brU~M hU~M brU~M hrA~MH_brU~M A brU~M/_'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu nas mtshon cha'i char chen po phab ste lag na rdo rje nyid kyang /_
[\[303a.2\]]khas sbub tu 'gyel nas khrag skyug par gyur to/_/lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang brgyal te lus dum bu dum bur chad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sbyor ba chad par rig nas slar bslang ste/_oM badzra satwa rA dza dz+ha/_de nas 
[\[303a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/khyod kyi 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las 'da' bar byed na thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lag na rdo rje khyod 
[\[303a.4\]]kyis kyang lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la bsgo shig_/de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di na srid pa gsum thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/_mthu bo che thams cad 'dul bar bgyi ba/_mthu bo che thams cad kyi nga rgyal gcog 
[\[303a.5\]]pa bdag lags te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming yang lag na rdo rje zhes btags na 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin brlabs kyis sngags 'di smras pas bdag 
[\[303a.6\]]kyang khrag tu skyug cing 'gyel bar gyur na gzhan lta ci smos/_/'di ni 'da' bar dka'o/_/de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad do/_/
[\[303a.7\]]ma~M las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang ngo /_/sku ni dud ka chen po la/_/dbu skra kham nag ral pa can/_/dbu gsum pa la phyag drug ste/_/dmar dang dud ka gnag pa yin/_/g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/_/sti 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang /_/dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la/_/rdo rjes dkrug cig 'thung bar brtag_/g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni/_/sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang /_/khyung gi khrag chen thogs pa dang /_/sti ra phra mo'i gsus pa nas/_/
[\[303b.2\]]klo snying nang grol 'dren cing za/_/gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad nyid/_/o~M phrag g.yas la ak+Sha b+h+yaHhU~M/_/g.yon rat+na sam+b+ha ba trA~M/_/rkang g.yas a mo g+ha sid+d+hi AH/_/g.yon na a mi tA b+ha ste/_/hrIH_b+hu~M las rdo rje 'khor lo la/_/rdo rje rnams 
[\[303b.3\]]ni rig sngags brtag_/kau ri dang ni tsau ri dang /_/pra mo ha dang bait+ta li/_/gzhan yang byA g+h+r-i mu khA dang /_/sid+ha la sogs mgyogs ma rnams/_/sti ra la ni 'bri tshugs su/_/blta zhing rtod pa'i tshul bzhin gnas/_/ha ha de nas skad 
[\[303b.4\]]cig la/_/rig sngags nyid dang rbod gtong bcas/_/dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya/_/ras sam gro ga'am rtsa rnams la/_/khro bo'i gzugs su bris pa 'am/_/yang na skud pa nag pos bcing /_/ha ha gad mo chen po dang /_/rdo rje 
[\[303b.5\]]skul ba'i glu blangs te/_/pho nya rnams la mngag par bya/_/de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang /_/rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang /_/'khor lo la sogs mtshon cha yis/_/de dag phye mar brlag par bya/_/badzra tsa kra hU~M/_phye mar 
[\[303b.6\]]de dag gtubs nas ni/_/thod pa gzhu dang bcas pa yis/_/hom khung gru gsum sgo can du/_/ra~M zhes bya ba'i me spar te/_/drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos bod/_/rig sngags bsreg par bya/_/de ltar lha dang bdag sbyar na/_/

[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]bya/_/zin pa'i sems can gang yang rung /_/de dag skud pa nag pos bcing /_/de yang dum bur bcad par bya'o/_/de nas mi de snga ma bzhin/_/tshe gnas bya phyir 'bru lnga yis/_/gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod do/_/brid 
[\[304a.2\]]pa'i sems can bsrung bar bya/_/tsha zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni/_/sha dang chang dang yo byad rnams/_/gnag cing tsha bar rnam sbyar te/_/lha chen rnams la mchod par bya/_/de nas las rnams grub pa dang /_/ha ha la sogs gad mo 
[\[304a.3\]]dang /_/glu dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis/_/lha rnams bdag la thim par bya/_/'di ni bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_/las rnams thams cad grub par byed/_/shar phyogs na phra men ma kau ri kha dog sngon mo phyag gnyis pa ste/_/g.yon b+han d+ha 
[\[304a.4\]]tsan+dan dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa/_/g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i dbyug pa thogs pa/_o~M badzra gau rI dzaHdzaHhU~M zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci smos/_che ge mo zhig khug cig ces bcol 
[\[304a.5\]]nas gtor ma dang tsan+dan dmar chen ar+g+ha la o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo zhes brjod cing ar+g+ha lan gsum du bsgreng ngo /_/lho phyogs na tsau ri kha dog ser mo phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/_o~M badzra tsau rI hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bcol na phyag na rdo 
[\[304a.6\]]rje'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos/_nub phyogs na pra mo ha dmar mo phyag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa/_/o~M badzra pra mo ha hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang rang gi mthu bzhag nas dbang du 
[\[304a.7\]]'ong na gzhan lta ci smos/_/byang phyogs na bai t+ta li kha dog nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing zab/_g.yas na rdo rje 'phyar ba/_o~M badzra bai t+ta li hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]kyang 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsgrub pa phran tshegs lta ci smos/_shar lho'i mtshams na puk+ka si kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta 'dren cing za ba/_o~M badzra puk+ka si hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang 'ching zhing 
[\[304b.2\]]'dren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing za ba lta ci smos/_lho nub kyi mtshams na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang gu phyag g.yon na b+han d+ha tsan+dan dmar pos bkang ba rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol ba/_o~M badzra g+hasma ri hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na 
[\[304b.3\]]rdo rje yang myos par nus na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_nub byang gi mtshams na badzra karma kha dog ljang gu zhing chung ngu lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste snying ga nas za ba/_o~M badzra karma hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na las gang bya ba thams cad 
[\[304b.4\]]'grub bo/_/byang shar gyi mtshams na tsaN+Da li kha dog ser skya phyag g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i b+han+d+ha 'dzin pa/_g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa/_o~M badzra tsaN+Da li hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na zam dang ma ning yang rgyud 'phel bar byed na dbang po 
[\[304b.5\]]tshang zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing tshe dang dbang thang 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/_phra men ma 'di rnams phrin las skul ba'i tshe ar+g+ha dang gtor ma dbul ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/khros na thams cad phyag na tri shU la 'bar ba/_g.yon 
[\[304b.6\]]rnge'u chung bsnams pa/_gdan me smug nag_/sku'i kha dog nag mo la khrag dang zhag dang thal ba'i thig les tshom bur byas shing bsu tas rked pa bcings pa/_gser gyi pags pa go zur bgos pa srod ta a dza nas lus brgyan te gcer bu'i tshogs smug 
[\[304b.7\]]gnag 'bar ba/_g.yon rnge'u chung bsnams pa/_g.yas me smug kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing /_zad par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la thim par bya'o/_/de ni phyi rim bshad par bya'o/_/shar phyogs su sid+ha mu kha kha 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dog ser mo zhing chung kha na thogs pa/_lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba/_seng ge'i mgo can/_lho phyogs na byA g+h+ri mu kha kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun na zhing gnas pa la lta ba/_stag gi mgo can nub 
[\[305a.2\]]phyogs su srin gla mu kha kha dog nag mo lag pa gnyis zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing lces ldag pa wa mgo can/_byang phyogs na shwa na mu kha kha dog mthing ga zhing lag pa gnyis kyis khong dral te lta ba khyi mgo can/_shar lho'i mtshams su kr-i D+ha mu kha kha 
[\[305a.3\]]dog dmar gnag zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta kha na thogs pa/_lag pa g.yas b+han d+ha g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/_lho nub mtshams na kang+ka mu kha kha dog dkar dmar phrag pa g.yon pa la zhing khel zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/_g.yas pa 
[\[305a.4\]]mgo 'dzin pa/_bya kang+ka'i mgo can mchu ring thor to gug ze ba dmar mo/_/nub byang mtshams na kA ka mu kha kha dog nag mo/_bya rog gi mgo can mchus zhing thogs pa/_lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin pa/_byang shar mtshams su U lU ka 
[\[305a.5\]]mu kha kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis bkang ba la 'thung ba la g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/_'ug pa'i mgo can/_nang rim 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/_de'i phyi rim bya rog gi 'khor gyis bskor/_de'i phyi rim bya kang ka mchu 
[\[305a.6\]{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]'khor gyis bskor/_de'i phyi rim bya rgod kyi 'khor gyis bskor/_de dag thams cad kyang zhing mang po gsar rnying spungs pa'i steng na zhing la rtod pa'i phyir 'thab pa'i tshul ston pa sha stag go/_/de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so/_/hU~M ha he phaT hU~M/_'di

[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]ldan tshogs kyi bdag_/he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang /_rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang /_dam tshig gnyen po dral ba dang /_rdo rje spun la 'khu byed rnams/_/khyed kyis rdul du brlags nas ni/_/gnod sems ma lus gtan nas

[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]pa gdengs/_/zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan/_/de yi dkyil 'khor khro bo ni/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje'i brag steng na/_/'jig rten skyong bas 'dud tshul lo/_/de yi pho nya bka' nyan ni/_/rdo rje phra men gtum bag

[\[306a.7\]]kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hU~M/_a a a hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/_gardza gardza gardza hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra krod+ha bi dza ya hU~M/_ha na ha na ha 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]na hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M/_da ha da ha da ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+tA ka hU~M/_ba tsa pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya tsa la hU~M/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ta ya grI ba hU~M/_hu lu hu lu hu hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/_
[\[306b.2\]]o~M badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/_b+hin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha me hA ba la hU~M/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/_'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags ril 
[\[306b.3\]]'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//oM badzra kro d+he hU~M/_ha la ha la ha la ha la ha hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha hU~M/_ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M/_ma ma ma ma hU~M/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M/_dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M hU~M/_'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rdo rje srin mo'i sngags 
[\[306b.4\]]kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//mnyam pa nyid du rtogs byas nas/_/bskul zhing gsigs pa thams cad kyang /_/phyag rgya yin zhes rgyal pos bshad/_/mdo tsam du ni 'di ltar brtag_/lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng /_/rkang pa mthil sbyar thur du gzugs/_/tshigs 
[\[306b.5\]]chen bzhi yang gcag par bya/_/mgo dang mtshan yang snying por brtag_/rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang /_/bcu gcig tu yang rnam brtags te/_/'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yi/_/phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad/_/lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng /_/rkang pa phral nas 
[\[306b.6\]]brkyang bskum zhing /_/gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/_/'di ni hU~M gi rgya chen yin/_/rkang pa phral mthil thur du gzugs/_/lag pa phral nas gar byed cing /_/stabs su mchod par byed pa ni/_/'di ni stobs chen phyag rgya yin/_/rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas la 'khyud/_/
[\[306b.7\]]lag pa gar thabs bskor nas kyang /_/thal mo drag tu brdabs pa ni/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis/_/mthe'u chung sen mo'i mthil du gnon/_/gdangs pa'i thabs su bsgreng ba ni/_/dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin/_/
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/_/rdeg pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang /_/g.yon pa dku la brten pa ni/_/gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yis/_/gdab pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang /_/g.yon gyis 'dzin 
[\[307a.2\]]pa ltar byas pa/_/mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/gung mo rgyab tu bsnol bar bya/_/mthe bo gnyis kyang phral te bsgreng /_/spyi bor bzhag pa gre ba'i rgya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa thur du gzugs/_/lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng /_/g.yon 
[\[307a.3\]]pa'i rkang pa lag phyar ba'i/_/gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur brten te/_/rkang pa gshibs te mchongs pa ni/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya zhes/_/dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang /_/rkang pa 
[\[307a.4\]]brkyang bskum byas pa ni/_/khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes/_/mgon po dpa' bos yang du bshad/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon sprugs pa dang /_/lus kyang drag tu gsigs pa ni/_/rdo rje phra men ma rnams kyi/_/phyag rgya yin par 'dren pas bshad/_/phyag rgya 'di dag 
[\[307a.5\]]bcings nas ni/_/stabs chen drag tu mchongs byas na/_/khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang go 'phang thams cad kun/_/grub par gyur te the tshom med/_/rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos bshad/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa 
[\[307a.6\]]pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//'khor lo chen po'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i/_/dkyil du khrag 'thung spyan drangs te/_/mdun du hU~M yang spyan drang ngo /_/rgyab tu stobs chen spyan drangs nas/_/'khor lo rtsibs kyi steng dag tu/_/bcu po rnams kyang 
[\[307a.7\]{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/so so'i gnas su spyan drangs te/_/dmar gyi ar+g+ha gsol nas ni/_/mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod byas te/_/de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/_/zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]'byam kun/_/khros pas yud tsam rlag mdzad de/_/brlag par ma gyur gang yang med/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//rdo rje phra men sbyor ba yis/_/yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas/_/rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs 
[\[307b.2\]]na/_/lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/_/'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'i/_/phra men ma rnams sbad byas te/_/mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/_/de yi sems 'phrogs bsgom nyams 'gyur/_/phra men rnams ni sbad byas te/_/de yi sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing /_/gsang 
[\[307b.3\]]ste 'khrul par bsgom byas na/_/sgrub pa nyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i las kyi le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//hom khung zur gsum gdengs pa la/_/rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te/_/thod pa dag gis rnam par 
[\[307b.4\]]brgyan/_/spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi/_/phra men mngags te bkug nas ni/_/thab kun bsregs na mod la 'chi/_/bsur dang bsres pa'i sha rnams kyis/_/lha rnams thams cad mchod par byed/_/rdo rje glu ni blangs nas su/_/'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhim/_/'byung po'i 
[\[307b.5\]]khrag ni shin tu zhim/_/'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste/_/gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/_/mgo bo rgya mdung rtse zur gsum/_/khro 
[\[307b.6\]]bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te/_/btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//lcags phye dug dang rdo phye dang /_/khrag las sprus te bsres pa dang /_/mud ga'i tshan dang sbyor ba dag_/sbyor 
[\[307b.7\]]bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun khung du/_/khro bo'i tho bas brdungs pa yi/_/rdo rje gtun phrugs bsgom byas na/_/lha yang rung ste brdungs 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//drag po'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'i rnams/_/'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad nas/_/rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus gtums te/_/'og min 
[\[308a.2\]]bla med gnas mchog na/_/gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/_/sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang /_/khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams/_/sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang /_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gnas bstabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[308a.3\]]zla gam dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa/_/khro bo khro mo spyan drangs te/_/mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod/_/de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/_/chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pa/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/chags pas yud la dbang mdzad de/_/dbang 
[\[308a.4\]]du ma gyur gang yang med/_/rdo rje phra men mngags nas su/_/bkug nas khro bo chen po yis/_/chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus las/_/dpa' dang gzi brjid bsdus nas 'grub/_/phra men rnams ni mngags nas su/_/de yi mig rna sna dang lce/_/lus ngag sems bsgyur rnams 
[\[308a.5\]]bsgoms na/_/kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//hom khung zla gam gdengs pa la/_/rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya/_/de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te/_/mi 
[\[308a.6\]]phan rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing /_/mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam/_/mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te/_/btab na nges par de dbang 
[\[308a.7\]]'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi phur pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//zangs phye dang ni bu ram dang /_/dmar po'i 'bras can la sogs pa/_/sbyar bas gtor ma gtang bar bya/_/mthong bas 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]nges par de dbang 'gyur/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas na/_/lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur/_/de ni bde 
[\[308b.2\]]ba chen po yin/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_/gru bzhi dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/_/lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/_/mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod/_/de nas las 
[\[308b.3\]]rnams brtsam par bya/_/nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams/_/yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod/_/khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang /_/rdo rje phra men 'khor bcas pas/_/dpal 
[\[308b.4\]]dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na/_/bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//ho ma khung gru bzhi gdengs pa la/_/rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya/_/de nas lha 
[\[308b.5\]]rnams spyan drangs te/_/bsregs pas mchod cig dpal 'phel bsgom/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/_/mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur bzhi/_/lha rnams bsgoms 
[\[308b.6\]]te gdab par bya/_/'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//gser phye 'bras can ser po rnams/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni/_/rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/_/
[\[308b.7\]]mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom zhing sbyin/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom/_/byang chub sems ni 'phro 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]bsgoms na/_/'di ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//_//zlum po'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/_/lha rnams 'khor bcas 
[\[309a.2\]]spyan drangs te/_/dkar po'i yon gyis mchod pa bya/_/de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/_/gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/_/'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/_/yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de/_/zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha rnams 'khor bcas thams cad 
[\[309a.3\]]kyis/_/'khrug pa thams cad zhi mdzad par/_/bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis/_/zhi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//_//hom khung zlum po gdengs pa la/_/rdo rje pad+mos brgyan par bya/_/
[\[309a.4\]]phur pa dkar po drug btab ste/_/spyan drangs rdul phye sogs pas mchod/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//_//phur pa kha dog dkar po la/_/mgo po rgya mdud rtse zlum por/_/lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya/_/'di 
[\[309a.5\]]ni zhi ba'i las la shis/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//_//dngul dang 'bras chan dkar po rnams/_/'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni/_/zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/_/mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing /_/
[\[309a.6\]]gtor/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//_//lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lha yi grub pa bsgom par bya/_/byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na/_/lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur/_/'phags 
[\[309a.7\]]pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i spyod pa las kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//_//mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/de las dngos byung phyag rgya rnams/_/nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad/_/mkhas pas ci dgar bsgyur na 'grub/_/
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//_//drag pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur/_/dbang gis 'byor ba mchog kyang 'grub/_/rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel/_/zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang 
[\[309b.2\]]'grub/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/_de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med 
[\[309b.3\]]pa'i don no/_/'khor lo rtsibs zur can du bya ba gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyis brlabs kyi lha dang /_lha mo dang /_khro bo dang /_khro mo dang /_pho nya la sogs pa dang nyid kyis 'phro ba'i don no/_/rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par 
[\[309b.4\]]rtog pa med bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci yang mkhyen pa lhun gyis grub pa'i don no/_/mtha' gru bzhi bya ba ni/_phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/_dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba/_lha mo ni dbyings 
[\[309b.5\]]nyid nye ba'i byin brlabs te/_sems dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no/_/sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no/_/sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni/_dbyings nyid thams cad dus rdo lta bu bems po ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang 
[\[309b.6\]]ldan zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/_/sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi 
[\[309b.7\]]gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/_/rnam gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i don/_sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/_sems dpa' dang sems ma phyi nang 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go/_/khro bo dang khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni phyi'i dngos po dang rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don/_de la dbyings ni dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/_
[\[310a.2\]]nyi ma'i 'od snang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o/_/de'i byin brlabs ni dro zhing 'jam pa lta bu'o/_/phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta bu ste/_/lha mo dang sems ma ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang ba'o/_/lha dang sems 
[\[310a.3\]]dpa' ni dbyings la snang ba'i don mthong ba'o/_/dbyings nyid la snang ba dang mthong ba'i byin brlabs kyi ngang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis 'joms shing dbyings su sbyor bar 'dul ba ni/_/khro bo dang khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig 
[\[310a.4\]]rten skyong ba'i don no/_/'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa ni byin gyis brlabs las pho nya ltar gnas pa yin/_rnam gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lha mthu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don no/_/bkra shis brgyad ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs 
[\[310a.5\]]pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la spyod kyang nyan thos kyi zhi ba phyogs gcig par mi 'gyur te/_gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir bkra shis so/_/de la dpal be'u ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/_/'khor lo ni thams cad 
[\[310a.6\]]la dbang bsgyur ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bkra shis so/_/rin po che ni zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/_/pad+mo ni 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bkra shis so/_/gdugs ni nyon mongs pas ma gdungs pa'i bkra shis so/_/bum pa ni bdud rtsi mchog dang ldan 
[\[310a.7\]]pa'i bkra shis so/_/dung ni sgo thams cad spa dgong bar sgra sgrogs pa'i bkra shis so/_/nya ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can gyi don mdzad kyang nyam nga ba med pa'o/_/klong bzhi ni rigs lnga'i byin brlabs yin pa'am/_lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yod par 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]bstan pa'am/_thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go/_/rnam gcig tu thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/_/de la gtso mo 'khor lnga lnga dang btsas pa ni ci yang mi mdzad do/_/sems dpa' sems ma nyi shu ni kun la bu gcig bzhin no/_/de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyis khro bo dang 
[\[310b.2\]]khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni phyi nang thams cad kyi dngos po la rngon pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mthong ba bzhin no/_/de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyar ro/_/'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyod kyang longs spyod chen po ste/_nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas 
[\[310b.3\]]de ltar sgrub pa ni 'dod chags so/_/chos kyi dbyings ngang gis gsang ba phrag dog go/_/chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go/_/chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo/_/de la gtso bo ni 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni thams cad la khyab mod kyi nye 
[\[310b.4\]]bar ni dbu dang /_mdun dang /_thong ka yan chad/_rgyab mjug yan chad do/_/mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni phyag g.yas pa dang rtsib logs g.yas so/_/rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni phyag g.yon dang rtsib logs g.yon no/_/'od dpag med 
[\[310b.5\]]'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni/_zhabs g.yon nas rked pa g.yon man chad do/_/don yod grub pa 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni zhabs g.yas rked pa g.yon man chad do/_/khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni rigs so so'i byin brlabs bzhin no/_/de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lnga lngar 'gyur te/_sra 
[\[310b.6\]]ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rdo rje'i rigs so/_/dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs so/_/gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni pad+ma'i rigs so/_/bskyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni las kyi rigs so/_/de rnams cha mnyam pa las spyir grub pa ni dngos su bzhugs pa/_de bzhin 
[\[310b.7\]]gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni dbus su gyur pa thams cad do/_/sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni yangs pa'i spyan 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/_/dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni mA ma kI 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/_/gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]ni gos dkar mo 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/_/bskyod pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/_/don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o/_/de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni sems ma'o/_/de ltar rig pa ni khro bo dang khro mo'o/_/de la bsdu zhing 
[\[311a.2\]]spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o/_/phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o/_/de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa la rdo rje gzhon nu sde 'bum phrag du ma yi rangs te 'di skad ces bstod do/_/hU~M/_bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/_/'od zer 'du 'phro 
[\[311a.3\]]klong dkyil na/_/khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa/_/sku ni cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs/_/hU~M/_dbu skra kham gnag ral pa can/_/gyen du 'khyil ba srid rtser 'bar/_/mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni/_/log par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan/_/hU~M/_mche ba zang yag gtsigs pas ni/_/skye shi rtsa ba 
[\[311a.4\]]gcod pa'i tshul/_/sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs ni/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang /_/hU~M/_thugs rje'i byin brlabs sprin ltar 'khrigs/_/byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyur/_/rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs/_/sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs/_/hU~M/_sngon gyi 
[\[311a.5\]]thugs dam chen po ni/_/klan ka chen po bdud la tshol/_/kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad/_/dam tshig can la dngos grub stsol/_/hU~M/_thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/bdag la byin gyis rlob mdzad cing /_/bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams/_/grub par byin gyis brlab tu 
[\[311a.6\]]gsol/_/'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la/_/sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/_/sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste/_/bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags/_/hU~M/_srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[311a.7\]]khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'du 'phro khro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bstod de/_nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
